# <a name="microsoft-edge---policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-103">Microsoft Edge - 策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-103">Microsoft Edge - Policies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-104">最新版本的 Microsoft Edge 包含以下策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-104">The latest version of Microsoft Edge includes the following policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-105">可以使用这些策略来配置在你的组织中运行 Microsoft Edge 的方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-105">You can use these policies to configure how Microsoft Edge runs in your organization.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-107">可下载 [Microsoft Security Compliance Toolkit](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=55319)，以获得 Microsoft Edge 的建议安全配置基线设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-107">You can download the [Microsoft Security Compliance Toolkit](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=55319) for the recommended security configuration baseline settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-108">有关详细信息，请参阅 [Microsoft 安全基线博客](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-security-baselines/bg-p/Microsoft-Security-Baselines)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-108">For more information see the [Microsoft Security Baselines Blog](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-security-baselines/bg-p/Microsoft-Security-Baselines).</span></span>

> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-109">本文适用于 Microsoft Edge 版本 77 或更高版本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-109">This article applies to Microsoft Edge version 77 or later.</span></span>

## <a name="new-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-110">新策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-110">New policies</span></span>

|--|--|

|[<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-116">AutomaticHttpsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-116">AutomaticHttpsDefault</span></span>](#automatichttpsdefault)|<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-117">配置自动 HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-117">Configure Automatic HTTPS</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-118">CECPQ2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-118">CECPQ2Enabled</span></span>](#cecpq2enabled)|<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-119">为 TLS 启用了 CECPQ2 后量子密钥协议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-119">CECPQ2 post-quantum key-agreement enabled for TLS</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-120">InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-120">InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowed</span></span>](#insecureprivatenetworkrequestsallowed)|<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-121">指定是否允许不安全网站向更专用的网络终结点提出请求</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-121">Specifies whether to allow insecure websites to make requests to more-private network endpoints</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-122">InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-122">InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#insecureprivatenetworkrequestsallowedforurls)|<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-123">允许列出的站点从不安全环境向更专用的网络终结点提出请求</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-123">Allow the listed sites to make requests to more-private network endpoints from insecure contexts</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-124">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalSiteListExpirationDays</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-124">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalSiteListExpirationDays</span></span>](#internetexplorerintegrationlocalsitelistexpirationdays)|<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-125">指定站点在本地 IE 模式站点列表中保留的天数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-125">Specify the number of days that a site remains on the local IE mode site list</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-126">InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-126">InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed</span></span>](#internetexplorerintegrationreloadiniemodeallowed)|<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-127">允许以 Internet Explorer 模式重新加载未配置的站点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-127">Allow unconfigured sites to be reloaded in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-128">LocalBrowserDataShareEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-128">LocalBrowserDataShareEnabled</span></span>](#localbrowserdatashareenabled)|<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-129">启用 Windows 搜索本地 Microsoft Edge 浏览数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-129">Enable Windows to search local Microsoft Edge browsing data</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-130">TripleDESEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-130">TripleDESEnabled</span></span>](#tripledesenabled)|<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-131">在 TLS 中启用 3DES 密码套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-131">Enable 3DES cipher suites in TLS</span></span>|

  ## <a name="application-guard-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-923">应用程序防护设置策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-923">Application Guard settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-924">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-924">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="applicationguardcontainerproxy"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-925">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-925">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>

  #### <a name="application-guard-container-proxy"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-926">应用程序防护容器代理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-926">Application Guard Container Proxy</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-927">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-927">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-928">在 84 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-928">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-929">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-929">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-930">配置 Microsoft Edge 应用程序防护的代理设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-930">Configures the proxy settings for Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-931">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 应用程序防护将忽略其他代理配置源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-931">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard ignores other sources of proxy configurations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-932">如果未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 应用程序防护将使用主机的代理配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-932">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard uses the proxy configuration of the host.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-933">此策略不会影响应用程序防护（在主机上）以外的 Microsoft Edge 代理配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-933">This policy does not affect the proxy configuration of Microsoft Edge outside of Application Guard (on the host).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-934">使用 ProxyMode 字段，可指定 Microsoft Edge 应用程序防护使用的代理服务器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-934">The ProxyMode field lets you specify the proxy server used by Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-935">ProxyPacUrl 字段是指向代理 .pac 文件的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-935">The ProxyPacUrl field is a URL to a proxy .pac file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-936">ProxyServer 字段是代理服务器的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-936">The ProxyServer field is a URL for the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-937">如果将direct”值选择为“ProxyMode”，则所有其他字段都将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-937">If you choose the 'direct' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-938">如果将“auto_detect”值选择为“ProxyMode”，则所有其他字段都将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-938">If you choose the 'auto_detect' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-939">如果将“fixed_servers”值选择为“ProxyMode”，则使用“ProxyServer”字段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-939">If you choose the 'fixed_servers' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyServer' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-940">如果将“pac_script”值选择为“ProxyMode”，则使用“ProxyPacUrl”字段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-940">If you choose the 'pac_script' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyPacUrl' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-941">有关通过双代理识别应用程序防护流量的详细信息，请访问 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-941">For more information about identifying Application Guard traffic via dual proxy, visit [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-942">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-942">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-943">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-943">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-944">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-944">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-945">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-945">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-946">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-946">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-947">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-947">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-948">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-948">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-949">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-949">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-950">GP 唯一名称：ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-950">GP unique name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-951">GP 名称：应用程序防护容器代理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-951">GP name: Application Guard Container Proxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-952">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/应用程序防护设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-952">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-953">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-953">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-954">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-954">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-955">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-955">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-956">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-956">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-957">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-957">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-958">值名称：ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-958">Value Name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-959">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-959">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-960">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-960">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ApplicationGuardContainerProxy = {
  "ProxyMode": "direct",
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac",
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-961">精简示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-961">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ApplicationGuardContainerProxy = {"ProxyMode": "direct", "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"}
  ```
  

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-962">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-962">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="applicationguardfavoritessyncenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-963">ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-963">ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="application-guard-favorites-sync-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-964">已启用应用程序防护收藏夹同步</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-964">Application Guard Favorites Sync Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-965">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-965">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-966">在 Windows 上自 90 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-966">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-967">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-967">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-968">此策略允许启用应用程序防护的 Microsoft Edge 计算机/设备将收藏夹从主机同步到容器，以便收藏夹匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-968">This policy allows Microsoft Edge computers/devices that have application guard enabled to sync favorites from the host to the container so the favorites match.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-969">如果配置了 [ManagedFavorites](#managedfavorites)，这些收藏夹也将同步到容器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-969">If [ManagedFavorites](#managedfavorites) are configured, those favorites will also be synced to the container.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-970">如果启用此策略，将禁用在容器中编辑收藏夹。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-970">If you enable this policy, editing favorites in the container is disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-971">因此，“添加收藏夹”和“添加收藏夹文件夹”按钮将在容器浏览器的 UI 中模糊显示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-971">So, the add favorites and add favorites folder buttons will be blurred out in the UI of the container browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-972">如果禁用或未配置此策略，主机上的收藏夹将不会共享到容器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-972">If you disable or don't configure this policy, favorites on the host will not be shared to the container.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-973">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-973">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-974">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-974">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-975">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-975">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-976">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-976">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-977">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-977">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-978">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-978">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-979">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-979">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-980">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-980">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-981">GP 唯一名称：ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-981">GP unique name: ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-982">GP 名称：已启用应用程序防护收藏夹同步</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-982">GP name: Application Guard Favorites Sync Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-983">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/应用程序防护设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-983">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-984">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-984">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-985">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-985">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-986">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-986">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-987">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-987">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-988">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-988">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-989">值名称：ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-989">Value Name: ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-990">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-990">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-991">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-991">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-992">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-992">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="applicationguardtrafficidentificationenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-993">ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-993">ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="application-guard-traffic-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-994">Application Guard 通信标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-994">Application Guard Traffic Identification</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-995">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-995">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-996">在 91 或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-996">On Windows since 91 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-997">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-997">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-998">如果启用或不配置此策略，Application Guard 将为来自 Application Guard 容器的所有出站 HTTP 请求添加额外的 HTTP 标头（X-MS-ApplicationGuard-启动）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-998">If you enable or don't configure this policy, Application Guard will add an extra HTTP header (X-MS-ApplicationGuard-Initiated) to all outbound HTTP requests made from the Application Guard container.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-999">如果禁用此策略，额外标题将不会添加到流量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-999">If you disable this policy, the extra header is not added to the traffic.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1000">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1000">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1001">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1001">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1002">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1002">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1003">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1003">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1004">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1004">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1005">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1005">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1006">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1006">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1007">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1007">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1008">GP 唯一名称：ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1008">GP unique name: ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1009">GP 名称：Application Guard 流量标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1009">GP name: Application Guard Traffic Identification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1010">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/应用程序防护设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1010">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1011">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1011">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1012">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1012">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1013">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1013">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1014">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1014">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1015">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1015">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1016">值名称：ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1016">Value Name: ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1017">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1017">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1018">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1018">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1019">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1019">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <a name="cast-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1020">Cast 策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1020">Cast policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1021">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1021">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="enablemediarouter"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1022">EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1022">EnableMediaRouter</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-google-cast"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1023">启用 Google Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1023">Enable Google Cast</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1024">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1024">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1025">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1025">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1026">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1026">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1027">启用此策略以启用 Google Cast。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1027">Enable this policy to enable Google Cast.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1028">用户将能够从应用菜单、页面上下文菜单、启用了 Cast 的网站上的媒体控件以及 Cast 工具栏图标（如果显示）中启动它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1028">Users will be able to launch it from the app menu, page context menus, media controls on Cast-enabled websites, and (if shown) the Cast toolbar icon.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1029">禁用此策略以禁用 Google Cast。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1029">Disable this policy to disable Google Cast.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1030">默认情况下，将启用 Google Cast。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1030">By default, Google Cast is enabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1031">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1031">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1032">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1032">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1033">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1033">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1034">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1034">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1035">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1035">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1036">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1036">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1037">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1037">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1038">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1038">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1039">GP 唯一名称：EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1039">GP unique name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1040">GP 名称：启用 Google Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1040">GP name: Enable Google Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1041">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1041">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1042">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1042">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1043">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1043">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1044">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1044">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1045">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1045">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1046">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1046">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1047">值名称：EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1047">Value Name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1048">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1048">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1049">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1049">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1050">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1050">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1051">首选项项名称：EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1051">Preference Key Name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1052">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1052">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1053">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1053">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="showcasticonintoolbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1054">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1054">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-the-cast-icon-in-the-toolbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1055">在工具栏中显示 Cast 图标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1055">Show the cast icon in the toolbar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1056">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1056">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1057">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1057">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1058">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1058">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1059">将此策略设置为 true，以在工具栏或溢出菜单上显示 Cast 工具栏图标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1059">Set this policy to true to show the Cast toolbar icon on the toolbar or the overflow menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1060">用户无法将其删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1060">Users won't be able to remove it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1061">如果未配置此策略或将其禁用，则用户可以使用其上下文菜单固定或删除图标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1061">If you don't configure this policy or if you disable it, users can pin or remove the icon by using its contextual menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1062">如果还将 [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) 策略设置为 false，则此策略将被忽略，并且不会显示工具栏图标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1062">If you've also set the [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) policy to false, then this policy is ignored, and the toolbar icon isn't shown.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1063">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1063">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1064">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1064">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1065">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1065">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1066">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1066">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1067">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1067">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1068">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1068">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1069">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1069">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1070">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1070">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1071">GP 唯一名称：ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1071">GP unique name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1072">GP 名称：在工具栏中显示 Cast 图标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1072">GP name: Show the cast icon in the toolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1073">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1073">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1074">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1074">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1075">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1075">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1076">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1076">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1077">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1077">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1078">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1078">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1079">值名称：ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1079">Value Name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1080">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1080">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1081">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1081">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1082">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1082">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1083">首选项项名称：ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1083">Preference Key Name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1084">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1084">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1085">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1085">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <a name="content-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1086">内容设置策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1086">Content settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1087">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1087">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autoselectcertificateforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1088">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1088">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="automatically-select-client-certificates-for-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1089">自动为这些网站选择客户端证书</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1089">Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1090">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1090">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1091">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1091">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1092">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1092">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1093">通过设置策略，您可以生成一个 URL 模式列表，这些模式指定 Microsoft Edge 可以为其自动选择客户端证书的站点。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1093">Setting the policy lets you make a list of URL patterns that specify sites for which Microsoft Edge can automatically select a client certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1094">该值是一个字符串化的 JSON 字典数组，每个字典的格式为 { "pattern": "$URL_PATTERN", "filter" : $FILTER }，其中 $URL_PATTERN 是内容设置模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1094">The value is an array of stringified JSON dictionaries, each with the form { "pattern": "$URL_PATTERN", "filter" : $FILTER }, where $URL_PATTERN is a content setting pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1095">$FILTER 限制浏览器自动从中选择的客户端证书。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1095">$FILTER restricts the client certificates the browser automatically selects from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1096">独立于筛选器，仅选择与服务器证书请求匹配的证书。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1096">Independent of the filter, only certificates that match the server's certificate request are selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1097">"$FILTER" 部分的用法示例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1097">Examples for the usage of the $FILTER section:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1098">当 $FILTER 设置为 { "ISSUER": { "CN": "$ISSUER_CN" } } 时，只选择由 CommonName 为 $ISSUER\u CN 的证书颁发的客户端证书。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1098">When $FILTER is set to { "ISSUER": { "CN": "$ISSUER_CN" } }, only client certificates issued by a certificate with the CommonName $ISSUER_CN are selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1099">当 $FILTER 同时包含“证书颁发者”和“使用者”部分时，只选择满足这两个条件的客户端证书。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1099">When $FILTER contains both the "ISSUER" and the "SUBJECT" sections, only client certificates that satisfy both conditions are selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1100">当 $FILTER 包含具有 “O” 值的“使用者”部分时，证书至少需要一个与指定值匹配的组织才能被选择。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1100">When $FILTER contains a "SUBJECT" section with the "O" value, a certificate needs at least one organization matching the specified value to be selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1101">当 $FILTER 包含具有 “OU” 值的“使用者”部分时，证书至少需要一个与指定值匹配的组织单位才能选择。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1101">When $FILTER contains a "SUBJECT" section with a "OU" value, a certificate needs at least one organizational unit matching the specified value to be selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1102">当 $FILTER 设置为 {} 时，客户端证书的选择不受额外限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1102">When $FILTER is set to {}, the selection of client certificates is not additionally restricted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1103">请注意，web 服务器提供的过滤器仍然适用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1103">Note that filters provided by the web server still apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1104">如果不设置策略，任何站点都不会自动选择。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1104">If you leave the policy unset, there's no autoselection for any site.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1105">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1105">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1106">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1106">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1107">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1107">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1108">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1108">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1109">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1109">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1110">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1110">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1111">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1111">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1112">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1112">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1113">GP 唯一名称：AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1113">GP unique name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1114">GP 名称：自动为这些网站选择客户端证书</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1114">GP name: Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1115">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1115">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1116">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1116">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1117">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1117">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1118">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1118">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1119">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1119">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1120">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1120">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1121">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1121">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1122">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1122">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1123">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1123">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls\1 = "{\"pattern\":\"https://www.contoso.com\",\"filter\":{\"ISSUER\":{\"CN\":\"certificate issuer name\", \"L\": \"certificate issuer location\", \"O\": \"certificate issuer org\", \"OU\": \"certificate issuer org unit\"}, \"SUBJECT\":{\"CN\":\"certificate subject name\", \"L\": \"certificate subject location\", \"O\": \"certificate subject org\", \"OU\": \"certificate subject org unit\"}}}"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1124">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1124">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1125">首选项项名称：AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1125">Preference Key Name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1126">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1126">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>{"pattern":"https://www.contoso.com","filter":{"ISSUER":{"CN":"certificate issuer name", "L": "certificate issuer location", "O": "certificate issuer org", "OU": "certificate issuer org unit"}, "SUBJECT":{"CN":"certificate subject name", "L": "certificate subject location", "O": "certificate subject org", "OU": "certificate subject org unit"}}}</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1127">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1127">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="cookiesallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1128">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1128">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-cookies-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1129">在特定网站上允许 cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1129">Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1130">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1130">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1131">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1131">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1132">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1132">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1133">根据 URL 模式定义允许设置 Cookie 的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1133">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1134">如果未配置此策略，则所有网站都将使用 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 策略中的全局默认值（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1134">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1135">有关详细信息，请参阅 [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) 和 [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1135">See the [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1136">请注意，这三个策略设置的 URL 模式不能冲突：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1136">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1137">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1137">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1138">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1138">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1139">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1139">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1140">关于有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1140">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1141">\* 不是此策略的接受值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1141">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1142">若要排除退出时删除 Cookie 的功能，请配置 [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1142">To exclude cookies from being deleted on exit, configure the [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1143">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1143">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1144">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1144">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1145">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1145">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1146">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1146">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1147">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1147">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1148">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1148">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1149">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1149">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1150">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1150">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1151">GP 唯一名称：CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1151">GP unique name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1152">GP 名称：在特定网站上允许 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1152">GP name: Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1153">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1153">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1154">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1154">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1155">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1155">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1156">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1156">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1157">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1157">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1158">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1158">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1159">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1159">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1160">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1160">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1161">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1161">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1162">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1162">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1163">首选项项名称：CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1163">Preference Key Name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1164">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1164">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1165">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1165">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="cookiesblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1166">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1166">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-cookies-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1167">在特定站点上阻止 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1167">Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1168">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1168">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1169">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1169">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1170">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1170">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1171">根据 URL 模式定义不能设置 Cookie 的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1171">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1172">如果未配置此策略，则所有网站都将使用 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 策略中的全局默认值（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1172">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1173">有关详细信息，请参阅 [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) 和 [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1173">See the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1174">请注意，这三个策略设置的 URL 模式不能冲突：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1174">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1175">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1175">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1176">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1176">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1177">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1177">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1178">有关有效 url 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1178">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1179">\* 不是此策略的接受值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1179">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1180">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1180">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1181">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1181">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1182">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1182">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1183">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1183">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1184">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1184">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1185">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1185">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1186">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1186">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1187">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1187">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1188">GP 唯一名称：CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1188">GP unique name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1189">GP 名称：在特定站点上阻止 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1189">GP name: Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1190">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1190">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1191">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1191">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1192">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1192">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1193">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1193">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1194">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1194">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1195">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1195">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1196">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1196">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1197">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1197">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1198">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1198">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1199">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1199">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1200">首选项项名称：CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1200">Preference Key Name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1201">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1201">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1202">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1202">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="cookiessessiononlyforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1203">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1203">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="limit-cookies-from-specific-websites-to-the-current-session"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1204">将来自特定网站的 Cookie 限制为当前会话</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1204">Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1205">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1205">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1206">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1206">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1207">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1207">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1208">当会话结束时（窗口关闭时），将删除由与你定义的 URL 模式匹配的网站创建的 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1208">Cookies created by websites that match a URL pattern you define are deleted when the session ends (when the window closes).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1209">由与模式不匹配的网站创建的 Cookie 受 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 策略（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置控制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1209">Cookies created by websites that don't match the pattern are controlled by the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or by the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1210">如果未配置此策略，这也是默认行为。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1210">This is also the default behavior if you don't configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1211">还可以使用 [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) 和 [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) 策略来控制哪些网站可以创建 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1211">You can also use the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) policies to control which websites can create cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1212">请注意，这三个策略设置的 URL 模式不能冲突：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1212">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1213">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1213">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1214">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1214">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1215">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1215">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1216">有关有效 url 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1216">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1217">\* 不是此策略的接受值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1217">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1218">如果将 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 策略设置为从以前的会话还原 URL，则此策略会被忽略，并且将永久存储这些网站的 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1218">If you set the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy to restore URLs from previous sessions, this policy is ignored, and cookies are stored permanently for those sites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1219">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1219">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1220">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1220">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1221">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1221">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1222">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1222">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1223">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1223">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1224">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1224">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1225">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1225">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1226">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1226">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1227">GP 唯一名称：CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1227">GP unique name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1228">GP 名称：将来自特定网站的 Cookie 限制为当前会话</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1228">GP name: Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1229">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1229">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1230">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1230">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1231">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1231">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1232">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1232">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1233">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1233">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1234">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1234">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1235">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1235">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1236">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1236">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1237">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1237">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1238">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1238">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1239">首选项项名称：CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1239">Preference Key Name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1240">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1240">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1241">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1241">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultcookiessetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1242">DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1242">DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-cookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1243">配置 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1243">Configure cookies</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1244">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1244">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1245">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1245">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1246">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1246">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1247">控制网站是否可以在用户的设备上创建 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1247">Control whether websites can create cookies on the user's device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1248">此策略为全有或全无 - 可以让所有网站创建 Cookie，或没有网站可创建 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1248">This policy is all or nothing - you can let all websites create cookies, or no websites create cookies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1249">不能使用此策略来启用来自特定网站的 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1249">You can't use this policy to enable cookies from specific websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1250">将策略设置为“SessionOnly”可在会话关闭时清除 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1250">Set the policy to 'SessionOnly' to clear cookies when the session closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1251">如果未配置此策略，则将使用默认的“AllowCookies”，用户可以在 Microsoft Edge “设置”中更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1251">If you don't configure this policy, the default 'AllowCookies' is used, and users can change this setting in Microsoft Edge Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1252">（如果不希望用户能够更改此设置，请设置该策略。）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1252">(If you don't want users to be able to change this setting, set the policy.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1253">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1253">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1254">AllowCookies (1) = 允许所有网站创建 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1254">AllowCookies (1) = Let all sites create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1255">BlockCookies (2) = 禁止任何网站创建 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1255">BlockCookies (2) = Don't let any site create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1256">SessionOnly (4) = 在会话期间保留 Cookie，但 [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) 中列出的 Cookie除外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1256">SessionOnly (4) = Keep cookies for the duration of the session, except ones listed in [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1257">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1257">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1258">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1258">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1259">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1259">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1260">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1260">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1261">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1261">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1262">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1262">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1263">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1263">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1264">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1264">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1265">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1265">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1266">GP 唯一名称：DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1266">GP unique name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1267">GP 名称：配置 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1267">GP name: Configure cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1268">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1268">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1269">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1269">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1270">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1270">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1271">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1271">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1272">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1272">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1273">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1273">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1274">值名称：DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1274">Value Name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1275">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1275">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1276">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1276">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1277">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1277">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1278">首选项项名称：DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1278">Preference Key Name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1279">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1279">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1280">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1280">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1281">DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1281">DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-file-system-api-for-reading"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1282">控制文件系统 API 在读取中的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1282">Control use of the File System API for reading</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1283">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1283">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1284">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1284">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1285">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1285">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1286">如果将此策略设置为 3，则网站可以使用文件系统 API 请求对主机操作系统的文件系统进行读取访问。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1286">If you set this policy to 3, websites can ask for read access to the host operating system's filesystem using the File System API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1287">如果将此策略设置为 2，则会拒绝访问。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1287">If you set this policy to 2, access is denied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1288">如果未设置此策略，网站可以请求访问。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1288">If you don't set this policy, websites can ask for access.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1289">用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1289">Users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1290">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1290">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1291">BlockFileSystemRead (2) = 不允许任何网站通过文件系统 API 请求对文件和目录的读取权限</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1291">BlockFileSystemRead (2) = Don't allow any site to request read access to files and directories via the File System API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1292">AskFileSystemRead (3) = 允许网站通过文件系统 API 请求用户授予对文件和目录的读取权限</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1292">AskFileSystemRead (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant read access to files and directories via the File System API</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1293">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1293">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1294">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1294">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1295">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1295">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1296">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1296">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1297">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1297">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1298">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1298">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1299">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1299">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1300">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1300">Windows information and settings</span></span>
