  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1301">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1301">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1302">GP 唯一名称：DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1302">GP unique name: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1303">GP 名称：控制文件系统 API 在读取中的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1303">GP name: Control use of the File System API for reading</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1304">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1304">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1305">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1305">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1306">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1306">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1307">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1307">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1308">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1308">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1309">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1309">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1310">值名称：DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1310">Value Name: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1311">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1311">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1312">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1312">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1313">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1313">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1314">首选项项名称：DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1314">Preference Key Name: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1315">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1315">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1316">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1316">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1317">DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1317">DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-file-system-api-for-writing"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1318">控制文件系统 API 在写入中的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1318">Control use of the File System API for writing</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1319">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1319">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1320">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1320">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1321">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1321">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1322">如果将此策略设置为 3，则网站可以使用文件系统 API 请求对主机操作系统的文件系统进行写入访问。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1322">If you set this policy to 3, websites can ask for write access to the host operating system's filesystem using the File System API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1323">如果将此策略设置为 2，则会拒绝访问。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1323">If you set this policy to 2, access is denied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1324">如果未设置此策略，网站可以请求访问。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1324">If you don't set this policy, websites can ask for access.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1325">用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1325">Users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1326">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1326">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1327">BlockFileSystemWrite (2) = 不允许任何网站通过文件系统 API 请求对文件和目录的写入权限</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1327">BlockFileSystemWrite (2) = Don't allow any site to request write access to files and directories</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1328">AskFileSystemWrite (3) = 允许网站请求用户授予对文件和目录的写入权限</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1328">AskFileSystemWrite (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant write access to files and directories</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1329">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1329">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1330">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1330">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1331">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1331">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1332">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1332">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1333">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1333">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1334">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1334">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1335">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1335">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1336">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1336">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1337">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1337">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1338">GP 唯一名称：DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1338">GP unique name: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1339">GP 名称：控制文件系统 API 在写入中的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1339">GP name: Control use of the File System API for writing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1340">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1340">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1341">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1341">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1342">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1342">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1343">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1343">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1344">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1344">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1345">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1345">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1346">值名称：DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1346">Value Name: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1347">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1347">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1348">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1348">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1349">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1349">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1350">首选项项名称：DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1350">Preference Key Name: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1351">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1351">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1352">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1352">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultgeolocationsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1353">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1353">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-geolocation-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1354">默认地理位置设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1354">Default geolocation setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1355">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1355">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1356">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1356">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1357">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1357">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1358">设置网站是否可以跟踪用户的物理位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1358">Set whether websites can track users' physical locations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1359">默认情况下，可允许跟踪（"AllowGeolocation"），默认情况下将其拒绝（"BlockGeolocation"），或在网站每次请求用户位置（"AskGeolocation"）时询问该用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1359">You can allow tracking by default ('AllowGeolocation'), deny it by default ('BlockGeolocation'), or ask the user each time a website requests their location ('AskGeolocation').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1360">如果未配置此策略，则会使用“AskGeolocation”策略，用户可以对其进行更改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1360">If you don't configure this policy, 'AskGeolocation' is used and the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1361">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1361">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1362">AllowGeolocation (1) = 允许网站跟踪用户的物理位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1362">AllowGeolocation (1) = Allow sites to track users' physical location</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1363">BlockGeolocation (2) = 不允许任何网站跟踪用户的物理位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1363">BlockGeolocation (2) = Don't allow any site to track users' physical location</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1364">AskGeolocation (3) = 每当网站想要跟踪用户的物理位置时询问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1364">AskGeolocation (3) = Ask whenever a site wants to track users' physical location</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1365">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1365">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1366">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1366">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1367">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1367">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1368">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1368">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1369">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1369">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1370">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1370">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1371">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1371">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1372">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1372">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1373">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1373">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1374">GP 唯一名称：DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1374">GP unique name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1375">GP 名称：默认地理位置设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1375">GP name: Default geolocation setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1376">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1376">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1377">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1377">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1378">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1378">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1379">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1379">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1380">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1380">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1381">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1381">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1382">值名称：DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1382">Value Name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1383">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1383">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1384">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1384">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1385">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1385">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1386">首选项项名称：DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1386">Preference Key Name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1387">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1387">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1388">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1388">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultimagessetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1389">DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1389">DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-images-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1390">默认图像设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1390">Default images setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1391">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1391">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1392">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1392">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1393">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1393">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1394">设置网站是否可以显示图像。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1394">Set whether websites can display images.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1395">可在所有网站上允许（"AllowImages"）或在所有网站上阻止这些图像（"BlockImages"）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1395">You can allow images on all sites ('AllowImages') or block them on all sites ('BlockImages').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1396">如果未配置此策略，则默认情况下允许图像，用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1396">If you don't configure this policy, images are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1397">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1397">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1398">AllowImages (1) = 允许所有网站显示所有图像</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1398">AllowImages (1) = Allow all sites to show all images</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1399">BlockImages (2) = 不允许任何网站显示图像</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1399">BlockImages (2) = Don't allow any site to show images</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1400">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1400">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1401">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1401">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1402">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1402">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1403">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1403">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1404">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1404">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1405">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1405">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1406">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1406">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1407">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1407">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1408">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1408">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1409">GP 唯一名称：DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1409">GP unique name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1410">GP 名称：默认图像设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1410">GP name: Default images setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1411">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1411">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1412">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1412">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1413">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1413">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1414">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1414">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1415">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1415">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1416">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1416">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1417">值名称：DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1417">Value Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1418">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1418">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1419">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1419">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1420">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1420">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1421">首选项项名称：DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1421">Preference Key Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1422">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1422">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1423">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1423">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultinsecurecontentsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1424">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1424">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-insecure-content-exceptions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1425">控制不安全内容异常的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1425">Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1426">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1426">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1427">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 80 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1427">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1428">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1428">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1429">允许你设置用户是否可以添加例外来允许特定网站的混合内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1429">Allows you to set whether users can add exceptions to allow mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1430">对于特定 URL 模式，可使用 [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) 和 [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls) 策略替代此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1430">This policy can be overridden for specific URL patterns using the [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) and [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1431">如果未设置此策略，则允许用户添加例外，以便允许可阻止的混合内容，并禁用可选择性阻止的混合内容的自动升级。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1431">If this policy isn't set, users will be allowed to add exceptions to allow blockable mixed content and disable autoupgrades for optionally blockable mixed content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1432">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1432">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1433">BlockInsecureContent (2) = 不允许任何网站加载混合内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1433">BlockInsecureContent (2) = Do not allow any site to load mixed content</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1434">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = 允许用户添加例外以允许混合内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1434">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = Allow users to add exceptions to allow mixed content</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1435">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1435">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1436">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1436">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1437">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1437">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1438">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1438">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1439">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1439">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1440">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1440">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1441">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1441">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1442">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1442">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1443">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1443">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1444">GP 唯一名称：DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1444">GP unique name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1445">GP 名称：控制不安全内容异常的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1445">GP name: Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1446">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1446">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1447">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1447">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1448">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1448">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1449">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1449">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1450">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1450">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1451">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1451">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1452">值名称：DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1452">Value Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1453">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1453">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1454">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1454">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1455">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1455">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1456">首选项项名称：DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1456">Preference Key Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1457">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1457">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
