  ### <a name="defaultjavascriptsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1459">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1459">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-javascript-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1460">默认 JavaScript 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1460">Default JavaScript setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1461">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1461">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1462">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1462">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1463">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1463">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1464">设置网站是否可以运行 JavaScript。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1464">Set whether websites can run JavaScript.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1465">可为所有网站允许 JavaScript （"AllowJavaScript"），或为所有网站阻止 JavaScript （"BlockJavaScript"）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1465">You can allow it for all sites ('AllowJavaScript') or block it for all sites ('BlockJavaScript').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1466">如果未配置此策略，则默认情况下，所有网站都可以运行 JavaScript，用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1466">If you don't configure this policy, all sites can run JavaScript by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1467">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1467">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1468">AllowJavaScript (1) = 允许所有网站运行 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1468">AllowJavaScript (1) = Allow all sites to run JavaScript</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1469">BlockJavaScript (2) = 不允许任何网站运行 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1469">BlockJavaScript (2) = Don't allow any site to run JavaScript</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1470">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1470">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1471">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1471">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1472">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1472">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1473">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1473">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1474">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1474">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1475">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1475">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1476">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1476">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1477">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1477">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1478">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1478">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1479">GP 唯一名称：DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1479">GP unique name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1480">GP 名称：默认 JavaScript 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1480">GP name: Default JavaScript setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1481">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1481">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1482">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1482">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1483">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1483">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1484">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1484">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1485">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1485">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1486">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1486">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1487">值名称：DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1487">Value Name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1488">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1488">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1489">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1489">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1490">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1490">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1491">首选项项名称：DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1491">Preference Key Name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1492">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1492">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1493">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1493">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultnotificationssetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1494">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1494">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-notification-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1495">默认通知设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1495">Default notification setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1496">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1496">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1497">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1497">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1498">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1498">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1499">设置网站是否可以显示桌面通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1499">Set whether websites can display desktop notifications.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1500">默认情况下，可以允许他们（"AllowNotifications"），默认情况下将其拒绝（"BlockNotifications"），或者每次网站想要显示通知时，都会询问用户（"AskNotifications"）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1500">You can allow them by default ('AllowNotifications'), deny them by default ('BlockNotifications'), or have the user be asked each time a website wants to show a notification ('AskNotifications').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1501">如果未配置此策略，则默认情况下允许通知，用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1501">If you don't configure this policy, notifications are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1502">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1502">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1503">AllowNotifications (1) = 允许网站显示桌面通知</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1503">AllowNotifications (1) = Allow sites to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1504">BlockNotifications (2) = 不允许任何网站显示桌面通知</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1504">BlockNotifications (2) = Don't allow any site to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1505">AskNotifications (3) = 每次网站想要显示桌面通知时询问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1505">AskNotifications (3) = Ask every time a site wants to show desktop notifications</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1506">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1506">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1507">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1507">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1508">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1508">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1509">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1509">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1510">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1510">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1511">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1511">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1512">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1512">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1513">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1513">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1514">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1514">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1515">GP 唯一名称：DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1515">GP unique name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1516">GP 名称：默认通知设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1516">GP name: Default notification setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1517">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1517">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1518">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1518">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1519">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1519">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1520">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1520">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1521">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1521">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1522">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1522">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1523">值名称：DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1523">Value Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1524">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1524">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1525">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1525">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1526">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1526">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1527">首选项项名称：DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1527">Preference Key Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1528">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1528">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1529">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1529">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultpluginssetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1530">DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1530">DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-adobe-flash-setting-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1531">默认 Adobe Flash 设置（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1531">Default Adobe Flash setting (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1532">已过时：此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 87 后不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1532">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1533">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1533">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1534">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 起至 87</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1534">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1535">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1535">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1536">此策略不起作用，因为 Microsoft Edge 不再支持 Flash。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1536">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1537">先检查 [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) 和 [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls)，然后再检查此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1537">[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) and [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) are checked first, then this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1538">选项为 "ClickToPlay" 和 "BlockPlugins"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1538">The options are 'ClickToPlay' and 'BlockPlugins'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1539">如果将此策略设置为 "BlockPlugins"，则所有网站均将拒绝该插件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1539">If you set this policy to 'BlockPlugins', this plugin is denied for all websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1540">点击 "ClickToPlay" 可运行 Flash 插件，但用户需单击占位以启动。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1540">'ClickToPlay' lets the Flash plugin run, but users click the placeholder to start it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1541">如果未配置此策略，用户可以手动更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1541">If you don't configure this policy, the user can change this setting manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1542">注意：仅对 [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) 策略中显式列出的域允许自动播放。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1542">Note: Automatic playback is only for domains explicitly listed in the [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1543">若要为所有网站打开"自动播放"，请将 http://\* 和 https://\* 添加到允许的 URL 列表中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1543">To turn automatic playback on for all sites, add http://\* and https://\* to the allowed list of URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1544">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1544">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1545">BlockPlugins (2) = 阻止 Adobe Flash 插件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1545">BlockPlugins (2) = Block the Adobe Flash plugin</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1546">ClickToPlay (3) = 单击播放</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1546">ClickToPlay (3) = Click to play</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1547">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1547">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1548">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1548">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1549">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1549">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1550">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1550">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1551">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1551">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1552">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1552">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1553">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1553">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1554">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1554">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1555">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1555">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1556">GP 唯一名称：DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1556">GP unique name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1557">GP 名称：默认 Adobe Flash 设置（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1557">GP name: Default Adobe Flash setting (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1558">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1558">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1559">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1559">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1560">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1560">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1561">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1561">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1562">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1562">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1563">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1563">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1564">值名称：DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1564">Value Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1565">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1565">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1566">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1566">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1567">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1567">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1568">首选项项名称：DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1568">Preference Key Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1569">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1569">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1570">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1570">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultpopupssetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1571">DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1571">DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-pop-up-window-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1572">默认弹出窗口设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1572">Default pop-up window setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1573">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1573">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1574">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1574">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1575">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1575">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1576">设置网站是否可以显示弹出窗口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1576">Set whether websites can show pop-up windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1577">可在所有网站上允许弹出窗口（"AllowPopups"），或在所有网站上阻止弹出窗口（"BlockPopups"）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1577">You can allow them on all websites ('AllowPopups') or block them on all sites ('BlockPopups').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1578">如果未配置此策略，则默认情况下将阻止弹出窗口，用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1578">If you don't configure this policy, pop-up windows are blocked by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1579">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1579">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1580">AllowPopups (1) = 允许所有网站显示弹出窗口</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1580">AllowPopups (1) = Allow all sites to show pop-ups</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1581">BlockPopups (2) = 不允许任何网站显示弹出窗口</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1581">BlockPopups (2) = Do not allow any site to show popups</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1582">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1582">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1583">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1583">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1584">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1584">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1585">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1585">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1586">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1586">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1587">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1587">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1588">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1588">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1589">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1589">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1590">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1590">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1591">GP 唯一名称：DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1591">GP unique name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1592">GP 名称：默认弹出窗口设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1592">GP name: Default pop-up window setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1593">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1593">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1594">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1594">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1595">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1595">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1596">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1596">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1597">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1597">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1598">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1598">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1599">值名称：DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1599">Value Name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1600">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1600">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1601">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1601">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1602">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1602">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1603">首选项项名称：DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1603">Preference Key Name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1604">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1604">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1605">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1605">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultwebbluetoothguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1606">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1606">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-web-bluetooth-api"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1607">控制 Web 蓝牙 API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1607">Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1608">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1608">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1609">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1609">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1610">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1610">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1611">控制网站是否可以访问附近的蓝牙设备。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1611">Control whether websites can access nearby Bluetooth devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1612">可以完全阻止访问，也可以在网站每次想要访问蓝牙设备时询问用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1612">You can completely block access or require the site to ask the user each time it wants to access a Bluetooth device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1613">如果未配置此策略，则使用默认值（'AskWebBluetooth'，意味着每次都询问用户），用户可以更改它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1613">If you don't configure this policy, the default value ('AskWebBluetooth', meaning users are asked each time) is used and users can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1614">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1614">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1615">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = 不允许任何网站使用 Web 蓝牙 API 请求访问蓝牙设备</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1615">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to Bluetooth devices via the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1616">AskWebBluetooth (3) = 允许网站请求用户授予对附近蓝牙设备的访问权限</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1616">AskWebBluetooth (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a nearby Bluetooth device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1617">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1617">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1618">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1618">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1619">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1619">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1620">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1620">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1621">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1621">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1622">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1622">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1623">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1623">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1624">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1624">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1625">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1625">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1626">GP 唯一名称：DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1626">GP unique name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1627">GP 名称：控制 Web 蓝牙 API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1627">GP name: Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1628">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1628">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1629">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1629">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1630">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1630">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1631">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1631">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1632">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1632">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1633">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1633">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1634">值名称：DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1634">Value Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1635">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1635">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1636">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1636">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1637">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1637">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1638">首选项项名称：DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1638">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1639">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1639">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1640">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1640">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultwebusbguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1641">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1641">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-webusb-api"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1642">控制 WebUSB API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1642">Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1643">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1643">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1644">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1644">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1645">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1645">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1646">设置网站是否可以访问已连接的 USB 设备。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1646">Set whether websites can access connected USB devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1647">可以完全阻止访问，也可以在网站每次想要访问连接的 USB 设备时询问用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1647">You can completely block access or ask the user each time a website wants to get access to connected USB devices.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1648">对于特定 URL 模式，可以使用 [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) 和 [WebUsbLockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 策略来替代此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1648">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) and [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1649">如果未配置此策略，则默认情况下，网站可以询问用户是否能访问连接的 USB 设备 ('AskWebUsb')，用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1649">If you don't configure this policy, sites can ask users whether they can access the connected USB devices ('AskWebUsb') by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1650">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1650">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1651">BlockWebUsb (2) = 不允许任何网站通过 WebUSB API 请求访问 USB 设备</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1651">BlockWebUsb (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to USB devices via the WebUSB API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1652">AskWebUsb (3) = 允许网站请求用户授予对连接的 USB 设备的访问权限</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1652">AskWebUsb (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a connected USB device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1653">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1653">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1654">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1654">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1655">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1655">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1656">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1656">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1657">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1657">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1658">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1658">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1659">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1659">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1660">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1660">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1661">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1661">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1662">GP 唯一名称：DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1662">GP unique name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1663">GP 名称：控制 WebUSB API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1663">GP name: Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1664">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1664">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1665">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1665">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1666">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1666">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1667">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1667">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1668">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1668">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1669">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1669">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1670">值名称：DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1670">Value Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1671">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1671">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1672">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1672">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1673">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1673">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1674">首选项项名称：DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1674">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1675">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1675">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1676">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1676">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="filesystemreadaskforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1677">FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1677">FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-read-access-via-the-file-system-api-on-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1678">允许在这些网站上通过文件系统 API 进行读取访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1678">Allow read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1679">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1679">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1680">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1680">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1681">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1681">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1682">通过设置策略，你可以列出一些 URL 模式，指定哪些网站可以通过文件系统 API 请求用户向他们授予对主机操作系统文件系统中的文件或目录的访问权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1682">Setting the policy lets you list the URL patterns that specify which sites can ask users to grant them read access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system via the File System API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1683">不设置该策略意味着对所有网站应用 [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting)（如果已设置）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1683">Leaving the policy unset means [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1684">如果未设置该策略，则应用用户的个人设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1684">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1685">URL 模式不得与 [FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls](#filesystemreadblockedforurls) 冲突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1685">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls](#filesystemreadblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1686">如果 URL 与两个策略都匹配，则这两个策略均不具有优先权。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1686">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1687">关于有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1687">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1688">\* 不是此策略的接受值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1688">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1689">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1689">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1690">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1690">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1691">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1691">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1692">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1692">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1693">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1693">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1694">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1694">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1695">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1695">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1696">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1696">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1697">GP 唯一名称：FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1697">GP unique name: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1698">GP 名称：允许在这些网站上通过文件系统 API 进行读取访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1698">GP name: Allow read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1699">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1699">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1700">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1700">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1701">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1701">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1702">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1702">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1703">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1703">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1704">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1704">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1705">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1705">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1706">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1706">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1707">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1707">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1708">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1708">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1709">首选项项名称：FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1709">Preference Key Name: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1710">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1710">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1711">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1711">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="filesystemreadblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1712">FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1712">FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-read-access-via-the-file-system-api-on-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1713">阻止在这些网站上通过文件系统 API 进行读取访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1713">Block read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1714">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1714">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1715">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1715">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1716">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1716">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1717">如果设置了此策略，则可以列出一些 URL 模式，指定哪些网站无法通过文件系统 API 请求用户向他们授予对主机操作系统文件系统中的文件或目录的访问权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1717">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can't ask users to grant them read access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system via the File System API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1718">如果未设置此策略，则会对所有网站应用 [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting)（如果已设置）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1718">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1719">如果未设置该策略，则应用用户的个人设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1719">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1720">URL 模式不得与 [FileSystemReadAskForUrls](#filesystemreadaskforurls) 冲突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1720">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemReadAskForUrls](#filesystemreadaskforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1721">如果 URL 与两个策略都匹配，则这两个策略均不具有优先权。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1721">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1722">关于有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1722">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1723">\* 不是此策略的接受值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1723">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1724">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1724">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1725">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1725">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1726">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1726">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1727">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1727">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1728">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1728">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1729">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1729">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1730">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1730">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1731">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1731">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1732">GP 唯一名称：FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1732">GP unique name: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1733">GP 名称：阻止在这些网站上通过文件系统 API 进行读取访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1733">GP name: Block read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1734">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1734">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1735">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1735">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1736">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1736">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1737">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1737">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1738">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1738">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1739">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1739">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1740">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1740">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1741">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1741">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1742">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1742">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1743">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1743">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1744">首选项项名称：FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1744">Preference Key Name: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1745">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1745">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="filesystemwriteaskforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1747">FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1747">FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-write-access-to-files-and-directories-on-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1748">允许在这些网站上对文件和目录进行写入访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1748">Allow write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1749">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1749">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1750">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1750">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1751">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1751">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1752">如果设置了此策略，则可以列出一些 URL 模式，指定哪些网站可以请求用户向他们授予对主机操作系统文件系统中的文件或目录的写入权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1752">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can ask users to grant them write access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1753">如果未设置此策略，则会对所有网站应用 [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting)（如果已设置）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1753">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1754">如果未设置该策略，则应用用户的个人设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1754">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1755">URL 模式不得与 [FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls](#filesystemwriteblockedforurls) 冲突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1755">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls](#filesystemwriteblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1756">如果 URL 与两个策略都匹配，则这两个策略均不具有优先权。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1756">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1757">关于有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1757">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1758">\* 不是此策略的接受值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1758">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1759">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1759">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1760">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1760">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1761">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1761">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1762">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1762">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1763">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1763">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1764">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1764">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1765">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1765">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1766">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1766">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1767">GP 唯一名称：FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1767">GP unique name: FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1768">GP 名称：允许在这些网站上对文件和目录进行写入访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1768">GP name: Allow write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1769">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1769">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1770">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1770">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1771">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1771">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1772">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1772">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1773">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1773">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1774">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1774">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1775">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1775">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1776">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1776">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1777">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1777">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1778">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1778">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1779">首选项项名称：FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1779">Preference Key Name: FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1780">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1780">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="filesystemwriteblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1782">FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1782">FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-write-access-to-files-and-directories-on-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1783">阻止在这些网站上对文件和目录进行写入访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1783">Block write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1784">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1784">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1785">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1785">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1786">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1786">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1787">如果设置了此策略，则可以列出一些 URL 模式，指定哪些网站无法请求用户向他们授予对主机操作系统文件系统中的文件或目录的写入权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1787">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can't ask users to grant them write access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1788">如果未设置此策略，则会对所有网站应用 [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting)（如果已设置）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1788">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1789">如果未设置该策略，则应用用户的个人设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1789">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1790">URL 模式不得与 [FileSystemWriteAskForUrls](#filesystemwriteaskforurls) 冲突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1790">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemWriteAskForUrls](#filesystemwriteaskforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1791">如果 URL 与两个策略都匹配，则这两个策略均不具有优先权。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1791">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1792">关于有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1792">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1793">\* 不是此策略的接受值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1793">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1794">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1794">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1795">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1795">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1796">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1796">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1797">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1797">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1798">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1798">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1799">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1799">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1800">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1800">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1801">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1801">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1802">GP 唯一名称：FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1802">GP unique name: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1803">GP 名称：阻止在这些网站上对文件和目录进行写入访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1803">GP name: Block write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1804">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1804">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1805">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1805">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1806">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1806">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1807">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1807">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1808">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1808">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1809">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1809">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1810">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1810">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1811">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1811">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1812">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1812">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1813">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1813">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1814">首选项项名称：FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1814">Preference Key Name: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1815">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1815">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
