  ### <a name="imagesallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1817">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1817">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-images-on-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1818">在这些网站上允许图像</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1818">Allow images on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1819">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1819">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1820">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1820">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1821">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1821">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1822">根据 URL 模式定义可显示图像的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1822">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can display images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1823">如果未配置此策略，则所有网站都将使用 [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) 策略中的全局默认值（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1823">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value is used for all sites either from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1824">关于有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1824">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1825">\* 不是此策略的接受值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1825">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1826">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1826">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1827">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1827">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1828">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1828">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1829">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1829">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1830">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1830">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1831">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1831">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1832">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1832">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1833">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1833">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1834">GP 唯一名称：ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1834">GP unique name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1835">GP 名称：在这些网站上允许图像</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1835">GP name: Allow images on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1836">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1836">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1837">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1837">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1838">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1838">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1839">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1839">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1840">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1840">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1841">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1841">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1842">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1842">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1843">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1843">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1844">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1844">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1845">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1845">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1846">首选项项名称：ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1846">Preference Key Name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1847">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1847">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1848">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1848">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="imagesblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1849">ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1849">ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-images-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1850">在这些网站上阻止图像</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1850">Block images on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1851">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1851">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1852">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1852">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1853">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1853">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1854">根据 URL 模式定义不允许显示图像的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1854">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that aren't allowed to display images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1855">如果未配置此策略，则所有网站都将使用 [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) 策略中的全局默认值（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1855">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1856">关于有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1856">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1857">\* 不是此策略的接受值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1857">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1858">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1858">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1859">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1859">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1860">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1860">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1861">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1861">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1862">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1862">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1863">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1863">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1864">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1864">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1865">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1865">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1866">GP 唯一名称：ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1866">GP unique name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1867">GP 名称：在这些网站上阻止图像</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1867">GP name: Block images on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1868">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1868">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1869">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1869">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1870">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1870">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1871">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1871">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1872">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1872">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1873">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1873">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1874">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1874">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1875">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1875">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1876">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1876">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1877">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1877">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1878">首选项项名称：ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1878">Preference Key Name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1879">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1879">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1880">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1880">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="insecurecontentallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1881">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1881">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-insecure-content-on-specified-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1882">在指定网站上允许不安全内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1882">Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1883">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1883">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1884">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 80 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1884">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1885">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1885">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1886">创建 URL 模式列表，以指定可显示不安全混合内容（即 HTTPS 网站上的 HTTP 内容）的网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1886">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that can display insecure mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1887">如果未配置此策略，则可阻止的混合内容将被阻止，并且可选择阻止的混合内容将被升级。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1887">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1888">但是，将允许用户设置例外，以允许特定网站使用不安全的混合内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1888">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1889">关于有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1889">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1890">\* 不是此策略的接受值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1890">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1891">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1891">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1892">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1892">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1893">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1893">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1894">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1894">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1895">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1895">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1896">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1896">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1897">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1897">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1898">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1898">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1899">GP 唯一名称：InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1899">GP unique name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1900">GP 名称：在指定网站上允许不安全内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1900">GP name: Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1901">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1901">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1902">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1902">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1903">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1903">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1904">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1904">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1905">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1905">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1906">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1906">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1907">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1907">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1908">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1908">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1909">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1909">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1910">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1910">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1911">首选项项名称：InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1911">Preference Key Name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1912">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1912">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1913">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1913">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="insecurecontentblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1914">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1914">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-insecure-content-on-specified-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1915">在指定网站上阻止不安全内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1915">Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1916">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1916">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1917">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 80 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1917">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1918">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1918">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1919">创建 URL 模式列表，以指定不允许显示可阻止（即活动）混合内容（即 HTTPS 网站上的 HTTP 内容）的网站，以及将禁用可选择阻止的混合内容升级的网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1919">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that aren't allowed to display blockable (i.e. active) mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites) and for which optionally blockable mixed content upgrades will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1920">如果未配置此策略，则可阻止的混合内容将被阻止，并且可选择阻止的混合内容将被升级。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1920">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1921">但是，将允许用户设置例外，以允许特定网站使用不安全的混合内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1921">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1922">关于有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1922">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1923">\* 不是此策略的接受值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1923">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1924">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1924">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1925">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1925">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1926">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1926">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1927">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1927">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1928">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1928">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1929">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1929">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1930">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1930">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1931">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1931">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1932">GP 唯一名称：InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1932">GP unique name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1933">GP 名称：在指定网站上阻止不安全内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1933">GP name: Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1934">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1934">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1935">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1935">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1936">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1936">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1937">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1937">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1938">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1938">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1939">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1939">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1940">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1940">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1941">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1941">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1942">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1942">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1943">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1943">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1944">首选项项名称：InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1944">Preference Key Name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1945">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1945">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1946">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1946">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="javascriptallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1947">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1947">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-javascript-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1948">在特定网站上允许 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1948">Allow JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1949">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1949">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1950">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1950">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1951">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1951">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1952">根据 URL 模式定义允许运行 JavaScript 的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1952">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to run JavaScript.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1953">如果未配置此策略， [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) 将应用于所有网站（如果已设置）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1953">If you don't configure this policy, [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1954">如果没有，则应用用户的个人设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1954">If not, the user's personal setting applies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1955">有关有效 url 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1955">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1956">\* 不是此策略的接受值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1956">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1957">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1957">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1958">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1958">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1959">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1959">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1960">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1960">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1961">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1961">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1962">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1962">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1963">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1963">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1964">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1964">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1965">GP 唯一名称：JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1965">GP unique name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1966">GP 名称：在特定网站上允许 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1966">GP name: Allow JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1967">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1967">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1968">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1968">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1969">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1969">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1970">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1970">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1971">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1971">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1972">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1972">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1973">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1973">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1974">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1974">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1975">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1975">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1976">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1976">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1977">首选项项名称：JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1977">Preference Key Name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1978">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1978">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="javascriptblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1980">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1980">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-javascript-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1981">在特定网站上阻止 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1981">Block JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1982">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1982">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1983">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1983">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1984">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1984">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1985">根据 URL 模式定义不允许运行 JavaScript 的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1985">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that aren't allowed to run JavaScript.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1986">如果未配置此策略， [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) 将应用于所有网站（如果已设置）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1986">If you don't configure this policy, [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1987">如果没有，则应用用户的个人设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1987">If not, the user's personal setting applies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1988">有关有效 url 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1988">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1989">\* 不是此策略的接受值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1989">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1990">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1990">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1991">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1991">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1992">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1992">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1993">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1993">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1994">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1994">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1995">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1995">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1996">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1996">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1997">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1997">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1998">GP 唯一名称：JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1998">GP unique name: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-1999">GP 名称：在特定网站上阻止 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-1999">GP name: Block JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2000">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2000">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2001">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2001">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2002">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2002">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2003">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2003">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2004">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2004">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2005">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2005">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2006">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2006">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2007">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2007">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2008">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2008">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2009">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2009">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2010">首选项项名称：JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2010">Preference Key Name: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2011">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2011">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2012">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2012">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2013">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2013">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-default-legacy-samesite-cookie-behavior-setting-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2014">启用默认旧 SameSite Cookie 行为设置 (已弃用) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2014">Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2015">已弃用：此策略已弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2015">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2016">当前受支持，但将在未来的版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2016">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2017">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2017">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2018">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 80 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2018">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2019">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2019">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2020">此策略已弃用，因为它仅作为一种短期机制，使企业在发现与 SameSite 行为更改不兼容时有更多的时间来更新其环境。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2020">'This policy is deprecated because it's intended to serve only as a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their environments if they are found to be incompatible with the SameSite behavior change.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2021">它在 Microsoft Edge 版本 95 中不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2021">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 95.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2022">如果仍需要旧 Cookie 行为，请使用 [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabledfordomainlist) 来对每个域分别配置行为。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2022">If you still require legacy cookie behavior, please use [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabledfordomainlist) to configure behavior on a per-domain basis.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2023">允许你将所有 Cookie 恢复为旧的 SameSite 行为。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2023">Lets you revert all cookies to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2024">还原为旧行为会导致未指定 SameSite 属性的 Cookie 被视为 “SameSite=None”，删除了 “SameSite=None” Cookie 携带 “Secure” 属性的要求，并在评估两个站点是否为同一站点时跳过方案比较。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2024">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute, and skips the scheme comparison when evaluating if two sites are same-site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2025">如果不设置此策略，Cookie 的 SameSite 行为将取决于 SameSite-by-default 功能、Cookies-without-SameSite-must-be-secure 功能、和 Schemeful Same-Site 功能的其他资源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2025">If you don't set this policy, the default SameSite behavior for cookies will depend on other configuration sources for the SameSite-by-default feature, the Cookies-without-SameSite-must-be-secure feature, and the Schemeful Same-Site feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2026">这些功能也可通过字段试用或相同的站点-默认-cookie 标志、cookie （无相同站点-必须是安全的标志）或 edge://flags 中的 schemeful-site 标志配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2026">These features can also be configured by a field trial or the same-site-by-default-cookies flag, the cookies-without-same-site-must-be-secure flag, or the schemeful-same-site flag in edge://flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2027">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2027">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2028">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = 恢复所有网站上 Cookie 的 SameSite 行为</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2028">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2029">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = 对所有网站上的 cookie 使用 SameSite-by-default 行为</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2029">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = Use SameSite-by-default behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2030">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2030">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2031">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2031">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2032">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2032">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2033">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2033">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2034">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2034">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2035">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2035">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2036">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2036">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2037">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2037">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2038">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2038">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2039">GP 唯一名称：LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2039">GP unique name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2040">GP 名称：启用默认旧版 SameSite cookie 行为设置 (已弃用) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2040">GP name: Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2041">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2041">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2042">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2042">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2043">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2043">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2044">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2044">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2045">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2045">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2046">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2046">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2047">值名称：LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2047">Value Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2048">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2048">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2049">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2049">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2050">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2050">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2051">首选项项名称：LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2051">Preference Key Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2052">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2052">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2053">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2053">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabledfordomainlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2054">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2054">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>

  #### <a name="revert-to-legacy-samesite-behavior-for-cookies-on-specified-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2055">在指定网站上还原为 Cookie 的旧 SameSite 行为</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2055">Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2056">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2056">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2057">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 80 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2057">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2058">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2058">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2059">为域设置的 Cookie 与指定的模式匹配时，将还原为旧 SameSite 行为。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2059">Cookies set for domains match specified patterns will revert to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2060">还原为旧行为会导致未指定 SameSite 属性的 Cookie 被视为 “SameSite=None”，删除了 “SameSite=None” Cookie 携带 “Secure” 属性的要求，并在评估两个站点是否为同一站点时跳过方案比较。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2060">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute, and skips the scheme comparison when evaluating if two sites are same-site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2061">如果未设置此策略，则将使用全局默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2061">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2062">全局默认值也将用于你指定的模式未涵盖的域上的 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2062">The global default will also be used for cookies on domains not covered by the patterns you specify.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2063">在使用已弃用[LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled)策略的 Microsoft Edge 版本 95 之前，可以配置全局默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2063">The global default value can be configured until Microsoft Edge version 95 using the deprecated [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2064">如果未设置 [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled)，则全局默认值将回退到其他配置源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2064">If [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) is unset, the global default value falls back to other configuration sources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2065">请注意，此策略中列出的模式将被视为域而不是 URL，因此不应指定方案或端口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2065">Note that patterns you list in this policy are treated as domains, not URLs, so you should not specify a scheme or port.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2066">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2066">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2067">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2067">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2068">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2068">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2069">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2069">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2070">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2070">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2071">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2071">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2072">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2072">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2073">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2073">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2074">GP 唯一名称：LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2074">GP unique name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2075">GP 名称：在指定网站上还原为 Cookie 的旧 SameSite 行为</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2075">GP name: Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2076">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2076">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2077">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2077">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2078">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2078">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2079">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2079">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2080">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2080">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2081">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2081">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2082">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2082">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2083">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2083">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2084">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2084">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList\1 = "www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2085">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2085">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2086">首选项项名称：LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2086">Preference Key Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2087">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2087">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2088">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2088">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="notificationsallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2089">NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2089">NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-notifications-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2090">在特定网站上允许通知</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2090">Allow notifications on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2091">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2091">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2092">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2092">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2093">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2093">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2094">可用于创建 url 模式列表，以指定允许显示通知的网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2094">Allows you to create a list of url patterns to specify sites that are allowed to display notifications.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2095">如果未设置此策略，则将对所有网站使用全局默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2095">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used for all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2096">此默认值将来自 [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) 策略（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2096">This default value will be from the [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) policy if it's set, or from the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2097">有关有效 url 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2097">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2098">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2098">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2099">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2099">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2100">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2100">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2101">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2101">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2102">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2102">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2103">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2103">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2104">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2104">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2105">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2105">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2106">GP 唯一名称：NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2106">GP unique name: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2107">GP 名称：在特定网站上允许通知</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2107">GP name: Allow notifications on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2108">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2108">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2109">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2109">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2110">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2110">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2111">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2111">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2112">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2112">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2113">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2113">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2114">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2114">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2115">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2115">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2116">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2116">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2117">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2117">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2118">首选项项名称：NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2118">Preference Key Name: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2119">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2119">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="notificationsblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2121">NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2121">NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-notifications-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2122">在特定网站上阻止通知</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2122">Block notifications on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2123">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2123">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2124">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2124">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2125">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2125">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2126">可用于创建 url 模式列表，以指定不允许显示通知的网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2126">Allows you to create a list of url patterns to specify sites that are not allowed to display notifications.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2127">如果未设置此策略，则将对所有网站使用全局默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2127">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used for all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2128">此默认值将来自 [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) 策略（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2128">This default value will be from the [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) policy if it's set, or from the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2129">有关有效 url 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2129">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2130">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2130">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2131">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2131">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2132">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2132">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2133">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2133">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2134">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2134">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2135">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2135">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2136">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2136">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2137">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2137">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2138">GP 唯一名称：NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2138">GP unique name: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2139">GP 名称：在特定网站上阻止通知</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2139">GP name: Block notifications on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2140">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2140">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2141">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2141">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2142">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2142">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2143">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2143">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2144">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2144">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2145">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2145">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2146">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2146">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2147">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2147">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2148">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2148">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2149">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2149">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2150">首选项项名称：NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2150">Preference Key Name: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2151">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2151">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
