  ### <a name="pluginsallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2153">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2153">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-the-adobe-flash-plug-in-on-specific-sites-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2154">在特定网站上允许 Adobe Flash 插件（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2154">Allow the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2155">已过时：此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 87 后不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2155">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2156">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2156">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2157">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 起至 87</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2157">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2158">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2158">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2159">此策略不起作用，因为 Microsoft Edge 不再支持 Flash。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2159">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2160">根据 URL 模式定义可运行 Adobe Flash 插件的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2160">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can run the Adobe Flash plug-in.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2161">如果未配置此策略，则所有网站都将使用 [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) 策略中的全局默认值（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2161">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2162">有关有效 url 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2162">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2163">但是，从 M85 开始，此策略不再支持主机中具有“\*”和“[\*.]”通配符的模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2163">However, starting in M85, patterns with '\*' and '[\*.]' wildcards in the host are no longer supported for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2164">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2164">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2165">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2165">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2166">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2166">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2167">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2167">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2168">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2168">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2169">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2169">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2170">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2170">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2171">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2171">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2172">GP 唯一名称：PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2172">GP unique name: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2173">GP 名称：在特定网站上允许 Adobe Flash 插件（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2173">GP name: Allow the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2174">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2174">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2175">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2175">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2176">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2176">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2177">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2177">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2178">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2178">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2179">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2179">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2180">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2180">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2181">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2181">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2182">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2182">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls\2 = "http://contoso.edu:8080"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2183">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2183">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2184">首选项项名称：PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2184">Preference Key Name: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2185">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2185">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>http://contoso.edu:8080</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2186">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2186">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="pluginsblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2187">PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2187">PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-the-adobe-flash-plug-in-on-specific-sites-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2188">在特定网站上阻止 Adobe Flash 插件（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2188">Block the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2189">已过时：此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 87 后不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2189">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2190">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2190">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2191">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 起至 87</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2191">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2192">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2192">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2193">此策略不起作用，因为 Microsoft Edge 不再支持 Flash。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2193">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2194">根据 URL 模式定义阻止运行 Adobe Flash 的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2194">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked from running Adobe Flash.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2195">如果未配置此策略，则所有网站都将使用 [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) 策略中的全局默认值（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2195">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2196">有关有效 url 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2196">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2197">但是，从 M85 开始，此策略不再支持主机中具有“\*”和“[\*.]”通配符的模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2197">However, starting in M85, patterns with '\*' and '[\*.]' wildcards in the host are no longer supported for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2198">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2198">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2199">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2199">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2200">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2200">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2201">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2201">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2202">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2202">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2203">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2203">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2204">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2204">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2205">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2205">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2206">GP 唯一名称：PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2206">GP unique name: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2207">GP 名称：在特定网站上阻止 Adobe Flash 插件（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2207">GP name: Block the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2208">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2208">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2209">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2209">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2210">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2210">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2211">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2211">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2212">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2212">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2213">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2213">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2214">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2214">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2215">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2215">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2216">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2216">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls\2 = "http://contoso.edu:8080"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2217">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2217">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2218">首选项项名称：PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2218">Preference Key Name: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2219">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2219">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>http://contoso.edu:8080</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2220">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2220">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="popupsallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2221">PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2221">PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-pop-up-windows-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2222">在特定网站上允许弹出窗口</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2222">Allow pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2223">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2223">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2224">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2224">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2225">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2225">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2226">根据 URL 模式定义可打开弹出窗口的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2226">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can open pop-up windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2227">\* 不是此策略的接受值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2227">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2228">如果未配置此策略，则所有网站都将使用 [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) 策略中的全局默认值（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2228">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2229">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2229">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2230">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2230">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2231">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2231">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2232">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2232">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2233">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2233">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2234">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2234">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2235">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2235">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2236">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2236">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2237">GP 唯一名称：PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2237">GP unique name: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2238">GP 名称：在特定网站上允许弹出窗口</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2238">GP name: Allow pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2239">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2239">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2240">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2240">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2241">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2241">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2242">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2242">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2243">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2243">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2244">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2244">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2245">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2245">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2246">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2246">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2247">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2247">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2248">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2248">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2249">首选项项名称：PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2249">Preference Key Name: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2250">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2250">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2251">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2251">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="popupsblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2252">PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2252">PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-pop-up-windows-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2253">在特定网站上阻止弹出窗口</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2253">Block pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2254">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2254">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2255">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2255">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2256">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2256">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2257">根据 URL 模式定义阻止打开弹出窗口的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2257">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked from opening pop-up windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2258">\* 不是此策略的接受值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2258">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2259">如果未配置此策略，则所有网站都将使用 [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) 策略中的全局默认值（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2259">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2260">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2260">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2261">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2261">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2262">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2262">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2263">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2263">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2264">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2264">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2265">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2265">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2266">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2266">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2267">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2267">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2268">GP 唯一名称：PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2268">GP unique name: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2269">GP 名称：在特定网站上阻止弹出窗口</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2269">GP name: Block pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2270">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2270">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2271">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2271">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2272">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2272">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2273">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2273">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2274">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2274">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2275">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2275">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2276">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2276">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2277">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2277">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2278">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2278">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2279">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2279">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2280">首选项项名称：PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2280">Preference Key Name: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2281">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2281">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2282">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2282">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="registeredprotocolhandlers"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2283">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2283">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>

  #### <a name="register-protocol-handlers"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2284">注册协议处理程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2284">Register protocol handlers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2285">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2285">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2286">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2286">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2287">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2287">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2288">设置此策略（仅推荐），注册协议处理程序列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2288">Set this policy (recommended only) to register a list of protocol handlers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2289">此列表与用户注册的列表合并，两者均可使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2289">This list is merged with ones registered by the user and both are available to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2290">注册协议处理程序：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2290">To register a protocol handler:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2291">将 "协议" 属性设置为方案（例如，"mailto"）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2291">Set the protocol property to the scheme (for example, "mailto")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2292">将 URL 属性设置为处理 "协议" 字段中指定的方案的应用程序的 URL 属性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2292">Set the URL property to the URL property of the application that handlers the scheme specified in the "protocol" field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2293">模式可包括已处理 URL 替换的 "% s" 占位符。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2293">The pattern can include a "%s" placeholder, which the handled URL replaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2294">用户不能删除由此策略注册的协议处理程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2294">Users can't remove a protocol handler registered by this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2295">但是，他们可以安装新的默认协议处理程序来替代现有的协议处理程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2295">However, they can install a new default protocol handler to override the existing protocol handlers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2296">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2296">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2297">可以强制：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2297">Can be mandatory: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2298">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2298">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2299">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2299">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2300">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2300">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2301">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2301">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2302">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2302">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2303">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2303">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2304">GP 唯一名称：RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2304">GP unique name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2305">GP 名称：注册协议处理程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2305">GP name: Register protocol handlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2306">GP 路径（强制）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2306">GP path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2307">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2307">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2308">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2308">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2309">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2309">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2310">路径（强制）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2310">Path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2311">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2311">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2312">值名称：RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2312">Value Name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2313">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2313">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2314">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2314">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RegisteredProtocolHandlers = [
  {
    "default": true,
    "protocol": "mailto",
    "url": "https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2315">精简示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2315">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RegisteredProtocolHandlers = [{"default": true, "protocol": "mailto", "url": "https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2316">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2316">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2317">首选项项名称：RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2317">Preference Key Name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2318">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2318">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>RegisteredProtocolHandlers</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>default</key>
    <true/>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>mailto</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2319">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2319">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="spotlightexperiencesandrecommendationsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2320">SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2320">SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="choose-whether-users-can-receive-customized-background-images-and-text-suggestions-notifications-and-tips-for-microsoft-services"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2321">选择用户是否可以接收自定义的背景图像和文本、建议、通知和Microsoft 服务提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2321">Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications, and tips for Microsoft services</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2322">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2322">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2323">在 86 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2323">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2324">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2324">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2325">选择用户是否可接收自定义的背景图像和文本、建议、通知及 Microsoft 服务提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2325">Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications, and tips for Microsoft services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2326">如果启用或未配置此设置，将启用聚焦体验和建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2326">If you enable or don't configure this setting, spotlight experiences and recommendations are turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2327">如果禁用此设置，聚焦体验和建议将关闭。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2327">If you disable this setting, spotlight experiences and recommendations are turned off.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2328">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2328">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2329">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2329">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2330">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2330">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2331">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2331">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2332">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2332">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2333">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2333">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2334">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2334">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2335">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2335">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2336">GP 唯一名称： SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2336">GP unique name: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2337">GP 名称：选择用户是否可接收自定义的背景图像和文本、建议、通知及 Microsoft 服务提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2337">GP name: Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications, and tips for Microsoft services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2338">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2338">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2339">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2339">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2340">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2340">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2341">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2341">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2342">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2342">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2343">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2343">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2344">值名称：SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2344">Value Name: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2345">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2345">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2346">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2346">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2347">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2347">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="webusballowdevicesforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2348">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2348">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="grant-access-to-specific-sites-to-connect-to-specific-usb-devices"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2349">授予特定网站连接到特定 USB 设备的访问权限</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2349">Grant access to specific sites to connect to specific USB devices</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2350">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2350">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2351">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2351">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2352">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2352">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2353">允许你设置一个 url 列表，指定自动向哪些网站授予对具有给定供应商和产品 ID 的 USB 设备的访问权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2353">Allows you to set a list of urls that specify which sites will automatically be granted permission to access a USB device with the given vendor and product IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2354">列表中的每个项目必须同时包含设备和 url，策略才能有效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2354">Each item in the list must contain both devices and urls in order for the policy to be valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2355">设备中的每个项目都可包含供应商 ID 和产品 ID 字段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2355">Each item in devices can contain a vendor ID and product ID field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2356">省略的任何 ID 都将被视为通配符，但有一个例外，即如果未同时指定供应商 ID，则也无法指定产品 ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2356">Any ID that is omitted is treated as a wildcard with one exception, and that exception is that a product ID cannot be specified without a vendor ID also being specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2357">否则，该策略将无效并将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2357">Otherwise, the policy will not be valid and will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2358">USB 权限模式使用请求网站的 URL（“请求 URL”）和顶级框架网站的 URL（“嵌入 URL”）来向请求 URL 授予访问 USB 设备的权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2358">The USB permission model uses the URL of the requesting site ("requesting URL") and the URL of the top-level frame site ("embedding URL") to grant permission to the requesting URL to access the USB device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2359">当请求网站加载到 iframe 中时，请求 URL 可能与嵌入 URL 不同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2359">The requesting URL may be different than the embedding URL when the requesting site is loaded in an iframe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2360">因此，“urls”字段最多可包含两个用逗号分隔的 URL 字符串，以分别指定请求 URL 和嵌入 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2360">Therefore, the "urls" field can contain up to two URL strings delimited by a comma to specify the requesting and embedding URL respectively.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2361">如果仅指定一个 URL，则在请求网站的 URL 与此 URL 匹配时，将授予对相应 USB 设备的访问权限，而不管嵌入状态如何。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2361">If only one URL is specified, then access to the corresponding USB devices will be granted when the requesting site's URL matches this URL regardless of embedding status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2362">“urls”中的 URL 必须是有效的 URL，否则该策略将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2362">The URLs in "urls" must be valid URLs, otherwise the policy will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2363">如果未设置此策略，则所有网站将使用 [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) 策略中的全局默认值（如果已设置），否则将使用用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2363">If this policy is left not set, the global default value will be used for all sites either from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy if it is set, or the user's personal configuration otherwise.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2364">此策略中的 URL 模式不应与通过 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 配置的 URL 模式冲突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2364">URL patterns in this policy should not clash with the ones configured via [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2365">如果发生冲突，此策略将优先于 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 和 [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2365">If there is a clash, this policy will take precedence over [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) and [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2366">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2366">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2367">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2367">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2368">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2368">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2369">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2369">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2370">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2370">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2371">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2371">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2372">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2372">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2373">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2373">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2374">GP 唯一名称：WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2374">GP unique name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2375">GP 名称：授予特定网站连接到特定 USB 设备的访问权限</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2375">GP name: Grant access to specific sites to connect to specific USB devices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2376">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2376">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2377">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2377">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2378">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2378">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2379">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2379">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2380">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2380">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2381">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2381">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2382">值名称：WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2382">Value Name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2383">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2383">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2384">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2384">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls = [
  {
    "devices": [
      {
        "product_id": 5678,
        "vendor_id": 1234
      }
    ],
    "urls": [
      "https://contoso.com",
      "https://fabrikam.com"
    ]
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2385">精简示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2385">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls = [{"devices": [{"product_id": 5678, "vendor_id": 1234}], "urls": ["https://contoso.com", "https://fabrikam.com"]}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2386">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2386">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2387">首选项项名称：WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2387">Preference Key Name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2388">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2388">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>devices</key>
    <array>
      <dict>
        <key>product_id</key>
        <integer>5678</integer>
        <key>vendor_id</key>
        <integer>1234</integer>
      </dict>
    </array>
    <key>urls</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://contoso.com</string>
      <string>https://fabrikam.com</string>
    </array>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2389">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2389">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="webusbaskforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2390">WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2390">WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-webusb-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2391">在特定网站上允许 WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2391">Allow WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2392">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2392">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2393">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2393">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2394">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2394">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2395">根据 URL 模式定义可要求用户授予 USB 设备访问权限的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2395">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can ask the user for access to a USB device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2396">如果未配置此策略，则所有网站都将使用 [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) 策略中的全局默认值（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2396">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2397">此策略中定义的 URL 模式不能与 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 策略中配置的 URL 模式冲突 - 不能同时允许和阻止一个 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2397">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) policy - you can't both allow and block a URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2398">有关有效 url 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2398">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2399">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2399">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2400">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2400">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2401">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2401">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2402">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2402">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2403">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2403">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2404">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2404">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2405">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2405">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2406">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2406">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2407">GP 唯一名称：WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2407">GP unique name: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2408">GP 名称：在特定网站上允许 WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2408">GP name: Allow WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2409">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2409">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2410">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2410">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2411">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2411">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2412">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2412">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2413">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2413">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2414">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2414">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2415">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2415">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2416">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2416">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2417">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2417">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2418">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2418">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2419">首选项项名称：WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2419">Preference Key Name: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2420">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2420">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2421">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2421">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="webusbblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2422">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2422">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-webusb-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2423">在特定网站上阻止 WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2423">Block WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2424">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2424">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2425">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2425">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2426">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2426">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2427">根据 URL 模式定义不能要求用户授予 USB 设备访问权限的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2427">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't ask the user to grant them access to a USB device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2428">如果未配置此策略，则所有网站都将使用 [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) 策略中的全局默认值（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2428">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2429">此策略中的 URL 模式不能与 [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) 策略中配置的 URL 模式冲突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2429">URL patterns in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2430">不能同时允许和阻止一个 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2430">You can't both allow and block a URL.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2431">有关有效 url 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2431">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2432">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2432">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2433">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2433">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2434">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2434">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2435">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2435">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2436">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2436">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2437">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2437">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2438">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2438">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2439">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2439">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2440">GP 唯一名称：WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2440">GP unique name: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2441">GP 名称：在特定网站上阻止 WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2441">GP name: Block WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2442">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2442">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2443">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2443">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2444">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2444">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2445">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2445">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2446">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2446">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2447">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2447">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2448">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2448">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2449">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2449">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2450">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2450">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2451">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2451">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2452">首选项项名称：WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2452">Preference Key Name: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2453">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2453">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
