  ## <a name="default-search-provider-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2455">默认搜索提供程序策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2455">Default search provider policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2456">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2456">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2457">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2457">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-the-default-search-provider"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2458">启用默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2458">Enable the default search provider</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2459">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2459">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2460">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2460">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2461">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2461">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2462">使用户能够使用默认搜索提供程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2462">Enables the ability to use a default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2463">如果启用此策略，用户可以通过在地址栏中键入内容来搜索字词（前提是他们键入的内容不是 URL）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2463">If you enable this policy, a user can search for a term by typing in the address bar (as long as what they type isn't a URL).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2464">可通过启用其余默认搜索策略来指定要使用的默认搜索提供程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2464">You can specify the default search provider to use by enabling the rest of the default search policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2465">如果这些保留为空（未配置）或配置不当，则用户可以选择默认提供程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2465">If these are left empty (not configured) or configured incorrectly, the user can choose the default provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2466">如果禁用此策略，用户将无法从地址栏中进行搜索。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2466">If you disable this policy, the user can't search from the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2467">如果启用或禁用此策略，用户将无法更改或替代它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2467">If you enable or disable this policy, users can't change or override it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2468">如果未配置此策略，则将启用默认搜索提供程序，用户可以选择默认搜索提供程序并设置搜索提供程序列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2468">If you don't configure this policy, the default search provider is enabled, and the user can choose the default search provider and set the search provider list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2469">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2469">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX..</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2470">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，你可以将此策略设置建议策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2470">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2471">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2471">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2472">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2472">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2473">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2473">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2474">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2474">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2475">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2475">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2476">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2476">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2477">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2477">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2478">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2478">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2479">GP 唯一名称：DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2479">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2480">GP 名称：启用默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2480">GP name: Enable the default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2481">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2481">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2482">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可替代）/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2482">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2483">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2483">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2484">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2484">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2485">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2485">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2486">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2486">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2487">值名称：DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2487">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2488">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2488">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2489">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2489">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2490">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2490">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2491">首选项项名称：DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2491">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2492">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2492">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2493">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2493">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderencodings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2494">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2494">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-encodings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2495">默认搜索提供程序编码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2495">Default search provider encodings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2496">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2496">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2497">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2497">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2498">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2498">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2499">指定搜索提供程序支持的字符编码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2499">Specify the character encodings supported by the search provider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2500">编码是 UTF-8、GB2312 和 ISO-8859-1 之类的代码页名称。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2500">Encodings are code page names like UTF-8, GB2312, and ISO-8859-1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2501">将按照提供的顺序尝试这些编码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2501">They are tried in the order provided.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2502">此策略是可选的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2502">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2503">如果未配置，则使用默认 UTF-8。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2503">If not configured, the default, UTF-8, is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2504">只有当启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时，才会应用此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2504">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2505">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，你可以将此策略设置建议策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2505">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2506">如果用户已经设置了默认搜索提供程序，此推荐策略配置的默认搜索提供程序不会添加到用户可选择的搜索提供程序列表中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2506">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2507">如果这是所需的行为，请使用[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines)策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2507">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2508">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2508">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2509">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2509">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2510">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2510">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2511">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2511">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2512">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2512">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2513">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2513">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2514">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2514">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2515">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2515">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2516">GP 唯一名称：DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2516">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2517">GP 名称：默认搜索提供程序编码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2517">GP name: Default search provider encodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2518">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2518">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2519">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可替代）/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2519">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2520">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2520">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2521">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2521">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2522">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2522">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2523">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2523">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2524">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2524">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2525">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2525">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2526">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2526">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\1 = "UTF-8"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\2 = "UTF-16"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\3 = "GB2312"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\4 = "ISO-8859-1"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2527">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2527">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2528">首选项项名称：DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2528">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2529">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2529">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>UTF-8</string>
  <string>UTF-16</string>
  <string>GB2312</string>
  <string>ISO-8859-1</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2530">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2530">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderimageurl"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2531">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2531">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>

  #### <a name="specifies-the-search-by-image-feature-for-the-default-search-provider"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2532">指定默认搜索提供程序的“按图像搜索”功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2532">Specifies the search-by-image feature for the default search provider</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2533">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2533">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2534">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2534">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2535">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2535">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2536">指定用于图像搜索的搜索引擎的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2536">Specifies the URL to the search engine used for image search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2537">将使用 GET 方法发送搜索请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2537">Search requests are sent using the GET method.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2538">此策略是可选的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2538">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2539">如果未配置，则图像搜索不可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2539">If you don't configure it, image search isn't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2540">指定必应的图像搜索 URL，如下所示：“{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2540">Specify Bing's Image Search URL as: '{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2541">指定 Google 的图像搜索 URL，如下所示：“{google:baseURL}searchbyimage/upload”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2541">Specify Google's Image Search URL as: '{google:baseURL}searchbyimage/upload'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2542">请参阅 [DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams) 策略，完成图像搜索的配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2542">See [DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams) policy to finish configuring image search.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2543">只有当启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时，才会应用此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2543">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2544">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，你可以将此策略设置建议策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2544">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2545">如果用户已经设置了默认搜索提供程序，此推荐策略配置的默认搜索提供程序不会添加到用户可选择的搜索提供程序列表中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2545">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2546">如果这是所需的行为，请使用[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines)策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2546">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2547">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2547">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2548">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2548">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2549">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2549">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2550">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2550">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2551">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2551">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2552">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2552">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2553">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2553">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2554">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2554">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2555">GP 唯一名称：DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2555">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2556">GP 名称：指定默认搜索提供程序的“按图像搜索”功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2556">GP name: Specifies the search-by-image feature for the default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2557">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2557">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2558">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可替代）/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2558">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2559">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2559">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2560">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2560">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2561">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2561">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2562">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2562">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2563">值名称：DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2563">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2564">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2564">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2565">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2565">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2566">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2566">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2567">首选项项名称：DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2567">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2568">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2568">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2569">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2569">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2570">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2570">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>

  #### <a name="parameters-for-an-image-url-that-uses-post"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2571">使用 POST 的图像 URL 的参数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2571">Parameters for an image URL that uses POST</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2572">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2572">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2573">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2573">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2574">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2574">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2575">如果启用此策略，则会指定在执行使用 POST 的图像搜索时使用的参数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2575">If you enable this policy, it specifies the parameters used when an image search that uses POST is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2576">该策略由逗号分隔的名称/值对组成。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2576">The policy consists of comma-separated name/value pairs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2577">如果值是模板参数（如上例中的 {imageThumbnail}），则将替换为实际图像缩略图数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2577">If a value is a template parameter, like {imageThumbnail} in the preceding example, it's replaced with real image thumbnail data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2578">只有当启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时，才会应用此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2578">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2579">指定必应的图像搜索 URL Post 参数，如下所示：“imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2579">Specify Bing's Image Search URL Post Params as: 'imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2580">指定 Google 的图像搜索 URL Post 参数，如下所示：“encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2580">Specify Google's Image Search URL Post Params as: 'encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2581">如果未设置此策略，则将使用 GET 方法发送图像搜索请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2581">If you don't set this policy, image search requests are sent using the GET method.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2582">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，你可以将此策略设置建议策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2582">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2583">如果用户已经设置了默认搜索提供程序，此推荐策略配置的默认搜索提供程序不会添加到用户可选择的搜索提供程序列表中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2583">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2584">如果这是所需的行为，请使用[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines)策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2584">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2585">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2585">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2586">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2586">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2587">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2587">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2588">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2588">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2589">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2589">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2590">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2590">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2591">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2591">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2592">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2592">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2593">GP 唯一名称：DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2593">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2594">GP 名称：使用 POST 的图像 URL 的参数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2594">GP name: Parameters for an image URL that uses POST</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2595">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2595">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2596">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可替代）/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2596">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2597">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2597">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2598">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2598">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2599">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2599">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2600">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2600">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2601">值名称：DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2601">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2602">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2602">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2603">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2603">Example value:</span></span>

```
"content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2604">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2604">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2605">首选项项名称：DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2605">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2606">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2606">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2607">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2607">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderkeyword"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2608">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2608">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-keyword"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2609">默认搜索提供程序关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2609">Default search provider keyword</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2610">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2610">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2611">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2611">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2612">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2612">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2613">指定关键字，它是用于在地址栏中对此提供程序触发搜索的快捷方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2613">Specifies the keyword, which is the shortcut used in the Address Bar to trigger the search for this provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2614">此策略是可选的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2614">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2615">如果未配置，则没有关键字激活搜索提供程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2615">If you don't configure it, no keyword activates the search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2616">只有当启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时，才会应用此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2616">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2617">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，你可以将此策略设置建议策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2617">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2618">如果用户已经设置了默认搜索提供程序，此推荐策略配置的默认搜索提供程序不会添加到用户可选择的搜索提供程序列表中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2618">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2619">如果这是所需的行为，请使用[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines)策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2619">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2620">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2620">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2621">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2621">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2622">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2622">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2623">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2623">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2624">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2624">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2625">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2625">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2626">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2626">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2627">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2627">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2628">GP 唯一名称：DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2628">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2629">GP 名称：默认搜索提供程序关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2629">GP name: Default search provider keyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2630">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2630">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2631">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可替代）/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2631">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2632">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2632">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2633">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2633">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2634">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2634">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2635">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2635">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2636">值名称：DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2636">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2637">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2637">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2638">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2638">Example value:</span></span>

```
"mis"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2639">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2639">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2640">首选项项名称：DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2640">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2641">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2641">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>mis</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2642">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2642">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultsearchprovidername"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2643">DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2643">DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-name"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2644">默认搜索提供程序名称</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2644">Default search provider name</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2645">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2645">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2646">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2646">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2647">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2647">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2648">指定默认搜索提供程序的名称。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2648">Specifies the name of the default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2649">如果启用此策略，则设置默认搜索提供程序的名称。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2649">If you enable this policy, you set the name of the default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2650">如果未启用此策略或将其留空，则将使用搜索 URL 指定的主机名。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2650">If you don't enable this policy or if you leave it empty, the host name specified by the search URL is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2651">“DefaultSearchProviderName”应设置为组织批准的加密搜索提供程序，该搜索提供程序对应于 DTBC-0008 中设置的加密搜索提供程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2651">'DefaultSearchProviderName' should be set to an organization-approved encrypted search provider that corresponds to the encrypted search provider set in DTBC-0008.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2652">只有当启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时，才会应用此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2652">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2653">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，你可以将此策略设置建议策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2653">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2654">如果用户已经设置了默认搜索提供程序，此推荐策略配置的默认搜索提供程序不会添加到用户可选择的搜索提供程序列表中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2654">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2655">如果这是所需的行为，请使用[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines)策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2655">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2656">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2656">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2657">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2657">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2658">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2658">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2659">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2659">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2660">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2660">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2661">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2661">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2662">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2662">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2663">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2663">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2664">GP 唯一名称：DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2664">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2665">GP 名称：默认搜索提供程序名称</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2665">GP name: Default search provider name</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2666">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2666">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2667">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可替代）/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2667">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2668">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2668">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2669">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2669">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2670">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2670">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2671">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2671">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2672">值名称：DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2672">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2673">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2673">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2674">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2674">Example value:</span></span>

```
"My Intranet Search"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2675">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2675">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2676">首选项项名称：DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2676">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2677">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2677">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>My Intranet Search</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2678">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2678">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultsearchprovidersearchurl"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2679">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2679">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-search-url"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2680">默认搜索提供程序搜索 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2680">Default search provider search URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2681">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2681">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2682">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2682">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2683">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2683">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2684">指定用于默认搜索的搜索引擎的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2684">Specifies the URL of the search engine used for a default search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2685">该 URL 包含字符串“{searchTerms}”，在查询时，该字符串将替换为用户正在搜索的字词。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2685">The URL contains the string '{searchTerms}', which is replaced at query time by the terms the user is searching for.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2686">指定必应的搜索 URL，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2686">Specify Bing's search URL as:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2687">“{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2687">'{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2688">指定 Google 的搜索 URL，如下所示：“{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2688">Specify Google's search URL as: '{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2689">启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 策略时，此策略是必需的；如果未启用 DefaultSearchProviderEnabled 策略，则此策略将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2689">This policy is required when you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) policy; if you don't enable the latter policy, this policy is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2690">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，你可以将此策略设置建议策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2690">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2691">如果用户已经设置了默认搜索提供程序，此推荐策略配置的默认搜索提供程序不会添加到用户可选择的搜索提供程序列表中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2691">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2692">如果这是所需的行为，请使用[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines)策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2692">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2693">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2693">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2694">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2694">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2695">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2695">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2696">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2696">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2697">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2697">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2698">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2698">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2699">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2699">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2700">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2700">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2701">GP 唯一名称：DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2701">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2702">GP 名称：默认搜索提供程序搜索 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2702">GP name: Default search provider search URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2703">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2703">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2704">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可替代）/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2704">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2705">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2705">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2706">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2706">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2707">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2707">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2708">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2708">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2709">值名称：DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2709">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2710">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2710">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2711">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2711">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/search?q={searchTerms}"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2712">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2712">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2713">首选项项名称：DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2713">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2714">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2714">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2715">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2715">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultsearchprovidersuggesturl"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2716">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2716">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-url-for-suggestions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2717">建议的默认搜索提供程序 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2717">Default search provider URL for suggestions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2718">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2718">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2719">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2719">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2720">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2720">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2721">指定用于提供搜索建议的搜索引擎的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2721">Specifies the URL for the search engine used to provide search suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2722">该 URL 包含字符串“{searchTerms}”，在查询时，该字符串将替换为用户迄今为止输入的文本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2722">The URL contains the string '{searchTerms}', which is replaced at query time by the text the user has entered so far.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2723">此策略是可选的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2723">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2724">如果未配置该策略，用户将看不到搜索建议；他们将看到来自浏览历史记录和收藏夹的建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2724">If you don't configure it, users won't see search suggestions; they will see suggestions from their browsing history and favorites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2725">必应的建议 URL 可指定为：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2725">Bing's suggest URL can be specified as:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2726">“{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2726">'{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2727">Google 的建议 URL 可指定为：“{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2727">Google's suggest URL can be specified as: '{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2728">只有当启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时，才会应用此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2728">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2729">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，你可以将此策略设置建议策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2729">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2730">如果用户已经设置了默认搜索提供程序，此推荐策略配置的默认搜索提供程序不会添加到用户可选择的搜索提供程序列表中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2730">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2731">如果这是所需的行为，请使用[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines)策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2731">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2732">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2732">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2733">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2733">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2734">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2734">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2735">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2735">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2736">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2736">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2737">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2737">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2738">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2738">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2739">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2739">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2740">GP 唯一名称：DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2740">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2741">GP 名称：建议的默认搜索提供程序 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2741">GP name: Default search provider URL for suggestions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2742">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2742">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2743">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可替代）/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2743">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2744">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2744">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2745">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2745">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2746">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2746">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2747">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2747">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2748">值名称：DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2748">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2749">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2749">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2750">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2750">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2751">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2751">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2752">首选项项名称：DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2752">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2753">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2753">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2754">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2754">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="newtabpagesearchbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2755">NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2755">NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-new-tab-page-search-box-experience"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2756">配置新建选项卡页面搜索框体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2756">Configure the new tab page search box experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2757">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2757">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2758">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 85 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2758">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2759">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2759">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2760">你可以配置新的标签页搜索框使用“搜索框(推荐)”或“地址栏”来搜索新的标签页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2760">You can configure the new tab page search box to use "Search box (Recommended)" or "Address bar" to search on new tabs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2761">这个策略只有在你通过设置下面两个策略，将搜索引擎设置为 Bing 之外的值才有效： [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和[DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2761">This policy only works if you set the search engine to a value other than Bing by setting the following two policies: [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2762">如果禁用或未配置此策略和：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2762">If you disable or don't configure this policy and:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2763">如果地址栏的默认搜索引擎是必应，新的选项卡页面使用搜索框搜索新的选项卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2763">If the address bar default search engine is Bing, the new tab page uses the search box to search on new tabs.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2764">如果地址栏的默认搜索引擎不是必应，用户在搜索新标签时可以有额外的选择(使用“地址栏”)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2764">If the address bar default search engine is not Bing, users are offered an additional choice (use "Address bar") when searching on new tabs.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2765">如果启用此策略并将其设置为：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2765">If you enable this policy and set it to:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2766">"搜索框（推荐）" （'必应'），新选项卡页面使用搜索框搜索新选项卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2766">"Search box (Recommended)" ('bing'), the new tab page uses the search box to search on new tabs.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2767">"地址栏" （"重定向"），新建选项卡页面搜索框使用地址栏在新选项卡上搜索。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2767">"Address bar" ('redirect'), the new tab page search box uses the address bar to search on new tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2768">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2768">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2769">bing (bing) = 搜索框（推荐）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2769">bing (bing) = Search box (Recommended)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2770">redirect (redirect) = 地址栏</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2770">redirect (redirect) = Address bar</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2771">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2771">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2772">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2772">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2773">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2773">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2774">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2774">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2775">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2775">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2776">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2776">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2777">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2777">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2778">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2778">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2779">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2779">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2780">GP 唯一名称：NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2780">GP unique name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2781">GP 名称：配置新的选项卡页面搜索框体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2781">GP name: Configure the new tab page search box experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2782">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2782">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2783">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可替代）/默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2783">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2784">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2784">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2785">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2785">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2786">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2786">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2787">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2787">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2788">值名称： NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2788">Value Name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2789">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2789">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2790">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2790">Example value:</span></span>

```
"bing"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2791">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2791">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2792">首选项名称：NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2792">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2793">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2793">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>bing</string>
```
