  ## <a name="extensions-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2795">扩展策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2795">Extensions policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2796">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2796">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="blockexternalextensions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2797">BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2797">BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>

  #### <a name="blocks-external-extensions-from-being-installed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2798">阻止安装外部扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2798">Blocks external extensions from being installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2799">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2799">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2800">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自88或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2800">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2801">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2801">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2802">控制外部扩展的安装。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2802">Control the installation of external extensions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2803">如果启用此设置，将阻止安装外部扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2803">If you enable this setting, external extensions are blocked from being installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2804">如果禁用此设置或将其保留为未设置，则允许安装外部扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2804">If you disable this setting or leave it unset, external extensions are allowed to be installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2805">外部扩展及其安装记录[在此处](/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/developer-guide/alternate-distribution-options)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2805">External extensions and their installation are documented [here](/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/developer-guide/alternate-distribution-options).</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2806">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2806">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2807">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2807">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2808">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2808">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2809">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2809">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2810">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2810">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2811">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2811">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2812">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2812">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2813">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2813">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2814">GP 唯一名称： BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2814">GP unique name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2815">GP 名称：阻止外部扩展的安装</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2815">GP name: Blocks external extensions from being installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2816">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2816">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2817">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2817">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2818">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2818">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2819">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2819">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2820">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2820">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2821">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2821">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2822">值名称： BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2822">Value Name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2823">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2823">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2824">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2824">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2825">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2825">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2826">首选键名称： BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2826">Preference Key Name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2827">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2827">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2828">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2828">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="extensionallowedtypes"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2829">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2829">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-allowed-extension-types"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2830">配置允许的扩展类型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2830">Configure allowed extension types</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2831">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2831">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2832">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2832">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2833">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2833">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2834">设置策略可控制 Microsoft Edge 中可以安装哪些应用和扩展、它们可以与哪些主机进行交互并限制运行时访问。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2834">Setting the policy controls which apps and extensions may be installed in Microsoft Edge, which hosts they can interact with, and limits runtime access.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2835">如果未设置此策略，则对可接受的扩展和应用类型没有任何限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2835">If you don't set this policy, there aren't any restrictions on acceptable extension and app types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2836">不会安装类型不在列表中的扩展和应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2836">Extensions and apps which have a type that's not on the list won't be installed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2837">每个值应为以下字符串之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2837">Each value should be one of these strings:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2838">“extension”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2838">"extension"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2839">“theme”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2839">"theme"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2840">“user_script”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2840">"user_script"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2841">“hosted_app”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2841">"hosted_app"</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2842">有关这些类型的详细信息，请参阅 Microsoft Edge 扩展文档。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2842">See the Microsoft Edge extensions documentation for more information about these types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2843">注意：此策略还会影响使用 [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) 强制安装的扩展和应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2843">Note: This policy also affects extensions and apps to be force-installed using [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2844">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2844">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2845">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2845">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2846">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2846">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2847">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2847">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2848">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2848">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2849">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2849">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2850">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2850">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2851">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2851">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2852">GP 唯一名称：ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2852">GP unique name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2853">GP 名称：配置允许的扩展类型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2853">GP name: Configure allowed extension types</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2854">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2854">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2855">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2855">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2856">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2856">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2857">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2857">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2858">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2858">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2859">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2859">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2860">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2860">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2861">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2861">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2862">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2862">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes\1 = "hosted_app"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2863">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2863">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2864">首选项项名称：ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2864">Preference Key Name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2865">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2865">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>hosted_app</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2866">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2866">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="extensioninstallallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2867">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2867">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-specific-extensions-to-be-installed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2868">允许安装特定扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2868">Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2869">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2869">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2870">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2870">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2871">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2871">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2872">设置此策略指定哪些扩展不受阻止列表的限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2872">Setting this policy specifies which extensions are not subject to the blocklist.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2873">Blocklist 值为 \* 表示将阻止所有扩展，且用户仅可安装允许列表中所列出的扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2873">A blocklist value of \* means all extensions are blocked and users can only install extensions listed in the allow list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2874">默认情况下，允许所有扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2874">By default, all extensions are allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2875">但是，如果策略禁止扩展，则可使用允许的扩展列表更改该策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2875">However, if you prohibited extensions by policy, you can use the list of allowed extensions to change that policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2876">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2876">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2877">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2877">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2878">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2878">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2879">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2879">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2880">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2880">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2881">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2881">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2882">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2882">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2883">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2883">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2884">GP 唯一名称：ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2884">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2885">GP 名称：允许安装特定扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2885">GP name: Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2886">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2886">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2887">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2887">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2888">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2888">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2889">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2889">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2890">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2890">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2891">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2891">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2892">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2892">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2893">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2893">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2894">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2894">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\1 = "extension_id1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\2 = "extension_id2"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2895">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2895">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2896">首选项项名称：ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2896">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2897">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2897">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2898">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2898">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="extensioninstallblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2899">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2899">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-which-extensions-cannot-be-installed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2900">控制无法安装的扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2900">Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2901">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2901">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2902">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2902">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2903">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2903">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2904">让你指定用户无法安装的扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2904">Lets you specify which extensions the users CANNOT install.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2905">如果阻止已安装的扩展程序，则将将其禁用，而用户无法启用它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2905">Extensions already installed will be disabled if blocked, without a way for the user to enable them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2906">当一个已禁用的扩展程序从阻止列表中删除后，它将自动重新启用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2906">After a disabled extension is removed from the blocklist it will automatically get re-enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2907">阻止列表值 '\*' 表示阻止所有扩展名，除非它们在 allowlist 中明确列出。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2907">A blocklist value of '\*' means all extensions are blocked unless they are explicitly listed in the allowlist.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2908">如果未设置此策略，用户可以在 Microsoft Edge 中安装任何扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2908">If this policy isn't set, the user can install any extension in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2909">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2909">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2910">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2910">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2911">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2911">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2912">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2912">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2913">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2913">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2914">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2914">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2915">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2915">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2916">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2916">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2917">GP 唯一名称：ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2917">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2918">GP 名称：控制无法安装的扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2918">GP name: Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2919">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2919">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2920">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2920">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2921">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2921">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2922">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2922">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2923">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2923">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2924">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2924">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2925">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2925">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2926">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2926">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2927">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2927">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\1 = "extension_id1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\2 = "extension_id2"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2928">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2928">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2929">首选项项名称：ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2929">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2930">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2930">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2931">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2931">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="extensioninstallforcelist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2932">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2932">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-which-extensions-are-installed-silently"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2933">控制静默安装的扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2933">Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2934">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2934">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2935">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2935">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2936">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2936">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2937">设置此策略以指定无需用户交互、无提示安装的应用和扩展的列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2937">Set this policy to specify a list of apps and extensions that install silently, without user interaction.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2938">用户无法卸载或关闭此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2938">Users can't uninstall or turn off this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2939">权限是隐式授予的，包括 enterprise.deviceAttributes 和 enterprise.platformKeys 扩展 API。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2939">Permissions are granted implicitly, including the enterprise.deviceAttributes and enterprise.platformKeys extension APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2940">注意：这 2 个 API 不适用于未强制安装的应用和扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2940">Note: These 2 APIs aren't available to apps and extensions that aren't force-installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2941">如果未设置此策略，则不会自动安装任何应用或扩展，用户可以卸载 Microsoft Edge 中的任何应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2941">If you don't set this policy, no apps or extensions are autoinstalled and users can uninstall any app in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2942">此策略取代了 [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2942">This policy supercedes [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2943">如果以前强制安装的应用或扩展已从此列表中删除，则 Microsoft Edge 将自动卸载它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2943">If a previously force-installed app or extension is removed from this list, Microsoft Edge automatically uninstalls it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2944">在 Microsoft Windows 实例上，只有当实例加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域并运行 Windows 10 专业版时，才能强制安装 Microsoft Edge Add-ons 网站外部的应用和扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2944">On Microsoft Windows instances, apps and extensions from outside the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website can only be forced installed if the instance is joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, and running Windows 10 Pro.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2945">在 macOS 实例上，只有当实例是通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域时，才能强制安装 Microsoft Edge 加载项网站外部的应用和扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2945">On macOS instances, apps and extensions from outside the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website can only be force installed if the instance is managed via MDM, or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2946">任何扩展的源代码都可以由使用开发人员工具的用户更改，这可能导致扩展无法正常工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2946">The source code of any extension can be altered by users with developer tools, potentially rendering the extension unfunctional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2947">如果这是个问题，请配置 DeveloperToolsDisabled 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2947">If this is a concern, configure the DeveloperToolsDisabled policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2948">策略的每个列表项都是一个字符串，其包含扩展 ID 和“更新”URL（可选），用分号 (;) 分隔。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2948">Each list item of the policy is a string that contains an extension ID and, optionally, an "update" URL separated by a semicolon (;).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2949">扩展 ID 是在开发人员模式下找到的 32 个字母字符串，例如在 edge://extensions 上。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2949">The extension ID is the 32-letter string found, for example, on edge://extensions when in Developer mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2950">如果指定，“更新”URL 应指向更新清单 XML 文档 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043))。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2950">If specified, the "update" URL should point to an Update Manifest XML document ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2951">默认情况下，使用 Microsoft Edge Add-ons 网站的更新 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2951">By default, the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website's update URL is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2952">此策略中设置的“更新”URL 仅用于初始安装；后续扩展更新使用扩展清单中的更新 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2952">The "update" URL set in this policy is only used for the initial installation; subsequent updates of the extension use the update URL in the extension's manifest.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2953">注意：此策略不适用于 InPrivate 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2953">Note: This policy doesn't apply to InPrivate mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2954">[此处](/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/enterprise/hosting-and-updating)阅读有关托管扩展的信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2954">Read about hosting extensions [here](/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/enterprise/hosting-and-updating).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2955">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2955">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2956">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2956">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2957">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2957">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2958">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2958">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2959">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2959">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2960">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2960">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2961">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2961">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2962">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2962">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2963">GP 唯一名称：ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2963">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2964">GP 名称：控制静默安装的扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2964">GP name: Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2965">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2965">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2966">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2966">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2967">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2967">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2968">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2968">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2969">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2969">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2970">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2970">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2971">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2971">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2972">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2972">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2973">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2973">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\1 = "gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\2 = "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2974">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2974">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2975">首选项项名称：ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2975">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2976">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2976">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx</string>
  <string>abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2977">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2977">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="extensioninstallsources"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2978">ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2978">ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-extension-and-user-script-install-sources"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2979">配置扩展和用户脚本安装源</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2979">Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2980">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2980">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2981">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2981">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2982">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2982">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2983">定义可安装扩展和主题的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2983">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2984">定义可直接安装扩展和主题的 Url，无需将包拖放到 edge://extensions 页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2984">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes directly without having to drag and drop the packages to the edge://extensions page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2985">此列表中的每个项目都是扩展样式匹配模式（请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2985">Each item in this list is an extension-style match pattern (see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2986">用户可以轻松地从与此列表中的项目匹配的任何 URL 安装项目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2986">Users can easily install items from any URL that matches an item in this list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2987">这些模式必须允许 \*.crx 文件的位置和从其启动下载的页面（换句话说，即引用者）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2987">Both the location of the \*.crx file and the page where the download is started from (in other words, the referrer) must be allowed by these patterns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2988">不要在需要身份验证的位置承载文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2988">Do not host the files at a location that requires authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2989">[ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) 策略优先于此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2989">The [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy takes precedence over this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2990">不会安装阻止列表上的任何扩展，即使它来自此列表上的网站也是如此。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2990">Any extensions that's on the block list won't be installed, even if it comes from a site on this list.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2991">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2991">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2992">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2992">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2993">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2993">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2994">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2994">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2995">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2995">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2996">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2996">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2997">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2997">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2998">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2998">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-2999">GP 唯一名称：ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-2999">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3000">GP 名称：配置扩展和用户脚本安装源</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3000">GP name: Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3001">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3001">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3002">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3002">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3003">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3003">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3004">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3004">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3005">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3005">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3006">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3006">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3007">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3007">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3008">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3008">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3009">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3009">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources\1 = "https://corp.contoso.com/*"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3010">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3010">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3011">首选项项名称：ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3011">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3012">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3012">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://corp.contoso.com/*</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3013">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3013">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="extensionsettings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3014">ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3014">ExtensionSettings</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-extension-management-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3015">配置扩展管理设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3015">Configure extension management settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3016">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3016">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3017">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3017">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3018">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3018">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3019">设置此策略可控制 Microsoft Edge 的扩展管理设置，包括任何受现有扩展相关策略控制的设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3019">Setting this policy controls extension management settings for Microsoft Edge, including any controlled by existing extension-related policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3020">此策略将取代可能设置的任何旧策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3020">This policy supersedes any legacy policies that might be set.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3021">此策略仅将扩展 ID 或更新 URL 映射到其特定设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3021">This policy maps an extension ID or an update URL to its specific setting only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3022">可以针对特殊 ID"\*"设置默认配置，此配置适用于在此策略中无自定义配置的所有扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3022">A default configuration can be set for the special ID "\*", which applies to all extensions without a custom configuration in this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3023">使用更新 URL，配置适用于扩展清单中所述的具有确切更新 URL 的扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3023">With an update URL, configuration applies to extensions with the exact update URL stated in the extension manifest.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3024">有关更多详细信息，请查看 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2161555](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2161555) 上提供的 ExtensionSettings 策略的详细指南。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3024">For more details, check out the detailed guide to ExtensionSettings policy available at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2161555](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2161555).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3025">要阻止来自特定第三方应用商店的扩展，只需阻止该商店的 update_url。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3025">To block extensions from a particular third party store, you only need to block the update_url for that store.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3026">例如，如果要阻止 Chrome Web Store 的扩展，可以使用以下 JSON。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3026">For example, if you want to block extensions from Chrome Web Store, you can use the following JSON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3027">{"update_url:https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx":{"installation_mode":"blocked"}}</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3027">{"update_url:https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx":{"installation_mode":"blocked"}}</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3028">请注意，你仍然可以使用 [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) 和 [ExtensionInstallAllowlist](#extensioninstallallowlist) 来允许/强制安装特定扩展，即使使用上一示例中的 JSON 阻止了商店。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3028">Note that you can still use [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) and [ExtensionInstallAllowlist](#extensioninstallallowlist) to allow / force install specific extensions even if the store is blocked using the JSON in the previous example.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3029">注意：对于未加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例，强制安装仅限于 Microsoft Edge 加载项网站中列出的应用程序和扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3029">Note: For Windows instances not joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, forced installation is limited to apps and extensions listed in the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3030">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3030">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3031">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3031">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3032">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3032">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3033">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3033">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3034">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3034">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3035">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3035">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3036">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3036">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3037">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3037">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3038">GP 唯一名称：ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3038">GP unique name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3039">GP 名称：配置扩展管理设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3039">GP name: Configure extension management settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3040">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3040">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3041">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3041">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3042">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3042">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3043">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3043">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3044">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3044">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3045">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3045">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3046">值名称：ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3046">Value Name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3047">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3047">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3048">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3048">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {
  "*": {
    "allowed_types": [
      "hosted_app"
    ],
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.",
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "downloads",
      "bookmarks"
    ],
    "install_sources": [
      "https://company-intranet/apps"
    ],
    "installation_mode": "blocked",
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ],
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ]
  },
  "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "history"
    ],
    "installation_mode": "allowed",
    "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"
  },
  "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ],
    "installation_mode": "force_installed",
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ],
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ],
    "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"
  },
  "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.",
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  },
  "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.",
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  },
  "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.",
    "installation_mode": "removed"
  },
  "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ],
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "wallpaper"
    ],
    "installation_mode": "allowed"
  }
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3049">精简示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3049">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {"*": {"allowed_types": ["hosted_app"], "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "blocked_permissions": ["downloads", "bookmarks"], "install_sources": ["https://company-intranet/apps"], "installation_mode": "blocked", "runtime_allowed_hosts": ["*://good.contoso.com"], "runtime_blocked_hosts": ["*://*.contoso.com"]}, "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {"blocked_permissions": ["history"], "installation_mode": "allowed", "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"}, "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {"allowed_permissions": ["downloads"], "installation_mode": "force_installed", "runtime_allowed_hosts": ["*://good.contoso.com"], "runtime_blocked_hosts": ["*://*.contoso.com"], "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"}, "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "installation_mode": "blocked"}, "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "installation_mode": "blocked"}, "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.", "installation_mode": "removed"}, "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {"allowed_permissions": ["downloads"], "blocked_permissions": ["wallpaper"], "installation_mode": "allowed"}}
  ```

  ## <a name="http-authentication-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3054">HTTP 身份验证策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3054">HTTP authentication policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3055">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3055">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="allowcrossoriginauthprompt"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3056">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3056">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-cross-origin-http-authentication-prompts"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3057">允许跨域 HTTP 身份验证提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3057">Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3058">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3058">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3059">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3059">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3060">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3060">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3061">控制页面上的第三方图像是否可以显示身份验证提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3061">Controls whether third-party images on a page can show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3062">通常，这将被禁用，以抵御网络钓鱼威胁。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3062">Typically, this is disabled as a phishing defense.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3063">如果未配置此策略，它将被禁用，第三方映像无法显示身份验证提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3063">If you don't configure this policy, it's disabled and third-party images can't show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3064">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3064">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3065">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3065">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3066">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3066">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3067">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3067">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3068">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3068">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3069">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3069">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3070">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3070">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3071">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3071">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3072">GP 唯一名称：AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3072">GP unique name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3073">GP 名称: 允许跨域 HTTP 身份验证提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3073">GP name: Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3074">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3074">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3075">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3075">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3076">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3076">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3077">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3077">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3078">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3078">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3079">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3079">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3080">值名称：AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3080">Value Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3081">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3081">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3082">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3082">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3083">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3083">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3084">首选项项名称：AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3084">Preference Key Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3085">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3085">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3086">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3086">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="authnegotiatedelegateallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3087">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3087">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="specifies-a-list-of-servers-that-microsoft-edge-can-delegate-user-credentials-to"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3088">指定 Microsoft Edge 可将用户凭据委派到的服务器列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3088">Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3089">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3089">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3090">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3090">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3091">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3091">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3092">配置 Microsoft Edge 可委派到的服务器列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3092">Configure the list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3093">以逗号分隔多个服务器名称。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3093">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3094">允许使用通配符 (\*)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3094">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3095">如果未配置此策略，即使服务器被检测为 Intranet，Microsoft Edge 也不会委派用户凭据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3095">If you don't configure this policy Microsoft Edge won't delegate user credentials even if a server is detected as Intranet.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3096">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3096">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3097">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3097">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3098">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3098">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3099">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3099">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3100">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3100">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3101">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3101">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3102">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3102">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3103">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3103">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3104">GP 唯一名称：AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3104">GP unique name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3105">GP 名称：指定 Microsoft Edge 可将用户凭据委派到的服务器列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3105">GP name: Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3106">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3106">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3107">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3107">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3108">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3108">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3109">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3109">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3110">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3110">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3111">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3111">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3112">值名称：AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3112">Value Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3113">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3113">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3114">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3114">Example value:</span></span>

```
"contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3115">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3115">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3116">首选项项名称：AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3116">Preference Key Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3117">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3117">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3118">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3118">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="authschemes"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3119">AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3119">AuthSchemes</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-authentication-schemes"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3120">支持的身份验证方案</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3120">Supported authentication schemes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3121">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3121">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3122">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3122">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3123">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3123">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3124">指定支持的 HTTP 身份验证方案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3124">Specifies which HTTP authentication schemes are supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3125">可使用以下值来配置策略：“basic”、“digest”、“ntlm”和“negotiate”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3125">You can configure the policy by using these values: 'basic', 'digest', 'ntlm', and 'negotiate'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3126">用逗号分隔多个值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3126">Separate multiple values with commas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3127">如果未配置此策略，将使用所有 4 种方案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3127">If you don't configure this policy, all four schemes are used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3128">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3128">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3129">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3129">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3130">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3130">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3131">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3131">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3132">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3132">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3133">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3133">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3134">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3134">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3135">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3135">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3136">GP 唯一名称：AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3136">GP unique name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3137">GP 名称：支持的身份验证方案</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3137">GP name: Supported authentication schemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3138">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3138">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3139">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3139">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3140">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3140">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3141">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3141">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3142">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3142">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3143">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3143">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3144">值名称：AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3144">Value Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3145">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3145">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3146">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3146">Example value:</span></span>

```
"basic,digest,ntlm,negotiate"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3147">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3147">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3148">首选项项名称：AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3148">Preference Key Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3149">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3149">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>basic,digest,ntlm,negotiate</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3150">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3150">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="authserverallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3151">AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3151">AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-list-of-allowed-authentication-servers"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3152">配置允许的身份验证服务器列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3152">Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3153">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3153">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3154">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3154">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3155">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3155">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3156">指定要启用集成身份验证的服务器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3156">Specifies which servers to enable for integrated authentication.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3157">仅当 Microsoft Edge 从代理或此列表中的服务器收到身份验证质询时，才会启用集成身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3157">Integrated authentication is only enabled when Microsoft Edge receives an authentication challenge from a proxy or from a server in this list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3158">以逗号分隔多个服务器名称。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3158">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3159">允许使用通配符 (\*)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3159">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3160">如果未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将尝试检测服务器是否位于 Intranet 上 - 只有这样，它才会响应 IWA 请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3160">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge tries to detect if a server is on the intranet - only then will it respond to IWA requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3161">如果服务器在 Internet 上，Microsoft Edge 将忽略来自服务器的 IWA 请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3161">If the server is on the internet, IWA requests from it are ignored by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3162">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3162">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3163">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3163">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3164">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3164">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3165">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3165">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3166">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3166">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3167">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3167">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3168">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3168">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3169">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3169">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3170">GP 唯一名称：AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3170">GP unique name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3171">GP 名称：配置允许的身份验证服务器列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3171">GP name: Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3172">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3172">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3173">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3173">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3174">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3174">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3175">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3175">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3176">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3176">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3177">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3177">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3178">值名称：AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3178">Value Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3179">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3179">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3180">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3180">Example value:</span></span>

```
"*contoso.com,contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3181">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3181">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3182">首选项项名称：AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3182">Preference Key Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3183">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3183">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>*contoso.com,contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3184">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3184">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="basicauthoverhttpenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3185">BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3185">BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-basic-authentication-for-http"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3186">允许 HTTP 的基本身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3186">Allow Basic authentication for HTTP</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3187">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3187">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3188">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自88或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3188">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3189">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3189">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3190">如果启用或不设置此策略，将允许通过非安全 HTTP 接收基本身份验证挑战。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3190">If you enable this policy or leave it unset, Basic authentication challenges received over non-secure HTTP will be allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3191">如果禁用此策略，则会阻止来自基本身份验证方案的非安全 HTTP 请求，并且只允许安全 HTTPS。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3191">If you disable this policy,  non-secure HTTP requests from the Basic authentication scheme are blocked, and only secure HTTPS is allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3192">如果设置了 [AuthSchemes](#authschemes) 策略且不包括基本身份验证方案，则忽略此策略（且始终禁止基本身份验证方案）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3192">This policy setting is ignored (and Basic is always forbidden) if the [AuthSchemes](#authschemes) policy is set and does not include Basic.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3193">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3193">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3194">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3194">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
