  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3195">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3195">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3196">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3196">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3197">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3197">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3198">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3198">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3199">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3199">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3200">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3200">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3201">GP 唯一名称：BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3201">GP unique name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3202">GP 名称：允许 HTTP 的基本身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3202">GP name: Allow Basic authentication for HTTP</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3203">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3203">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3204">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3204">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3205">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3205">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3206">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3206">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3207">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3207">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3208">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3208">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3209">值名称：BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3209">Value Name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3210">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3210">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3211">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3211">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3212">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3212">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3213">首选项项名称：BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3213">Preference Key Name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3214">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3214">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3215">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3215">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="disableauthnegotiatecnamelookup"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3216">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3216">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-cname-lookup-when-negotiating-kerberos-authentication"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3217">在协商 Kerberos 身份验证时禁用 CNAME 查找</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3217">Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3218">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3218">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3219">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3219">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3220">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3220">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3221">确定生成的 Kerberos SPN 是基于规范 DNS 名称 (CNAME) 还是基于输入的原始名称。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3221">Determines whether the generated Kerberos SPN is based on the canonical DNS name (CNAME) or on the original name entered.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3222">如果启用此策略，将跳过 CNAME 查找，并使用服务器名称（如所输入）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3222">If you enable this policy, CNAME lookup is skipped and the server name (as entered) is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3223">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则将使用服务器的规范名称。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3223">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, the canonical name of the server is used.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3224">这是通过 CNAME 查找确定的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3224">This is determined through CNAME lookup.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3225">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3225">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3226">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3226">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3227">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3227">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3228">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3228">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3229">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3229">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3230">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3230">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3231">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3231">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3232">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3232">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3233">GP 唯一名称：DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3233">GP unique name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3234">GP 名称：在协商 Kerberos 身份验证时禁用 CNAME 查找</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3234">GP name: Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3235">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3235">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3236">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3236">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3237">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3237">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3238">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3238">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3239">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3239">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3240">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3240">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3241">值名称：DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3241">Value Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3242">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3242">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3243">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3243">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3244">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3244">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3245">首选项项名称：DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3245">Preference Key Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3246">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3246">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3247">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3247">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="enableauthnegotiateport"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3248">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3248">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>

  #### <a name="include-non-standard-port-in-kerberos-spn"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3249">在 Kerberos SPN 中包括非标准端口</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3249">Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3250">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3250">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3251">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3251">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3252">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3252">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3253">指定生成的 Kerberos SPN 是否应包括非标准端口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3253">Specifies whether the generated Kerberos SPN should include a non-standard port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3254">如果启用此策略，并且用户在 URL 中包括非标准端口（80 或 443 以外的端口），则该端口将包括在生成的 Kerberos SPN 中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3254">If you enable this policy, and a user includes a non-standard port (a port other than 80 or 443) in a URL, that port is included in the generated Kerberos SPN.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3255">如果未配置或禁用此策略，则生成的 Kerberos SPN 在任何情况下都不包括端口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3255">If you don't configure or disable this policy, the generated Kerberos SPN won't include a port in any case.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3256">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3256">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3257">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3257">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3258">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3258">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3259">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3259">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3260">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3260">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3261">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3261">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3262">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3262">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3263">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3263">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3264">GP 唯一名称：EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3264">GP unique name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3265">GP 名称：在 Kerberos SPN 中包括非标准端口</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3265">GP name: Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3266">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3266">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3267">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3267">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3268">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3268">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3269">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3269">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3270">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3270">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3271">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3271">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3272">值名称：EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3272">Value Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3273">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3273">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3274">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3274">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3275">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3275">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3276">首选项项名称：EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3276">Preference Key Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3277">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3277">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3278">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3278">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="ntlmv2enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3279">NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3279">NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-whether-ntlmv2-authentication-is-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3280">控制是否启用 NTLMv2 身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3280">Control whether NTLMv2 authentication is enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3281">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3281">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3282">在 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3282">On macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3283">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3283">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3284">控制是否启用 NTLMv2。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3284">Controls whether NTLMv2 is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3285">Samba 和 Windows 服务器的所有最新版本都支持 NTLMv2。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3285">All recent versions of Samba and Windows servers support NTLMv2.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3286">只应禁用 NTLMv2 来解决向后兼容性问题，因为它会降低身份验证的安全性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3286">You should only disable NTLMv2 to address issues with backwards compatibility as it reduces the security of authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3287">如果未配置此策略，则默认情况下将启用 NTLMv2。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3287">If you don't configure this policy, NTLMv2 is enabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3288">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3288">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3289">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3289">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3290">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3290">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3291">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3291">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3292">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3292">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3293">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3293">Boolean</span></span>

  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3294">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3294">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3295">首选项项名称：NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3295">Preference Key Name: NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3296">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3296">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3297">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3297">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="windowshelloforhttpauthenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3298">WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3298">WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-hello-for-http-auth-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3299">适用于 HTTP Auth 的 Windows Hello 已启用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3299">Windows Hello For HTTP Auth Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3300">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3300">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3301">在 Windows 上自 90 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3301">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3302">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3302">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3303">指示是否应当使用 Windows 凭据 UI 来响应 NTLM 和应对身份验证挑战。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3303">Indicates if Windows Credential UI should be used to respond to NTLM and Negotiate authentication challenges.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3304">如果禁用此策略，将使用基本用户名和密码提示来回答 NTLM 和应对挑战。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3304">If you disable this policy, a basic username and password prompt will be used to respond to NTLM and Negotiate challenges.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3305">如果启用或不配置此策略，将使用 Windows 凭据 UI。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3305">If you enable or don't configure this policy, Windows Credential UI will be used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3306">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3306">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3307">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3307">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3308">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3308">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3309">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3309">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3310">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3310">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3311">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3311">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3312">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3312">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3313">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3313">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3314">GP 唯一名称：WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3314">GP unique name: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3315">GP 名称：已启用适用于 HTTP Auth 的 Windows Hello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3315">GP name: Windows Hello For HTTP Auth Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3316">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3316">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3317">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/HTTP 身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3317">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3318">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3318">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3319">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3319">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3320">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3320">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3321">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3321">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3322">值名称：WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3322">Value Name: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3323">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3323">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3324">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3324">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3325">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3325">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <a name="kiosk-mode-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3326">展台模式设置策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3326">Kiosk Mode settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3327">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3327">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="kioskaddressbareditingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3328">KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3328">KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-address-bar-editing-for-kiosk-mode-public-browsing-experience"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3329">配置地址栏编辑，实现展台模式的公共浏览体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3329">Configure address bar editing for kiosk mode public browsing experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3330">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3330">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3331">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自87或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3331">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3332">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3332">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3333">此策略仅适用于使用公共浏览体验时的 Microsoft Edge 展台模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3333">This policy only applies to Microsoft Edge kiosk mode while using the public browsing experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3334">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以更改地址栏中的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3334">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can change the URL in the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3335">如果禁用此策略，将阻止用户更改地址栏中的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3335">If you disable this policy, it prevents users from changing the URL in the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3336">有关配置展台模式的详细信息，请参阅[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3336">For detailed information on configuring kiosk Mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3337">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3337">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3338">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3338">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3339">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3339">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3340">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3340">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3341">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3341">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3342">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3342">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3343">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3343">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3344">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3344">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3345">GP 唯一名称：KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3345">GP unique name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3346">GP 名称：配置地址栏编辑，实现展台模式的公共浏览体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3346">GP name: Configure address bar editing for kiosk mode public browsing experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3347">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/展台模式设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3347">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3348">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3348">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3349">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3349">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3350">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3350">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3351">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3351">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3352">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3352">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3353">值名称：KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3353">Value Name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3354">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3354">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3355">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3355">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3356">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3356">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3357">首选项项名称：KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3357">Preference Key Name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3358">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3358">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3359">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3359">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="kioskdeletedownloadsonexit"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3360">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3360">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>

  #### <a name="delete-files-downloaded-as-part-of-kiosk-session-when-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3361">Microsoft Edge 关闭时删除作为展台会话的一部分下载的文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3361">Delete files downloaded as part of kiosk session when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3362">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3362">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3363">在 87 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3363">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3364">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3364">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3365">此策略仅适用于 Microsoft Edge 展台模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3365">This policy only applies to Microsoft Edge kiosk mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3366">如果启用此策略，则每次关闭 Microsoft Edge 时，都会删除作为展台会话一部分下载的文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3366">If you enable this policy, files downloaded as part of the kiosk session are deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3367">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则当 Microsoft Edge 关闭时，作为展台会话一部分下载的文件不会被删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3367">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, files downloaded as part of the kiosk session are not deleted when Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3368">有关配置展台模式的详细信息，请参阅[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3368">For detailed information on configuring kiosk Mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3369">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3369">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3370">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3370">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3371">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3371">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3372">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3372">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3373">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3373">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3374">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3374">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3375">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3375">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3376">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3376">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3377">GP 唯一名称：KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3377">GP unique name: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3378">GP 名称：Microsoft Edge 关闭时删除作为展台会话的一部分下载的文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3378">GP name: Delete files downloaded as part of kiosk session when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3379">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/展台模式设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3379">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3380">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3380">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3381">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3381">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3382">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3382">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3383">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3383">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3384">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3384">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3385">值名称：KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3385">Value Name: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3386">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3386">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3387">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3387">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3388">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3388">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <a name="manageability-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3389">可管理性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3389">Manageability policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3390">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3390">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="mamenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3391">MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3391">MAMEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="mobile-app-management-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3392">移动应用管理已启用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3392">Mobile App Management Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3393">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3393">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3394">自 89 或更高版本起，在 Windows 和 macOS 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3394">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3395">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3395">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3396">允许 Microsoft Edge 浏览器从 Intune 应用程序管理服务检索策略，并应用于用户配置文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3396">Allows the Microsoft Edge browser to retrieve policies from the Intune application management services and apply them to users' profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3397">如果启用或不配置此策略，可以应用移动应用管理 (MAM) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3397">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Mobile App Management (MAM) Policies can be applied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3398">如果禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将不会与 Intune 通信以请求 MAM 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3398">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will not communicate with Intune to request MAM Policies.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3399">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3399">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3400">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3400">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3401">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3401">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3402">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3402">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3403">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3403">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3404">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3404">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3405">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3405">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3406">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3406">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3407">GP 唯一名称：MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3407">GP unique name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3408">GP 名称：移动应用管理已启用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3408">GP name: Mobile App Management Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3409">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/可管理性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3409">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Manageability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3410">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3410">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3411">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3411">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3412">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3412">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3413">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3413">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3414">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3414">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3415">值名称：MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3415">Value Name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3416">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3416">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3417">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3417">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3418">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3418">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3419">首选项项名称：MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3419">Preference Key Name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3420">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3420">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3421">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3421">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <a name="native-messaging-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3422">本机消息传递策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3422">Native Messaging policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3423">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3423">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="nativemessagingallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3424">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3424">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-which-native-messaging-hosts-users-can-use"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3425">控制用户可使用的本机消息传递主机</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3425">Control which native messaging hosts users can use</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3426">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3426">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3427">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3427">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3428">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3428">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3429">设置策略指定哪些本机邮件主机不受拒绝列表的限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3429">Setting the policy specifies which native messaging hosts aren't subject to the deny list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3430">拒绝列表值为 \*，意味着除非明确允许，否则将拒绝所有本地消息主机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3430">A deny list value of \* means all native messaging hosts are denied unless they're explicitly allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3431">默认情况下，允许所有本机消息主机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3431">All native messaging hosts are allowed by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3432">但是，如果策略拒绝本机消息主机，管理员可使用允许列表更改该策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3432">However, if a native messaging host is denied by policy, the admin can use the allow list to change that policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3433">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3433">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3434">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3434">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3435">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3435">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3436">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3436">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3437">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3437">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3438">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3438">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3439">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3439">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3440">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3440">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3441">GP 唯一名称：NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3441">GP unique name: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3442">GP 名称：控制用户可使用的本机消息传递主机</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3442">GP name: Control which native messaging hosts users can use</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3443">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/本机消息传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3443">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3444">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3444">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3445">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3445">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3446">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3446">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3447">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3447">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3448">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3448">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3449">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3449">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3450">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3450">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3451">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3451">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\1 = "com.native.messaging.host.name1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\2 = "com.native.messaging.host.name2"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3452">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3452">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3453">首选项项名称：NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3453">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3454">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3454">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name1</string>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3455">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3455">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="nativemessagingblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3456">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3456">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-native-messaging-block-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3457">配置本机消息传递阻止列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3457">Configure native messaging block list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3458">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3458">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3459">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3459">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3460">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3460">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3461">设置此策略可指定哪些不应加载的本机消息主机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3461">Setting this policy specifies which native messaging hosts shouldn't be loaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3462">拒绝列表值为 \*，意味着除非明确允许，否则将拒绝所有本地消息主机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3462">A deny list value of \* means all native messaging hosts are denied unless they're explicitly allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3463">如果未设置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将加载所有已安装的本机消息主机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3463">If you leave this policy unset , Microsoft Edge loads all installed native messaging hosts.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3464">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3464">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3465">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3465">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3466">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3466">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3467">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3467">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3468">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3468">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3469">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3469">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3470">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3470">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3471">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3471">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3472">GP 唯一名称：NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3472">GP unique name: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3473">GP 名称：配置本机消息传递阻止列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3473">GP name: Configure native messaging block list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3474">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/本机消息传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3474">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3475">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3475">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3476">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3476">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3477">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3477">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3478">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3478">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3479">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3479">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3480">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3480">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3481">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3481">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3482">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3482">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\1 = "com.native.messaging.host.name1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\2 = "com.native.messaging.host.name2"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3483">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3483">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3484">首选项项名称：NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3484">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3485">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3485">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name1</string>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3486">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3486">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="nativemessaginguserlevelhosts"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3487">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3487">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-user-level-native-messaging-hosts-installed-without-admin-permissions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3488">允许用户级本机消息传递主机（已安装但没有管理员权限）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3488">Allow user-level native messaging hosts (installed without admin permissions)</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3489">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3489">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3490">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3490">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3491">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3491">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3492">如果此策略设置为已启用或保持未设置状态，Microsoft Edge 可以使用安装在用户级别的本机消息主机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3492">If you set this policy to Enabled or leave it unset, Microsoft Edge can use native messaging hosts installed at the user level.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3493">如果将此策略设置为“已禁用”，如果它们安装在系统级别，则 Microsoft Edge 仅能使用这些主机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3493">If you set this policy to Disabled, Microsoft Edge can only use these hosts if they're installed at the system level.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3494">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3494">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3495">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3495">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3496">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3496">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3497">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3497">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3498">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3498">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3499">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3499">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3500">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3500">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3501">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3501">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3502">GP 唯一名称：NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3502">GP unique name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3503">GP 名称：允许用户级本机消息传递主机（已安装但没有管理员权限）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3503">GP name: Allow user-level native messaging hosts (installed without admin permissions)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3504">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/本机消息传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3504">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3505">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3505">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3506">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3506">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3507">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3507">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3508">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3508">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3509">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3509">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3510">值名称：NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3510">Value Name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3511">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3511">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3512">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3512">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3513">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3513">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3514">首选项项名称：NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3514">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3515">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3515">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3516">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3516">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <a name="password-manager-and-protection-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3517">密码管理器和保护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3517">Password manager and protection policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3518">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3518">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="passwordmanagerenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3519">PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3519">PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-saving-passwords-to-the-password-manager"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3520">允许将密码保存到密码管理器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3520">Enable saving passwords to the password manager</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3521">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3521">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3522">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3522">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3523">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3523">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3524">允许 Microsoft Edge 保存用户密码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3524">Enable Microsoft Edge to save user passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3525">如果启用此策略，用户可以在 Microsoft Edge 中保存其密码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3525">If you enable this policy, users can save their passwords in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3526">下次他们访问网站时，Microsoft Edge 将自动输入密码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3526">The next time they visit the site, Microsoft Edge will enter the password automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3527">如果禁用此策略，用户将无法保存新密码，但仍然可以使用以前保存的密码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3527">If you disable this policy, users can't save new passwords, but they can still use previously saved passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3528">如果启用或禁用此策略，用户将无法在 Microsoft Edge 中更改或替代它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3528">If you enable or disable this policy, users can't change or override it in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3529">如果未配置此策略，用户可以保存密码以及关闭此功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3529">If you don't configure it, users can save passwords, as well as turn this feature off.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3530">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3530">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3531">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3531">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3532">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3532">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3533">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3533">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3534">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3534">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3535">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3535">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3536">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3536">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3537">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3537">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3538">GP 唯一名称：PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3538">GP unique name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3539">GP 名称：允许将密码保存到密码管理器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3539">GP name: Enable saving passwords to the password manager</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3540">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/密码管理器和保护</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3540">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3541">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/密码管理器和保护</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3541">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3542">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3542">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3543">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3543">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3544">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3544">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3545">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3545">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3546">值名称：PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3546">Value Name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3547">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3547">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3548">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3548">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3549">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3549">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3550">首选项项名称：PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3550">Preference Key Name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3551">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3551">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3552">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3552">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="passwordmonitorallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3553">PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3553">PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-be-alerted-if-their-passwords-are-found-to-be-unsafe"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3554">如果用户发现其密码不安全，则允许其收到通知</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3554">Allow users to be alerted if their passwords are found to be unsafe</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3555">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3555">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3556">在 85 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3556">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3557">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3557">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3558">允许 Microsoft Edge 监视用户密码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3558">Allow Microsoft Edge to monitor user passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3559">如果你启用了该策略，并且用户同意启用该策略，此情况下，用户存储在 Microsoft Edge 中的任何密码被发现是不安全的，用户将收到警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3559">If you enable this policy and a user consents to enabling the policy, the user will get alerted if any of their passwords stored in Microsoft Edge are found to be unsafe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3560">Microsoft Edge 将显示一条通知，这些信息将在设置 > 密码 >密码监视器提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3560">Microsoft Edge will show an alert and this information will also be available in Settings > Passwords > Password Monitor.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3561">如果禁用此策略，用户将不会得到启用此功能的权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3561">If you disable this policy, users will not be asked for permission to enable this feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3562">密码不会被扫描，也不会收到通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3562">Their passwords will not be scanned and they will not be alerted either.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3563">如果您启用或未配置策略，用户可以打开或关闭此功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3563">If you enable or don't configure the policy, users can turn this feature on or off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3564">若要深入了解 Microsoft Edge 如何查找不安全的密码，请参阅[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3564">To learn more about how Microsoft Edge finds unsafe passwords see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3565">其他指南：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3565">Additional guidance:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3566">此策略可以设置为推荐的项目，也可以设置为强制的项目，但是必须使用重要标注。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3566">This policy can be set as both Recommended as well as Mandatory, however with an important callout.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3567">强制启用：假设个别用户许可是为某位用户启用此功能的预条件，则此策略没有必需的已启用设置。
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3567">Mandatory enabled: Given that individual user consent is a pre-condition to enabling this feature for a given user, this policy does not have a Mandatory enabled setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3568">如果将策略设置为强制启用，则设置中的 UI 将不会更改，并且将在 edge://policy 中显示以下错误消息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3568">If the policy is set to Mandatory enabled, the UI in Settings will not change and the following error message will be displayed in edge://policy</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3569">示例错误状态消息：“忽略此策略值，因为密码监视器需要获得单个用户的同意才能打开它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3569">Example Error state message: "This policy value is ignored because Password Monitor requires the consent of the individual user for it to be turned on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3570">你可以要求你组织中的用户进入设置>个人资料>密码并打开该功能。”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3570">You can ask users in your Organization to go to Settings > Profile > Password and turn on the feature."</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3571">建议启用：如果政策设置为推荐启用，UI设置将保持在“关闭”状态，但一个公文包图标旁边将可见这个描述显示在盘旋 - “你的组织推荐这个设置的特定值,你选择了一个不同的价值”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3571">Recommended enabled: If the policy is set to Recommended enabled, the UI in Settings will remain in 'Off' state, but a briefcase icon will be made visible next to it with this description displayed on hover - "Your organization recommends a specific value for this setting and you have chosen a different value"</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3572">强制启用和推荐的禁用项目：强制和推荐禁用：这两种状态都将正常工作，且向用户显示常用标题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3572">Mandatory and Recommended disabled: Both these states will work the normal way, with the usual captions being shown to users.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3573">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3573">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3574">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3574">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3575">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3575">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3576">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3576">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3577">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3577">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3578">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3578">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3579">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3579">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3580">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3580">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3581">GP 唯一名称： PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3581">GP unique name: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3582">GP 名称：当用户的密码被发现不安全时，允许收到警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3582">GP name: Allow users to be alerted if their passwords are found to be unsafe</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3583">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/密码管理器和保护</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3583">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3584">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/密码管理器和保护</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3584">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3585">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3585">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3586">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3586">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3587">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3587">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3588">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3588">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3589">值名称： PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3589">Value Name: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3590">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3590">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3591">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3591">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3592">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3592">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3593">PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3593">PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-change-password-url"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3594">配置更改密码 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3594">Configure the change password URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3595">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3595">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3596">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3596">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3597">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3597">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3598">配置更改密码 URL（仅限 HTTP 和 HTTPS 方案）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3598">Configures the change password URL (HTTP and HTTPS schemes only).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3599">在浏览器中看到警告后，密码保护服务会将用户发送到此 URL 以更改其密码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3599">Password protection service will send users to this URL to change their password after seeing a warning in the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3600">如果启用此策略，则密码保护服务会将用户发送到此 URL 以更改其密码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3600">If you enable this policy, then password protection service sends users to this URL to change their password.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3601">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则密码保护服务不会将用户重定向到更改密码 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3601">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, then password protection service will not redirect users to a change password URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3602">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3602">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3603">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3603">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3604">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3604">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3605">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3605">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3606">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3606">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3607">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3607">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3608">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3608">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3609">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3609">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3610">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3610">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
