  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3611">GP 唯一名称：PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3611">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3612">GP 名称：配置更改密码 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3612">GP name: Configure the change password URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3613">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/密码管理器和保护</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3613">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3614">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3614">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3615">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3615">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3616">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3616">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3617">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3617">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3618">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3618">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3619">值名称：PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3619">Value Name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3620">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3620">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3621">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3621">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://contoso.com/change_password.html"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3622">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3622">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3623">首选项项名称：PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3623">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3624">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3624">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://contoso.com/change_password.html</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3625">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3625">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="passwordprotectionloginurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3626">PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3626">PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-enterprise-login-urls-where-the-password-protection-service-should-capture-salted-hashes-of-a-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3627">配置密码保护服务应在其中捕获加盐密码哈希的企业登录 URL 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3627">Configure the list of enterprise login URLs where the password protection service should capture salted hashes of a password</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3628">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3628">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3629">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3629">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3630">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3630">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3631">配置企业登录 URL 列表（仅限 HTTP 和 HTTPS 方案），Microsoft Edge 应在这些 URL 中捕获加盐密码哈希并将其用于密码重用检测。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3631">Configure the list of enterprise login URLs (HTTP and HTTPS schemes only) where Microsoft Edge should capture the salted hashes of passwords and use it for password reuse detection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3632">如果启用此策略，密码保护服务将在定义的 URL 上捕获密码的指纹。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3632">If you enable this policy, the password protection service captures fingerprints of passwords on the defined URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3633">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则不会捕获密码指纹。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3633">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, no password fingerprints are captured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3634">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3634">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3635">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3635">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3636">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3636">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3637">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3637">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3638">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3638">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3639">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3639">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3640">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3640">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3641">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3641">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3642">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3642">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3643">GP 唯一名称：PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3643">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3644">GP 名称：配置密码保护服务应在其中捕获加盐密码哈希的企业登录 URL 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3644">GP name: Configure the list of enterprise login URLs where the password protection service should capture salted hashes of a password</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3645">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/密码管理器和保护</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3645">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3646">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3646">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3647">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3647">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3648">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3648">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3649">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3649">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3650">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3650">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3651">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3651">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3652">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3652">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3653">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3653">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs\1 = "https://contoso.com/login.html"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs\2 = "https://login.contoso.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3654">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3654">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3655">首选项项名称：PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3655">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3656">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3656">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com/login.html</string>
  <string>https://login.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3657">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3657">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="passwordprotectionwarningtrigger"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3658">PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3658">PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-password-protection-warning-trigger"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3659">配置密码保护警告触发器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3659">Configure password protection warning trigger</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3660">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3660">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3661">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3661">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3662">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3662">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3663">允许你控制何时触发密码保护警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3663">Allows you to control when to trigger password protection warning.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3664">当用户在可能可疑的网站上重复使用其受保护的密码时，密码保护会提醒用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3664">Password protection alerts users when they reuse their protected password on potentially suspicious sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3665">可使用 [PasswordProtectionLoginURL](#passwordprotectionloginurls) 和 [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) 策略来配置要保护的密码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3665">You can use the [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) and [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) policies to configure which passwords to protect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3666">免除：[PasswordProtectionLoginURL](#passwordprotectionloginurls) 和 [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) 中列出的网站以及 [SmartScreenAllowListDomains](#smartscreenallowlistdomains) 中列出的网站的密码不会触发密码保护警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3666">Exemptions: Passwords for the sites listed in [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) and [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl), as well as for the sites listed in [SmartScreenAllowListDomains](#smartscreenallowlistdomains), will not trigger a password-protection warning.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3667">设置为“PasswordProtectionWarningOff” 时，不会显示密码保护警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3667">Set to 'PasswordProtectionWarningOff' to not show password protection warningss.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3668">设置为“PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse“ 后，当用户在所列不允许网站上重新使用其受保护的密码时，将显示密码保护警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3668">Set to 'PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse' to show password protection warnings when the user reuses their protected password on a non-allowlisted site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3669">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则不会显示警告触发器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3669">If you disable or don't configure this policy, then the warning trigger is not shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3670">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3670">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3671">PasswordProtectionWarningOff (0) = 关闭密码保护警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3671">PasswordProtectionWarningOff (0) = Password protection warning is off</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3672">PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse (1) = 密码重用触发密码保护警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3672">PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse (1) = Password protection warning is triggered by password reuse</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3673">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3673">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3674">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3674">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3675">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3675">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3676">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3676">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3677">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3677">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3678">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3678">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3679">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3679">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3680">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3680">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3681">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3681">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3682">GP 唯一名称：PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3682">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3683">GP 名称：配置密码保护警告触发器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3683">GP name: Configure password protection warning trigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3684">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/密码管理器和保护</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3684">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3685">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3685">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3686">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3686">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3687">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3687">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3688">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3688">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3689">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3689">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3690">值名称：PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3690">Value Name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3691">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3691">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3692">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3692">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3693">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3693">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3694">首选项项名称：PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3694">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3695">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3695">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3696">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3696">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="passwordrevealenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3697">PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3697">PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-password-reveal-button"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3698">启用“显示密码”按钮</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3698">Enable Password reveal button</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3699">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3699">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3700">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自87或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3700">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3701">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3701">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3702">可用于配置网站密码输入字段的浏览器密码显示按钮的默认显示方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3702">Lets you configure the default display of the browser password reveal button for password input fields on websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3703">如果启用或未配置此策略，浏览器用户设置将默认显示密码显示按钮。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3703">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the browser user setting defaults to displaying the password reveal button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3704">如果禁用此策略，浏览器用户设置将不会显示密码显示按钮。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3704">If you disable this policy, the browser user setting won't display the password reveal button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3705">对于辅助功能，用户可以通过默认策略更改浏览器设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3705">For accessibility, users can change the browser setting from the default policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3706">此策略仅影响浏览器密码显示按钮，不影响网站的自定义显示按钮。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3706">This policy only affects the browser password reveal button, it doesn't affect websites' custom reveal buttons.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3707">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3707">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3708">可以强制：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3708">Can be mandatory: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3709">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3709">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3710">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3710">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3711">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3711">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3712">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3712">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3713">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3713">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3714">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3714">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3715">GP 唯一名称：PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3715">GP unique name: PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3716">GP 名称：启用“显示密码”按钮</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3716">GP name: Enable Password reveal button</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3717">GP 路径（强制）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3717">GP path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3718">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/密码管理器和保护</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3718">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3719">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3719">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3720">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3720">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3721">路径（强制）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3721">Path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3722">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3722">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3723">值名称：PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3723">Value Name: PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3724">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3724">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3725">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3725">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3726">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3726">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3727">首选项项名称：PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3727">Preference Key Name: PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3728">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3728">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3729">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3729">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <a name="performance-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3730">性能策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3730">Performance policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3731">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3731">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="startupboostenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3732">StartupBoostEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3732">StartupBoostEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-startup-boost"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3733">启用启动增强</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3733">Enable startup boost</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3734">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3734">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3735">在 88 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3735">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3736">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3736">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3737">允许 Microsoft Edge 进程在操作系统登录时启动，并在最后一个浏览器窗口关闭后继续运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3737">Allows Microsoft Edge processes to start at OS sign-in and restart in background after the last browser window is closed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3738">如果 Microsoft Edge 正在后台模式下运行，则浏览器可能不会在最后一个窗口关闭时关闭，并且当窗口关闭时，浏览器不会在后台重启。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3738">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the browser might not close when the last window is closed and the browser won't be restarted in background when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3739">有关配置 Microsoft Edge 在后台模式下运行时发生的情况的信息，请参阅 [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3739">See the [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about what happens after configuring Microsoft Edge background mode behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3740">如果启用此策略，启动增强将打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3740">If you enable this policy, startup boost is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3741">如果禁用此策略，启动增强将关闭。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3741">If you disable this policy, startup boost is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3742">如果未配置此策略，启动增强可能初始处于关闭或打开状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3742">If you don't configure this policy, startup boost may initially be off or on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3743">用户可在 edge://settings/system 中配置其行为。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3743">The user can configure its behavior in edge://settings/system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3744">深入了解启动增强： [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3744">Learn more about startup boost: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3745">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3745">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3746">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3746">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3747">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3747">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3748">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3748">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3749">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3749">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3750">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3750">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3751">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3751">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3752">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3752">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3753">GP 唯一名称： StartupBoostEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3753">GP unique name: StartupBoostEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3754">GP名称：启用启动增强</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3754">GP name: Enable startup boost</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3755">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/性能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3755">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Performance</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3756">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/性能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3756">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Performance</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3757">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3757">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3758">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3758">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3759">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3759">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3760">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3760">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3761">值名称： StartupBoostEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3761">Value Name: StartupBoostEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3762">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3762">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3763">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3763">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3764">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3764">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <a name="printing-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3765">打印策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3765">Printing policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3766">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3766">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultprinterselection"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3767">DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3767">DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-printer-selection-rules"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3768">默认打印机选择规则</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3768">Default printer selection rules</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3769">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3769">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3770">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3770">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3771">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3771">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3772">替代 Microsoft Edge 默认打印机选择规则。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3772">Overrides Microsoft Edge default printer selection rules.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3773">此策略确定在 Microsoft Edge 中选择默认打印机的规则，这在用户首次尝试打印页面时发生。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3773">This policy determines the rules for selecting the default printer in Microsoft Edge, which happens the first time a user tries to print a page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3774">设置此策略后，Microsoft Edge 将尝试查找与所有指定属性匹配的打印机，并将其用作默认打印机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3774">When this policy is set, Microsoft Edge tries to find a printer that matches all of the specified attributes and uses it as default printer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3775">如果有多台打印机符合条件，则使用第一台匹配的打印机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3775">If there are multiple printers that meet the criteria, the first printer that matches is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3776">如果未配置此策略，或者在超时时间内未找到匹配的打印机，则打印机默认为内置 PDF 打印机，如果 PDF 打印机不可用，则默认为无打印机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3776">If you don't configure this policy or no matching printers are found within the timeout, the printer defaults to the built-in PDF printer or no printer, if the PDF printer isn't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3777">该值被解析为符合以下架构的 JSON 对象：{ "type": "object", "properties": { "idPattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer id.", "type": "string" }, "namePattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer display name.", "type": "string" } } }</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3777">The value is parsed as a JSON object, conforming to the following schema: { "type": "object", "properties": { "idPattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer id.", "type": "string" }, "namePattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer display name.", "type": "string" } } }</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3778">省略字段意味着所有值都匹配；例如，如果未指定连接，打印预览将开始发现所有类型的本地打印机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3778">Omitting a field means all values match; for example, if you don't specify connectivity Print Preview starts discovering all kinds of local printers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3779">正则表达式模式必须遵循 JavaScript RegExp 语法，并且匹配项区分大小写。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3779">Regular expression patterns must follow the JavaScript RegExp syntax and matches are case sensitive.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3780">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3780">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3781">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3781">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3782">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3782">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3783">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3783">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3784">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3784">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3785">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3785">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3786">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3786">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3787">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3787">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3788">GP 唯一名称：DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3788">GP unique name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3789">GP 名称：默认打印机选择规则</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3789">GP name: Default printer selection rules</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3790">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3790">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3791">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3791">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3792">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3792">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3793">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3793">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3794">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3794">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3795">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3795">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3796">值名称：DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3796">Value Name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3797">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3797">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3798">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3798">Example value:</span></span>

```
"{ \"idPattern\": \".*public\", \"namePattern\": \".*Color\" }"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3799">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3799">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3800">首选项项名称：DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3800">Preference Key Name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3801">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3801">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>{ "idPattern": ".*public", "namePattern": ".*Color" }</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3802">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3802">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="printheaderfooter"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3803">PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3803">PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>

  #### <a name="print-headers-and-footers"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3804">打印页眉和页脚</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3804">Print headers and footers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3805">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3805">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3806">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3806">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3807">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3807">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3808">在打印对话框中强制打开或关闭“页眉和页脚”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3808">Force 'headers and footers' to be on or off in the printing dialog.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3809">如果未配置此策略，用户可以决定是否打印页眉和页脚。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3809">If you don't configure this policy, users can decide whether to print headers and footers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3810">如果禁用此策略，用户不能打印页眉和页脚。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3810">If you disable this policy, users can't print headers and footers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3811">如果启用此策略，用户将始终打印页眉和页脚。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3811">If you enable this policy, users always print headers and footers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3812">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3812">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3813">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3813">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3814">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3814">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3815">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3815">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3816">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3816">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3817">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3817">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3818">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3818">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3819">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3819">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3820">GP 唯一名称：PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3820">GP unique name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3821">GP 名称：打印页眉和页脚</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3821">GP name: Print headers and footers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3822">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3822">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3823">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3823">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3824">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3824">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3825">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3825">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3826">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3826">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3827">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3827">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3828">值名称：PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3828">Value Name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3829">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3829">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3830">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3830">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3831">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3831">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3832">首选项项名称：PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3832">Preference Key Name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3833">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3833">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3834">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3834">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="printpreviewusesystemdefaultprinter"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3835">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3835">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-system-default-printer-as-the-default-printer"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3836">将系统默认打印机设置为默认打印机</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3836">Set the system default printer as the default printer</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3837">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3837">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3838">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3838">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3839">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3839">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3840">指示 Microsoft Edge 将系统默认打印机用作打印预览中的默认选项，而不是最近使用的打印机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3840">Tells Microsoft Edge to use the system default printer as the default choice in Print Preview instead of the most recently used printer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3841">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则打印预览将使用最近使用的打印机作为默认目标选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3841">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, Print Preview uses the most recently used printer as the default destination choice.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3842">如果启用此策略，打印预览将使用操作系统系统默认打印机作为默认目标选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3842">If you enable this policy, Print Preview uses the OS system default printer as the default destination choice.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3843">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3843">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3844">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3844">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3845">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3845">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3846">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3846">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3847">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3847">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3848">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3848">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3849">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3849">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3850">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3850">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3851">GP 唯一名称：PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3851">GP unique name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3852">GP 名称：将系统默认打印机设置为默认打印机</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3852">GP name: Set the system default printer as the default printer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3853">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3853">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3854">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3854">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3855">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3855">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3856">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3856">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3857">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3857">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3858">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3858">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3859">值名称：PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3859">Value Name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3860">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3860">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3861">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3861">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3862">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3862">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3863">首选项项名称：PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3863">Preference Key Name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3864">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3864">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3865">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3865">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="printrasterizationmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3866">PrintRasterizationMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3866">PrintRasterizationMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="print-rasterization-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3867">打印光栅化模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3867">Print Rasterization Mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3868">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3868">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3869">在 Windows 上自 90 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3869">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3870">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3870">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3871">控制 Microsoft Edge 在 Windows 上的打印方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3871">Controls how Microsoft Edge prints on Windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3872">打印至 Windows 上的非 PostScript 打印机时，有时打印作业需要光栅化才能正确打印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3872">When printing to a non-PostScript printer on Windows, sometimes print jobs need to be rasterized to print correctly.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3873">如果将此策略设置为“完全”或者未配置，则 Microsoft Edge 将会视需要进行整页光栅化。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3873">If you set this policy to 'Full' or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will do full page rasterization if necessary.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3874">如果将此策略设置为“快速”，则 Microsoft Edge 将会减少光栅化量，这有助于减少打印作业大小和提高打印速度。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3874">If you set this policy to 'Fast', Microsoft Edge will reduce the amount of rasterization which can help reduce print job sizes and increase printing speed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3875">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3875">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3876">完全 (0) = 全页光栅化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3876">Full (0) = Full page rasterization</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3877">快速 (1) = 避免光栅化（如可能）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3877">Fast (1) = Avoid rasterization if possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3878">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3878">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3879">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3879">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3880">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3880">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3881">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3881">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3882">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3882">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3883">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3883">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3884">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3884">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3885">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3885">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3886">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3886">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3887">GP 唯一名称：PrintRasterizationMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3887">GP unique name: PrintRasterizationMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3888">GP 名称：打印光栅化模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3888">GP name: Print Rasterization Mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3889">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3889">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3890">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3890">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3891">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3891">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3892">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3892">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3893">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3893">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3894">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3894">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3895">值名称：PrintRasterizationMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3895">Value Name: PrintRasterizationMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3896">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3896">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3897">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3897">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3898">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3898">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="printertypedenylist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3899">PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3899">PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-printer-types-on-the-deny-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3900">在拒绝列表上禁用打印机类型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3900">Disable printer types on the deny list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3901">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3901">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3902">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自88或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3902">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3903">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3903">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3904">拒绝列表中的打印机类型不会被发现或获取其功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3904">The printer types on the deny list won't be discovered or have their capabilities fetched.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3905">将所有打印机类型放在拒绝列表上会有效地禁用打印，因为文档没有打印目标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3905">Placing all printer types on the deny list effectively disables printing, because there's no print destination for documents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3906">如果未配置此策略，或者打印机列表为空，则所有打印机类型都是可发现的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3906">If you don't configure this policy, or the printer list is empty, all printer types are discoverable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3907">打印机目标包括扩展打印机和本地打印机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3907">Printer destinations include extension printers and local printers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3908">扩展打印机也称为打印提供商目标，包括属于 Microsoft Edge 扩展的任何目标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3908">Extension printers are also known as print provider destinations, and include any destination that belongs to a Microsoft Edge extension.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3909">本地打印机也称为本机打印目标，包括本地计算机可用的目标位置和共享网络打印机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3909">Local printers are also known as native printing destinations, and include destinations available to the local machine and shared network printers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3910">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3910">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3911">privet (privet) = 基于 Zeroconf (mDNS + DNS-SD) 的协议目标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3911">privet (privet) = Zeroconf-based (mDNS + DNS-SD) protocol destinations</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3912">extension (extension) = 基于扩展的目标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3912">extension (extension) = Extension-based destinations</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3913">pdf (pdf) =“另存为 PDF”目标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3913">pdf (pdf) = The 'Save as PDF' destination</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3914">local (local) = 本地打印机目标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3914">local (local) = Local printer destinations</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3915">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3915">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3916">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3916">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3917">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3917">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3918">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3918">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3919">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3919">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3920">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3920">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3921">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3921">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3922">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3922">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3923">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3923">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3924">GP 唯一名称：PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3924">GP unique name: PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3925">GP 名称：在拒绝列表上禁用打印机类型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3925">GP name: Disable printer types on the deny list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3926">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3926">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3927">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3927">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3928">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3928">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3929">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3929">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3930">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3930">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3931">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3931">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3932">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3932">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3933">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3933">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3934">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3934">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList\1 = "local"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList\2 = "privet"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3935">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3935">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3936">首选项键名称：PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3936">Preference Key Name: PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3937">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3937">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>local</string>
  <string>privet</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3938">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3938">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="printingallowedbackgroundgraphicsmodes"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3939">PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3939">PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>

  #### <a name="restrict-background-graphics-printing-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3940">限制背景图形打印模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3940">Restrict background graphics printing mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3941">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3941">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3942">自 89 或更高版本起，在 Windows 和 macOS 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3942">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3943">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3943">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3944">限制背景图形打印模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3944">Restricts background graphics printing mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3945">如果未设置此策略，则对打印背景图形没有限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3945">If this policy isn't set there's no restriction on printing background graphics.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3946">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3946">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3947">任何（任何）= 允许打印带有背景图形和无背景图形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3947">any (any) = Allow printing with and without background graphics</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3948">已启用（已启用）= 仅允许打印带有背景图形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3948">enabled (enabled) = Allow printing only with background graphics</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3949">禁用 (禁用) = 仅允许打印无背景图形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3949">disabled (disabled) = Allow printing only without background graphics</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3950">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3950">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3951">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3951">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3952">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3952">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3953">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3953">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3954">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3954">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3955">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3955">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3956">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3956">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3957">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3957">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3958">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3958">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3959">GP 唯一名称：PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3959">GP unique name: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3960">GP 名称：限制后台图形打印模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3960">GP name: Restrict background graphics printing mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3961">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3961">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3962">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3962">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3963">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3963">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3964">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3964">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3965">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3965">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3966">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3966">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3967">值名称：PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3967">Value Name: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3968">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3968">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3969">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3969">Example value:</span></span>

```
"enabled"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3970">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3970">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3971">首选项名称：PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3971">Preference Key Name: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3972">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3972">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>enabled</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3973">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3973">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="printingbackgroundgraphicsdefault"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3974">PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3974">PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-background-graphics-printing-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3975">默认背景图形打印模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3975">Default background graphics printing mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3976">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3976">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3977">自 89 或更高版本起，在 Windows 和 macOS 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3977">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3978">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3978">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3979">覆盖上次用于打印背景图形的设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3979">Overrides the last used setting for printing background graphics.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3980">如果启用此设置，则启用背景图形打印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3980">If you enable this setting, background graphics printing is enabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3981">如果禁用此设置，则禁用背景图形打印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3981">If you disable this setting, background graphics printing is disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3982">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3982">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3983">已启用（已启用） = 默认情况下启用背景图形打印模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3983">enabled (enabled) = Enable background graphics printing mode by default</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3984">禁用 (禁用) = 默认情况下禁用背景图形打印模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3984">disabled (disabled) = Disable background graphics printing mode by default</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3985">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3985">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3986">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3986">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3987">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3987">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3988">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3988">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3989">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3989">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3990">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3990">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3991">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3991">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3992">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3992">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3993">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3993">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3994">GP 唯一名称：PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3994">GP unique name: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3995">GP 名称：默认后台图形打印模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3995">GP name: Default background graphics printing mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3996">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3996">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3997">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3997">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3998">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3998">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-3999">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-3999">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4000">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4000">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4001">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4001">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4002">值名称：PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4002">Value Name: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4003">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4003">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4004">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4004">Example value:</span></span>

```
"enabled"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4005">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4005">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4006">首选项名称：PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4006">Preference Key Name: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4007">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4007">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>enabled</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4008">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4008">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="printingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4009">PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4009">PrintingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-printing"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4010">启用打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4010">Enable printing</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4011">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4011">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4012">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4012">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4013">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4013">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4014">在 Microsoft Edge 中启用打印并防止用户更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4014">Enables printing in Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4015">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以打印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4015">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4016">如果禁用此策略，用户将无法从 Microsoft Edge 打印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4016">If you disable this policy, users can't print from Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4017">打印在扳手菜单、扩展、JavaScript 应用程序等中处于禁用状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4017">Printing is disabled in the wrench menu, extensions, JavaScript applications, and so on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4018">用户仍可以从打印时跳过 Microsoft Edge 的插件进行打印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4018">Users can still print from plug-ins that bypass Microsoft Edge while printing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4019">例如，某些 Adobe Flash 应用程序的上下文菜单中具有打印选项，此策略未涵盖此选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4019">For example, certain Adobe Flash applications have the print option in their context menu, which isn't covered by this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4020">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4020">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4021">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4021">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4022">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4022">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4023">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4023">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4024">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4024">Data Type:</span></span>
