  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4025">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4025">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4026">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4026">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4027">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4027">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4028">GP 唯一名称：PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4028">GP unique name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4029">GP 名称：启用打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4029">GP name: Enable printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4030">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4030">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4031">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4031">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4032">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4032">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4033">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4033">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4034">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4034">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4035">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4035">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4036">值名称：PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4036">Value Name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4037">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4037">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4038">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4038">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4039">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4039">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4040">首选项项名称：PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4040">Preference Key Name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4041">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4041">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4042">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4042">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="printingpapersizedefault"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4043">PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4043">PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-printing-page-size"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4044">默认打印页面大小</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4044">Default printing page size</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4045">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4045">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4046">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4046">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4047">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4047">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4048">覆盖默认打印页面大小。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4048">Overrides default printing page size.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4049">名称应包含列出的格式之一；如果所需的纸张尺寸不在列表中，则名称应包含“自定义”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4049">name should contain one of the listed formats or 'custom' if required paper size is not in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4050">如果提供了“自定义”值，则应指定 custom_size 属性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4050">If 'custom' value is provided custom_size property should be specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4051">它描述了所需的高度和宽度（以微米为单位）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4051">It describes the desired height and width in micrometers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4052">否则，则不应指定 custom_size 属性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4052">Otherwise custom_size property shouldn't be specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4053">违反这些规则的策略将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4053">Policy that violates these rules is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4054">如果该页面大小在用户选择的打印机上不可用，则将忽略此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4054">If the page size is unavailable on the printer chosen by the user this policy is ignored.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4055">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4055">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4056">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4056">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4057">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4057">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4058">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4058">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4059">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4059">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4060">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4060">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4061">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4061">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4062">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4062">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4063">GP 唯一名称：PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4063">GP unique name: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4064">GP 名称：默认打印页面大小</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4064">GP name: Default printing page size</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4065">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4065">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4066">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4066">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4067">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4067">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4068">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4068">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4069">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4069">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4070">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4070">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4071">值名称：PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4071">Value Name: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4072">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4072">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4073">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4073">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrintingPaperSizeDefault = {
  "custom_size": {
    "height": 297000,
    "width": 210000
  },
  "name": "custom"
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4074">精简示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4074">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrintingPaperSizeDefault = {"custom_size": {"height": 297000, "width": 210000}, "name": "custom"}
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4075">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4075">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4076">首选项项名称：PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4076">Preference Key Name: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4077">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4077">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>PrintingPaperSizeDefault</key>
<dict>
  <key>custom_size</key>
  <dict>
    <key>height</key>
    <integer>297000</integer>
    <key>width</key>
    <integer>210000</integer>
  </dict>
  <key>name</key>
  <string>custom</string>
</dict>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4078">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4078">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="usesystemprintdialog"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4079">UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4079">UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>

  #### <a name="print-using-system-print-dialog"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4080">使用系统打印对话框打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4080">Print using system print dialog</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4081">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4081">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4082">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4082">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4083">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4083">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4084">显示系统打印对话框而不是打印预览。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4084">Shows the system print dialog instead of print preview.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4085">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将在用户打印页面时打开系统打印对话框，而不是内置打印预览。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4085">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge opens the system print dialog instead of the built-in print preview when a user prints a page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4086">如果未配置或禁用此策略，打印命令将触发 Microsoft Edge 打印预览屏幕。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4086">If you don't configure or disable this policy, print commands trigger the Microsoft Edge print preview screen.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4087">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4087">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4088">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4088">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4089">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4089">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4090">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4090">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4091">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4091">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4092">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4092">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4093">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4093">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4094">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4094">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4095">GP 唯一名称：UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4095">GP unique name: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4096">GP 名称：使用系统打印对话框打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4096">GP name: Print using system print dialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4097">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4097">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4098">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4098">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4099">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4099">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4100">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4100">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4101">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4101">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4102">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4102">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4103">值名称：UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4103">Value Name: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4104">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4104">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4105">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4105">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4106">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4106">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4107">首选项项名称：UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4107">Preference Key Name: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4108">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4108">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4109">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4109">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <a name="private-network-request-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4110">专用网络请求设置策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4110">Private Network Request Settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4111">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4111">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="insecureprivatenetworkrequestsallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4112">InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4112">InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="specifies-whether-to-allow-insecure-websites-to-make-requests-to-more-private-network-endpoints"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4113">指定是否允许不安全网站向更专用的网络终结点提出请求</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4113">Specifies whether to allow insecure websites to make requests to more-private network endpoints</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4114">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4114">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4115">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 92 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4115">On Windows and macOS since 92 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4116">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4116">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4117">控制是否允许不安全的网站向更专用的网络终结点提出请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4117">Controls whether insecure websites are allowed to make requests to more-private network endpoints.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4118">此策略与 CORS-RFC1918 规范相关。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4118">This policy relates to the CORS-RFC1918 specification.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4119">有关更多详细信息，请参阅https://wicg.github.io/cors-rfc1918。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4119">See https://wicg.github.io/cors-rfc1918 for more details.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4120">如果存在以下情况，则网络终结点比另一个终结点更专用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4120">A network endpoint is more private than another if:</span></span>
1) <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4121">它的 IP 地址是 localhost，另一个不是。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4121">Its IP address is localhost and the other is not.</span></span>
2) <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4122">它的 IP 地址是私有的，另一个是公用的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4122">Its IP address is private and the other is public.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4123">将来，根据规范的发展，此策略可能适用于针对专用 IP 或 localhost 的所有跨源请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4123">In the future, depending on spec evolution, this policy might apply to all cross-origin requests directed at private IPs or localhost.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4124">如果网站符合 https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Security/Secure_Contexts 中安全环境的定义，则认为该网站是安全的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4124">A website is deemed secure if it meets the definition of a secure context in https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Security/Secure_Contexts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4125">否则，它将视为不安全环境。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4125">Otherwise, it will be treated as an insecure context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4126">当此策略未设置或设置为 false 时，从不安全环境到更专用网络终结点的请求的默认行为将取决于 BlockInsecurePrivateNetworkRequests 功能的用户个人配置，该功能可由字段试用或在命令行上设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4126">When this policy is either not set or set to false, the default behavior for requests from insecure contexts to more-private network endpoints will depend on the user's personal configuration for the BlockInsecurePrivateNetworkRequests feature, which may be set by a field trial or on the command line.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4127">当此策略设置为 true 时，允许不安全网站向任何网络终结点提出请求，但需接受其他跨源检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4127">When this policy is set to true, insecure websites are allowed to make requests to any network endpoint, subject to other cross-origin checks.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4128">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4128">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4129">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4129">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4130">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4130">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4131">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4131">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4132">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4132">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4133">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4133">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4134">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4134">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4135">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4135">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4136">GP 唯一名称：InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4136">GP unique name: InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4137">GP 名称：指定是否允许不安全的网站向更专用的网络终结点提出请求</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4137">GP name: Specifies whether to allow insecure websites to make requests to more-private network endpoints</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4138">GP 路径 (强制) ：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/专用网络请求设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4138">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Private Network Request Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4139">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4139">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4140">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4140">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4141">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4141">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4142">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4142">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4143">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4143">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4144">值名称：InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4144">Value Name: InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4145">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4145">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4146">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4146">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4147">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4147">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4148">首选项项名称：InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4148">Preference Key Name: InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4149">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4149">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4150">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4150">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="insecureprivatenetworkrequestsallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4151">InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4151">InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-the-listed-sites-to-make-requests-to-more-private-network-endpoints-from-insecure-contexts"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4152">允许列出的站点从不安全环境向更专用的网络终结点提出请求</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4152">Allow the listed sites to make requests to more-private network endpoints from insecure contexts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4153">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4153">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4154">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 92 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4154">On Windows and macOS since 92 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4155">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4155">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4156">URL 模式列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4156">List of URL patterns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4157">允许从匹配源所提供的不安全网站启动的专用网络请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4157">Private network requests initiated from insecure websites served by matching origins are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4158">如果未设置此策略，此策略将按照设置为空列表行为。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4158">If this policy is not set, this policy behaves as if set to the empty list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4159">对于此处指定的模式未涵盖的源，将采用来自 [InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowed](#insecureprivatenetworkrequestsallowed) 策略（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置的全局默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4159">For origins not covered by the patterns specified here, the global default value will be used either from the [InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowed](#insecureprivatenetworkrequestsallowed) policy, if it is set, or the user's personal configuration otherwise.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4160">请注意，此策略仅影响不安全源，因此将忽略安全源 (例如此列表中包含的 https://example.com)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4160">Note that this policy only affects insecure origins, so secure origins (e.g. https://example.com) included in this list will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4161">有关有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请转到 [此处](/DeployEdge/edge-learnmmore-url-list-filter%20format)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4161">For detailed information on valid URL patterns, please go [here](/DeployEdge/edge-learnmmore-url-list-filter%20format).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4162">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4162">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4163">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4163">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4164">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4164">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4165">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4165">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4166">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4166">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4167">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4167">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4168">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4168">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4169">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4169">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4170">GP 唯一名称：InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4170">GP unique name: InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4171">GP 名称：允许列出的站点从不安全环境向更专用的网络终结点提出请求</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4171">GP name: Allow the listed sites to make requests to more-private network endpoints from insecure contexts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4172">GP 路径 (强制) ：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/专用网络请求设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4172">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Private Network Request Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4173">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4173">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4174">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4174">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4175">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4175">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4176">路径 (强制) ：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4176">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4177">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4177">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4178">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4178">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4179">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4179">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4180">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4180">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowedForUrls\1 = "http://www.example.com:8080"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4181">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4181">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4182">首选项项名称：InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4182">Preference Key Name: InsecurePrivateNetworkRequestsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4183">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4183">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>http://www.example.com:8080</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ## <a name="proxy-server-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4185">代理服务器策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4185">Proxy server policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4186">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4186">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="proxybypasslist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4187">ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4187">ProxyBypassList</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-proxy-bypass-rules-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4188">配置代理跳过规则（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4188">Configure proxy bypass rules (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4189">已弃用：此策略已弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4189">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4190">当前受支持，但将在未来的版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4190">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4191">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4191">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4192">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4192">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4193">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4193">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4194">此策略已弃用，改为使用[ProxySettings](#proxysettings)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4194">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4195">它在 Microsoft Edge 版本 91 中将不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4195">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4196">定义 Microsoft Edge 为其跳过任何代理的主机列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4196">Defines a list of hosts for which Microsoft Edge bypasses any proxy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4197">只有在未指定 [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) 策略，并且你已选择 [ProxyMode](#proxymode) 策略中的 fixed_servers 或 pac_script 时，才应用此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4197">This policy is applied only if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified and you have selected either fixed_servers or pac_script in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4198">如果选择了其他任何模式来配置代理策略，请不要启用或配置此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4198">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4199">如果启用此策略，则可创建 Microsoft Edge 不对其使用代理的主机列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4199">If you enable this policy, you can create a list of hosts for which Microsoft Edge doesn't use a proxy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4200">如果未配置此策略，则不会创建 Microsoft Edge 对其跳过代理的主机列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4200">If you don't configure this policy, no list of hosts is created for which Microsoft Edge bypasses a proxy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4201">如果已指定任何其他设置代理策略的方法，请将此策略保留为未配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4201">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4202">有关更多详细示例，请转到 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4202">For more detailed examples go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4203">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4203">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4204">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4204">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4205">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4205">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4206">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4206">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4207">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4207">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4208">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4208">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4209">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4209">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4210">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4210">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4211">GP 唯一名称：ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4211">GP unique name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4212">GP名称：配置代理跳过规则（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4212">GP name: Configure proxy bypass rules (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4213">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/代理服务器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4213">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4214">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4214">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4215">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4215">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4216">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4216">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4217">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4217">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4218">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4218">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4219">值名称：ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4219">Value Name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4220">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4220">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4221">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4221">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://www.contoso.com, https://www.fabrikam.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4222">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4222">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4223">首选项项名称：ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4223">Preference Key Name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4224">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4224">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.contoso.com, https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
```

  ### <a name="proxymode"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4226">ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4226">ProxyMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-proxy-server-settings-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4227">配置代理服务器设置（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4227">Configure proxy server settings (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4228">已弃用：此策略已弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4228">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4229">当前受支持，但将在未来的版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4229">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4230">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4230">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4231">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4231">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4232">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4232">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4233">此策略已弃用，改为使用[ProxySettings](#proxysettings)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4233">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4234">它在 Microsoft Edge 版本 91 中将不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4234">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4235">如果将此策略设置为“启用”，可指定 Microsoft Edge 使用的代理服务器，并阻止用户更改代理设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4235">If you set this policy to Enabled you can specify the proxy server Microsoft Edge uses and prevents users from changing proxy settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4236">Microsoft Edge 将忽略从命令行指定的所有与代理相关的选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4236">Microsoft Edge ignores all proxy-related options specified from the command line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4237">仅当未指定 [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) 策略时，才会应用此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4237">The policy is only applied if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4238">如果选择以下选项之一，则会忽略其他选项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4238">Other options are ignored if you choose one of the following options:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4239">direct = 从不使用代理服务器且始终直接连接</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4239">direct = Never use a proxy server and always connect directly</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4240">system = 使用系统代理设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4240">system = Use system proxy settings</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4241">auto_detect = 自动检测代理服务器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4241">auto_detect = Auto detect the proxy server</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4242">如果你选择使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4242">If you choose to use:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4243">fixed_servers= 固定代理服务器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4243">fixed_servers = Fixed proxy servers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4244">可使用 [ProxyServer](#proxyserver) 和 [ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)指定更多选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4244">You can specify further options with [ProxyServer](#proxyserver) and [ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist).</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4245">pac_script= .pac 代理脚本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4245">pac_script =  A .pac proxy script.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4246">使用 [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) 将 URL 设置为代理 .pac 文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4246">Use [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) to set the URL to a proxy .pac file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4247">有关详细示例，请转到 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4247">For detailed examples, go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4248">如果未配置此策略，用户可选择自己的代理设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4248">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4249">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4249">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4250">ProxyDisabled (direct) = 从不使用代理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4250">ProxyDisabled (direct) = Never use a proxy</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4251">ProxyAutoDetect (auto_detect) = 自动检测代理设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4251">ProxyAutoDetect (auto_detect) = Auto detect proxy settings</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4252">ProxyPacScript (pac_script) = 使用 .pac 代理脚本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4252">ProxyPacScript (pac_script) = Use a .pac proxy script</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4253">ProxyFixedServers (fixed_servers) = 使用固定代理服务器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4253">ProxyFixedServers (fixed_servers) = Use fixed proxy servers</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4254">ProxyUseSystem (system) = 使用系统代理设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4254">ProxyUseSystem (system) = Use system proxy settings</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4255">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4255">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4256">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4256">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4257">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4257">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4258">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4258">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4259">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4259">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4260">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4260">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4261">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4261">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4262">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4262">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4263">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4263">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4264">GP 唯一名称：ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4264">GP unique name: ProxyMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4265">GP名称：配置代理服务器设置（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4265">GP name: Configure proxy server settings (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4266">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/代理服务器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4266">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4267">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4267">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4268">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4268">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4269">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4269">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4270">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4270">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4271">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4271">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4272">值名称：ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4272">Value Name: ProxyMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4273">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4273">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4274">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4274">Example value:</span></span>

```
"direct"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4275">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4275">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4276">首选项项名称：ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4276">Preference Key Name: ProxyMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4277">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4277">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>direct</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4278">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4278">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="proxypacurl"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4279">ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4279">ProxyPacUrl</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-proxy-pac-file-url-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4280">设置代理 .pac 文件 URL（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4280">Set the proxy .pac file URL (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4281">已弃用：此策略已弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4281">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4282">当前受支持，但将在未来的版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4282">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4283">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4283">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4284">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4284">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4285">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4285">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4286">此策略已弃用，改为使用[ProxySettings](#proxysettings)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4286">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4287">它在 Microsoft Edge 版本 91 中将不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4287">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4288">指定代理自动配置 (PAC) 文件的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4288">Specifies the URL for a proxy auto-config (PAC) file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4289">仅当未指定 [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) 策略，并且已在 [ProxyMode](#proxymode) 策略中选择 pac_script 时，才会应用此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4289">This policy is applied only if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified and you have selected pac_script in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4290">如果选择了其他任何模式来配置代理策略，请不要启用或配置此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4290">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4291">如果启用此策略，则可以指定 PAC 文件的 URL，该 URL 定义浏览器如何自动选择用于获取特定网站的相应代理服务器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4291">If you enable this policy, you can specify the URL for a PAC file, which defines how the browser automatically chooses the appropriate proxy server for fetching a particular website.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4292">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则不指定 PAC 文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4292">If you disable or don't configure this policy, no PAC file is specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4293">如果已指定任何其他设置代理策略的方法，请将此策略保留为未配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4293">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4294">有关详细示例，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4294">For detailed examples, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4295">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4295">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4296">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4296">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4297">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4297">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4298">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4298">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4299">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4299">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4300">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4300">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4301">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4301">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4302">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4302">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4303">GP 唯一名称：ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4303">GP unique name: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4304">GP 名称：设置代理 .pac 文件 URL（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4304">GP name: Set the proxy .pac file URL (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4305">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/代理服务器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4305">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4306">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4306">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4307">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4307">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4308">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4308">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4309">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4309">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4310">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4310">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4311">值名称：ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4311">Value Name: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4312">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4312">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4313">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4313">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://internal.contoso.com/example.pac"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4314">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4314">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4315">首选项项名称：ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4315">Preference Key Name: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4316">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4316">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://internal.contoso.com/example.pac</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4317">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4317">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="proxyserver"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4318">ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4318">ProxyServer</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-address-or-url-of-proxy-server-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4319">配置代理服务器的地址或 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4319">Configure address or URL of proxy server (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4320">已弃用：此策略已弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4320">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4321">当前受支持，但将在未来的版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4321">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4322">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4322">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4323">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4323">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4324">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4324">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4325">此策略已弃用，改为使用[ProxySettings](#proxysettings)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4325">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4326">它在 Microsoft Edge 版本 91 中将不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4326">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4327">指定代理服务器的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4327">Specifies the URL of the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4328">仅当未指定 [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) 策略，并且已在 [ProxyMode](#proxymode) 策略中选择 fixed_servers 时，才会应用此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4328">This policy is applied only if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified and you have selected fixed_servers in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4329">如果选择了其他任何模式来配置代理策略，请不要启用或配置此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4329">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4330">如果启用此策略，则此策略配置的代理服务器将用于所有 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4330">If you enable this policy, the proxy server configured by this policy will be used for all URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4331">如果禁用或未配置此策略，用户可以在此代理模式下选择自己的代理设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4331">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings while in this proxy mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4332">如果已指定任何其他设置代理策略的方法，请将此策略保留为未配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4332">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4333">有关更多选项和详细示例，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4333">For more options and detailed examples, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4334">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4334">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4335">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4335">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4336">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4336">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4337">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4337">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4338">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4338">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4339">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4339">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4340">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4340">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4341">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4341">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4342">GP 唯一名称：ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4342">GP unique name: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4343">GP 名称：配置代理服务器的地址或 URL（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4343">GP name: Configure address or URL of proxy server (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4344">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/代理服务器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4344">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4345">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4345">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4346">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4346">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4347">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4347">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4348">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4348">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4349">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4349">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4350">值名称：ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4350">Value Name: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4351">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4351">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4352">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4352">Example value:</span></span>

```
"123.123.123.123:8080"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4353">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4353">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4354">首选项项名称：ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4354">Preference Key Name: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4355">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4355">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>123.123.123.123:8080</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4356">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4356">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="proxysettings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4357">ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4357">ProxySettings</span></span>

  #### <a name="proxy-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4358">代理设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4358">Proxy settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4359">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4359">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4360">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4360">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4361">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4361">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4362">配置 Microsoft Edge 的代理设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4362">Configures the proxy settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4363">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将忽略从命令行指定的所有与代理相关的选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4363">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge ignores all proxy-related options specified from the command line.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4364">如果未配置此策略，用户可选择自己的代理设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4364">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4365">此策略将替代以下各个策略：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4365">This policy overrides the following individual policies:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4366">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4366">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4367">将 [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) 策略设置为 "接受以下字段"：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4367">Setting the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy accepts the following fields:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4368">ProxyMode，可指定 Microsoft Edge 使用的代理服务器，并阻止用户更改代理设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4368">ProxyMode, which lets you specify the proxy server used by Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing proxy settings</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4369">ProxyPacUrl, 代理 .pac 文件的 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4369">ProxyPacUrl, a URL to a proxy .pac file</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4370">ProxyServer, 代理服务器的 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4370">ProxyServer, a URL for the proxy server</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4371">ProxyBypassList, Microsoft Edge 跳过的代理主机列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4371">ProxyBypassList, a list of proxy hosts that Microsoft Edge bypasses</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4372">对于 "ProxyMode"，如果你选择值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4372">For ProxyMode, if you choose the value:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4373">direct, 永远不会使用代理，并且忽略所有其他字段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4373">direct, a proxy is never used and all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4374">system, 将使用系统的代理，并且忽略所有其他字段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4374">system, the systems's proxy is used and all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4375">auto_detect，将忽略所有其他字段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4375">auto_detect, all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4376">fixed_servers，将使用 "ProxyServer" 和 "ProxyBypassList" 字段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4376">fixed_servers, the ProxyServer and ProxyBypassList fields are used.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4377">pac_script，将使用 "ProxyServer" 和 "ProxyBypassList" 字段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4377">pac_script, the ProxyPacUrl and ProxyBypassList fields are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4378">有关更多详细示例，请转到 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4378">For more detailed examples go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4379">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4379">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4380">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4380">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4381">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4381">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4382">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4382">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4383">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4383">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4384">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4384">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4385">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4385">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4386">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4386">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4387">GP 唯一名称：ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4387">GP unique name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4388">GP 名称：代理设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4388">GP name: Proxy settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4389">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/代理服务器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4389">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4390">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4390">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4391">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4391">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4392">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4392">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4393">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4393">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4394">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4394">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4395">值名称：ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4395">Value Name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4396">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4396">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4397">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4397">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ProxySettings = {
  "ProxyBypassList": "https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/",
  "ProxyMode": "pac_script",
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac",
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4398">精简示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4398">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ProxySettings = {"ProxyBypassList": "https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/", "ProxyMode": "pac_script", "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"}
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4399">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4399">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4400">首选项项名称：ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4400">Preference Key Name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4401">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4401">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ProxySettings</key>
<dict>
  <key>ProxyBypassList</key>
  <string>https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/</string>
  <key>ProxyMode</key>
  <string>pac_script</string>
  <key>ProxyPacUrl</key>
  <string>https://internal.site/example.pac</string>
  <key>ProxyServer</key>
  <string>123.123.123.123:8080</string>
</dict>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4402">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4402">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <a name="sleeping-tabs-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4403">休眠选项卡设置策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4403">Sleeping tabs settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4404">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4404">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sleepingtabsblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4405">SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4405">SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-sleeping-tabs-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4406">屏蔽特定网站上的睡眠选项卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4406">Block sleeping tabs on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4407">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4407">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4408">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自88或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4408">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4409">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4409">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4410">根据 URL 模式定义不允许休眠选项卡进入睡眠状态的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4410">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are not allowed to be put to sleep by sleeping tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4411">如果禁用策略 [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) ，则此列表将无效，并且任何网站都不会自动进入睡眠状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4411">If the policy [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) is disabled, this list is not used and no sites will be put to sleep automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4412">如果未配置此策略，则所有网站都有资格进入睡眠状态，除非用户的个人配置阻止它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4412">If you don't configure this policy, all sites will be eligible to be put to sleep unless the user's personal configuration blocks them.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4413">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4413">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4414">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4414">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4415">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4415">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4416">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4416">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4417">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4417">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4418">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4418">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4419">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4419">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4420">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4420">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4421">GP 唯一名称： SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4421">GP unique name: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4422">GP 名称：阻止特定网站上休眠的选项卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4422">GP name: Block sleeping tabs on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4423">GP 路径 (必需) ：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/休眠选项卡设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4423">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4424">GP 路径 (推荐) ：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置 (用户可以替代) /睡眠选项卡设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4424">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4425">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4425">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4426">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4426">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4427">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4427">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4428">路径（推荐）： SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4428">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4429">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4429">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4430">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4430">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4431">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4431">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4432">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4432">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4433">首选键名称： SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4433">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
