  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4434">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4434">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4435">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4435">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sleepingtabsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4436">SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4436">SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-sleeping-tabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4437">配置睡眠选项卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4437">Configure sleeping tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4438">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4438">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4439">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自88或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4439">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4440">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4440">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4441">此策略设置允许你配置是否打开休眠选项卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4441">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on sleeping tabs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4442">睡眠选项卡通过将空闲后台选项卡置于睡眠状态来减少 CPU、电池和内存使用率。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4442">Sleeping tabs reduces CPU, battery, and memory usage by putting idle background tabs to sleep.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4443">Microsoft Edge 使用试探法避免后台执行有用操作的选项卡进入睡眠状态，例如显示通知、播放声音和流视频。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4443">Microsoft Edge uses heuristics to avoid putting tabs to sleep that do useful work in the background, such as display notifications, play sound, and stream video.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4444">默认情况下，休眠选项卡已打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4444">By default, sleeping tabs is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4445">通过配置策略 [SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls](#sleepingtabsblockedforurls)，可以阻止单个网站进入睡眠状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4445">Individual sites may be blocked from being put to sleep by configuring the policy [SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls](#sleepingtabsblockedforurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4446">如果启用此设置，则休眠选项卡将打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4446">If you enable this setting, sleeping tabs is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4447">如果禁用此设置，休眠选项卡将关闭。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4447">If you disable this setting, sleeping tabs is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4448">如果未配置此设置，用户可以选择是否使用休眠选项卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4448">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use sleeping tabs.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4449">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4449">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4450">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4450">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4451">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4451">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4452">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4452">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4453">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4453">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4454">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4454">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4455">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4455">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4456">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4456">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4457">GP 唯一名称： SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4457">GP unique name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4458">GP 名称：配置休眠选项卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4458">GP name: Configure sleeping tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4459">GP 路径 (必需) ：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/休眠选项卡设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4459">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4460">GP 路径 (推荐) ：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置 (用户可以替代) /睡眠选项卡设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4460">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4461">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4461">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4462">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4462">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4463">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4463">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4464">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4464">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4465">值名称： SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4465">Value Name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4466">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4466">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4467">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4467">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4468">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4468">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4469">首选键名称： SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4469">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4470">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4470">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4471">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4471">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sleepingtabstimeout"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4472">SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4472">SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-background-tab-inactivity-timeout-for-sleeping-tabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4473">为睡眠选项卡设置后台选项卡闲置时长</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4473">Set the background tab inactivity timeout for sleeping tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4474">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4474">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4475">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自88或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4475">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4476">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4476">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4477">此策略设置允许你配置超时（以秒表示）。启用休眠选项卡后，非活动后台选项卡将自动进入睡眠状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4477">This policy setting lets you configure the timeout, in seconds, after which inactive background tabs will be automatically put to sleep if sleeping tabs is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4478">默认情况下，此超时为7200秒 (2 小时)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4478">By default, this timeout is 7,200 seconds (2 hours).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4479">只有在启用或未配置 [策略 SleepTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) 且用户已启用休眠选项卡设置时，选项卡才自动进入睡眠状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4479">Tabs are only put to sleep automatically when the policy [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) is enabled or is not configured and the user has enabled the sleeping tabs setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4480">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以选择超时值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4480">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose the timeout value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4481">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4481">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4482">5Minutes (300) = 处于非活动状态5分钟</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4482">5Minutes (300) = 5 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4483">15Minutes (900) = 处于非活动状态15 分钟</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4483">15Minutes (900) = 15 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4484">30Minutes (1800) =处于非活动状态 30 分钟</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4484">30Minutes (1800) = 30 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4485">1Hour (3600) = 处于非活动状态1小时</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4485">1Hour (3600) = 1 hour of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4486">2Hours (7200) = 处于非活动状态2小时</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4486">2Hours (7200) = 2 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4487">3Hours (10800) = 处于非活动状态3 小时</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4487">3Hours (10800) = 3 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4488">6Hours (21600) = 处于非活动状态6 小时</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4488">6Hours (21600) = 6 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4489">12Hours (43200) = 处于非活动状态12小时</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4489">12Hours (43200) = 12 hours of inactivity</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4490">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4490">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4491">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4491">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4492">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4492">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4493">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4493">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4494">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4494">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4495">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4495">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4496">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4496">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4497">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4497">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4498">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4498">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4499">GP 唯一名称： SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4499">GP unique name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4500">GP 名称：为休眠选项卡设置后台选项卡不活动超时</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4500">GP name: Set the background tab inactivity timeout for sleeping tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4501">GP 路径 (必需) ：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/休眠选项卡设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4501">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4502">GP 路径 (推荐) ：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置 (用户可以替代) /睡眠选项卡设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4502">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4503">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4503">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4504">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4504">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4505">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4505">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4506">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4506">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4507">值名称： SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4507">Value Name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4508">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4508">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4509">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4509">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000384
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4510">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4510">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4511">首选键名称： SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4511">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4512">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4512">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>900</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4513">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4513">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <a name="smartscreen-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4514">SmartScreen 设置策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4514">SmartScreen settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4515">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4515">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="preventsmartscreenpromptoverride"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4516">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4516">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>

  #### <a name="prevent-bypassing-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-prompts-for-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4517">阻止跳过 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 有关网站的提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4517">Prevent bypassing Microsoft Defender SmartScreen prompts for sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4518">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4518">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4519">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4519">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4520">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4520">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4521">通过此策略设置，可决定用户是否能替代有关潜在恶意网站的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4521">This policy setting lets you decide whether users can override the Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about potentially malicious websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4522">如果启用此设置，则用户不能忽略 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告，并且无法继续访问该网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4522">If you enable this setting, users can't ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and they are blocked from continuing to the site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4523">如果禁用或未配置此设置，则用户可以忽略 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告，并且能继续访问该网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4523">If you disable or don't configure this setting, users can ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and continue to the site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4524">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4524">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4525">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4525">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4526">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4526">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4527">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4527">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4528">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4528">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4529">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4529">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4530">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4530">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4531">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4531">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4532">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4532">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4533">GP 唯一名称：PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4533">GP unique name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4534">GP 名称：阻止跳过 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 有关网站的提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4534">GP name: Prevent bypassing Microsoft Defender SmartScreen prompts for sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4535">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4535">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4536">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4536">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4537">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4537">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4538">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4538">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4539">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4539">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4540">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4540">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4541">值名称：PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4541">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4542">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4542">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4543">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4543">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4544">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4544">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4545">首选项项名称：PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4545">Preference Key Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4546">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4546">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4547">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4547">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="preventsmartscreenpromptoverrideforfiles"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4548">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4548">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>

  #### <a name="prevent-bypassing-of-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-warnings-about-downloads"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4549">阻止跳过 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 有关下载的警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4549">Prevent bypassing of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about downloads</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4550">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4550">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4551">在 Windows 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4551">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4552">在 macOS 上自 79 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4552">On macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4553">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4553">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4554">通过此策略，可决定用户是否能替代有关未验证下载的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4554">This policy lets you determine whether users can override Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4555">如果启用此策略，则你组织中的用户不能忽略 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告，并且无法完成未经验证的下载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4555">If you enable this policy, users in your organization can't ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings, and they're prevented from completing the unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4556">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则用户可以忽略 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告并完成未经验证的下载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4556">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and complete unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4557">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4557">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4558">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4558">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4559">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4559">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4560">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4560">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4561">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4561">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4562">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4562">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4563">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4563">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4564">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4564">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4565">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4565">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4566">GP 唯一名称：PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4566">GP unique name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4567">GP 名称：阻止跳过 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 有关下载的警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4567">GP name: Prevent bypassing of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about downloads</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4568">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4568">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4569">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4569">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4570">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4570">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4571">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4571">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4572">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4572">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4573">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4573">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4574">值名称：PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4574">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4575">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4575">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4576">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4576">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4577">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4577">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4578">首选项项名称：PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4578">Preference Key Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4579">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4579">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4580">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4580">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="smartscreenallowlistdomains"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4581">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4581">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-domains-for-which-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-wont-trigger-warnings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4582">配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 无法为其触发警告的域列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4582">Configure the list of domains for which Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't trigger warnings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4583">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4583">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4584">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4584">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4585">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4585">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4586">配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 受信任域列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4586">Configure the list of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen trusted domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4587">这意味着：如果源 URL 与这些域匹配，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 将不会检查潜在的恶意资源（如钓鱼软件和其他恶意软件）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4587">This means: Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't check for potentially malicious resources like phishing software and other malware if the source URLs match these domains.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4588">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 下载保护服务不会检查这些域上托管的下载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4588">The Microsoft Defender SmartScreen download protection service won't check downloads hosted on these domains.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4589">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 将信任这些域。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4589">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen trusts these domains.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4590">如果禁用或未设置此策略，则默认 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 保护将应用于所有资源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4590">If you disable or don't set this policy, default Microsoft Defender SmartScreen protection is applied to all resources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4591">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4591">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4592">另请注意，如果你的组织启用了 Microsoft Defender 高级威胁防护，则此策略不适用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4592">Also note that this policy does not apply if your organization has enabled Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4593">必须在 Microsoft Defender 安全中心中配置允许和阻止列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4593">You must configure your allow and block lists in Microsoft Defender Security Center instead.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4594">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4594">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4595">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4595">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4596">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4596">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4597">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4597">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4598">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4598">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4599">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4599">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4600">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4600">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4601">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4601">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4602">GP 唯一名称：SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4602">GP unique name: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4603">GP 名称：配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 无法为其触发警告的域列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4603">GP name: Configure the list of domains for which Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't trigger warnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4604">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4604">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4605">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4605">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4606">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4606">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4607">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4607">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4608">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4608">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4609">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4609">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4610">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4610">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4611">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4611">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4612">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4612">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\1 = "mydomain.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\2 = "myuniversity.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4613">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4613">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4614">首选项项名称：SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4614">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4615">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4615">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>mydomain.com</string>
  <string>myuniversity.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4616">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4616">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="smartscreenenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4617">SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4617">SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-microsoft-defender-smartscreen"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4618">配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4618">Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4619">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4619">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4620">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4620">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4621">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4621">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4622">通过此策略设置，可配置是否打开 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4622">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4623">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 可提供警告消息，帮助保护你的员工免受潜在钓鱼欺诈和恶意软件的侵害。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4623">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen provides warning messages to help protect your users from potential phishing scams and malicious software.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4624">默认情况下，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 处于打开状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4624">By default, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4625">如果启用此设置，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 将打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4625">If you enable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4626">如果禁用此设置，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 将关闭。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4626">If you disable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4627">如果未配置此设置，则用户可以选择是否使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4627">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4628">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4628">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4629">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4629">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4630">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4630">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4631">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4631">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4632">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4632">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4633">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4633">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4634">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4634">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4635">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4635">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4636">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4636">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4637">GP 唯一名称：SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4637">GP unique name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4638">GP 名称：配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4638">GP name: Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4639">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4639">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4640">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/SmartScreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4640">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4641">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4641">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4642">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4642">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4643">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4643">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4644">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4644">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4645">值名称：SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4645">Value Name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4646">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4646">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4647">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4647">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4648">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4648">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4649">首选项项名称：SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4649">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4650">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4650">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4651">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4651">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="smartscreenfortrusteddownloadsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4652">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4652">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-checks-on-downloads-from-trusted-sources"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4653">强制 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 检查从受信任来源下载的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4653">Force Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks on downloads from trusted sources</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4654">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4654">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4655">在 Windows 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4655">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4656">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4656">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4657">通过此策略设置，可配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 是否检查受信任来源的下载信誉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4657">This policy setting lets you configure whether Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks download reputation from a trusted source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4658">如果启用或未配置此设置，无论来源如何，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 都会检查下载信誉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4658">If you enable or don't configure this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks the download's reputation regardless of source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4659">如果禁用此设置，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 在从受信任来源下载时不会检查下载内容的信誉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4659">If you disable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen doesn't check the download's reputation when downloading from a trusted source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4660">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例或者已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4660">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4661">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4661">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4662">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4662">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4663">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4663">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4664">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4664">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4665">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4665">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4666">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4666">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4667">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4667">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4668">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4668">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4669">GP 唯一名称：SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4669">GP unique name: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4670">GP 名称：强制 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 检查从受信任来源下载的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4670">GP name: Force Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks on downloads from trusted sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4671">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4671">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4672">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/SmartScreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4672">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4673">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4673">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4674">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4674">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4675">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4675">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4676">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4676">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4677">值名称：SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4677">Value Name: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4678">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4678">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4679">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4679">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4680">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4680">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="smartscreenpuaenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4681">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4681">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-to-block-potentially-unwanted-apps"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4682">配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 以阻止可能不需要的应用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4682">Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen to block potentially unwanted apps</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4683">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4683">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4684">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 80 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4684">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4685">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4685">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4686">通过此策略设置，可配置是否允许使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 阻止可能不需要的应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4686">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on blocking for potentially unwanted apps with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4687">使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 阻止可能不需要的应用时，将提供警告消息来帮助保护用户防范广告软件、硬币矿工、捆绑件和网站托管的其他低声誉应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4687">Potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen provides warning messages to help protect users from adware, coin miners, bundleware, and other low-reputation apps that are hosted by websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4688">默认情况下，将禁止使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 阻止可能不需要的应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4688">Potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4689">如果启用此设置，则将允许使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 阻止可能不需要的应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4689">If you enable this setting, potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4690">如果禁用此设置，则将禁止使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 阻止可能不需要的应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4690">If you disable this setting, potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4691">如果未配置此设置，则用户可选择是否使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 阻止可能不需要的应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4691">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4692">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4692">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4693">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4693">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4694">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4694">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4695">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4695">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4696">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4696">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4697">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4697">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4698">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4698">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4699">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4699">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4700">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4700">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4701">GP 唯一名称：SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4701">GP unique name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4702">GP 名称：配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 以阻止可能不需要的应用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4702">GP name: Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen to block potentially unwanted apps</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4703">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4703">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4704">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/SmartScreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4704">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4705">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4705">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4706">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4706">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4707">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4707">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4708">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4708">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4709">值名称：SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4709">Value Name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4710">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4710">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4711">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4711">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4712">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4712">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4713">首选项项名称：SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4713">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4714">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4714">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4715">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4715">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <a name="startupcomma-home-page-and-new-tab-page-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4716">启动&comma;、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4716">Startup&comma; home page and new tab page policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4717">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4717">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="homepageisnewtabpage"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4718">HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4718">HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-new-tab-page-as-the-home-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4719">将新选项卡页设置为主页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4719">Set the new tab page as the home page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4720">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4720">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4721">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4721">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4722">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4722">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4723">在 Microsoft Edge 中配置默认主页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4723">Configures the default home page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4724">可将主页设置为你指定的 URL 或新选项卡页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4724">You can set the home page to a URL you specify or to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4725">如果启用此策略，则新选项卡页将始终用于主页，并且将忽略主页 URL 位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4725">If you enable this policy, the new tab page is always used for the home page, and the home page URL location is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4726">如果禁用此策略，则用户的主页不能是新选项卡页，除非 URL 设置为“edge://newtab”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4726">If you disable this policy, the user's home page can't be the new tab page, unless the URL is set to 'edge://newtab'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4727">如果未配置，用户可以选择新选项卡页是否作为其主页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4727">If not configured users can choose whether the new tab page is their home page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4728">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4728">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4729">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4729">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4730">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4730">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4731">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4731">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4732">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4732">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4733">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4733">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4734">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4734">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4735">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4735">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4736">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4736">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4737">GP 唯一名称：HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4737">GP unique name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4738">GP 名称：将新选项卡页设置为主页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4738">GP name: Set the new tab page as the home page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4739">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4739">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4740">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4740">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4741">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4741">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4742">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4742">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4743">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4743">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4744">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4744">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4745">值名称：HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4745">Value Name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4746">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4746">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4747">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4747">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4748">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4748">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4749">首选项项名称：HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4749">Preference Key Name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4750">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4750">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4751">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4751">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="homepagelocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4752">HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4752">HomepageLocation</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-home-page-url"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4753">配置主页 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4753">Configure the home page URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4754">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4754">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4755">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4755">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4756">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4756">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4757">在 Microsoft Edge 中配置默认主页 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4757">Configures the default home page URL in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4758">主页是通过“主页”按钮打开的页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4758">The home page is the page opened by the Home button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4759">启动时打开的页面由 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 策略控制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4759">The pages that open on startup are controlled by the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4760">可在此处设置 URL，也可以设置主页以打开新选项卡页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4760">You can either set a URL here or set the home page to open the new tab page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4761">如果选择打开新选项卡页，则此策略不会生效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4761">If you select to open the new tab page, then this policy doesn't take effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4762">如果启用此策略，则用户不能更改其主页 URL，但他们可以选择使用新选项卡页作为其主页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4762">If you enable this policy, users can't change their home page URL, but they can choose to use the new tab page as their home page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4763">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则只要未启用 [HomepageIsNewTabPage](#homepageisnewtabpage) 策略，用户就可以选择自己的主页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4763">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can choose their own home page, as long as the [HomepageIsNewTabPage](#homepageisnewtabpage) policy isn't enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4764">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4764">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4765">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4765">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4766">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4766">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4767">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4767">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4768">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4768">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4769">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4769">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4770">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4770">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4771">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4771">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4772">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4772">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4773">GP 唯一名称：HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4773">GP unique name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4774">GP 名称：配置主页 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4774">GP name: Configure the home page URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4775">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4775">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4776">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4776">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4777">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4777">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4778">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4778">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4779">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4779">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4780">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4780">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4781">值名称：HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4781">Value Name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4782">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4782">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4783">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4783">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://www.contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4784">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4784">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4785">首选项项名称：HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4785">Preference Key Name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4786">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4786">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4787">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4787">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="newtabpageallowedbackgroundtypes"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4788">NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4788">NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-background-types-allowed-for-the-new-tab-page-layout"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4789">配置新选项卡页面布局允许使用的背景类型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4789">Configure the background types allowed for the new tab page layout</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4790">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4790">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4791">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4791">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4792">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4792">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4793">可在 Microsoft Edge 中的新选项卡页面布局上配置允许使用的背景图像类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4793">You can configure which types of background image that are allowed on the new tab page layout in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4794">如果未配置此策略，则将启用新选项卡页面上的所有背景图像类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4794">If you don't configure this policy, all background image types on the new tab page are enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4795">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4795">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4796">DisableImageOfTheDay (1) = 禁用每日背景图像类型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4796">DisableImageOfTheDay (1) = Disable daily background image type</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4797">DisableCustomImage (2) = 禁用自定义背景图像类型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4797">DisableCustomImage (2) = Disable custom background image type</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4798">DisableAll (3) = 禁用所有背景图像类型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4798">DisableAll (3) = Disable all background image types</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4799">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4799">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4800">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4800">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4801">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4801">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4802">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4802">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4803">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4803">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4804">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4804">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4805">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4805">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4806">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4806">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4807">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4807">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4808">GP 唯一名称： NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4808">GP unique name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4809">GP 名称：配置新选项卡页面布局允许使用的背景类型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4809">GP name: Configure the background types allowed for the new tab page layout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4810">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4810">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4811">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4811">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4812">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4812">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4813">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4813">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4814">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4814">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4815">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4815">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4816">值名称：NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4816">Value Name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4817">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4817">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4818">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4818">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4819">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4819">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4820">首选项名称： NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4820">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4821">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4821">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4822">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4822">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="newtabpagecompanylogo"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4823">NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4823">NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-new-tab-page-company-logo-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4824">设置新选项卡页公司徽标（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4824">Set new tab page company logo (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4825">已过时：该策略已过时，Microsoft Edge 版本 85 后将无法正常工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4825">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 85.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4826">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4826">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4827">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 79 起至 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4827">On Windows and macOS since 79, until 85</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4828">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4828">Description</span></span>
