  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4829">由于操作要求的更改，此策略未按预期工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4829">This policy didn't work as expected due to changes in operational requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4830">因此，它已过时，不应使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4830">Therefore it's obsolete and should not be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4831">指定要在 Microsoft Edge 的新选项卡页上使用的公司徽标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4831">Specifies the company logo to use on the new tab page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4832">该策略应配置为以 JSON 格式表示徽标的字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4832">The policy should be configured as a string that expresses the logo(s) in JSON format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4833">例如：{ "default_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png", "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29" }, "light_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png", "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737" } }</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4833">For example: { "default_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png", "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29" }, "light_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png", "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737" } }</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4834">可通过指定 Microsoft Edge 可从中下载徽标的 URL 及其加密哈希 (SHA-256)（用于验证下载的完整性）来配置此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4834">You configure this policy by specifying the URL from which Microsoft Edge can download the logo and its cryptographic hash (SHA-256), which is used to verify the integrity of the download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4835">徽标必须为 PNG 或 SVG 格式，其文件大小不得超过 16 MB。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4835">The logo must be in PNG or SVG format, and its file size must not exceed 16 MB.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4836">徽标会下载并缓存，并且只要 URL 或哈希发生更改就会重新下载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4836">The logo is downloaded and cached, and it will be redownloaded whenever the URL or the hash changes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4837">该 URL 必须无需任何身份验证即可访问。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4837">The URL must be accessible without any authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4838">“default_logo”是必需的，将在没有背景图像时使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4838">The 'default_logo' is required and will be used when there's no background image.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4839">如果提供了“light_logo”，则当用户的新选项卡页具有背景图像时，将使用它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4839">If 'light_logo' is provided, it will be used when the user's new tab page has a background image.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4840">建议使用带左对齐且垂直居中的透明背景的水平徽标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4840">We recommend a horizontal logo with a transparent background that is left-aligned and vertically centered.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4841">徽标的最小高度应为 32 像素，宽高比应为 1:1 至 4:1。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4841">The logo should have a minimum height of 32 pixels and an aspect ratio from 1:1 to 4:1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4842">“default_logo”应与白色/黑色背景有适当的对比度，而“light_logo”应与背景图像有适当的对比度。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4842">The 'default_logo' should have proper contrast against a white/black background while the 'light_logo' should have proper contrast against a background image.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4843">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将下载并在新选项卡页上显示指定的徽标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4843">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge downloads and shows the specified logo(s) on the new tab page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4844">用户不能替代或隐藏徽标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4844">Users can't override or hide the logo(s).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4845">如果禁用或未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 不会在新选项卡页上显示公司徽标或 Microsoft 徽标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4845">If you disable or don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will show no company logo or a Microsoft logo on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4846">有关确定 SHA-256 哈希的帮助，请转到[此处](/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/get-filehash)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4846">For help with determining the SHA-256 hash, go [here](/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/get-filehash).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4847">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4847">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4848">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4848">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4849">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4849">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4850">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4850">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4851">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4851">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4852">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4852">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4853">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4853">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4854">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4854">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4855">GP 唯一名称：NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4855">GP unique name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4856">GP 名称：设置新选项卡页公司徽标（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4856">GP name: Set new tab page company logo (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4857">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4857">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4858">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4858">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4859">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4859">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4860">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4860">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4861">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4861">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4862">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4862">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4863">值名称：NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4863">Value Name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4864">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4864">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4865">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4865">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageCompanyLogo = {
  "default_logo": {
    "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29",
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png"
  },
  "light_logo": {
    "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737",
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png"
  }
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4866">精简示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4866">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageCompanyLogo = {"default_logo": {"hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29", "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png"}, "light_logo": {"hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737", "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png"}}
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4867">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4867">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4868">首选项项名称：NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4868">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4869">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4869">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>NewTabPageCompanyLogo</key>
<dict>
  <key>default_logo</key>
  <dict>
    <key>hash</key>
    <string>cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com/logo.png</string>
  </dict>
  <key>light_logo</key>
  <dict>
    <key>hash</key>
    <string>517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png</string>
  </dict>
</dict>
```
