  ### <a name="newtabpagecontentenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4871">NewTabPageContentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4871">NewTabPageContentEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-microsoft-news-content-on-the-new-tab-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4872">允许新选项卡页上的 Microsoft 资讯内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4872">Allow Microsoft News content on the new tab page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4873">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4873">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4874">自 91 或更高版本起，在 Windows 和 macOS 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4874">On Windows and macOS since 91 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4875">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4875">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4876">如果启用或不配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将在新选项卡页上显示 Microsoft 资讯内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4876">If you enable or don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge displays Microsoft News content on the new tab page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4877">用户可以为内容选择不同的显示选项，包括但不限于“内容关闭”、“滚动时可见的内容”、“仅标题”和“内容可见”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4877">The user can choose different display options for the content, including but not limited to Content off, Content visible on scroll, Headings only, and Content visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4878">启用此策略不会强制内容可见 - 用户可以继续设置自己首选的内容位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4878">Enabling this policy doesn't force content to be visible - the user can continue to set their own preferred content position.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4879">如果禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 不会在新建选项卡页上显示 Microsoft 资讯内容，将禁用 “NTP 设置”浮出控件中的“内容控件”，并设置为“内容关闭”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4879">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge does not display Microsoft News content on the new tab page, the Content control in the NTP settings flyout is disabled and set to 'Content off'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4880">此策略仅适用于 Microsoft Edge 本地用户配置文件、使用 Microsoft 帐户登录的配置文件和使用 Active Directory 登录的配置文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4880">This policy only applies for Microsoft Edge local user profiles, profiles signed in using a Microsoft Account, and profiles signed in using Active Directory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4881">若要为使用 Azure Active Directory 登录的配置文件配置企业新选项卡页，请使用 M365 管理门户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4881">To configure the Enterprise new tab page for profiles signed in using Azure Active Directory, use the M365 admin portal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4882">相关策略：[NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes](#newtabpageallowedbackgroundtypes)、[NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled](#newtabpagequicklinksenabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4882">Related policies: [NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes](#newtabpageallowedbackgroundtypes), [NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled](#newtabpagequicklinksenabled)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4883">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4883">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4884">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4884">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4885">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4885">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4886">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4886">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4887">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4887">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4888">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4888">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4889">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4889">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4890">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4890">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4891">GP 唯一名称：NewTabPageContentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4891">GP unique name: NewTabPageContentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4892">GP 名称：允许新选项卡页上的 Microsoft 资讯内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4892">GP name: Allow Microsoft News content on the new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4893">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/ Microsoft Edge /启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4893">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4894">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4894">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4895">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4895">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4896">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4896">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4897">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4897">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4898">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4898">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4899">值名称：NewTabPageContentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4899">Value Name: NewTabPageContentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4900">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4900">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4901">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4901">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4902">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4902">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4903">首选项项名称：NewTabPageContentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4903">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageContentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4904">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4904">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4905">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4905">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="newtabpagehidedefaulttopsites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4906">NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4906">NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>

  #### <a name="hide-the-default-top-sites-from-the-new-tab-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4907">从新选项卡页隐藏默认热门网站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4907">Hide the default top sites from the new tab page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4908">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4908">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4909">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4909">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4910">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4910">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4911">从 Microsoft Edge 中的新选项卡页隐藏默认热门网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4911">Hides the default top sites from the new tab page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4912">如果将此策略设置为 true，则默认热门网站磁贴将隐藏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4912">If you set this policy to true, the default top site tiles are hidden.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4913">如果将此策略设置为 false 或未配置它，则默认热门网站磁贴将保持可见。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4913">If you set this policy to false or don't configure it, the default top site tiles remain visible.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4914">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4914">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4915">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4915">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4916">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4916">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4917">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4917">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4918">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4918">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4919">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4919">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4920">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4920">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4921">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4921">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4922">GP 唯一名称：NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4922">GP unique name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4923">GP 名称：从新选项卡页隐藏默认热门网站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4923">GP name: Hide the default top sites from the new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4924">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4924">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4925">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4925">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4926">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4926">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4927">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4927">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4928">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4928">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4929">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4929">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4930">值名称：NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4930">Value Name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4931">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4931">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4932">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4932">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4933">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4933">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4934">首选项项名称：NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4934">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4935">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4935">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4936">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4936">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="newtabpagelocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4937">NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4937">NewTabPageLocation</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-new-tab-page-url"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4938">配置新选项卡页 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4938">Configure the new tab page URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4939">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4939">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4940">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4940">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4941">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4941">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4942">配置新选项卡页的默认 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4942">Configures the default URL for the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4943">此策略的推荐版本目前无法使用，其功能与强制版本完全相同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4943">The recommended version of this policy does not currently work and functions exactly like the mandatory version.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4944">此策略确定创建新选项卡时（包括打开新窗口时）打开的页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4944">This policy determines the page that's opened when new tabs are created (including when new windows are opened).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4945">如果启动页设置为打开新选项卡页，则该策略也会影响启动页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4945">It also affects the startup page if that's set to open to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4946">此策略不确定启动时打开哪个页面；它由 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 策略控制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4946">This policy doesn't determine which page opens on startup; that's controlled by the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4947">如果该策略设置为打开新选项卡页，则不会影响主页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4947">It also doesn't affect the home page if that's set to open to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4948">如果未配置此策略，则将使用默认新选项卡页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4948">If you don't configure this policy, the default new tab page is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4949">如果配置此策略*和* [NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype) 策略，则此策略优先。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4949">If you configure this policy *and* the [NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype) policy, this policy has precedence.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4950">如果首选空白选项卡，则“about:blank”是要使用的正确 URL，而不是“about://blank”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4950">If a blank tab is preferred, "about:blank" is the correct URL to use, not "about://blank".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4951">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4951">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4952">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4952">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4953">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4953">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4954">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4954">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4955">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4955">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4956">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4956">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4957">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4957">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4958">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4958">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4959">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4959">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4960">GP 唯一名称：NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4960">GP unique name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4961">GP 名称：配置新选项卡页 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4961">GP name: Configure the new tab page URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4962">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4962">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4963">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4963">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4964">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4964">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4965">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4965">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4966">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4966">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4967">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4967">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4968">值名称：NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4968">Value Name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4969">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4969">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4970">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4970">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://www.fabrikam.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4971">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4971">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4972">首选项项名称：NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4972">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4973">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4973">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4974">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4974">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="newtabpagemanagedquicklinks"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4975">NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4975">NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-new-tab-page-quick-links"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4976">设置新选项卡页快速链接</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4976">Set new tab page quick links</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4977">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4977">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4978">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 79 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4978">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4979">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4979">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4980">默认情况下，Microsoft Edge 会根据浏览历史记录，从用户添加的快捷方式和热门网站在新选项卡页上显示快速链接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4980">By default, Microsoft Edge displays quick links on the new tab page from user-added shortcuts and top sites based on browsing history.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4981">使用此策略，可在新选项卡页上配置最多三个快速链接磁贴，以 JSON 对象表示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4981">With this policy, you can configure up to three quick link tiles on the new tab page, expressed as a JSON object:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4982">[ { "url": "https://www.contoso.com", "title": "Contoso Portal", "pinned": true/false }, ... ]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4982">[ { "url": "https://www.contoso.com", "title": "Contoso Portal", "pinned": true/false }, ... ]</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4983">“url”字段为必填项；“title”和“pined”是可选的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4983">The 'url' field is required; 'title' and 'pinned' are optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4984">如果未提供“title”，则使用 URL 作为默认标题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4984">If 'title' is not provided, the URL is used as the default title.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4985">如果未提供“pinned”，则默认值为 false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4985">If 'pinned' is not provided, the default value is false.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4986">Microsoft Edge 将按列出的顺序从左到右显示这些磁贴，并显示所有固定的磁贴，但不显示未固定的磁贴。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4986">Microsoft Edge presents these in the order listed, from left to right, with all pinned tiles displayed ahead of non-pinned tiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4987">如果该策略设置为强制，则将忽略“pinned”字段，并且将固定所有磁贴。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4987">If the policy is set as mandatory, the 'pinned' field will be ignored and all tiles will be pinned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4988">用户不能删除磁贴，并且磁贴始终显示在快速链接列表的前面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4988">The tiles can't be deleted by the user and will always appear at the front of the quick links list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4989">如果该策略设置为推荐，则固定的磁贴将保留在列表中，但用户能够编辑和删除它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4989">If the policy is set as recommended, pinned tiles will remain in the list but the user has the ability to edit and delete them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4990">未固定的快速链接磁贴的行为与默认热门网站类似，如果其他网站访问频率更高，则这些磁贴会被推离列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4990">Quick link tiles that aren't pinned behave like default top sites and are pushed off the list if other websites are visited more frequently.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4991">通过此策略将未固定的链接应用到现有浏览器配置文件时，可能根本不会显示链接，具体取决于它们与用户浏览历史记录相比的排名。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4991">When applying non-pinned links via this policy to an existing browser profile, the links may not appear at all, depending on how they rank compared to the user's browsing history.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4992">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4992">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4993">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4993">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4994">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4994">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4995">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4995">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4996">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4996">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4997">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4997">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4998">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4998">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-4999">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-4999">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5000">GP 唯一名称：NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5000">GP unique name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5001">GP 名称：设置新选项卡页快速链接</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5001">GP name: Set new tab page quick links</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5002">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5002">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5003">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5003">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5004">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5004">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5005">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5005">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5006">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5006">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5007">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5007">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5008">值名称：NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5008">Value Name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5009">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5009">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5010">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5010">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks = [
  {
    "pinned": true,
    "title": "Contoso Portal",
    "url": "https://contoso.com"
  },
  {
    "title": "Fabrikam",
    "url": "https://fabrikam.com"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5011">精简示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5011">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks = [{"pinned": true, "title": "Contoso Portal", "url": "https://contoso.com"}, {"title": "Fabrikam", "url": "https://fabrikam.com"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5012">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5012">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5013">首选项项名称：NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5013">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5014">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5014">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>pinned</key>
    <true/>
    <key>title</key>
    <string>Contoso Portal</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://contoso.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>title</key>
    <string>Fabrikam</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://fabrikam.com</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5015">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5015">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="newtabpageprerenderenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5016">NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5016">NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-preload-of-the-new-tab-page-for-faster-rendering"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5017">启用新选项卡页面的预加载，以便快速呈现</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5017">Enable preload of the new tab page for faster rendering</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5018">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5018">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5019">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 85 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5019">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5020">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5020">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5021">如果配置了此策略，将启用预加载新选项卡页面，并且用户无法更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5021">If you configure this policy, preloading the New tab page is enabled, and users can't change this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5022">如果不配置此策略，将启用预加载，用户可更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5022">If you don't configure this policy, preloading is enabled and a user can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5023">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5023">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5024">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5024">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5025">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5025">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5026">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5026">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5027">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5027">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5028">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5028">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5029">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5029">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5030">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5030">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5031">GP 唯一名称： NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5031">GP unique name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5032">GP 名称：启用新选项卡页面的预加载，以便快速呈现</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5032">GP name: Enable preload of the new tab page for faster rendering</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5033">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5033">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5034">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5034">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5035">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5035">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5036">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5036">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5037">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5037">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5038">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5038">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5039">值名称： NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5039">Value Name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5040">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5040">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5041">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5041">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5042">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5042">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5043">首选参数名称： NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5043">Preference Key Name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5044">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5044">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5045">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5045">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="newtabpagequicklinksenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5046">NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5046">NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-quick-links-on-the-new-tab-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5047">允许新选项卡页上的快速链接</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5047">Allow quick links on the new tab page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5048">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5048">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5049">自 91 或更高版本起，在 Windows 和 macOS 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5049">On Windows and macOS since 91 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5050">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5050">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5051">如果启用或不配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将在新的选项卡页上显示快速链接，用户可以与控件交互，打开或关闭快速链接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5051">If you enable or don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge displays quick links on the new tab page, and the user can interact with the control, turning quick links on and off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5052">启用此策略不会强制快速链接可见 - 用户可以继续打开或关闭快速链接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5052">Enabling this policy does not force quick links to be visible - the user can continue to turn quick links on and off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5053">如果禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 会在新选项卡页面上隐藏快速链接，并禁用 NTP 设置飞出中的快速链接控件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5053">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge hides quick links on the new tab page and disables the quick links control in the NTP settings flyout.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5054">此策略仅适用于 Microsoft Edge 本地用户配置文件、使用 Microsoft 帐户登录的配置文件和使用 Active Directory 登录的配置文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5054">This policy only applies for Microsoft Edge local user profiles, profiles signed in using a Microsoft Account, and profiles signed in using Active Directory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5055">若要为使用 Azure Active Directory 登录的配置文件配置企业新选项卡页，请使用 M365 管理门户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5055">To configure the Enterprise new tab page for profiles signed in using Azure Active Directory, use the M365 admin portal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5056">相关策略：[NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes](#newtabpageallowedbackgroundtypes)、[NewTabPageContentEnabled](#newtabpagecontentenabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5056">Related policies: [NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes](#newtabpageallowedbackgroundtypes), [NewTabPageContentEnabled](#newtabpagecontentenabled)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5057">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5057">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5058">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5058">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5059">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5059">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5060">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5060">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5061">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5061">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5062">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5062">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5063">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5063">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5064">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5064">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5065">GP 唯一名称：NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5065">GP unique name: NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5066">GP 名称：允许新选项卡页上的快速链接</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5066">GP name: Allow quick links on the new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5067">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5067">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5068">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5068">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5069">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5069">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5070">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5070">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5071">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5071">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5072">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5072">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5073">值名称：NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5073">Value Name: NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5074">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5074">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5075">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5075">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5076">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5076">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5077">首选项密钥名称：NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5077">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageQuickLinksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5078">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5078">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5079">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5079">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="newtabpagesetfeedtype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5080">NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5080">NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-microsoft-edge-new-tab-page-experience-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5081">配置 Microsoft Edge 新选项卡页体验 (已过时) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5081">Configure the Microsoft Edge new tab page experience (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5082">已过时：此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 92 之后不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5082">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 92.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5083">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5083">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5084">在 Windows 和 macOS 上，从 79 直到 92</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5084">On Windows and macOS since 79, until 92</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5085">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5085">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5086">此策略已过时，因为新版本的企业新选项卡页不再需要在不同内容类型之间选择。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5086">This policy is obsolete because the new version of the enterprise new tab page no longer requires choosing between different content types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5087">实际上，可以通过 Microsoft 365 管理中心来控制向用户呈现的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5087">Instead, the content that is presented to the user can be controlled via the Microsoft 365 admin center.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5088">若要访问 Microsoft 365 管理中心，请使用管理员帐户登录 https://admin.microsoft.com。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5088">To get to the Microsoft 365 admin center, sign in at https://admin.microsoft.com with your admin account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5089">允许你为新选项卡页选择 Microsoft 资讯或 Office 365 源体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5089">Lets you choose either the Microsoft News or Office 365 feed experience for the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5090">当将此策略设置为 'News' 时，用户将在新选项卡页上看到 Microsoft 资讯源体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5090">When you set this policy to 'News', users will see the Microsoft News feed experience on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5091">当将此策略设置为 'Office' 时，使用 Azure Active Directory 浏览器登录的用户将在新选项卡页上看到 Office 365 源体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5091">When you set this policy to 'Office', users with an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in will see the Office 365 feed experience on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5092">如果禁用或未配置此策略：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5092">If you disable or don't configure this policy:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5093">使用 Azure Active Directory 浏览器登录的用户将获得 Office 365 新选项卡页源体验以及标准的新选项卡页源体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5093">Users with an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in are offered the Office 365 new tab page feed experience, as well as the standard new tab page feed experience.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5094">不使用 Azure Active Directory 浏览器登录的用户将看到标准的新选项卡页体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5094">Users without an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in will see the standard new tab page experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5095">如果配置了此策略*和* [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) 策略，则 [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) 优先。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5095">If you configure this policy *and* the [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) policy, [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) has precedence.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5096">默认设置：禁用或未配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5096">Default setting:  Disabled or not configured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5097">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5097">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5098">News (0) = Microsoft 资讯源体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5098">News (0) = Microsoft News feed experience</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5099">Office (1) = Office 365 源体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5099">Office (1) = Office 365 feed experience</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5100">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5100">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5101">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5101">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5102">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5102">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5103">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5103">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5104">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5104">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5105">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5105">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5106">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5106">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5107">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5107">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5108">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5108">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5109">GP 唯一名称：NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5109">GP unique name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5110">GP 名称：配置 Microsoft Edge 新选项卡页体验 (已过时) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5110">GP name: Configure the Microsoft Edge new tab page experience (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5111">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5111">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5112">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5112">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5113">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5113">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5114">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5114">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5115">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5115">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5116">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5116">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5117">值名称：NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5117">Value Name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5118">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5118">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5119">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5119">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5120">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5120">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5121">首选项项名称：NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5121">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5122">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5122">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5123">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5123">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="restoreonstartup"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5124">RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5124">RestoreOnStartup</span></span>

  #### <a name="action-to-take-on-startup"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5125">启动时要执行的操作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5125">Action to take on startup</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5126">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5126">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5127">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5127">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5128">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5128">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5129">指定 Microsoft Edge 启动时的行为方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5129">Specify how Microsoft Edge behaves when it starts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5130">如果想要在启动时始终打开新选项卡，请选择 "RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5130">If you want a new tab to always open on startup, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5131">如果要重新打开上次 Microsoft Edge 关闭时打开的 URL，请选择 'RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession'。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5131">If you want to reopen URLs that were open the last time Microsoft Edge closed, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5132">浏览会话将按原样还原。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5132">The browsing session will be restored as it was.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5133">请注意，此选项会禁用某些依赖会话或在退出时执行操作的设置（例如，退出时清除浏览数据或仅清除会话 Cookie）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5133">Note that this option disables some settings that rely on sessions or that perform actions on exit (such as Clear browsing data on exit or session-only cookies).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5134">如果想要打开一组特定的 URL，请选择 "RestoreOnStartupIsURLs"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5134">If you want to open a specific set of URLs, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsURLs'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5135">禁用此设置等同于未配置此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5135">Disabling this setting is equivalent to leaving it not configured.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5136">用户将能够在 Microsoft Edge 中对其进行更改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5136">Users will be able to change it in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5137">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5137">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5138">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5138">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5139">RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage (5) = 打开新选项卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5139">RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage (5) = Open a new tab</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5140">RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession (1) = 还原上次会话</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5140">RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession (1) = Restore the last session</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5141">RestoreOnStartupIsURLs (4) = 打开 URL 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5141">RestoreOnStartupIsURLs (4) = Open a list of URLs</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5142">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5142">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5143">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5143">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5144">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5144">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5145">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5145">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5146">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5146">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5147">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5147">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5148">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5148">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5149">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5149">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5150">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5150">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5151">GP 唯一名称：RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5151">GP unique name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5152">GP 名称：启动时要执行的操作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5152">GP name: Action to take on startup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5153">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5153">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5154">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5154">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5155">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5155">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5156">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5156">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5157">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5157">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5158">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5158">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5159">值名称：RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5159">Value Name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5160">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5160">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5161">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5161">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000004
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5162">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5162">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5163">首选项项名称：RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5163">Preference Key Name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5164">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5164">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>4</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5165">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5165">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="restoreonstartupurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5166">RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5166">RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>

  #### <a name="sites-to-open-when-the-browser-starts"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5167">浏览器启动时要打开的网站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5167">Sites to open when the browser starts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5168">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5168">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5169">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5169">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5170">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5170">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5171">指定浏览器启动时自动打开的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5171">Specify a list of websites to open automatically when the browser starts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5172">如果未配置此策略，则启动时将不会打开任何网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5172">If you don't configure this policy, no site is opened on startup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5173">只有当还将 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 策略设置为“打开 URL 列表”(4) 时，此策略才起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5173">This policy only works if you also set the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy to 'Open a list of URLs' (4).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5174">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5174">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5175">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5175">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5176">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5176">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5177">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5177">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5178">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5178">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5179">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5179">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5180">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5180">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5181">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5181">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5182">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5182">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5183">GP 唯一名称：RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5183">GP unique name: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5184">GP 名称：浏览器启动时要打开的网站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5184">GP name: Sites to open when the browser starts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5185">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5185">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5186">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5186">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5187">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5187">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5188">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5188">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5189">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5189">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5190">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5190">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5191">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5191">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5192">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5192">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5193">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5193">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs\1 = "https://contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs\2 = "https://www.fabrikam.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5194">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5194">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5195">首选项项名称：RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5195">Preference Key Name: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5196">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5196">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5197">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5197">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="showhomebutton"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5198">ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5198">ShowHomeButton</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-home-button-on-toolbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5199">在工具栏上显示“主页”按钮</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5199">Show Home button on toolbar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5200">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5200">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5201">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5201">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5202">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5202">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5203">在 Microsoft Edge 工具栏上显示“主页”按钮。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5203">Shows the Home button on Microsoft Edge's toolbar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5204">启用此策略后可始终显示“主页”按钮。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5204">Enable this policy to always show the Home button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5205">如果禁用该策略，则从不显示该按钮。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5205">Disable it to never show the button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5206">如果未配置该策略，则用户可以选择是否显示“主页”按钮。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5206">If you don't configure the policy, users can choose whether to show the home button.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5207">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5207">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5208">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5208">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5209">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5209">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5210">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5210">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5211">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5211">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5212">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5212">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5213">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5213">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5214">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5214">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5215">GP 唯一名称：ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5215">GP unique name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5216">GP 名称：在工具栏上显示“主页”按钮</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5216">GP name: Show Home button on toolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5217">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5217">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5218">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5218">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5219">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5219">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5220">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5220">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5221">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5221">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5222">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5222">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5223">值名称：ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5223">Value Name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5224">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5224">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5225">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5225">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5226">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5226">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5227">首选项项名称：ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5227">Preference Key Name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5228">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5228">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ## <a name="additional-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5230">其他策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5230">Additional policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5231">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5231">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="aadwebsitessousingthisprofileenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5232">AADWebSiteSSOUsingThisProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5232">AADWebSiteSSOUsingThisProfileEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="single-sign-on-for-work-or-school-sites-using-this-profile-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5233">启用通过此配置文件对工作或学校网站进行单一登录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5233">Single sign-on for work or school sites using this profile enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5234">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5234">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5235">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 92 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5235">On Windows and macOS since 92 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5236">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5236">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5237">"允许使用此配置文件对工作或学校网站进行单一登录"选项允许非 AAD 配置文件使用计算机上存在的工作或学校凭据对工作或学校网站进行单一登录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5237">'Allow single sign-on for work or school sites using this profile' option allows non-AAD profiles to be able to use single sign-on for work or school sites using work or school credentials present on the machine.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5238">此选项仅在设置 -> 配置文件 -> 配置文件偏好设置中作为切换项向非 AAD 配置文件的最终用户显示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5238">This option shows up for end-users as a toggle in Settings -> Profiles -> Profile Preferences for non-AAD profiles only.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5239">如果禁用此策略，非 AAD 配置文件将不能使用计算机上存在的其他凭据使用 SSO。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5239">If you disable this policy, non-AAD profiles will not be able to use SSO using other credentials present on the machine.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5240">这还将确保"为具有单个非 Azure AD Microsoft Edge 配置文件的用户的所有 Windows Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) 帐户启用单一登录 (SSO) "已关闭。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5240">This will also ensure that 'Intelligent enablement of Single sign-on (SSO) for all Windows Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) accounts for users with a single non-Azure AD Microsoft Edge profile' is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5241">如果启用或不配置此策略，非 AAD 配置文件将能够使用计算机上存在的其他凭据使用 SSO，并且对于具有单个非 Azure AD Microsoft Edge 配置文件的用户，所有 Windows Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) 帐户的"智能启用单一登录 (SSO) "将继续工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5241">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, non-AAD profiles will be able to use SSO using other credentials present on the machine and 'Intelligent enablement of Single sign-on (SSO) for all Windows Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) accounts for users with a single non-Azure AD Microsoft Edge profile' will continue working.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5242">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5242">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5243">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5243">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5244">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5244">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5245">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5245">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5246">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5246">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5247">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5247">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5248">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5248">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5249">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5249">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5250">GP 唯一名称：AADWebSiteSSOUsingThisProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5250">GP unique name: AADWebSiteSSOUsingThisProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5251">GP 名称：启用通过此配置文件对工作或学校网站进行单一登录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5251">GP name: Single sign-on for work or school sites using this profile enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5252">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5252">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5253">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5253">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5254">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5254">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5255">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5255">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5256">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5256">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5257">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5257">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5258">值名称：AADWebSiteSSOUsingThisProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5258">Value Name: AADWebSiteSSOUsingThisProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5259">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5259">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5260">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5260">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5261">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5261">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5262">首选项项名称：AADWebSiteSSOUsingThisProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5262">Preference Key Name: AADWebSiteSSOUsingThisProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5263">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5263">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5264">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5264">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)
