  ### <a name="addressbarmicrosoftsearchinbingproviderenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5265">AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5265">AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-microsoft-search-in-bing-suggestions-in-the-address-bar"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5266">在地址栏中启用 Microsoft 必应搜索建议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5266">Enable Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5267">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5267">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5268">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 81 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5268">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5269">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5269">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5270">当用户在地址栏中键入搜索字符串时，可在地址栏的建议列表中显示相关的 Microsoft 必应搜索建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5270">Enables the display of relevant Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar's suggestion list when the user types a search string in the address bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5271">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以在 Microsoft Edge 地址栏建议列表中看到由 Microsoft 必应搜索提供支持的内部结果。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5271">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can see internal results powered by Microsoft Search in Bing in the Microsoft Edge address bar suggestion list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5272">若要查看 Microsoft 必应搜索结果，用户必须使用其组织的 Azure AD 帐户登录到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5272">To see the Microsoft Search in Bing results, the user must be signed into Microsoft Edge with their Azure AD account for that organization.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5273">如果禁用此策略，用户将无法在 Microsoft Edge 地址栏建议列表中看到内部结果。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5273">If you disable this policy, users can't see internal results in the Microsoft Edge address bar suggestion list.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5274">从 Microsoft Edge 89 版本开始，即使必应不是用户的默认搜索提供程序，必应中的 Microsoft 搜索建议也可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5274">Starting with Microsoft Edge version 89, Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions will be available even if Bing isn't the user's default search provider.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5275">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5275">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5276">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5276">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5277">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5277">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5278">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5278">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5279">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5279">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5280">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5280">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5281">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5281">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5282">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5282">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5283">GP 唯一名称：AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5283">GP unique name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5284">GP 名称：在地址栏中启用 Microsoft 必应搜索建议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5284">GP name: Enable Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5285">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5285">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5286">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5286">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5287">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5287">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5288">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5288">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5289">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5289">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5290">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5290">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5291">值名称：AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5291">Value Name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5292">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5292">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5293">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5293">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5294">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5294">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5295">首选项项名称：AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5295">Preference Key Name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5296">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5296">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5297">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5297">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="adssettingforintrusiveadssites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5298">AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5298">AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>

  #### <a name="ads-setting-for-sites-with-intrusive-ads"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5299">含侵扰广告的网站的广告设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5299">Ads setting for sites with intrusive ads</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5300">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5300">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5301">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5301">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5302">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5302">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5303">控制是否在具有侵扰广告的网站上阻止广告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5303">Controls whether ads are blocked on sites with intrusive ads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5304">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5304">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5305">AllowAds (1) = 在所有网站上允许广告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5305">AllowAds (1) = Allow ads on all sites</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5306">BlockAds (2) = 在含侵入式广告的网站上阻止广告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5306">BlockAds (2) = Block ads on sites with intrusive ads.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5307">（默认值）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5307">(Default value)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5308">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5308">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5309">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5309">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5310">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5310">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5311">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5311">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5312">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5312">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5313">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5313">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5314">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5314">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5315">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5315">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5316">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5316">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5317">GP 唯一名称：AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5317">GP unique name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5318">GP 名称：含侵扰广告的网站的广告设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5318">GP name: Ads setting for sites with intrusive ads</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5319">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5319">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5320">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5320">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5321">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5321">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5322">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5322">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5323">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5323">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5324">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5324">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5325">值名称：AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5325">Value Name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5326">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5326">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5327">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5327">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5328">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5328">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5329">首选项项名称：AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5329">Preference Key Name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5330">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5330">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5331">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5331">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="allowdeletingbrowserhistory"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5332">AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5332">AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-deleting-browser-and-download-history"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5333">启用删除浏览器和下载历史记录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5333">Enable deleting browser and download history</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5334">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5334">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5335">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5335">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5336">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5336">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5337">允许删除浏览器历史记录和下载历史记录，并阻止用户更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5337">Enables deleting browser history and download history and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5338">请注意，即使禁用了此策略，也不能保证保留浏览和下载历史记录：用户可以直接编辑或删除历史记录数据库文件，浏览器本身也可以随时删除（根据有效期）或者存档任何或所有历史记录项目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5338">Note that even with this policy is disabled, the browsing and download history aren't guaranteed to be retained: users can edit or delete the history database files directly, and the browser itself may remove (based on expiration period) or archive any or all history items at any time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5339">如果启用或未配置此策略，用户可以删除浏览和下载历史记录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5339">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can delete the browsing and download history.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5340">如果禁用此策略，用户将无法删除浏览和下载历史记录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5340">If you disable this policy, users can't delete browsing and download history.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5341">禁用此策略将禁用历史记录同步并打开选项卡同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5341">Disabling this policy will disable history sync and open tab sync.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5342">如果启用此策略，请不要启用 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 策略，因为它们都处理数据删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5342">If you enable this policy, don't enable the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy, because they both deal with deleting data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5343">如果同时启用两者，则 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 策略优先并且会在 Microsoft Edge 关闭时删除所有数据，而不管此策略是如何配置的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5343">If you enable both, the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy takes precedence and deletes all data when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how this policy is configured.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5344">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5344">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5345">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5345">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5346">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5346">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5347">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5347">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5348">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5348">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5349">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5349">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5350">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5350">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5351">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5351">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5352">GP 唯一名称：AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5352">GP unique name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5353">GP 名称：启用删除浏览器和下载历史记录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5353">GP name: Enable deleting browser and download history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5354">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5354">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5355">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5355">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5356">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5356">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5357">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5357">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5358">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5358">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5359">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5359">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5360">值名称：AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5360">Value Name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5361">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5361">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5362">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5362">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5363">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5363">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5364">首选项项名称：AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5364">Preference Key Name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5365">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5365">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5366">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5366">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="allowfileselectiondialogs"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5367">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5367">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-file-selection-dialogs"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5368">允许文件选择对话框</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5368">Allow file selection dialogs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5369">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5369">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5370">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5370">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5371">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5371">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5372">通过让 Microsoft Edge 显示文件选择对话框来允许访问本地文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5372">Allow access to local files by letting Microsoft Edge display file selection dialogs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5373">如果启用或未配置此策略，用户可以正常打开文件选择对话框。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5373">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can open file selection dialogs as normal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5374">如果禁用此策略，则每当用户执行触发文件选择对话框的操作（如导入收藏夹、上传文件或保存链接）时，都会显示一条消息，并假定用户已在文件选择对话框中单击“取消”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5374">If you disable this policy, whenever the user performs an action that triggers a file selection dialog (like importing favorites, uploading files, or saving links), a message is displayed instead, and the user is assumed to have clicked Cancel on the file selection dialog.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5375">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5375">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5376">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5376">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5377">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5377">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5378">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5378">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5379">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5379">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5380">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5380">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5381">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5381">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5382">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5382">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5383">GP 唯一名称：AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5383">GP unique name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5384">GP 名称：允许文件选择对话框</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5384">GP name: Allow file selection dialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5385">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5385">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5386">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5386">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5387">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5387">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5388">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5388">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5389">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5389">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5390">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5390">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5391">值名称：AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5391">Value Name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5392">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5392">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5393">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5393">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5394">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5394">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5395">首选项项名称：AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5395">Preference Key Name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5396">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5396">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5397">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5397">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="allowpopupsduringpageunload"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5398">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5398">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>

  #### <a name="allows-a-page-to-show-popups-during-its-unloading-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5399">允许页面在卸载期间显示弹出窗口（过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5399">Allows a page to show popups during its unloading (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5400">已过时：此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 87 后不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5400">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5401">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5401">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5402">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 78 开始，直到 87</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5402">On Windows and macOS since 78, until 87</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5403">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5403">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5404">通过此策略，管理员能够指定页面在其卸载期间显示弹出窗口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5404">This policy allows an admin to specify that a page can show popups during its unloading.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5405">当该策略设置为启用时，允许页面在卸载时显示弹出窗口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5405">When the policy is set to enabled, pages are allowed to show popups while they're being unloaded.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5406">当该策略设置为禁用或未设置时，不允许页面在卸载时显示弹出窗口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5406">When the policy is set to disabled or unset, pages aren't allowed to show popups while they're being unloaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5407">这将遵循规范：https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5407">This is as per the spec: (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5408">此策略已在 Microsoft Edge 88 中删除，如果已设置，则将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5408">This policy was removed in Microsoft Edge 88 and is ignored if set.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5409">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5409">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5410">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5410">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5411">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5411">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5412">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5412">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5413">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5413">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5414">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5414">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5415">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5415">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5416">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5416">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5417">GP 唯一名称：AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5417">GP unique name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5418">GP 名称：允许页面在卸载期间显示弹出窗口， (过时) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5418">GP name: Allows a page to show popups during its unloading (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5419">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5419">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5420">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5420">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5421">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5421">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5422">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5422">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5423">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5423">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5424">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5424">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5425">值名称：AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5425">Value Name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5426">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5426">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5427">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5427">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5428">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5428">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5429">首选项项名称：AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5429">Preference Key Name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5430">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5430">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5431">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5431">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="allowsurfgame"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5432">AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5432">AllowSurfGame</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-surf-game"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5433">允许冲浪游戏</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5433">Allow surf game</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5434">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5434">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5435">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 83 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5435">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5436">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5436">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5437">如果禁用此策略，则当设备脱机或用户导航到 edge://surf 时，用户将无法玩冲浪游戏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5437">If you disable this policy, users won't be able to play the surf game when the device is offline or if the user navigates to edge://surf.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5438">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以玩冲浪游戏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5438">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can play the surf game.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5439">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5439">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5440">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5440">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5441">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5441">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5442">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5442">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5443">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5443">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5444">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5444">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5445">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5445">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5446">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5446">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5447">GP 唯一名称：AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5447">GP unique name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5448">GP 名称：允许冲浪游戏</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5448">GP name: Allow surf game</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5449">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5449">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5450">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5450">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5451">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5451">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5452">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5452">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5453">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5453">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5454">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5454">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5455">值名称：AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5455">Value Name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5456">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5456">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5457">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5457">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5458">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5458">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5459">首选项项名称：AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5459">Preference Key Name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5460">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5460">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5461">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5461">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="allowsyncxhrinpagedismissal"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5462">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5462">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-pages-to-send-synchronous-xhr-requests-during-page-dismissal-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5463">允许页面在页面关闭期间发送同步 XHR 请求（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5463">Allow pages to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5464">已弃用：此策略已弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5464">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5465">当前受支持，但将在未来的版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5465">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5466">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5466">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5467">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 79 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5467">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5468">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5468">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5469">此策略已弃用，因为它仅作为一种短期机制提供，目的是让企业能够在发现与不允许在页面关闭期间发送同步 XHR 请求的更改不兼容时有更多的时间来更新其 Web 内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5469">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the change to disallow synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5470">它在 Microsoft Edge 版本 93 中不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5470">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 93.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5471">通过此策略，可指定页面能够在页面关闭期间发送同步 XHR 请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5471">This policy lets you specify that a page can send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5472">如果启用此策略，则页面可以在页面关闭期间发送同步 XHR 请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5472">If you enable this policy, pages can send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5473">如果禁用此策略或未配置此策略，则不允许页面在页面关闭期间发送同步 XHR 请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5473">If you disable this policy or don't configure this policy, pages aren't allowed to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5474">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5474">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5475">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5475">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5476">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5476">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5477">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5477">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5478">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5478">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5479">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5479">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5480">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5480">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5481">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5481">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5482">GP 唯一名称：AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5482">GP unique name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5483">GP 名称：允许页面在页面关闭期间发送同步 XHR 请求（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5483">GP name: Allow pages to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5484">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5484">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5485">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5485">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5486">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5486">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5487">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5487">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5488">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5488">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5489">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5489">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5490">值名称：AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5490">Value Name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5491">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5491">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5492">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5492">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5493">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5493">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5494">首选项项名称：AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5494">Preference Key Name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5495">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5495">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5496">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5496">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="allowtokenbindingforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5497">AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5497">AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-sites-for-which-microsoft-edge-will-attempt-to-establish-a-token-binding-with"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5498">配置 Microsoft Edge 将尝试与其建立令牌绑定的站点列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5498">Configure the list of sites for which Microsoft Edge will attempt to establish a Token Binding with</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5499">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5499">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5500">在 Windows 上自 83 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5500">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5501">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5501">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5502">为浏览器将尝试为其执行令牌绑定协议的网站配置 URL 模式列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5502">Configure the list of URL patterns for sites that the browser will attempt to perform the Token Binding protocol with.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5503">对于此列表中的域，浏览器将在 TLS 握手中发送令牌绑定 ClientHello（请参阅 https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472)）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5503">For the domains on this list, the browser will send the Token Binding ClientHello in the TLS handshake (See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472).</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5504">如果服务器做出有效的 ServerHello 响应，浏览器将在后续 https 请求上创建并发送令牌绑定消息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5504">If the server responds with a valid ServerHello response, the browser will create and send Token Binding messages on subsequent https requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5505">有关详细信息，请参阅 https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5505">See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471 for more info.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5506">如果此列表为空，则将禁用令牌绑定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5506">If this list is empty, Token Binding will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5507">此策略仅在具有虚拟安全模式功能的 Windows 10 设备上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5507">This policy is only available on Windows 10 devices with Virtual Secure Mode capability.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5508">从 Microsoft Edge 86 开始，此策略不再支持动态刷新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5508">Starting in Microsoft Edge 86, this policy no longer supports dynamic refresh.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5509">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5509">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5510">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5510">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5511">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5511">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5512">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5512">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5513">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5513">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5514">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5514">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5515">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5515">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5516">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5516">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5517">GP 唯一名称：AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5517">GP unique name: AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5518">GP 名称：配置 Microsoft Edge 将尝试与其建立令牌绑定的网站列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5518">GP name: Configure the list of sites for which Microsoft Edge will attempt to establish a Token Binding with</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5519">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5519">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5520">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5520">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5521">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5521">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5522">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5522">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5523">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5523">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5524">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5524">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5525">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5525">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5526">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5526">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5527">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5527">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\1 = "mydomain.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\2 = "[*.]mydomain2.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\3 = "[*.].mydomain2.com"

```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5528">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5528">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="allowtrackingforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5529">AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5529">AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-tracking-prevention-exceptions-for-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5530">配置特定网站的跟踪防护例外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5530">Configure tracking prevention exceptions for specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5531">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5531">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5532">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5532">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5533">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5533">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5534">配置排除在跟踪防护之外的 URL 模式列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5534">Configure the list of URL patterns that are excluded from tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5535">如果配置此策略，则已配置的 URL 模式列表将被排除在跟踪防护之外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5535">If you configure this policy, the list of configured URL patterns is excluded from tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5536">如果未配置此策略，则所有网站都将使用“阻止跟踪用户的 Web 浏览活动”策略中的全局默认值（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5536">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the "Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity" policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5537">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5537">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5538">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5538">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5539">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5539">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5540">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5540">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5541">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5541">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5542">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5542">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5543">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5543">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5544">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5544">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5545">GP 唯一名称：AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5545">GP unique name: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5546">GP 名称：配置特定网站的跟踪防护例外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5546">GP name: Configure tracking prevention exceptions for specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5547">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5547">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5548">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5548">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5549">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5549">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5550">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5550">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5551">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5551">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5552">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5552">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5553">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5553">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5554">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5554">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5555">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5555">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5556">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5556">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5557">首选项项名称：AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5557">Preference Key Name: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5558">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5558">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5559">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5559">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="alternateerrorpagesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5560">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5560">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="suggest-similar-pages-when-a-webpage-cant-be-found"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5561">找不到网页时建议类似页面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5561">Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5562">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5562">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5563">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 80 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5563">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5564">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5564">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5565">允许 Microsoft Edge 发布与 Web 服务的连接，以针对连接问题（如 DNS 错误）生成 URL 和搜索建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5565">Allow Microsoft Edge to issue a connection to a web service to generate URL and search suggestions for connectivity issues such as DNS errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5566">如果启用此策略，则将使用 Web 服务针对网络错误生成 URL 和搜索建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5566">If you enable this policy, a web service is used to generate url and search suggestions for network errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5567">如果禁用此策略，则不会调用 Web 服务，并且将显示标准错误页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5567">If you disable this policy, no calls to the web service are made and a standard error page is shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5568">如果未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将遵循 edge://settings/privacy 处“服务”下设置的用户首选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5568">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge respects the user preference that's set under Services at edge://settings/privacy.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5569">具体而言，有一个“**找不到网页时建议类似页面**开关，用户可以打开或关闭该开关。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5569">Specifically, there's a **Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found** toggle, which the user can switch on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5570">请注意，如果启用此策略 (AlternateErrorPagesEnabled)，则找不到网页时建议类似页面设置将打开，但用户无法使用该开关更改设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5570">Note that if you have enable this policy (AlternateErrorPagesEnabled), the Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found setting is turned on, but the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5571">如果禁用此策略，则找不到网页时建议类似页面设置将关闭，并且用户无法使用该开关更改设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5571">If you disable this policy, the Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found setting is turned off, and the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5572">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5572">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5573">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5573">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5574">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5574">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5575">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5575">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5576">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5576">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5577">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5577">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5578">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5578">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5579">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5579">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5580">GP 唯一名称：AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5580">GP unique name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5581">GP 名称：找不到网页时建议类似页面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5581">GP name: Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5582">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5582">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5583">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5583">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5584">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5584">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5585">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5585">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5586">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5586">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5587">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5587">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5588">值名称：AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5588">Value Name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5589">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5589">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5590">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5590">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5591">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5591">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5592">首选项项名称：AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5592">Preference Key Name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5593">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5593">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5594">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5594">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="alwaysopenpdfexternally"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5595">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5595">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>

  #### <a name="always-open-pdf-files-externally"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5596">始终在外部打开 PDF 文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5596">Always open PDF files externally</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5597">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5597">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5598">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5598">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5599">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5599">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5600">在 Microsoft Edge 中禁用内部 PDF 查看器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5600">Disables the internal PDF viewer in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5601">如果启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 会将 PDF 文件视为下载，并允许用户使用默认应用程序打开它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5601">If you enable this policy Microsoft Edge treats PDF files as downloads and lets users open them with the default application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5602">如果 Microsoft Edge 是默认的 PDF 阅读器，则不下载 PDF 文件，并且将继续在 Microsoft Edge 中打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5602">If Microsoft Edge is the default PDF reader, PDF files aren't downloaded and will continue to open in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5603">如果未配置此策略或将其禁用，则 Microsoft Edge 将打开 PDF 文件（除非用户将其禁用）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5603">If you don't configure this policy or disable it, Microsoft Edge will open PDF files (unless the user disables it).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5604">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5604">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5605">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5605">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5606">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5606">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5607">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5607">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5608">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5608">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5609">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5609">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5610">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5610">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5611">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5611">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5612">GP 唯一名称：AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5612">GP unique name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5613">GP 名称：始终在外部打开 PDF 文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5613">GP name: Always open PDF files externally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5614">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5614">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5615">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5615">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5616">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5616">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5617">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5617">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5618">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5618">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5619">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5619">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5620">值名称：AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5620">Value Name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5621">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5621">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5622">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5622">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5623">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5623">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5624">首选项项名称：AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5624">Preference Key Name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5625">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5625">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5626">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5626">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="ambientauthenticationinprivatemodesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5627">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5627">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-ambient-authentication-for-inprivate-and-guest-profiles"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5628">为 InPrivate 和来宾配置文件启用环境身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5628">Enable Ambient Authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5629">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5629">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5630">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 81 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5630">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5631">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5631">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5632">配置此策略以对 Microsoft Edge 中的 InPrivate 和来宾配置文件允许/禁止环境身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5632">Configure this policy to allow/disallow ambient authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5633">环境身份验证是指在未通过 NTLM/Kerberos/协商质询/响应方案提供显式凭据时使用默认凭据进行的 http 身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5633">Ambient Authentication is http authentication with default credentials when explicit credentials aren't provided via NTLM/Kerberos/Negotiate challenge/response schemes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5634">如果将该策略设置为 RegularOnly，则只允许对常规会话进行环境身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5634">If you set the policy to 'RegularOnly', it allows ambient authentication for Regular sessions only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5635">不允许 InPrivate 和来宾会话进行环境身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5635">InPrivate and Guest sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5636">如果将该策略设置为 InPrivateAndRegular，则允许对 InPrivate 和常规会话进行环境身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5636">If you set the policy to 'InPrivateAndRegular', it allows ambient authentication for InPrivate and Regular sessions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5637">不允许来宾会话进行环境身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5637">Guest sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5638">如果将该策略设置为 GuestAndRegular，则允许对来宾和常规会话进行环境身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5638">If you set the policy to 'GuestAndRegular', it allows ambient authentication for Guest and Regular sessions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5639">不允许 InPrivate 会话进行环境身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5639">InPrivate sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5640">如果将该策略设置为 'All'，则允许对所有会话进行环境身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5640">If you set the policy to 'All', it allows ambient authentication for all sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5641">请注意，始终允许对常规配置文件进行环境身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5641">Note that ambient authentication is always allowed on regular profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5642">在 Microsoft Edge 81 及更高版本中，如果未设置该策略，则仅对常规会话启用环境身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5642">In Microsoft Edge version 81 and later, if the policy is left not set, ambient authentication will be enabled in regular sessions only.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5643">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5643">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5644">RegularOnly (0) = 仅在常规会话中启用环境身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5644">RegularOnly (0) = Enable ambient authentication in regular sessions only</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5645">InPrivateAndRegular (1) = 在 InPrivate 和常规会话中启用环境身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5645">InPrivateAndRegular (1) = Enable ambient authentication in InPrivate and regular sessions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5646">GuestAndRegular (2) = 在来宾和常规会话中启用环境身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5646">GuestAndRegular (2) = Enable ambient authentication in guest and regular sessions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5647">All (3) = 在常规、InPrivate 和来宾会话中启用环境身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5647">All (3) = Enable ambient authentication in regular, InPrivate and guest sessions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5648">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5648">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5649">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5649">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5650">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5650">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5651">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5651">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5652">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5652">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5653">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5653">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5654">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5654">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5655">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5655">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5656">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5656">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5657">GP 唯一名称：AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5657">GP unique name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5658">GP 名称：为 InPrivate 和来宾配置文件启用环境身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5658">GP name: Enable Ambient Authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5659">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5659">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5660">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5660">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5661">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5661">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5662">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5662">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5663">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5663">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5664">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5664">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5665">值名称：AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5665">Value Name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5666">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5666">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5667">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5667">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5668">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5668">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5669">首选项项名称：AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5669">Preference Key Name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5670">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5670">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5671">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5671">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="appcacheforceenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5672">AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5672">AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allows-the-appcache-feature-to-be-re-enabled-even-if-its-turned-off-by-default"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5673">允许重新启用 AppCache 功能，即使因默认方式于关闭状态</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5673">Allows the AppCache feature to be re-enabled, even if it's turned off by default</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5674">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5674">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5675">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 84 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5675">On Windows and macOS since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5676">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5676">Description</span></span>
