  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5677">如果将此策略设置为 true，将启用 AppCache，即使 Microsoft Edge 中的 AppCache 默认情况下不可用也是如此。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5677">If you set this policy to true, the AppCache is enabled, even when AppCache in Microsoft Edge is not available by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5678">如果将此策略设置为 false 或不对其进行设置，AppCache 将遵循 Microsoft Edge 的默认设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5678">If you set this policy to false, or don't set it, AppCache will follow Microsoft Edge's defaults.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5679">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5679">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5680">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5680">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5681">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5681">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5682">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5682">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5683">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5683">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5684">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5684">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5685">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5685">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5686">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5686">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5687">GP 唯一名称： AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5687">GP unique name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5688">GP 名称：允许重新启用 AppCache 功能，即使它在默认情况下处于关闭状态</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5688">GP name: Allows the AppCache feature to be re-enabled, even if it's turned off by default</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5689">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5689">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5690">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5690">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5691">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5691">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5692">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5692">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5693">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5693">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5694">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5694">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5695">值名称： AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5695">Value Name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5696">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5696">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5697">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5697">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5698">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5698">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5699">首选参数名称： AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5699">Preference Key Name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5700">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5700">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5701">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5701">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="applicationlocalevalue"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5702">ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5702">ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-application-locale"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5703">设置应用程序区域设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5703">Set application locale</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5704">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5704">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5705">在 Windows 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5705">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5706">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5706">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5707">在 Microsoft Edge 中配置应用程序区域设置并阻止用户更改区域设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5707">Configures the application locale in Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing the locale.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5708">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将使用指定的区域设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5708">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the specified locale.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5709">如果配置的区域设置不受支持，则使用“en-US”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5709">If the configured locale isn't supported, 'en-US' is used instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5710">如果禁用或未配置此设置，Microsoft Edge 将使用用户指定的首选区域设置（如果已配置）或回退区域设置“en-US”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5710">If you disable or don't configure this setting, Microsoft Edge uses either the user-specified preferred locale (if configured) or the fallback locale 'en-US'.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5711">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5711">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5712">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5712">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5713">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5713">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5714">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5714">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5715">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5715">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5716">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5716">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5717">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5717">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5718">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5718">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5719">GP 唯一名称：ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5719">GP unique name: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5720">GP 名称：设置应用程序区域设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5720">GP name: Set application locale</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5721">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5721">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5722">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5722">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5723">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5723">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5724">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5724">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5725">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5725">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5726">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5726">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5727">值名称：ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5727">Value Name: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5728">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5728">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5729">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5729">Example value:</span></span>

```
"en"
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5730">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5730">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="audiocaptureallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5731">AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5731">AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-or-block-audio-capture"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5732">允许或阻止音频捕获</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5732">Allow or block audio capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5733">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5733">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5734">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5734">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5735">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5735">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5736">允许你设置是否提示用户授予网站对其音频捕获设备的访问权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5736">Allows you to set whether a user is prompted to grant a website access to their audio capture device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5737">此策略适用于除 [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) 列表中配置的 URL 之外的所有 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5737">This policy applies to all URLs except for those configured in the [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5738">如果启用或未配置此策略（默认设置），则系统会提示用户授予音频捕获访问权限，[AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) 列表中的 URL 除外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5738">If you enable this policy or don't configure it (the default setting), the user is prompted for audio capture access except from the URLs in the [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5739">将在不提示的情况下向列出的这些 URL 授予访问权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5739">These listed URLs are granted access without prompting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5740">如果禁用此策略，则系统不会提示用户，并且只有 [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) 中配置的 URL 能够访问音频捕获。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5740">If you disable this policy, the user is not prompted, and audio capture is accessible only to the URLs configured in [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5741">此策略影响所有类型的音频输入，而不仅仅是内置麦克风。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5741">This policy affects all types of audio inputs, not only the built-in microphone.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5742">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5742">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5743">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5743">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5744">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5744">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5745">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5745">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5746">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5746">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5747">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5747">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5748">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5748">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5749">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5749">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5750">GP 唯一名称：AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5750">GP unique name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5751">GP 名称：允许或阻止音频捕获</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5751">GP name: Allow or block audio capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5752">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5752">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5753">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5753">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5754">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5754">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5755">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5755">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5756">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5756">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5757">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5757">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5758">值名称：AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5758">Value Name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5759">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5759">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5760">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5760">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5761">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5761">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5762">首选项项名称：AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5762">Preference Key Name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5763">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5763">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5764">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5764">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="audiocaptureallowedurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5765">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5765">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="sites-that-can-access-audio-capture-devices-without-requesting-permission"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5766">无需请求许可即可访问音频捕获设备的网站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5766">Sites that can access audio capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5767">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5767">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5768">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5768">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5769">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5769">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5770">根据 URL 模式指定无需请求用户许可即可使用音频捕获设备的网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5770">Specify websites, based on URL patterns, that can use audio capture devices without asking the user for permission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5771">此列表中的模式将与请求 URL 的安全源进行匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5771">Patterns in this list are matched against the security origin of the requesting URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5772">如果二者相符，则自动向网站授予对音频捕获设备的访问权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5772">If they match, the site is automatically granted access to audio capture devices.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5773">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5773">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5774">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5774">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5775">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5775">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5776">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5776">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5777">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5777">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5778">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5778">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5779">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5779">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5780">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5780">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5781">GP 唯一名称：AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5781">GP unique name: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5782">GP 名称：无需请求许可即可访问音频捕获设备的网站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5782">GP name: Sites that can access audio capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5783">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5783">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5784">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5784">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5785">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5785">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5786">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5786">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5787">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5787">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5788">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5788">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5789">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5789">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5790">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5790">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5791">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5791">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls\2 = "https://[*.]contoso.edu/"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5792">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5792">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5793">首选项项名称：AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5793">Preference Key Name: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5794">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5794">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>https://[*.]contoso.edu/</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5795">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5795">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="audiosandboxenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5796">AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5796">AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-the-audio-sandbox-to-run"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5797">允许运行音频沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5797">Allow the audio sandbox to run</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5798">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5798">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5799">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 81 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5799">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5800">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5800">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5801">此策略控制音频进程沙盒。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5801">This policy controls the audio process sandbox.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5802">如果启用此策略，则音频进程运行时将通过沙盒进行屏蔽。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5802">If you enable this policy, the audio process will run sandboxed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5803">如果禁用此策略，则音频进程运行时不通过沙盒进行屏蔽，WebRTC 音频处理模块将在呈现器进程中运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5803">If you disable this policy, the audio process will run unsandboxed and the WebRTC audio-processing module will run in the renderer process.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5804">这样，用户将面临与运行音频子系统时不通过沙盒进行屏蔽相关的安全风险。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5804">This leaves users open to security risks related to running the audio subsystem unsandboxed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5805">如果未配置此策略，则将使用音频沙盒的默认配置，这可能因平台而异。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5805">If you don't configure this policy, the default configuration for the audio sandbox will be used, which might differ based on the platform.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5806">此策略旨在让企业在使用干扰沙盒的安全软件设置时可以灵活地禁用音频沙盒。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5806">This policy is intended to give enterprises flexibility to disable the audio sandbox if they use security software setups that interfere with the sandbox.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5807">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5807">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5808">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5808">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5809">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5809">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5810">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5810">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5811">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5811">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5812">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5812">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5813">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5813">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5814">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5814">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5815">GP 唯一名称：AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5815">GP unique name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5816">GP 名称：允许运行音频沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5816">GP name: Allow the audio sandbox to run</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5817">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5817">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5818">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5818">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5819">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5819">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5820">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5820">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5821">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5821">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5822">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5822">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5823">值名称：AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5823">Value Name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5824">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5824">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5825">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5825">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5826">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5826">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5827">首选项项名称：AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5827">Preference Key Name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5828">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5828">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5829">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5829">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autoimportatfirstrun"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5830">AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5830">AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>

  #### <a name="automatically-import-another-browsers-data-and-settings-at-first-run"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5831">首次运行时自动导入另一个浏览器的数据和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5831">Automatically import another browser's data and settings at first run</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5832">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5832">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5833">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5833">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5834">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5834">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5835">如果启用此策略，则指定浏览器中所有支持的数据类型和设置将在首次运行时以静默方式自动导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5835">If you enable this policy, all supported datatypes and settings from the specified browser will be silently and automatically imported at first run.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5836">在首次运行体验期间，也将跳过导入部分。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5836">During the First Run Experience, the import section will also be skipped.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5837">无论此策略的值如何，Microsoft Edge 旧版中的浏览器数据将始终在首次运行时以静默方式迁移。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5837">The browser data from Microsoft Edge Legacy will always be silently migrated at the first run, irrespective of the value of this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5838">如果此策略设置为 'FromDefaultBrowser'，则将导入与受管理设备上的默认浏览器对应的数据类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5838">If this policy is set to 'FromDefaultBrowser', then the datatypes corresponding to the default browser on the managed device will be imported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5839">如果受管理设备中不存在指定为此策略值的浏览器，Microsoft Edge 将直接跳过导入，而不会向用户发出任何通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5839">If the browser specified as the value of this policy is not present in the managed device, Microsoft Edge will simply skip the import without any notification to the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5840">如果将此策略设置为“DisabledAutoImport”，则将完全跳过首次运行体验的导入部分，Microsoft Edge 不会自动导入浏览器数据和设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5840">If you set this policy to 'DisabledAutoImport', the import section of the first-run experience is skipped entirely and Microsoft Edge doesn't import browser data and settings automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5841">如果此策略设置为 'FromInternetExplorer' 的值，则将从 Internet Explorer 导入以下数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5841">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromInternetExplorer', the following datatypes will be imported from Internet Explorer:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5842">收藏夹或书签</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5842">Favorites or bookmarks</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5843">保存的密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5843">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5844">搜索引擎</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5844">Search engines</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5845">浏览历史记录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5845">Browsing history</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5846">主页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5846">Home page</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5847">如果此策略设置为 'FromGoogleChrome' 的值，则将从 Google Chrome 导入以下数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5847">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromGoogleChrome', the following datatypes will be imported from Google Chrome:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5848">收藏夹</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5848">Favorites</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5849">保存的密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5849">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5850">地址等</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5850">Addresses and more</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5851">付款信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5851">Payment info</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5852">浏览历史记录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5852">Browsing history</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5853">“设置”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5853">Settings</span></span>
7. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5854">已固定和打开的选项卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5854">Pinned and Open tabs</span></span>
8. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5855">Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5855">Extensions</span></span>
9. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5856">Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5856">Cookies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5857">注意：有关从 Google Chrome 导入的内容的更多详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5857">Note: For more details on what is imported from Google Chrome, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5858">如果该策略设置 'FromSafari' 的值，则不再将用户数据导入 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5858">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromSafari', user data is no longer imported into Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5859">这是由于 Mac 上的完全磁盘访问工作方式造成的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5859">This is due to the way Full Disk Access works on Mac.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5860">在 macOS Mojave 及更高版本上，再也不可能自动将 Safari 数据导入到 Microsoft Edge 中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5860">On macOS Mojave and above, it's no longer possible to have automated and unattended import of Safari data into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5861">从 Microsoft Edge 83 版开始，如果此策略设置为 'FromMozillaFirefox' 的值，则将从 Mozilla Firefox 导入以下数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5861">Starting with Microsoft Edge version 83, if this policy is set to the value of 'FromMozillaFirefox', the following datatypes will be imported from Mozilla Firefox:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5862">收藏夹或书签</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5862">Favorites or bookmarks</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5863">保存的密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5863">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5864">地址等</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5864">Addresses and more</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5865">浏览历史记录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5865">Browsing History</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5866">如果要限制特定数据类型在受管理设备上导入，可以将此策略与其他策略搭配使用，例如 [ImportAutofillFormData](#importautofillformdata)、[ImportBrowserSettings](#importbrowsersettings)、[ImportFavorites](#importfavorites) 等。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5866">If you want to restrict specific datatypes from getting imported on the managed devices, you can use this policy with other policies such as [ImportAutofillFormData](#importautofillformdata), [ImportBrowserSettings](#importbrowsersettings), [ImportFavorites](#importfavorites), and etc.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5867">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5867">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5868">FromDefaultBrowser (0) = 自动从默认浏览器导入所有支持的数据类型和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5868">FromDefaultBrowser (0) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from the default browser</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5869">FromInternetExplorer (1) = 自动从 Internet Explorer 导入所有支持的数据类型和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5869">FromInternetExplorer (1) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Internet Explorer</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5870">FromGoogleChrome (2) = 自动从 Google Chrome 导入所有支持的数据类型和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5870">FromGoogleChrome (2) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Google Chrome</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5871">FromSafari (3) = 自动从 Safari 导入所有支持的数据类型和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5871">FromSafari (3) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Safari</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5872">DisabledAutoImport (4) = 禁用自动导入，并跳过首次运行体验的导入部分</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5872">DisabledAutoImport (4) = Disables automatic import, and the import section of the first-run experience is skipped</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5873">FromMozillaFirefox (5) = 自动从 Mozilla Firefox 导入所有支持的数据类型和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5873">FromMozillaFirefox (5) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Mozilla Firefox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5874">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5874">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5875">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5875">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5876">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5876">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5877">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5877">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5878">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5878">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5879">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5879">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5880">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5880">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5881">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5881">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5882">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5882">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5883">GP 唯一名称：AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5883">GP unique name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5884">GP 名称：首次运行时自动导入另一个浏览器的数据和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5884">GP name: Automatically import another browser's data and settings at first run</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5885">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5885">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5886">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5886">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5887">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5887">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5888">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5888">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5889">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5889">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5890">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5890">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5891">值名称：AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5891">Value Name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5892">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5892">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5893">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5893">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5894">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5894">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5895">首选项项名称：AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5895">Preference Key Name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5896">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5896">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5897">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5897">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autolaunchprotocolsfromorigins"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5898">AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5898">AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>

  #### <a name="define-a-list-of-protocols-that-can-launch-an-external-application-from-listed-origins-without-prompting-the-user"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5899">定义可以从列出的源启动外部应用程序而不提示用户的协议列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5899">Define a list of protocols that can launch an external application from listed origins without prompting the user</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5900">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5900">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5901">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 85 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5901">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5902">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5902">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5903">允许你设置协议列表，并为每个协议设置允许的原始模式的关联列表，这样可以启动外部应用程序而不提示用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5903">Allows you to set a list of protocols, and for each protocol an associated list of allowed origin patterns, that can launch an external application without prompting the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5904">列表协议时，不应包括尾部分隔符。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5904">The trailing separator should not be included when listing the protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5905">例如，列出 "skype"，而不是"skype:"或 "skype://"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5905">For example, list "skype" instead of "skype:" or "skype://".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5906">如果配置了此策略，仅允许在未通过策略提示的情况下启动外部应用程序的协议，如：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5906">If you configure this policy, a protocol will only be permitted to launch an external application without prompting by policy if:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5907">已列出该协议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5907">the protocol is listed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5908">试图启动协议的站点的源匹配该协议的 allowed_origins 列表中的一个源模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5908">the origin of the site trying to launch the protocol matches one of the origin patterns in that protocol's allowed_origins list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5909">如果任一条件为 false，则策略将不会忽略外部协议启动提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5909">If either condition is false, the external protocol launch prompt will not be omitted by policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5910">如果未配置此策略，则无需提示即可启动任何协议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5910">If you don't configure this policy, no protocols can launch without a prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5911">除非[ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox](#externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox)策略被设置为禁用，否则用户可以根据每个协议/每个站点选择退出提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5911">Users can opt out of prompts on a per-protocol/per-site basis unless the [ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox](#externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox) policy is set to Disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5912">此策略对用户设置的每个协议/每个站点的提示豁免没有影响。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5912">This policy has no impact on per-protocol/per-site prompt exemptions set by users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5913">来源匹配模式使用与[URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist)策略类似的格式，这些格式被记录在[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5913">The origin matching patterns use a similar format to those for the [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) policy, which are documented at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5914">但是，此策略的原始匹配模式不能包含"/path" 或 "@query"元素。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5914">However, origin matching patterns for this policy cannot contain "/path" or "@query" elements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5915">包含"/path" 或 "@query"元素的任何模式都将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5915">Any pattern that does contain a "/path" or "@query" element will be ignored.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5916">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5916">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5917">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5917">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5918">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5918">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5919">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5919">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5920">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5920">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5921">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5921">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5922">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5922">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5923">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5923">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5924">GP 唯一名称： AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5924">GP unique name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5925">GP 名称：定义可从列出的源启动外部应用程序的协议的列表，而无需提示用户</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5925">GP name: Define a list of protocols that can launch an external application from listed origins without prompting the user</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5926">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5926">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5927">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5927">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5928">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5928">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5929">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5929">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5930">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5930">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5931">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5931">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5932">值名称： AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5932">Value Name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5933">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5933">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5934">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5934">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins = [
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "example.com",
      "http://www.example.com:8080"
    ],
    "protocol": "spotify"
  },
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "https://example.com",
      "https://.mail.example.com"
    ], 
    "protocol": "msteams"
  }, 
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "*"
    ], 
    "protocol": "msoutlook"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5935">精简示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5935">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins = [{"allowed_origins": ["example.com", "http://www.example.com:8080"], "protocol": "spotify"}, {"allowed_origins": ["https://example.com", "https://.mail.example.com"], "protocol": "msteams"}, {"allowed_origins": ["*"], "protocol": "msoutlook"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5936">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5936">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5937">首选参数名称： AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5937">Preference Key Name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5938">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5938">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>example.com</string>
      <string>http://www.example.com:8080</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>spotify</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://example.com</string>
      <string>https://.mail.example.com</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>teams</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>*</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>outlook</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5939">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5939">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autoopenallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5940">AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5940">AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>

  #### <a name="urls-where-autoopenfiletypes-can-apply"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5941">AutoOpenFileTypes 可应用的 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5941">URLs where AutoOpenFileTypes can apply</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5942">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5942">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5943">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 85 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5943">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5944">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5944">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5945">[AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes)将应用到的 URL 的列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5945">A list of URLs to which [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) will apply to.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5946">该策略对用户通过下载架... > “总是打开这种类型的文件”菜单项自动打开的值没有影响。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5946">This policy has no impact on automatically open values set by users via the download shelf ... > "Always open files of this type" menu entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5947">如果在此策略中设置URL，则只有在URL是此策略的一部分并且文件类型在[AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes)中列出时，策略才会自动打开文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5947">If you set URLs in this policy, files will only automatically open by policy if the URL is part of this set and the file type is listed in [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5948">如果任一条件为 false，则下载不会通过策略自动打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5948">If either condition is false, the download won't automatically open by policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5949">如果未设置此策略，则所有文件类型均位于[AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes)中的下载将自动打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5949">If you don't set this policy, all downloads where the file type is in [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) will automatically open.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5950">URL 模式必须按[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)进行格式设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5950">A URL pattern has to be formatted according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5951">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5951">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5952">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5952">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5953">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5953">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5954">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5954">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5955">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5955">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5956">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5956">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5957">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5957">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5958">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5958">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5959">GP 唯一名称： AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5959">GP unique name: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5960">GP 名称： AutoOpenFileTypes 可应用的 Url</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5960">GP name: URLs where AutoOpenFileTypes can apply</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5961">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5961">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5962">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5962">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5963">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5963">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5964">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5964">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5965">路径(强制) :SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5965">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5966">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5966">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5967">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5967">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5968">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5968">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5969">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5969">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\1 = "example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\3 = "hosting.com/good_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5970">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5970">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5971">首选参数名称： AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5971">Preference Key Name: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5972">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5972">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>example.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/good_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5973">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5973">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autoopenfiletypes"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5974">AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5974">AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>

  #### <a name="list-of-file-types-that-should-be-automatically-opened-on-download"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5975">在下载中应该自动打开的文件类型列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5975">List of file types that should be automatically opened on download</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5976">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5976">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5977">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 85 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5977">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5978">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5978">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5979">此策略设置一个文件类型列表，这些文件类型应该在下载时自动打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5979">This policy sets a list of file types that should be automatically opened on download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5980">注意：在列出文件类型时，不应该包括前导分隔符，所以用 "txt" 代替".txt"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5980">Note: The leading separator should not be included when listing the file type, so list "txt" instead of ".txt".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5981">默认情况下，这些文件类型将自动在所有 Url 上打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5981">By default, these file types will be automatically opened on all URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5982">您可以使用[AutoOpenAllowedForURLs](#autoopenallowedforurls)策略来限制将自动打开这些文件类型的URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5982">You can use the [AutoOpenAllowedForURLs](#autoopenallowedforurls) policy to restrict the URLs for which these file types will be automatically opened on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5983">那些应该被自动打开的文件类型仍然会受制于启用的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 检查，如果检查失败就不会被打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5983">Files with types that should be automatically opened will still be subject to the enabled Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks and won't be opened if they fail those checks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5984">用户已经指定自动打开的文件类型将在下载时继续打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5984">File types that a user has already specified to automatically be opened will continue to do so when downloaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5985">用户将继续能够指定自动打开的其他文件类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5985">The user will continue to be able to specify other file types to be automatically opened.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5986">如果没有设置此策略，则只有用户已经指定为自动打开的文件类型才会在下载时自动打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5986">If you don't set this policy, only file types that a user has already specified to automatically be opened will do so when downloaded.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5987">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5987">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5988">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5988">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5989">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5989">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5990">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5990">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5991">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5991">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5992">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5992">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5993">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5993">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5994">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5994">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5995">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5995">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5996">GP 唯一名称： AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5996">GP unique name: AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5997">GP 名称：下载时自动打开的文件类型列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5997">GP name: List of file types that should be automatically opened on download</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5998">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5998">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-5999">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-5999">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6000">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6000">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6001">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6001">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6002">路径(强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6002">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6003">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6003">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6004">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6004">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6005">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6005">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6006">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6006">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes\1 = "exe"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes\2 = "txt"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6007">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6007">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6008">首选项名称： AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6008">Preference Key Name: AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6009">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6009">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>exe</string>
  <string>txt</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6010">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6010">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autofilladdressenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6011">AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6011">AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-autofill-for-addresses"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6012">启用地址自动填充</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6012">Enable AutoFill for addresses</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6013">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6013">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6014">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6014">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6015">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6015">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6016">启用自动填充功能，让用户能够使用以前存储的信息自动填写 Web 表单中的地址信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6016">Enables the AutoFill feature and allows users to auto-complete address information in web forms using previously stored information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6017">如果禁用此策略，自动填充不会建议或填写地址信息，也不会保存用户在浏览 Web 时可能提交的其他地址信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6017">If you disable this policy, AutoFill never suggests or fills in address information, nor does it save additional address information that the user might submit while browsing the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6018">如果启用或未配置此策略，用户可以在用户界面中控制地址的自动填充。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6018">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can control AutoFill for addresses in the user interface.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6019">请注意，如果禁用此策略，则还会停止所有 Web 表单（付款和密码表单除外）的所有活动。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6019">Note that if you disable this policy you also stop all activity for all web forms, except payment and password forms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6020">不会保存任何其他条目，并且 Microsoft Edge 不会建议或自动填充任何以前的条目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6020">No further entries are saved, and Microsoft Edge won't suggest or AutoFill any previous entries.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6021">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6021">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6022">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6022">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6023">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6023">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6024">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6024">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6025">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6025">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6026">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6026">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6027">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6027">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6028">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6028">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6029">GP 唯一名称：AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6029">GP unique name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6030">GP 名称：启用地址自动填充</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6030">GP name: Enable AutoFill for addresses</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6031">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6031">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6032">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6032">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6033">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6033">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6034">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6034">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6035">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6035">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6036">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6036">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6037">值名称：AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6037">Value Name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6038">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6038">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6039">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6039">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6040">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6040">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6041">首选项项名称：AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6041">Preference Key Name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6042">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6042">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6043">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6043">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autofillcreditcardenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6044">AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6044">AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-autofill-for-credit-cards"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6045">启用信用卡自动填充</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6045">Enable AutoFill for credit cards</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6046">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6046">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6047">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6047">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6048">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6048">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6049">启用 Microsoft Edge 的自动填充功能，让用户能够使用以前存储的信息自动填写 Web 表单中的信用卡信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6049">Enables Microsoft Edge's AutoFill feature and lets users auto complete credit card information in web forms using previously stored information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6050">如果禁用此策略，则自动填充从不建议或填写信用卡信息，也不会保存用户在浏览 Web 时可能提交的其他信用卡信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6050">If you disable this policy, AutoFill never suggests or fills credit card information, nor will it save additional credit card information that users might submit while browsing the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6051">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以控制信用卡的自动填充。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6051">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can control AutoFill for credit cards.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6052">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6052">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6053">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6053">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6054">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6054">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6055">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6055">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6056">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6056">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6057">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6057">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6058">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6058">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6059">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6059">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6060">GP 唯一名称：AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6060">GP unique name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6061">GP 名称：启用信用卡自动填充</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6061">GP name: Enable AutoFill for credit cards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6062">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6062">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6063">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6063">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6064">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6064">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6065">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6065">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6066">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6066">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6067">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6067">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6068">值名称：AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6068">Value Name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6069">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6069">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6070">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6070">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6071">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6071">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6072">首选项项名称：AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6072">Preference Key Name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
