  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6073">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6073">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6074">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6074">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="automatichttpsdefault"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6075">AutomaticHttpsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6075">AutomaticHttpsDefault</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-automatic-https"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6076">配置自动 HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6076">Configure Automatic HTTPS</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6077">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6077">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6078">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 92 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6078">On Windows and macOS since 92 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6079">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6079">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6080">此策略允许你管理 [AutomaticHttpsDefault](#automatichttpsdefault)的设置，这会将连接从 HTTP 切换到 HTTPS。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6080">This policy lets you manage settings for [AutomaticHttpsDefault](#automatichttpsdefault), which switches connections from HTTP to HTTPS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6081">此功能通过强制执行更安全的连接来帮助抵御中间人攻击，但用户可能会遇到更多连接错误。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6081">This feature helps protect against man-in-the-middle attacks by enforcing more secure connections, but users might experience more connection errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6082">注意："UpgradeCapableDomains"配置需要组件列表，如果 [ComponentUpdatesEnabled](#componentupdatesenabled) 设置为"Disabled"，将不会升级这些连接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6082">Note: The 'UpgradeCapableDomains' configuration requires a component list, and will not upgrade these connections if [ComponentUpdatesEnabled](#componentupdatesenabled) is set to 'Disabled'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6083">如果未配置此策略，将启用 [AutomaticHttpsDefault，](#automatichttpsdefault) 并且仅升级可能支持 HTTPS 的域上的连接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6083">If you don't configure this policy, [AutomaticHttpsDefault](#automatichttpsdefault) will be enabled, and will only upgrade connections on domains likely to support HTTPS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6084">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6084">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6085">DisableAutomaticHttps (0) = 自动 HTTPS 功能已禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6085">DisableAutomaticHttps (0) = Automatic HTTPS functionality is disabled.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6086">UpgradeCapableDomains (1) = 通过 HTTP 传递的导航将切换到 HTTPS，仅在可能支持 HTTPS 的域上。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6086">UpgradeCapableDomains (1) = Navigations delivered over HTTP are switched to HTTPS, only on domains likely to support HTTPS.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6087">AlwaysUpgrade (2) = 所有通过 HTTP 传递的导航都切换到 HTTPS。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6087">AlwaysUpgrade (2) = All navigations delivered over HTTP are switched to HTTPS.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6088">连接错误可能更常发生。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6088">Connection errors might occur more often.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6089">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6089">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6090">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6090">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6091">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6091">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6092">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6092">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6093">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6093">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6094">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6094">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6095">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6095">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6096">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6096">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6097">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6097">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6098">GP 唯一名称：AutomaticHttpsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6098">GP unique name: AutomaticHttpsDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6099">GP 名称：配置自动 HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6099">GP name: Configure Automatic HTTPS</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6100">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6100">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6101">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6101">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6102">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6102">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6103">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6103">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6104">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6104">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6105">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6105">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6106">值名称：AutomaticHttpsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6106">Value Name: AutomaticHttpsDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6107">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6107">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6108">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6108">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6109">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6109">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6110">首选项项名称：AutomaticHttpsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6110">Preference Key Name: AutomaticHttpsDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6111">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6111">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6112">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6112">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autoplayallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6113">AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6113">AutoplayAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-media-autoplay-for-websites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6114">允许网站媒体自动播放</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6114">Allow media autoplay for websites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6115">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6115">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6116">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6116">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6117">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6117">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6118">此策略设置网站的媒体自动播放策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6118">This policy sets the media autoplay policy for websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6119">默认设置“未配置”遵循当前媒体自动播放设置，并允许用户配置其自动播放设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6119">The default setting, "Not configured" respects the current media autoplay settings and lets users configure their autoplay settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6120">设置为“已启用”会将媒体自动播放设置为“允许”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6120">Setting to "Enabled" sets media autoplay to "Allow".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6121">允许所有网站自动播放媒体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6121">All websites are allowed to autoplay media.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6122">用户不能替代此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6122">Users can't override this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6123">设置为“已禁用”会将媒体自动播放设置为“阻止”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6123">Setting to "Disabled" sets media autoplay to "Block".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6124">不允许任何网站自动播放媒体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6124">No websites are allowed to autoplay media.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6125">用户不能替代此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6125">Users can't override this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6126">需要关闭并重新打开一个选项卡，此策略才会生效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6126">A tab will need to be closed and re-opened for this policy to take effect.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6127">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6127">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6128">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6128">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6129">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6129">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6130">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6130">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6131">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6131">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6132">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6132">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6133">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6133">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6134">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6134">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6135">GP 唯一名称：AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6135">GP unique name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6136">GP 名称：允许网站媒体自动播放</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6136">GP name: Allow media autoplay for websites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6137">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6137">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6138">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6138">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6139">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6139">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6140">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6140">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6141">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6141">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6142">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6142">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6143">值名称：AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6143">Value Name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6144">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6144">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6145">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6145">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6146">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6146">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6147">首选项项名称：AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6147">Preference Key Name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6148">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6148">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6149">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6149">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="backgroundmodeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6150">BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6150">BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="continue-running-background-apps-after-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6151">Microsoft Edge 关闭后继续运行后台应用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6151">Continue running background apps after Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6152">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6152">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6153">在 Windows 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6153">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6154">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6154">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6155">允许 Microsoft Edge 进程在操作系统登录时启动，并在最后一个浏览器窗口关闭后继续运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6155">Allows Microsoft Edge processes to start at OS sign-in and keep running after the last browser window is closed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6156">在这种情况下，后台应用和当前浏览会话将保持活动状态，包括任何会话 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6156">In this scenario, background apps and the current browsing session remain active, including any session cookies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6157">打开的后台进程会在系统托盘中显示一个图标，并且始终可以从该处关闭。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6157">An open background process displays an icon in the system tray and can always be closed from there.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6158">如果启用此策略，后台模式将打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6158">If you enable this policy, background mode is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6159">如果禁用此策略，后台模式将关闭。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6159">If you disable this policy, background mode is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6160">如果未配置此策略，则后台模式最初将关闭，用户可以在 edge://settings/system 中配置其行为。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6160">If you don't configure this policy, background mode is initially turned off, and the user can configure its behavior in edge://settings/system.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6161">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6161">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6162">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6162">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6163">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6163">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6164">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6164">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6165">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6165">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6166">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6166">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6167">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6167">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6168">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6168">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6169">GP 唯一名称：BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6169">GP unique name: BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6170">GP 名称：Microsoft Edge 关闭后继续运行后台应用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6170">GP name: Continue running background apps after Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6171">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6171">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6172">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6172">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6173">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6173">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6174">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6174">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6175">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6175">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6176">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6176">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6177">值名称：BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6177">Value Name: BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6178">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6178">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6179">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6179">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6180">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6180">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="backgroundtemplatelistupdatesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6181">BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6181">BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enables-background-updates-to-the-list-of-available-templates-for-collections-and-other-features-that-use-templates"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6182">对“集锦”和使用模板的其他功能启用可用模板列表后台更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6182">Enables background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6183">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6183">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6184">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 79 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6184">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6185">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6185">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6186">允许你对“集锦”和使用模板的其他功能启用或禁用可用模板列表后台更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6186">Lets you enable or disable background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6187">当页面保存到某个集锦时，可使用模板从网页中提取丰富的元数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6187">Templates are used to extract rich metadata from a webpage when the page is saved to a collection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6188">如果启用或未配置该设置，则将每隔 24 小时在后台从 Microsoft 服务下载可用模板列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6188">If you enable this setting or the setting is unconfigured, the list of available templates will be downloaded in the background from a Microsoft service every 24 hours.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6189">如果禁用此设置，则将按需下载可用模板列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6189">If you disable this setting the list of available templates will be downloaded on demand.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6190">此类下载可能会对“集锦”和其他功能造成较小的性能损失。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6190">This type of download might result in small performance penalties for Collections and other features.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6191">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6191">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6192">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6192">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6193">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6193">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6194">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6194">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6195">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6195">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6196">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6196">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6197">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6197">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6198">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6198">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6199">GP 唯一名称：BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6199">GP unique name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6200">GP 名称：对“集锦”和使用模板的其他功能启用可用模板列表后台更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6200">GP name: Enables background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6201">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6201">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6202">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6202">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6203">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6203">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6204">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6204">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6205">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6205">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6206">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6206">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6207">值名称：BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6207">Value Name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6208">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6208">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6209">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6209">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6210">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6210">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6211">首选项项名称：BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6211">Preference Key Name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6212">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6212">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6213">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6213">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="bingadssuppression"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6214">BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6214">BingAdsSuppression</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-all-ads-on-bing-search-results"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6215">阻止必应搜索结果中的所有广告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6215">Block all ads on Bing search results</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6216">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6216">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6217">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 83 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6217">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6218">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6218">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6219">在 Bing.com 上启用无广告搜索体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6219">Enables an ad-free search experience on Bing.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6220">如果启用此策略，则用户可以在 bing.com 上搜索并享受无广告搜索体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6220">If you enable this policy, then a user can search on bing.com and have an ad-free search experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6221">同时，安全搜索设置将设置为“严格”，用户无法更改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6221">At the same time, the SafeSearch setting will be set to 'Strict' and can't be changed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6222">如果未配置此策略，则默认体验将在 bing.com 上的搜索结果中显示广告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6222">If you don't configure this policy, then the default experience will have ads in the search results on bing.com.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6223">默认情况下，安全搜索将设置为“中等”，用户可以更改该设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6223">SafeSearch will be set to 'Moderate' by default and can be changed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6224">此策略仅适用于 Microsoft 识别为 EDU 租户的 K-12 SKU。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6224">This policy is only available for K-12 SKUs that are identified as EDU tenants by Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6225">请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711)，了解有关此策略的更多信息或者以下情形是否适用于你：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6225">Please refer to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711) to learn more about this policy or if the following scenarios apply to you:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6226">你有 EDU 租户，但该策略不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6226">You have an EDU tenant, but the policy doesn't work.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6227">你的 IP 因具有无广告搜索体验而被列入允许列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6227">You had your IP allowlisted for having an ad free search experience.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6228">你曾在 Microsoft Edge 旧版上体验了无广告搜索体验，并希望升级到新版本的 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6228">You were experiencing an ad-free search experience on Microsoft Edge Legacy and want to upgrade to the new version of Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6229">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6229">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6230">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6230">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6231">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6231">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6232">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6232">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6233">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6233">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6234">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6234">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6235">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6235">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6236">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6236">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6237">GP 唯一名称：BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6237">GP unique name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6238">GP 名称：阻止必应搜索结果中的所有广告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6238">GP name: Block all ads on Bing search results</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6239">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6239">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6240">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6240">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6241">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6241">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6242">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6242">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6243">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6243">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6244">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6244">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6245">值名称：BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6245">Value Name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6246">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6246">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6247">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6247">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6248">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6248">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6249">首选项项名称：BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6249">Preference Key Name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6250">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6250">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6251">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6251">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="blockthirdpartycookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6252">BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6252">BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-third-party-cookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6253">阻止第三方 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6253">Block third party cookies</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6254">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6254">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6255">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6255">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6256">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6256">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6257">阻止非来自地址栏中域的网页元素设置 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6257">Block web page elements that aren't from the domain that's in the address bar from setting cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6258">如果启用此策略，则非来自地址栏中域的网页元素不能设置 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6258">If you enable this policy, web page elements that are not from the domain that is in the address bar can't set cookies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6259">如果禁用此策略，则来自地址栏以外的其他域的网页元素可以设置 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6259">If you disable this policy, web page elements from domains other than in the address bar can set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6260">如果未配置此策略，则会启用第三方 Cookie，但用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6260">If you don't configure this policy, third-party cookies are enabled but users can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6261">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6261">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6262">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6262">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6263">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6263">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6264">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6264">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6265">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6265">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6266">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6266">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6267">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6267">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6268">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6268">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6269">GP 唯一名称：BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6269">GP unique name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6270">GP 名称：阻止第三方 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6270">GP name: Block third party cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6271">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6271">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6272">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6272">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6273">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6273">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6274">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6274">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6275">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6275">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6276">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6276">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6277">值名称：BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6277">Value Name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6278">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6278">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6279">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6279">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6280">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6280">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6281">首选项项名称：BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6281">Preference Key Name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6282">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6282">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="browseraddprofileenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6284">BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6284">BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-profile-creation-from-the-identity-flyout-menu-or-the-settings-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6285">允许从“标识”浮出控件或“设置”页面创建配置文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6285">Enable profile creation from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6286">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6286">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6287">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6287">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6288">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6288">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6289">允许用户使用“**添加配置文件**”选项创建新的配置文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6289">Allows users to create new profiles, using the **Add profile** option.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6290">如果启用或未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将允许用户使用“标识”浮出菜单或“设置”页面上的“**添加配置文件**”来创建新的配置文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6290">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge allows users to use **Add profile** on the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page to create new profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6291">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法从“标识”浮出菜单或“设置”页面添加新的配置文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6291">If you disable this policy, users cannot add new profiles from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6292">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6292">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6293">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6293">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6294">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6294">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6295">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6295">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6296">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6296">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6297">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6297">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6298">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6298">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6299">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6299">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6300">GP 唯一名称：BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6300">GP unique name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6301">GP 名称：允许从“标识”浮出控件或“设置”页面创建配置文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6301">GP name: Enable profile creation from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6302">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6302">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6303">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6303">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6304">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6304">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6305">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6305">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6306">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6306">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6307">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6307">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6308">值名称：BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6308">Value Name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6309">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6309">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6310">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6310">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6311">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6311">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6312">首选项项名称：BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6312">Preference Key Name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6313">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6313">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6314">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6314">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="browserguestmodeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6315">BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6315">BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-guest-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6316">启用来宾模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6316">Enable guest mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6317">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6317">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6318">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6318">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6319">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6319">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6320">启用该选项以允许在 Microsoft Edge 中使用来宾配置文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6320">Enable the option to allow the use of guest profiles in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6321">在来宾配置文件中，浏览器不会从现有配置文件导入浏览数据，并且在所有来宾配置文件关闭时将删除浏览数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6321">In a guest profile, the browser doesn't import browsing data from existing profiles, and it deletes browsing data when all guest profiles are closed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6322">如果启用或未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将允许用户在来宾配置文件中浏览。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6322">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge lets users browse in guest profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6323">如果禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将不允许用户在来宾配置文件中浏览。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6323">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge doesn't let users browse in guest profiles.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6324">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6324">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6325">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6325">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6326">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6326">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6327">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6327">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6328">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6328">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6329">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6329">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6330">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6330">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6331">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6331">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6332">GP 唯一名称：BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6332">GP unique name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6333">GP 名称：启用来宾模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6333">GP name: Enable guest mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6334">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6334">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6335">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6335">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6336">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6336">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6337">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6337">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6338">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6338">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6339">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6339">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6340">值名称：BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6340">Value Name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6341">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6341">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6342">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6342">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6343">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6343">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6344">首选项项名称：BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6344">Preference Key Name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6345">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6345">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6346">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6346">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="browsernetworktimequeriesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6347">BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6347">BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-queries-to-a-browser-network-time-service"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6348">允许向浏览器网络时间服务发送查询</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6348">Allow queries to a Browser Network Time service</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6349">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6349">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6350">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6350">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6351">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6351">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6352">阻止 Microsoft Edge 偶尔向浏览器网络时间服务发送查询以检索准确的时间戳。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6352">Prevents Microsoft Edge from occasionally sending queries to a browser network time service to retrieve an accurate timestamp.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6353">如果禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将停止向浏览器网络时间服务发送查询。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6353">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will stop sending queries to a browser network time service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6354">如果启用或未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将偶尔向浏览器网络时间服务发送查询。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6354">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will occasionally send queries to a browser network time service.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6355">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6355">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6356">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6356">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6357">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6357">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6358">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6358">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6359">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6359">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6360">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6360">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6361">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6361">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6362">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6362">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6363">GP 唯一名称：BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6363">GP unique name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6364">GP 名称：允许向浏览器网络时间服务发送查询</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6364">GP name: Allow queries to a Browser Network Time service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6365">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6365">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6366">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6366">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6367">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6367">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6368">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6368">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6369">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6369">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6370">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6370">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6371">值名称：BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6371">Value Name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6372">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6372">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6373">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6373">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6374">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6374">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6375">首选项项名称：BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6375">Preference Key Name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6376">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6376">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6377">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6377">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="browsersignin"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6378">BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6378">BrowserSignin</span></span>

  #### <a name="browser-sign-in-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6379">浏览器登录设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6379">Browser sign-in settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6380">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6380">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6381">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6381">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6382">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6382">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6383">指定用户是否可以使用其帐户登录到 Microsoft Edge 并使用与帐户相关的服务（如同步和单一登录）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6383">Specify whether a user can sign into Microsoft Edge with their account and use account-related services like sync and single sign on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6384">要控制同步的可用性，请改用 [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6384">To control the availability of sync, use the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6385">如果将此策略设置为“禁用”，请确保还将 [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) 策略设置为禁用，因为 [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) 禁止创建自动登录的浏览器配置文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6385">If you set this policy to 'Disable', make sure that you also set the [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) policy to disabled because [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) disables the creation of an automatically signed in browser profile.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6386">如果同时设置了这两个策略，Microsoft Edge 将使用“禁用浏览器登录”策略，其行为将如同 [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) 设置为禁用一样。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6386">If both policies are set, Microsoft Edge will use the 'Disable browser sign-in' policy and behave as if [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) is set to disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6387">如果将此策略设置为“启用”，则用户可以登录到浏览器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6387">If you set this policy to 'Enable', users can sign into the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6388">登录到浏览器并不意味着默认情况下启用同步；用户必须单独选择加入才能使用此功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6388">Signing into the browser doesn't mean that sync is turned on by default; the user must separately opt-in to use this feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6389">如果将此策略设置为 'Force'，用户必须登录到配置文件才能使用浏览器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6389">If you set this policy to 'Force', users must sign into a profile to use the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6390">默认情况下，这将允许用户选择是否要同步到其帐户，除非域管理员已禁用同步或使用了 [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6390">By default, this will allow the user to choose whether they want to sync to their account, unless sync is disabled by the domain admin or with the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6391">[BrowserGuestModeEnabled](#browserguestmodeenabled) 策略的默认值设置为 false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6391">The default value of [BrowserGuestModeEnabled](#browserguestmodeenabled) policy is set to false.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6392">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以决定是否要启用浏览器登录选项并根据需要使用它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6392">If you don't configure this policy users can decide if they want to enable the browser sign-in option and use it as they see fit.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6393">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6393">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6394">Disable (0) = 禁用浏览器登录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6394">Disable (0) = Disable browser sign-in</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6395">Enable (1) = 启用浏览器登录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6395">Enable (1) = Enable browser sign-in</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6396">Force (2) = 强制用户登录以使用浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6396">Force (2) = Force users to sign-in to use the browser</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6397">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6397">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6398">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6398">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6399">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6399">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6400">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6400">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6401">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6401">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6402">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6402">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6403">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6403">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6404">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6404">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6405">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6405">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6406">GP 唯一名称：BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6406">GP unique name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6407">GP 名称：浏览器登录设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6407">GP name: Browser sign-in settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6408">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6408">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6409">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6409">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6410">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6410">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6411">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6411">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6412">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6412">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6413">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6413">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6414">值名称：BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6414">Value Name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6415">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6415">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6416">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6416">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6417">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6417">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6418">首选项项名称：BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6418">Preference Key Name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6419">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6419">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6420">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6420">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="browsingdatalifetime"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6421">BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6421">BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>

  #### <a name="browsing-data-lifetime-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6422">浏览数据生存期设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6422">Browsing Data Lifetime Settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6423">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6423">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6424">自 89 或更高版本起，在 Windows 和 macOS 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6424">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6425">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6425">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6426">配置 Microsoft Edge 的浏览数据生存期设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6426">Configures browsing data lifetime settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6427">此策略控制所选浏览数据的生存期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6427">This policy controls the lifetime of selected browsing data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6428">如果启用了同步，则此策略无效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6428">This policy has no effect if Sync is enabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6429">可用的数据类型是 "browsing_history"、"download_history"、"cookies_and_other_site_data"、"cached_images_and_files"、"password_signin"、"autofill"、"site_settings" 和 "hosted_app_data"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6429">The available data types are the 'browsing_history', 'download_history', 'cookies_and_other_site_data', 'cached_images_and_files', 'password_signin', 'autofill', 'site_settings' and 'hosted_app_data'.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6430">Microsoft Edge 将定期删除超过 "time_to_live_in_hours" 的选定类型的数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6430">Microsoft Edge will regularly remove data of selected types that is older than 'time_to_live_in_hours'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6431">删除过期数据将在浏览器启动后的 15 秒后发生，然后当浏览器运行时每小时删除一次。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6431">The deletion of expired data will happen 15 seconds after the browser starts then every hour while the browser is running.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6432">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6432">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6433">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6433">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6434">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6434">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6435">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6435">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6436">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6436">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6437">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6437">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6438">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6438">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6439">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6439">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6440">GP 唯一名称：BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6440">GP unique name: BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6441">GP 名称：浏览数据生存期设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6441">GP name: Browsing Data Lifetime Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6442">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6442">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6443">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6443">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6444">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6444">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6445">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6445">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6446">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6446">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6447">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6447">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6448">值名称：BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6448">Value Name: BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6449">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6449">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6450">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6450">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\BrowsingDataLifetime = [
  {
    "data_types": [
      "browsing_history"
    ],
    "time_to_live_in_hours": 24
  },
  {
    "data_types": [
      "password_signin",
      "autofill"
    ],
    "time_to_live_in_hours": 12
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6451">精简示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6451">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\BrowsingDataLifetime = [{"data_types": ["browsing_history"], "time_to_live_in_hours": 24}, {"data_types": ["password_signin", "autofill"], "time_to_live_in_hours": 12}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6452">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6452">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6453">首选项项名称：BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6453">Preference Key Name: BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6454">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6454">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>BrowsingDataLifetime</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>data_types</key>
    <array>
      <string>browsing_history</string>
    </array>
    <key>time_to_live_in_hours</key>
    <integer>24</integer>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>data_types</key>
    <array>
      <string>password_signin</string>
      <string>autofill</string>
    </array>
    <key>time_to_live_in_hours</key>
    <integer>12</integer>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6455">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6455">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="builtindnsclientenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6456">BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6456">BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="use-built-in-dns-client"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6457">使用内置 DNS 客户端</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6457">Use built-in DNS client</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6458">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6458">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6459">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6459">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6460">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6460">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6461">控制是否使用内置 DNS 客户端。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6461">Controls whether to use the built-in DNS client.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6462">此策略控制用于与 DNS 服务器通信的软件堆栈：操作系统 DNS 客户端或 Microsoft Edge 的内置 DNS 客户端。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6462">This policy controls which software stack is used to communicate with the DNS server: the operating system DNS client, or Microsoft Edge's built-in DNS client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6463">此策略不会影响使用哪些 DNS 服务器：例如，如果操作系统配置为使用企业 DNS 服务器，则内置 DNS 客户端将使用同一服务器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6463">This policy does not affect which DNS servers are used: if, for example, the operating system is configured to use an enterprise DNS server, that same server would be used by the built-in DNS client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6464">它还无法控制是否使用 DNS-over-HTTPS；Microsoft Edge 始终将内置解析程序用于 DNS-over-HTTPS 请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6464">It also does not control if DNS-over-HTTPS is used; Microsoft Edge always uses the built-in resolver for DNS-over-HTTPS requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6465">有关控制 DNS-over-HTTPS 的信息，请参阅 [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6465">Please see the [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) policy for information on controlling DNS-over-HTTPS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6466">如果启用此策略，则使用内置 DNS 客户端（如果可用）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6466">If you enable this policy, the built-in DNS client is used, if it's available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6467">如果禁用此策略，则仅在使用 DNS-over-HTTPS 时使用内置 DNS 客户端。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6467">If you disable this policy, the built-in DNS client is only used when DNS-over-HTTPS is in use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6468">如果未配置此策略，则当未启用专用 DNS 和 VPN 时，默认情况下在 macOS 和 Android 上启用内置 DNS。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6468">If you don't configure this policy, the built-in DNS client is enabled by default on macOS and Android (when neither Private DNS nor VPN are enabled).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6469">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6469">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6470">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6470">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6471">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6471">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6472">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6472">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6473">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6473">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6474">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6474">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6475">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6475">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6476">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6476">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6477">GP 唯一名称：BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6477">GP unique name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6478">GP 名称：使用内置 DNS 客户端</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6478">GP name: Use built-in DNS client</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6479">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6479">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6480">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6480">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6481">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6481">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6482">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6482">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6483">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6483">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6484">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6484">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6485">值名称：BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6485">Value Name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6486">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6486">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
