  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6487">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6487">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6488">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6488">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6489">首选项项名称：BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6489">Preference Key Name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6490">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6490">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6491">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6491">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="builtincertificateverifierenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6492">BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6492">BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="determines-whether-the-built-in-certificate-verifier-will-be-used-to-verify-server-certificates-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6493">确定是否将使用内置证书验证程序来验证服务器证书（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6493">Determines whether the built-in certificate verifier will be used to verify server certificates (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6494">已弃用：此策略已弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6494">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6495">当前受支持，但将在未来的版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6495">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6496">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6496">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6497">在 macOS 上自 83 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6497">On macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6498">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6498">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6499">此策略已弃用，因为它仅作为一种短期机制提供，目的是让企业能够在发现与内置证书验证程序不兼容时有更多的时间来更新环境和报告问题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6499">This policy is deprecated because it's intended to serve only as a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their environments and report issues if they are found to be incompatible with the built-in certificate verifier.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6500">如果计划删除对 Mac OS X 上旧版证书验证程序的支持，则它在 Microsoft Edge 版本 92 中不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6500">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 92, when support for the legacy certificate verifier on Mac OS X is planned to be removed.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6501">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6501">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6502">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6502">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6503">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6503">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6504">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6504">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6505">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6505">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6506">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6506">Boolean</span></span>

  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6507">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6507">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6508">首选项项名称：BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6508">Preference Key Name: BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6509">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6509">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6510">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6510">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="cecpq2enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6511">CECPQ2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6511">CECPQ2Enabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="cecpq2-post-quantum-key-agreement-enabled-for-tls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6512">为 TLS 启用了 CECPQ2 后量子密钥协议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6512">CECPQ2 post-quantum key-agreement enabled for TLS</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6513">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6513">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6514">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 93 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6514">On Windows and macOS since 93 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6515">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6515">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6516">如果未配置此策略或设置为启用，Microsoft Edge 将遵循 CECPQ2 的默认推出过程，这是 TLS 中的一种后量子密钥协议算法。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6516">If this policy is not configured, or is set to enabled, then Microsoft Edge will follow the default rollout process for CECPQ2, a post-quantum key-agreement algorithm in TLS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6517">CECPQ2 会导致更大的 TLS 消息，在极少数情况下，可能会触发某些网络硬件中的 Bug。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6517">CECPQ2 results in larger TLS messages which, in very rare cases, can trigger bugs in some networking hardware.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6518">此策略可以设置为 False，以在解决网络问题时禁用 CECPQ2。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6518">This policy can be set to False to disable CECPQ2 while networking issues are resolved.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6519">此策略是一项临时措施，将在未来版本的 Microsoft Edge 中删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6519">This policy is a temporary measure and will be removed in future versions of Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6520">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6520">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6521">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6521">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6522">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6522">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6523">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6523">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6524">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6524">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6525">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6525">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6526">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6526">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6527">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6527">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6528">GP 唯一名称：CECPQ2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6528">GP unique name: CECPQ2Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6529">GP 名称：为 TLS 启用 CECPQ2 后量子密钥协议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6529">GP name: CECPQ2 post-quantum key-agreement enabled for TLS</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6530">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6530">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6531">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6531">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6532">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6532">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6533">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6533">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6534">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6534">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6535">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6535">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6536">值名称：CECPQ2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6536">Value Name: CECPQ2Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6537">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6537">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6538">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6538">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6539">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6539">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6540">首选项项名称：CECPQ2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6540">Preference Key Name: CECPQ2Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6541">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6541">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6542">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6542">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="certificatetransparencyenforcementdisabledforcas"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6543">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6543">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-certificate-transparency-enforcement-for-a-list-of-subjectpublickeyinfo-hashes"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6544">针对 SubjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希列表禁用证书透明度强制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6544">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6545">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6545">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6546">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6546">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6547">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6547">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6548">禁止对 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希列表强制实施证书透明度要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6548">Disables enforcement of Certificate Transparency requirements for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6549">通过此策略，可针对包含具有其中一个指定 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希的证书的证书链禁用证书透明度披露要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6549">This policy lets you disable Certificate Transparency disclosure requirements for certificate chains that contain certificates with one of the specified subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6550">这样，由于未正确公开披露而不受信任的证书仍将用于企业主机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6550">This allows certificates that would otherwise be untrusted because they were not properly publicly disclosed to still be used for Enterprise hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6551">要在设置此策略时禁止强制实施证书透明度，必须满足以下其中一组条件：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6551">To disable Certificate Transparency enforcement when this policy is set, one of the following sets of conditions must be met:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6552">哈希属于服务器证书的 subjectPublicKeyInfo。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6552">The hash is of the server certificate's subjectPublicKeyInfo.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6553">哈希属于出现在证书链中某个 CA 证书中的 subjectPublicKeyInfo；该 CA 证书受 X.509v3 nameConstraints 扩展约束；permittedSubtrees 中存在一个或多个 DdirectoryName nameConstraint；DirectoryName 包含 organizationName 属性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6553">The hash is of a subjectPublicKeyInfo that appears in a CA certificate in the certificate chain, that CA certificate is constrained via the X.509v3 nameConstraints extension, one or more directoryName nameConstraints are present in the permittedSubtrees, and the directoryName contains an organizationName attribute.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6554">哈希属于出现在证书链中某个 CA 证书中的 subjectPublicKeyInfo；CA 证书的证书使用者中具有一个或多个 organizationName 属性；服务器的证书包含数量相同且顺序一致的 organizationName 属性，并且每个字节的值都相同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6554">The hash is of a subjectPublicKeyInfo that appears in a CA certificate in the certificate chain, the CA certificate has one or more organizationName attributes in the certificate Subject, and the server's certificate contains the same number of organizationName attributes, in the same order, and with byte-for-byte identical values.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6555">可通过将以下内容串联起来指定 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希：哈希算法名称、“/”字符以及哈希算法的 Base64 编码，该哈希算法应用于指定证书经过 DER 编码的 subjectPublicKeyInfo。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6555">A subjectPublicKeyInfo hash is specified by concatenating the hash algorithm name, the "/" character, and the Base64 encoding of that hash algorithm applied to the DER-encoded subjectPublicKeyInfo of the specified certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6556">此 Base64 编码的格式与 SPKI 指纹相同，如 RFC 7469 第 2.4 节所定义。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6556">This Base64 encoding is the same format as an SPKI Fingerprint, as defined in RFC 7469, Section 2.4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6557">无法识别的哈希算法将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6557">Unrecognized hash algorithms are ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6558">目前仅支持“sha256”哈希算法。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6558">The only supported hash algorithm at this time is "sha256".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6559">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则当需要通过证书透明度进行披露的任何证书未根据证书透明度策略进行披露时，将被视为不受信任。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6559">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, any certificate that's required to be disclosed via Certificate Transparency will be treated as untrusted if it's not disclosed according to the Certificate Transparency policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6560">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6560">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6561">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6561">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6562">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6562">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6563">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6563">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6564">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6564">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6565">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6565">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6566">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6566">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6567">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6567">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6568">GP 唯一名称：CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6568">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6569">GP 名称：针对 SubjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希列表禁用证书透明度强制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6569">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6570">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6570">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6571">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6571">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6572">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6572">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6573">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6573">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6574">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6574">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6575">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6575">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6576">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6576">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6577">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6577">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6578">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6578">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas\1 = "sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas\2 = "sha256//////////////////////w=="

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6579">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6579">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6580">首选项项名称：CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6580">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6581">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6581">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==</string>
  <string>sha256//////////////////////w==</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6582">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6582">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="certificatetransparencyenforcementdisabledforlegacycas"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6583">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6583">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-certificate-transparency-enforcement-for-a-list-of-legacy-certificate-authorities"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6584">针对旧证书颁发机构列表禁用证书透明度强制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6584">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of legacy certificate authorities</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6585">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6585">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6586">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6586">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6587">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6587">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6588">禁止对旧证书颁发机构 (Cas) 列表强制实施证书透明度要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6588">Disables enforcing Certificate Transparency requirements for a list of legacy certificate authorities (Cas).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6589">通过此策略，可针对包含具有其中一个指定 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希的证书的证书链禁用证书透明度披露要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6589">This policy lets you disable Certificate Transparency disclosure requirements for certificate chains that contain certificates with one of the specified subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6590">这样，由于未正确公开披露而不受信任的证书将继续用于企业主机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6590">This allows certificates that would otherwise be untrusted because they were not properly publicly disclosed, continue to be used for enterprise hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6591">要禁用证书透明度强制实施，必须将哈希设置为出现在被识别为旧证书颁发机构 (CA) 的 CA 证书中的 SubjectPublicKeyInfo。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6591">In order for Certificate Transparency enforcement to be disabled, you must set the hash to a subjectPublicKeyInfo appearing in a CA certificate that is recognized as a legacy certificate authority (CA).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6592">旧 CA 是默认情况下由 Microsoft Edge 支持的一个或多个操作系统公开信任的 CA。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6592">A legacy CA is a CA that has been publicly trusted by default by one or more operating systems supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6593">可通过将以下内容串联起来指定 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希：哈希算法名称、“/”字符以及哈希算法的 Base64 编码，该哈希算法应用于指定证书经过 DER 编码的 subjectPublicKeyInfo。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6593">You specify a subjectPublicKeyInfo hash by concatenating the hash algorithm name, the "/" character, and the Base64 encoding of that hash algorithm applied to the DER-encoded subjectPublicKeyInfo of the specified certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6594">此 Base64 编码的格式与 SPKI 指纹相同，如 RFC 7469 第 2.4 节所定义。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6594">This Base64 encoding is the same format as an SPKI Fingerprint, as defined in RFC 7469, Section 2.4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6595">无法识别的哈希算法将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6595">Unrecognized hash algorithms are ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6596">目前仅支持“sha256”哈希算法。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6596">The only supported hash algorithm at this time is "sha256".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6597">如果未配置此策略，则当需要通过证书透明度进行披露的任何证书未根据证书透明度策略进行披露时，将被视为不受信任。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6597">If you don't configure this policy, any certificate that's required to be disclosed via Certificate Transparency will be treated as untrusted if it isn't disclosed according to the Certificate Transparency policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6598">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6598">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6599">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6599">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6600">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6600">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6601">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6601">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6602">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6602">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6603">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6603">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6604">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6604">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6605">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6605">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6606">GP 唯一名称：CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6606">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6607">GP 名称：针对旧证书颁发机构列表禁用证书透明度强制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6607">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of legacy certificate authorities</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6608">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6608">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6609">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6609">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6610">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6610">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6611">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6611">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6612">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6612">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6613">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6613">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6614">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6614">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6615">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6615">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6616">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6616">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas\1 = "sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas\2 = "sha256//////////////////////w=="

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6617">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6617">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6618">首选项项名称：CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6618">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6619">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6619">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==</string>
  <string>sha256//////////////////////w==</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6620">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6620">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="certificatetransparencyenforcementdisabledforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6621">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6621">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-certificate-transparency-enforcement-for-specific-urls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6622">针对特定 URL 禁用证书透明度强制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6622">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for specific URLs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6623">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6623">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6624">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6624">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6625">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6625">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6626">禁止对列出的 URL 强制实施证书透明度要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6626">Disables enforcing Certificate Transparency requirements for the listed URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6627">通过此策略，可不通过证书透明度来披露指定 URL 中主机名的证书。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6627">This policy lets you not disclose certificates for the hostnames in the specified URLs via Certificate Transparency.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6628">这样，你就可以使用由于未正确公开披露而不受信任的证书，但这会使得检测这些主机的错误颁发证书变得更加困难。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6628">This lets you use certificates that would otherwise be untrusted, because they weren't properly publicly disclosed, but it makes it harder to detect mis-issued certificates for those hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6629">根据 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) 构建你的 URL 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6629">Form your URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6630">由于证书对给定主机名有效，与方案、端口或路径无关，因此仅考虑 URL 的主机名部分。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6630">Because certificates are valid for a given hostname, independent of the scheme, port, or path, only the hostname part of the URL is considered.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6631">不支持通配符主机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6631">Wildcard hosts are not supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6632">如果未配置此策略，则应通过证书透明度披露的任何证书如果未披露，则将被视为不受信任。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6632">If you don't configure this policy, any certificate that should be disclosed via Certificate Transparency is treated as untrusted if it's not disclosed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6633">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6633">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6634">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6634">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6635">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6635">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6636">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6636">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6637">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6637">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6638">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6638">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6639">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6639">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6640">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6640">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6641">GP 唯一名称：CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6641">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6642">GP 名称：针对特定 URL 禁用证书透明度强制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6642">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for specific URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6643">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6643">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6644">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6644">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6645">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6645">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6646">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6646">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6647">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6647">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6648">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6648">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6649">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6649">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6650">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6650">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6651">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6651">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls\2 = ".contoso.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6652">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6652">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6653">首选项项名称：CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6653">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6654">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6654">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6655">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6655">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="clearbrowsingdataonexit"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6656">ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6656">ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>

  #### <a name="clear-browsing-data-when-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6657">在 Microsoft Edge 关闭时清除浏览数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6657">Clear browsing data when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6658">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6658">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6659">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6659">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6660">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6660">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6661">默认情况下，Microsoft Edge 关闭时不会清除浏览数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6661">Microsoft Edge doesn't clear the browsing data by default when it closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6662">浏览数据包括在表单中输入的信息、密码乃至访问过的网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6662">Browsing data includes information entered in forms, passwords, and even the websites visited.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6663">如果启用此策略，则每次 Microsoft Edge 关闭时都会删除所有浏览数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6663">If you enable this policy, all browsing data is deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6664">请注意，如果启用此策略，它将优先于 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 的配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6664">Note that if you enable this policy, it takes precedence over how you configured [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6665">如果禁用或未配置此策略，用户可以在“设置”中配置“清除浏览数据”选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6665">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can configure the Clear browsing data option in Settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6666">如果启用此策略，请不要配置 [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) 或 [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) 策略，因为它们都处理浏览数据删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6666">If you enable this policy, don't configure the [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) or the [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) policy, because they all deal with deleting browsing data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6667">如果配置了上述策略和此策略，则在 Microsoft Edge 关闭时，所有浏览数据都将被删除，而不管 [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) 或 [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) 的配置如何。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6667">If you configure the preceding policies and this policy, all browsing data is deleted when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how you configured [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) or [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6668">若要排除退出时删除 Cookie 的功能，请配置 [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6668">To exclude cookies from being deleted on exit, configure the [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6669">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6669">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6670">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6670">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6671">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6671">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6672">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6672">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6673">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6673">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6674">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6674">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6675">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6675">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6676">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6676">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6677">GP 唯一名称：ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6677">GP unique name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6678">GP 名称：在 Microsoft Edge 关闭时清除浏览数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6678">GP name: Clear browsing data when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6679">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6679">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6680">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6680">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6681">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6681">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6682">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6682">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6683">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6683">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6684">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6684">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6685">值名称：ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6685">Value Name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6686">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6686">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6687">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6687">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6688">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6688">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6689">首选项项名称：ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6689">Preference Key Name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6690">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6690">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6691">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6691">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6692">ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6692">ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>

  #### <a name="clear-cached-images-and-files-when-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6693">在 Microsoft Edge 关闭时清除缓存的图像和文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6693">Clear cached images and files when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6694">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6694">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6695">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 83 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6695">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6696">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6696">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6697">默认情况下，Microsoft Edge 关闭时不会清除缓存的图像和文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6697">Microsoft Edge doesn't clear cached images and files by default when it closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6698">如果启用此策略，则每次 Microsoft Edge 关闭时，缓存的图像和文件都将被删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6698">If you enable this policy, cached images and files will be deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6699">如果禁用此策略，用户将无法在 edge://settings/clearBrowsingDataOnClose 中配置缓存的图像和文件选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6699">If you disable this policy, users cannot configure the cached images and files option in edge://settings/clearBrowsingDataOnClose.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6700">如果未配置此策略，用户可以选择是否在退出时清除缓存的图像和文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6700">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose whether cached images and files are cleared on exit.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6701">如果禁用此策略，请不要启用 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 策略，因为它们都处理数据删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6701">If you disable this policy, don't enable the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy, because they both deal with deleting data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6702">如果同时配置这两个策略，则 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 策略优先并在 Microsoft Edge 关闭时删除所有数据，而不管 [ClearCacheedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) 的配置如何。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6702">If you configure both, the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy takes precedence and deletes all data when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how you configured [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6703">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6703">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6704">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6704">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6705">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6705">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6706">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6706">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6707">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6707">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6708">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6708">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6709">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6709">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6710">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6710">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6711">GP 唯一名称：ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6711">GP unique name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6712">GP 名称：在 Microsoft Edge 关闭时清除缓存的图像和文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6712">GP name: Clear cached images and files when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6713">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6713">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6714">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6714">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6715">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6715">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6716">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6716">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6717">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6717">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6718">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6718">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6719">值名称：ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6719">Value Name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6720">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6720">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6721">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6721">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6722">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6722">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6723">首选项项名称：ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6723">Preference Key Name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6724">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6724">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6725">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6725">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="clickonceenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6726">ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6726">ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-open-files-using-the-clickonce-protocol"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6727">允许用户使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6727">Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6728">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6728">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6729">在 Windows 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6729">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6730">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6730">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6731">允许用户使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6731">Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6732">通过 ClickOnce 协议，网站可使用用户计算机或设备上的 ClickOnce 文件处理程序请求浏览器从特定 URL 打开文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6732">The ClickOnce protocol allows websites to request that the browser open files from a specific URL using the ClickOnce file handler on the user's computer or device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6733">如果启用此策略，用户可以使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6733">If you enable this policy, users can open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6734">此策略将替代 edge://flags/ 页面中用户的 ClickOnce 设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6734">This policy overrides the user's ClickOnce setting in the edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6735">如果禁用此策略，用户将无法使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6735">If you disable this policy, users can't open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6736">而是使用浏览器将文件保存到文件系统。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6736">Instead, the file will be saved to the file system using the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6737">此策略将替代 edge://flags/ 页面中用户的 ClickOnce 设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6737">This policy overrides the user's ClickOnce setting in the edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6738">如果未配置此策略，则默认情况下，拥有 Microsoft Edge 87 之前的 Microsoft Edge 版本的用户无法使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6738">If you don't configure this policy, users with Microsoft Edge versions before Microsoft Edge 87 can't open files using the ClickOnce protocol by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6739">但是，他们可以选择允许将 ClickOnce 协议与 edge://flags/ 页面搭配使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6739">However, they have the option to enable the use of the ClickOnce protocol with the edge://flags/ page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6740">默认情况下，拥有 Microsoft Edge 版本 87 和更高版本的用户可以使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件，但可以选择使用 edge://flags/ 页面禁用 ClickOnce 协议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6740">Users with Microsoft Edge versions 87 and later can open files using the ClickOnce protocol by default but have the option to disable the ClickOnce protocol with edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6741">禁用 ClickOnce 可能会导致 ClickOnce 应用程序（.application 文件）无法正常启动。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6741">Disabling ClickOnce may prevent ClickOnce applications (.application files) from launching properly.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6742">有关 ClickOnce 的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) 和 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6742">For more information about ClickOnce, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) and [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6743">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6743">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6744">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6744">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6745">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6745">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6746">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6746">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6747">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6747">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6748">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6748">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6749">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6749">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6750">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6750">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6751">GP 唯一名称：ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6751">GP unique name: ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6752">GP 名称：允许用户使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6752">GP name: Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6753">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6753">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6754">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6754">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6755">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6755">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6756">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6756">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6757">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6757">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6758">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6758">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6759">值名称：ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6759">Value Name: ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6760">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6760">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6761">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6761">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6762">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6762">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="collectionsservicesandexportsblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6763">CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6763">CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-access-to-a-specified-list-of-services-and-export-targets-in-collections"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6764">阻止访问指定服务列表及在集锦中导出目标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6764">Block access to a specified list of services and export targets in Collections</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6765">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6765">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6766">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6766">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6767">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6767">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6768">在 Microsoft Edge 的“集锦”功能中列出用户无法访问的特定服务和导出目标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6768">List specific services and export targets that users can't access in the Collections feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6769">这包括显示来自必应的其他数据，以及将集锦导出到 Microsoft 产品或外部合作伙伴。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6769">This includes displaying additional data from Bing and exporting collections to Microsoft products or external partners.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6770">如果启用此策略，将阻止与指定列表匹配的服务和导出目标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6770">If you enable this policy, services and export targets that match the given list are blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6771">如果未配置此策略，则不会对可接受的服务和导出目标强制实施任何限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6771">If you don't configure this policy, no restrictions on the acceptable services and export targets are enforced.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6772">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6772">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6773">pinterest_suggestions (pinterest_suggestions) = Pinterest 建议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6773">pinterest_suggestions (pinterest_suggestions) = Pinterest suggestions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6774">collections_share （collections_share） = 共享集锦</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6774">collections_share (collections_share) = Sharing of Collections</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6775">local_pdf (local_pdf) = 将集锦中的本地 PDF 保存到 OneDrive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6775">local_pdf (local_pdf) = Save local PDFs in Collections to OneDrive</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6776">send_word (send_word) = 将集锦发送到 Microsoft Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6776">send_word (send_word) = Send collection to Microsoft Word</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6777">send_excel (send_excel) = 将集锦发送到 Microsoft Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6777">send_excel (send_excel) = Send collection to Microsoft Excel</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6778">send_onenote (send_onenote) = 将集锦发送到 Microsoft OneNote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6778">send_onenote (send_onenote) = Send collection to Microsoft OneNote</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6779">send_pinterest (send_pinterest) = 将集锦发送到 Pinterest</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6779">send_pinterest (send_pinterest) = Send collection to Pinterest</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6780">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6780">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6781">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6781">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6782">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6782">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6783">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6783">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6784">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6784">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6785">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6785">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6786">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6786">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6787">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6787">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6788">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6788">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6789">GP 唯一名称：CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6789">GP unique name: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6790">GP 名称：阻止访问指定服务列表及在集锦中导出目标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6790">GP name: Block access to a specified list of services and export targets in Collections</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6791">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6791">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6792">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6792">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6793">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6793">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6794">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6794">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6795">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6795">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6796">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6796">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6797">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6797">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6798">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6798">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6799">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6799">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList\1 = "pinterest_suggestions"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList\2 = "collections_share"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList\3 = "local_pdf"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList\4 = "send_word"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList\5 = "send_excel"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList\6 = "send_onenote"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList\7 = "send_pinterest"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6800">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6800">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6801">首选项名称： CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6801">Preference Key Name: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6802">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6802">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>pinterest_suggestions</string>
  <string>collections_share</string>
  <string>local_pdf</string>
  <string>send_word</string>
  <string>send_excel</string>
  <string>send_onenote</string>
  <string>send_pinterest</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6803">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6803">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="commandlineflagsecuritywarningsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6804">CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6804">CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-security-warnings-for-command-line-flags"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6805">启用命令行标志的安全警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6805">Enable security warnings for command-line flags</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6806">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6806">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6807">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6807">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6808">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6808">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6809">如果禁用，则此策略可阻止在使用潜在危险的命令行标志启动 Microsoft Edge 时出现安全警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6809">If disabled, this policy prevents security warnings from appearing when Microsoft Edge is launched with potentially dangerous command-line flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6810">如果启用或未设置，则在使用这些命令行标志启动 Microsoft Edge 时会显示安全警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6810">If enabled or unset, security warnings are displayed when these command-line flags are used to launch Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6811">例如，--disable-gpu-sandbox 标志将生成此警告：你正在使用不受支持的命令行标志：--disable-gpu-sandbox。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6811">For example, the --disable-gpu-sandbox flag generates this warning:  You're using an unsupported command-line flag: --disable-gpu-sandbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6812">这会带来稳定性和安全风险。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6812">This poses stability and security risks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6813">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6813">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6814">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6814">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6815">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6815">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6816">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6816">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6817">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6817">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6818">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6818">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6819">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6819">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6820">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6820">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6821">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6821">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6822">GP 唯一名称：CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6822">GP unique name: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6823">GP 名称：启用命令行标志的安全警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6823">GP name: Enable security warnings for command-line flags</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6824">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6824">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6825">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6825">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6826">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6826">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6827">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6827">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6828">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6828">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6829">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6829">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6830">值名称：CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6830">Value Name: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6831">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6831">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6832">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6832">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6833">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6833">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6834">首选项项名称：CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6834">Preference Key Name: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6835">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6835">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6836">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6836">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="componentupdatesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6837">ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6837">ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-component-updates-in-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6838">在 Microsoft Edge 中启用组件更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6838">Enable component updates in Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6839">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6839">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6840">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6840">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6841">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6841">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6842">如果启用或未配置此策略，则将在 Microsoft Edge 中启用组件更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6842">If you enable or don't configure this policy, component updates are enabled in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6843">如果禁用此策略或将其设置为 false，则 Microsoft Edge 中所有组件的组件更新都将被禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6843">If you disable this policy or set it to false, component updates are disabled for all components in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6844">但是，某些组件不受此策略约束。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6844">However, some components are exempt from this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6845">这包括不含可执行代码、不会显著改变浏览器行为或者对安全至关重要的任何组件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6845">This includes any component that doesn't contain executable code, that doesn't significantly alter the behavior of the browser, or that's critical for security.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6846">也就是说，即使禁用此策略，仍将应用被视为“对安全至关重要”的更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6846">That is, updates that are deemed "critical for security" are still applied even if you disable this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6847">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6847">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6848">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6848">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6849">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6849">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6850">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6850">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6851">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6851">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6852">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6852">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6853">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6853">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6854">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6854">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6855">GP 唯一名称：ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6855">GP unique name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6856">GP 名称：在 Microsoft Edge 中启用组件更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6856">GP name: Enable component updates in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6857">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6857">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6858">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6858">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6859">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6859">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6860">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6860">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6861">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6861">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6862">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6862">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6863">值名称：ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6863">Value Name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
