  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6864">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6864">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6865">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6865">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6866">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6866">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6867">首选项项名称：ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6867">Preference Key Name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6868">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6868">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6869">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6869">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="configuredonottrack"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6870">ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6870">ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-do-not-track"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6871">配置 Do Not Track</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6871">Configure Do Not Track</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6872">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6872">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6873">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6873">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6874">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6874">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6875">指定是否向要求跟踪信息的网站发送 Do Not Track 请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6875">Specify whether to send Do Not Track requests to websites that ask for tracking info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6876">Do Not Track 请求可让你访问的网站知道你并不希望跟踪你的浏览活动。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6876">Do Not Track requests let the websites you visit know that you don't want your browsing activity to be tracked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6877">默认情况下，Microsoft Edge 不发送 Do Not Track 请求，但用户可以打开此功能以发送请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6877">By default, Microsoft Edge doesn't send Do Not Track requests, but users can turn on this feature to send them.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6878">如果启用此策略，则始终向要求跟踪信息的网站发送 Do Not Track 请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6878">If you enable this policy, Do Not Track requests are always sent to websites asking for tracking info.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6879">如果禁用此策略，则永远不会发送请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6879">If you disable this policy, requests are never sent.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6880">如果未配置此策略，用户可以选择是否发送这些请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6880">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose whether to send these requests.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6881">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6881">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6882">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6882">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6883">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6883">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6884">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6884">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6885">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6885">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6886">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6886">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6887">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6887">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6888">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6888">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6889">GP 唯一名称：ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6889">GP unique name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6890">GP 名称：配置 Do Not Track</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6890">GP name: Configure Do Not Track</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6891">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6891">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6892">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6892">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6893">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6893">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6894">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6894">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6895">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6895">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6896">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6896">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6897">值名称：ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6897">Value Name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6898">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6898">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6899">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6899">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6900">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6900">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6901">首选项项名称：ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6901">Preference Key Name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6902">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6902">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6903">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6903">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="configurefriendlyurlformat"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6904">ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6904">ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-default-paste-format-of-urls-copied-from-microsoft-edge-and-determine-if-additional-formats-will-be-available-to-users"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6905">配置从 Microsoft Edge 复制的 URL 的默认粘贴格式，并确定用户是否可以使用其他格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6905">Configure the default paste format of URLs copied from Microsoft Edge, and determine if additional formats will be available to users</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6906">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6906">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6907">在 87 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6907">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6908">在 macOS 上自 88 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6908">On macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6909">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6909">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6910">如果启用了 FriendlyURLs，Microsoft Edge 将计算 URL 的其他表示形式并将其放入剪贴板。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6910">If FriendlyURLs are enabled, Microsoft Edge will compute additional representations of the URL and place them on the clipboard.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6911">当用户在外部应用程序中或在不带“粘贴为”上下文菜单项的 Microsoft Edge 中进行粘贴时，此策略将配置粘贴内容的格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6911">This policy configures what format will be pasted when the user pastes in external applications, or inside Microsoft Edge without the 'Paste as' context menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6912">如果已配置，此策略将代表用户作出选择。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6912">If configured, this policy makes a choice on behalf of the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6913">edge://settings/shareCopyPaste 中的选项将显示为灰色，并且“粘贴为”上下文菜单中的选项将不可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6913">The options in edge://settings/shareCopyPaste will be grayed out, and the options in the 'Paste As' context menu will not be available.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6914">未配置 = 用户将可以选择自己喜欢的粘贴格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6914">Not configured = The user will be able to choose their preferred paste format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6915">默认情况下，会将此策略设置为友好 URL 格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6915">By default, this is set to the friendly URL format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6916">Microsoft Edge 中将提供“粘贴为”菜单。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6916">The 'Paste As' menu will be available in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6917">1 = 不会在剪贴板中存储其他格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6917">1 = No additional formats will be stored on the clipboard.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6918">Microsoft Edge 中将不显示“粘贴为”上下文菜单项，并且可用的粘贴格式只有纯文本 URL 格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6918">There will be no 'Paste as' context menu item in Microsoft Edge and the only format available to paste will be the plain text URL format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6919">实际上，友好 URL 功能将被禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6919">Effectively, the friendly URL feature will be disabled.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6920">3 = 只要目标粘贴位置接受富文本，用户便会获得友好 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6920">3 = The user will get a friendly URL whenever they paste into surfaces that accept rich text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6921">对于不接受富文本的位置，则仍将提供纯文本 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6921">The plain URL will still be available for non-rich surfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6922">Microsoft Edge 中将不提供“粘贴为”菜单。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6922">There will be no 'Paste As' menu in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6923">4 =（当前未使用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6923">4 = (Not currently used)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6924">某些粘贴目标和/或网站中可能不能很好地支持更丰富的格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6924">The richer formats may not be well-supported in some paste destinations and/or websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6925">因此，如果要配置此策略，则建议使用纯文本 URL 选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6925">As such, if this policy is to be configured, then the plain URL option is recommended.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6926">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6926">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6927">PlainText (1) = 无任何额外信息的纯文本 URL，例如页面标题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6927">PlainText (1) = The plain URL without any extra information, such as the page's title.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6928">配置此策略时，推荐选择此选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6928">This is the recommended option when this policy is configured.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6929">有关详细信息，请参阅相关说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6929">For more information, see the description.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6930">TitledHyperlink (3) = 标题式超链接：指向复制的 URL 的超链接，但其可见文本是目标页面的标题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6930">TitledHyperlink (3) = Titled Hyperlink: A hyperlink that points to the copied URL, but whose visible text is the title of the destination page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6931">这是一种友好的 URL 格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6931">This is the Friendly URL format.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6932">WebPreview (4) = 即将推出。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6932">WebPreview (4) = Coming soon.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6933">如果设置，其行为与“纯文本 URL”相同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6933">If set, behaves the same as 'Plain URL'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6934">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6934">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6935">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6935">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6936">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6936">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6937">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6937">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6938">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6938">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6939">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6939">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6940">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6940">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6941">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6941">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6942">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6942">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6943">GP 唯一名称：ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6943">GP unique name: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6944">GP 名称：配置从 Microsoft Edge 复制的 URL 的默认粘贴格式，并确定用户是否可以使用其他格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6944">GP name: Configure the default paste format of URLs copied from Microsoft Edge, and determine if additional formats will be available to users</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6945">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6945">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6946">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6946">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6947">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6947">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6948">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6948">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6949">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6949">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6950">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6950">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6951">值名称：ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6951">Value Name: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6952">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6952">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6953">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6953">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000003
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6954">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6954">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6955">首选项项名称：ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6955">Preference Key Name: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6956">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6956">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>3</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6957">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6957">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="configureonpremisesaccountautosignin"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6958">ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6958">ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-automatic-sign-in-with-an-active-directory-domain-account-when-there-is-no-azure-ad-domain-account"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6959">配置当没有 Azure AD 域帐户时使用 Active Directory 域帐户自动登录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6959">Configure automatic sign in with an Active Directory domain account when there is no Azure AD domain account</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6960">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6960">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6961">在 Windows 上自 81 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6961">On Windows since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6962">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6962">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6963">如果用户的计算机已加入域，并且你的环境不是混合加入的，则可以使用 Active Directory 帐户进行自动登录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6963">Enable the use of Active Directory accounts for automatic sign in if your users' machines are Domain Joined and your environment is not hybrid joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6964">如果希望用户使用其 Azure Active Directory 帐户自动登录，请对你的环境使用 Azure AD 加入（有关详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197)）或混合加入（有关详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365)）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6964">If you want users automatically signed in with their Azure Active Directory accounts instead, please Azure AD join (See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197) for more information) or hybrid join (See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365) for more information) your environment.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6965">每次启动时，只要启动的第一个配置文件没有登录或以前没有自动登录，Microsoft Edge 都会尝试使用此策略登录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6965">On every launch, Microsoft Edge will try to sign-in using this policy, as long as the first profile being launched isn't signed-in or an auto sign-in hasn't happened before.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6966">如果已将 [BrowserSigning](#browsersignin) 策略配置为禁用，则此策略将不会生效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6966">If you have configured the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy to disabled, this policy will not take any effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6967">如果启用此策略并将其设置为 'SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable'，则 Microsoft Edge 将会自动登录那些使用其 Active Directory 帐户来登录加入域的计算机的用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6967">If you enable this policy and set it to 'SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable', Microsoft Edge will automatically sign in users that are on domain joined machines using their Active Directory accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6968">如果将此策略设置为“已禁用”或未设置该策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将不会自动登录那些使用其 Active Directory 帐户来登录加入域的计算机的用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6968">If you set this policy to 'Disabled' or don't set it, Microsoft Edge will not automatically sign in users that are on domain joined machines with Active Directory accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6969">从 Microsoft Edge 89 开始，如果现有本地配置文件已禁用[RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled)策略，并且计算机现已混合加入，即</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6969">From Microsoft Edge 89 onwards, if there is an existing on-premises profile with [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy disabled and machine is now hybrid joined i.e</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6970">它拥有 Azure AD 帐户，它将本地配置文件自动升级到 Azure AD 配置文件，以获得完整的 Azure AD 同步功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6970">it has an Azure AD account, it will auto-upgrade the on-premises profile to Azure AD profile to get full Azure AD sync facilities.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6971">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6971">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6972">Disabled (0) = 禁用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6972">Disabled (0) = Disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6973">SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable (1) = 登录并将域帐户设置为不可移动</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6973">SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable (1) = Sign in and make domain account non-removable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6974">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6974">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6975">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6975">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6976">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6976">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6977">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6977">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6978">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6978">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6979">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6979">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6980">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6980">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6981">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6981">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6982">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6982">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6983">GP 唯一名称：ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6983">GP unique name: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6984">GP 名称：配置当没有 Azure AD 域帐户时使用 Active Directory 域帐户自动登录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6984">GP name: Configure automatic sign in with an Active Directory domain account when there is no Azure AD domain account</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6985">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6985">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6986">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6986">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6987">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6987">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6988">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6988">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6989">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6989">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6990">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6990">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6991">值名称：ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6991">Value Name: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6992">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6992">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6993">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6993">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6994">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6994">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="configureonlinetexttospeech"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6995">ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6995">ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-online-text-to-speech"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6996">配置联机文本到语音转换</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6996">Configure Online Text To Speech</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6997">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6997">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6998">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6998">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-6999">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-6999">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7000">设置浏览器是否可以利用联机文本到语音转换语音字体（Azure 认知服务的一部分）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7000">Set whether the browser can leverage Online Text to Speech voice fonts, part of Azure Cognitive Services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7001">这些语音字体的质量高于预安装的系统语音字体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7001">These voice fonts are higher quality than the pre-installed system voice fonts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7002">如果启用或未配置此策略，则使用 SpeechSynthesis API 的基于 Web 的应用程序可以使用联机文本到语音转换语音字体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7002">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web-based applications that use the SpeechSynthesis API can use Online Text to Speech voice fonts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7003">如果禁用此策略，则语音字体不可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7003">If you disable this policy, the voice fonts aren't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7004">在此处阅读有关此功能的更多信息：SpeechSynthesis API：[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038) 认知服务：[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7004">Read more about this feature here: SpeechSynthesis API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7005">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7005">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7006">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7006">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7007">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7007">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7008">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7008">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7009">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7009">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7010">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7010">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7011">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7011">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7012">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7012">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7013">GP 唯一名称：ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7013">GP unique name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7014">GP 名称：配置联机文本到语音转换</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7014">GP name: Configure Online Text To Speech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7015">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7015">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7016">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7016">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7017">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7017">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7018">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7018">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7019">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7019">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7020">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7020">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7021">值名称：ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7021">Value Name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7022">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7022">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7023">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7023">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7024">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7024">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7025">首选项项名称：ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7025">Preference Key Name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7026">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7026">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7027">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7027">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="configureshare"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7028">ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7028">ConfigureShare</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-share-experience"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7029">配置共享体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7029">Configure the Share experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7030">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7030">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7031">在 Windows 上自 83 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7031">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7032">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7032">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7033">如果将此策略设置为“ShareAllowed”（默认值），用户将能够从 Microsoft Edge 中的“设置及更多”菜单访问 Windows 10 共享体验，以便与系统上的其他应用共享。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7033">If you set this policy to 'ShareAllowed' (the default), users will be able to access the Windows 10 Share experience from the Settings and More Menu in Microsoft Edge to share with other apps on the system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7034">如果将此策略设置为“ShareDisallowed”，用户将无法访问 Windows 10 共享体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7034">If you set this policy to 'ShareDisallowed', users won't be able to access the Windows 10 Share experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7035">如果“共享"按钮位于工具栏上，它也将被隐藏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7035">If the Share button is on the toolbar, it will also be hidden.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7036">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7036">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7037">ShareAllowed (0) = 允许使用共享体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7037">ShareAllowed (0) = Allow using the Share experience</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7038">ShareDisallowed (1) = 不允许使用共享体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7038">ShareDisallowed (1) = Don't allow using the Share experience</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7039">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7039">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7040">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7040">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7041">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7041">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7042">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7042">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7043">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7043">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7044">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7044">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7045">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7045">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7046">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7046">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7047">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7047">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7048">GP 唯一名称：ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7048">GP unique name: ConfigureShare</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7049">GP 名称：配置共享体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7049">GP name: Configure the Share experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7050">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7050">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7051">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7051">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7052">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7052">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7053">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7053">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7054">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7054">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7055">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7055">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7056">值名称：ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7056">Value Name: ConfigureShare</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7057">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7057">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7058">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7058">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7059">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7059">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="customhelplink"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7060">CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7060">CustomHelpLink</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-custom-help-link"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7061">指定自定义帮助链接</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7061">Specify custom help link</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7062">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7062">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7063">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 79 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7063">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7064">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7064">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7065">指定“帮助”菜单或 F1 键的链接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7065">Specify a link for the Help menu or the F1 key.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7066">如果启用此策略，管理员可以指定“帮助”菜单或 F1 键的链接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7066">If you enable this policy, an admin can specify a link for the Help menu or the F1 key.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7067">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则将使用“帮助”菜单或 F1 键的默认链接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7067">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default link for the Help menu or the F1 key is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7068">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7068">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7069">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7069">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7070">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7070">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7071">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7071">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7072">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7072">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7073">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7073">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7074">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7074">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7075">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7075">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7076">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7076">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7077">GP 唯一名称：CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7077">GP unique name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7078">GP 名称：指定自定义帮助链接</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7078">GP name: Specify custom help link</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7079">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7079">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7080">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7080">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7081">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7081">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7082">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7082">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7083">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7083">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7084">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7084">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7085">值名称：CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7085">Value Name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7086">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7086">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7087">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7087">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080734"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7088">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7088">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7089">首选项项名称：CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7089">Preference Key Name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7090">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7090">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080734</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7091">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7091">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="dnsinterceptionchecksenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7092">DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7092">DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="dns-interception-checks-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7093">已启用 DNS 拦截检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7093">DNS interception checks enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7094">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7094">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7095">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 80 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7095">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7096">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7096">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7097">此策略配置可用于禁用 DNS 拦截检查的本地开关。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7097">This policy configures a local switch that can be used to disable DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7098">这些检查将尝试发现浏览器是否位于重定向未知主机名的代理后面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7098">These checks attempt to discover whether the browser is behind a proxy that redirects unknown host names.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7099">在网络配置已知的企业环境中，可能不需要进行此检测。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7099">This detection might not be necessary in an enterprise environment where the network configuration is known.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7100">可以将其禁用，以避免启动时和每次 DNS 配置更改时出现额外的 DNS 和 HTTP 流量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7100">It can be disabled to avoid additional DNS and HTTP traffic on start-up and each DNS configuration change.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7101">如果启用或未设置此策略，则会执行 DNS 拦截检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7101">If you enable or don't set this policy, the DNS interception checks are performed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7102">如果禁用此策略，则不会执行 DNS 拦截检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7102">If you disable this policy, DNS interception checks aren't performed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7103">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7103">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7104">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7104">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7105">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7105">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7106">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7106">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7107">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7107">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7108">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7108">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7109">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7109">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7110">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7110">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7111">GP 唯一名称：DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7111">GP unique name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7112">GP 名称：已启用 DNS 拦截检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7112">GP name: DNS interception checks enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7113">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7113">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7114">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7114">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7115">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7115">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7116">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7116">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7117">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7117">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7118">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7118">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7119">值名称：DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7119">Value Name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7120">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7120">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7121">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7121">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7122">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7122">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7123">首选项项名称：DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7123">Preference Key Name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7124">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7124">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7125">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7125">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultbrowsersettingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7126">DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7126">DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-microsoft-edge-as-default-browser"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7127">将 Microsoft Edge 设为默认浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7127">Set Microsoft Edge as default browser</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7128">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7128">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7129">在 Windows 7 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7129">On Windows 7 and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7130">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7130">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7131">如果将此策略设置为 true，Microsoft Edge 将检查它是否为默认浏览器，并且在可能的情况下会自动注册。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7131">If you set this policy to True, Microsoft Edge always checks whether it's the default browser on startup and, if possible, automatically registers itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7132">如果将此策略设置为 False，则会阻止 Microsoft Edge 检查其是否为默认值，并将关闭此选项的用户控件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7132">If you set this policy to False, Microsoft Edge is stopped from ever checking if it's the default and turns user controls off for this option.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7133">如果未设置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 可让用户控制是否为默认设置，如果不是，是否应显示用户通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7133">If you don't set this policy, Microsoft Edge lets users control whether it's the default and, if not, whether user notifications should appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7134">Windows 管理员注意事项：此策略仅适用于运行 Windows 7 的电脑。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7134">Note for Windows administrators: This policy only works for PCs running Windows 7.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7135">对于较高版本的 Windows，必须部署一个“默认应用程序关联”文件，该文件使 Microsoft Edge 成为 https 和 http 协议的处理程序（也可以涵盖 FTP 协议和文件格式，如 .html、.htm、.pdf、.svg、.webp）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7135">For later versions of Windows, you have to deploy a "default application associations" file that makes Microsoft Edge the handler for the https and http protocols (and, optionally, the ftp protocol and file formats such as .html, .htm, .pdf, .svg, .webp).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7136">有关详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7136">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932) for more information.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7137">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7137">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7138">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7138">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7139">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7139">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7140">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7140">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7141">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7141">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7142">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7142">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7143">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7143">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7144">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7144">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7145">GP 唯一名称：DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7145">GP unique name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7146">GP 名称：将 Microsoft Edge 设为默认浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7146">GP name: Set Microsoft Edge as default browser</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7147">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7147">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7148">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7148">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7149">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7149">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7150">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7150">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7151">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7151">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7152">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7152">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7153">值名称：DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7153">Value Name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7154">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7154">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7155">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7155">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7156">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7156">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7157">首选项项名称：DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7157">Preference Key Name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7158">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7158">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7159">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7159">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultsearchprovidercontextmenuaccessallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7160">DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7160">DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-default-search-provider-context-menu-search-access"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7161">允许默认搜索提供程序快捷菜单搜索访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7161">Allow default search provider context menu search access</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7162">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7162">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7163">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 85 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7163">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7164">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7164">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7165">允许在上下文菜单中使用默认搜索提供程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7165">Enables the use of a default search provider on the context menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7166">如果将此策略设置为 "禁用"，则依赖于默认搜索提供程序的搜索上下文菜单项和边栏搜索将不可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7166">If you set this policy to disabled the search context menu item that relies on your default search provider and sidebar search will not be available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7167">如果将此策略设置为 "启用" 或 "未设置"，则默认搜索提供程序的搜索上下文菜单项和边栏搜索将可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7167">If this policy is set to enabled or not set, the context menu item for your default search provider and sidebar search will be available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7168">仅当启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 策略时，该策略值才适用，否则将不适用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7168">The policy value is only appled when the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) policy is enabled, and is not applicable otherwise.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7169">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7169">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7170">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7170">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7171">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7171">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7172">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7172">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7173">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7173">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7174">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7174">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7175">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7175">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7176">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7176">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7177">GP 唯一名称：DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7177">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7178">GP 名称：允许默认搜索提供程序快捷菜单搜索访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7178">GP name: Allow default search provider context menu search access</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7179">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7179">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7180">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7180">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7181">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7181">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7182">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7182">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7183">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7183">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7184">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7184">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7185">值名称：DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7185">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7186">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7186">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7187">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7187">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7188">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7188">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7189">首选项名称： DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7189">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7190">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7190">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7191">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7191">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultsensorssetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7192">DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7192">DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-sensors-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7193">默认传感器设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7193">Default sensors setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7194">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7194">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7195">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7195">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7196">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7196">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7197">设置网站是否可访问和使用诸如运动和光传感器等传感器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7197">Set whether websites can access and use sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7198">可完全阻止或允许网站获取对传感器的访问权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7198">You can completely block or allow websites to get access to sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7199">将策略设置为 “1” 可允许网站访问和使用传感器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7199">Setting the policy to 1 lets websites access and use sensors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7200">将策略设置为 “2” 将拒绝对传感器的访问。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7200">Setting the policy to 2 denies acess to sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7201">对于特定 URL 模式，可以使用 [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) 和 [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) 策略来替代此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7201">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) and [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7202">如果未配置此策略，则网站可以访问和使用传感器，用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7202">If you don't configure this policy, websites can access and use sensors, and users can change this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7203">这是 [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) 和 [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls)的全局默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7203">This is the global default for [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) and [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7204">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7204">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7205">AllowSensors (1) = 允许网站访问传感器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7205">AllowSensors (1) = Allow sites to access sensors</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7206">BlockSensors (2) = 不允许任何网站访问传感器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7206">BlockSensors (2) = Do not allow any site to access sensors</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7207">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7207">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7208">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7208">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7209">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7209">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7210">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7210">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7211">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7211">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7212">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7212">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7213">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7213">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7214">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7214">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7215">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7215">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7216">GP 唯一名称：DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7216">GP unique name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7217">GP 名称：默认传感器设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7217">GP name: Default sensors setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7218">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7218">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7219">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7219">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7220">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7220">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7221">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7221">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7222">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7222">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7223">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7223">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7224">值名称：DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7224">Value Name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7225">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7225">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7226">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7226">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7227">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7227">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7228">首选项项名称：DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7228">Preference Key Name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7229">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7229">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7230">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7230">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultserialguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7231">DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7231">DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-serial-api"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7232">控制串行 API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7232">Control use of the Serial API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7233">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7233">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7234">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7234">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7235">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7235">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7236">设置网站是否可以访问串行端口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7236">Set whether websites can access serial ports.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7237">可以完全阻止访问，也可以在网站每次想要访问串行端口时询问用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7237">You can completely block access or ask the user each time a website wants to get access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7238">将策略设置为 “3” 可允许网站请求访问串行端口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7238">Setting the policy to 3 lets websites ask for access to serial ports.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7239">将策略设置为 "2" 将拒绝访问串行端口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7239">Setting the policy to 2 denies access to serial ports.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7240">对于特定 URL 模式，可以使用 [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) 和 [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) 策略来替代此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7240">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) and [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7241">如果未配置此策略，则默认情况下，网站可以询问用户是否能访问串行端口，用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7241">If you don't configure this policy, by default, websites can ask users whether they can access a serial port, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7242">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7242">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7243">BlockSerial (2) = 不允许任何网站通过串行 API 向串行端口请求访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7243">BlockSerial (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to serial ports via the Serial API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7244">AskSerial (3) = 允许网站向用户请求访问串行端口的许可</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7244">AskSerial (3) = Allow sites to ask for user permission to access a serial port</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7245">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7245">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7246">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7246">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7247">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7247">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7248">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7248">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7249">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7249">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7250">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7250">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7251">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7251">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7252">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7252">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7253">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7253">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7254">GP 唯一名称：DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7254">GP unique name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7255">GP 名称：控制串行 API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7255">GP name: Control use of the Serial API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7256">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7256">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7257">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7257">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7258">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7258">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7259">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7259">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7260">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7260">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7261">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7261">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7262">值名称：DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7262">Value Name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7263">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7263">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7264">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7264">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7265">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7265">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7266">首选项项名称：DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7266">Preference Key Name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7267">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7267">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7268">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7268">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="definepreferredlanguages"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7269">DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7269">DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>

  #### <a name="define-an-ordered-list-of-preferred-languages-that-websites-should-display-in-if-the-site-supports-the-language"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7270">定义网站应在网站支持该语言时显示的首选语言的有序列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7270">Define an ordered list of preferred languages that websites should display in if the site supports the language</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7271">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7271">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7272">自 89 或更高版本起，在 Windows 和 macOS 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7272">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7273">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7273">Description</span></span>
