  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7274">配置 Microsoft Edge 作为 Accept-Language 请求 HTTP 标头的一部分发送到网站的语言变体，并阻止用户在 Microsoft Edge 设置中添加、删除或更改首选语言的顺序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7274">Configures the language variants that Microsoft Edge sends to websites as part of the Accept-Language request HTTP header and prevents users from adding, removing, or changing the order of preferred languages in Microsoft Edge settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7275">希望更改 Microsoft Edge 所显示或主动以其翻译页面的语言的用户将被限制为此策略中配置的语言。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7275">Users who want to change the languages Microsoft Edge displays in or offers to translate pages to will be limited to the languages configured in this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7276">如果启用此策略，网站将采用他们支持的列表的第一种语言显示，除非其他特定于网站的逻辑用于确定显示语言。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7276">If you enable this policy, websites will appear in the first language in the list that they support unless other site-specific logic is used to determine the display language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7277">此策略中定义的语言变体会覆盖配置为 [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) 策略一部分的语言。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7277">The language variants defined in this policy override the languages configured as part of the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7278">如果未配置或禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 会向网站发送用户指定的首选语言，作为 Accept-Language 请求 HTTP 标头的一部分。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7278">If you don't configure or disable this policy, Microsoft Edge sends websites the user-specified preferred languages as part of the Accept-Language request HTTP header.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7279">有关有效语言变体的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7279">For detailed information on valid language variants, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7280">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7280">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7281">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7281">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7282">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7282">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7283">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7283">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7284">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7284">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7285">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7285">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7286">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7286">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7287">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7287">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7288">GP 唯一名称：DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7288">GP unique name: DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7289">GP 名称：定义网站应在网站支持该语言时显示的首选语言的有序列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7289">GP name: Define an ordered list of preferred languages that websites should display in if the site supports the language</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7290">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7290">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7291">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7291">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7292">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7292">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7293">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7293">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7294">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7294">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7295">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7295">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7296">值名称：DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7296">Value Name: DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7297">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7297">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7298">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7298">Example value:</span></span>

```
"en-US,fr,es"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7299">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7299">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7300">首选项项名称：DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7300">Preference Key Name: DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7301">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7301">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>en-US,fr,es</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7302">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7302">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7303">DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7303">DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>

  #### <a name="require-that-the-enterprise-mode-site-list-is-available-before-tab-navigation"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7304">要求企业模式站点列表在选项卡导航前可用
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7304">Require that the Enterprise Mode Site List is available before tab navigation</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7305">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7305">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7306">在 84 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7306">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7307">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7307">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7308">允许你指定 Microsoft Edge 标签页是否在浏览器下载初始企业模式站点列表后，才会导航。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7308">Lets you specify whether Microsoft Edge tabs wait to navigate until the browser has downloaded the initial Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7309">此设置适用于应该以 Internet Explorer 模式加载浏览器主页的场景，重要的是在启用IE模式后首次运行浏览器时执行此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7309">This setting is intended for the scenario where the browser home page should load in Internet Explorer mode, and it is important that is does so on browser first run after IE mode is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7310">如果不存在此场景，我们建议不启用此设置，因为它可能会对加载主页的性能产生负面影响。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7310">If this scenario does not exist, we recommend not enabling this setting because it can negatively impact the performance of loading the home page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7311">该设置仅适用于 Microsoft Edge 没有缓存的企业模式站点列表时，比如在启用IE模式后首次运行浏览器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7311">The setting only applies when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached Enterprise Mode Site List, such as on browser first run after IE mode is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7312">此设置与以下策略配合使用：[InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) （设置为 'IEMode'） 和 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 策略 （列表至少有一个条目）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7312">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7313">该策略的超时行为可使用[NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout](#navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout)策略进行配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7313">The timeout behavior of this policy can be configured with the [NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout](#navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7314">如果将此策略设置为 'All'，当 Microsoft Edge 没有企业模式站点列表的缓存版本时，选项卡将在浏览器下载网站列表时延迟导航。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7314">If you set this policy to 'All', when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached version of the Enterprise Mode Site List, tabs delay navigating until the browser has downloaded the site list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7315">由站点列表配置为以 Internet Explorer 模式打开的网站将以 Internet Explorer 模式加载，即使是在浏览器的初始导航期间。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7315">Sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode by the site list will load in Internet Explorer mode, even during the initial navigation of the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7316">不能被配置为在 Internet Explorer 中打开的站点，比如使用 http:， https:，file:， 或 ftp: 以外的方案的站点，不会在 Edge 模式下立即延迟导航和加载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7316">Sites that cannot possibly be configured to open in Internet Explorer, such as any site with a scheme other than http:, https:, file:, or ftp: do not delay navigating and load immediately in Edge mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7317">如果将此策略设置为 'None' 或不对其进行配置，则当 Microsoft Edge 不具有缓存版本的企业模式站点列表时，选项卡将立即导航，而不会等待浏览器下载企业模式站点列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7317">If you set this policy to 'None' or don't configure it, when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached version of the Enterprise Mode Site List, tabs will navigate immediately, and not wait for the browser to download the Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7318">站点列表配置为在 Internet Explorer 模式下打开的站点将在 Microsoft Edge 模式下打开，直到浏览器完成企业模式站点列表的下载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7318">Sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode by the site list will open in Microsoft Edge mode until the browser has finished downloading the Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7319">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7319">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7320">None (0) = None</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7320">None (0) = None</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7321">All (1) = 所有符合条件的导航</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7321">All (1) = All eligible navigations</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7322">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7322">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7323">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7323">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7324">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7324">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7325">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7325">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7326">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7326">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7327">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7327">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7328">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7328">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7329">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7329">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7330">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7330">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7331">GP 唯一名称： DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7331">GP unique name: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7332">GP 名称：要求企业模式站点列表在选项卡导航前可用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7332">GP name: Require that the Enterprise Mode Site List is available before tab navigation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7333">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7333">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7334">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7334">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7335">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7335">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7336">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7336">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7337">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7337">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7338">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7338">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7339">值名称： DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7339">Value Name: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7340">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7340">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7341">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7341">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7342">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7342">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="deletedataonmigration"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7343">DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7343">DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>

  #### <a name="delete-old-browser-data-on-migration"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7344">迁移时删除旧的浏览器数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7344">Delete old browser data on migration</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7345">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7345">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7346">在 Windows 上自 83 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7346">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7347">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7347">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7348">此策略确定在迁移到 Microsoft Edge 81 或更高版本后是否删除 Microsoft Edge 旧版中的用户浏览数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7348">This policy determines whether user browsing data from Microsoft Edge Legacy will be deleted after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7349">如果将此策略设置为“已启用”，则迁移到 Microsoft Edge 81 或更高版本后，Microsoft Edge 旧版中的所有浏览数据都将被删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7349">If you set this policy to "Enabled", all browsing data from Microsoft Edge Legacy after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later will be deleted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7350">必须在迁移到 Microsoft Edge 81 或更高版本之前设置此策略，以对现有浏览数据产生任何影响。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7350">This policy must be set before migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later to have any effect on existing browsing data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7351">如果将此策略设置为“已禁用”，或者未配置此策略，则在迁移到 Microsoft Edge 83 或更高版本后，不会删除用户浏览数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7351">If you set this policy to "Disabled", or the policy is not configured, user browsing data isn't deleted after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 83 or later.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7352">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7352">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7353">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7353">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7354">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7354">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7355">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7355">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7356">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7356">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7357">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7357">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7358">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7358">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7359">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7359">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7360">GP 唯一名称：DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7360">GP unique name: DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7361">GP 名称：迁移时删除旧的浏览器数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7361">GP name: Delete old browser data on migration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7362">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7362">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7363">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7363">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7364">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7364">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7365">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7365">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7366">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7366">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7367">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7367">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7368">值名称：DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7368">Value Name: DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7369">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7369">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7370">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7370">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7371">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7371">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="developertoolsavailability"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7372">DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7372">DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-where-developer-tools-can-be-used"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7373">控制可使用开发人员工具的位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7373">Control where developer tools can be used</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7374">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7374">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7375">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7375">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7376">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7376">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7377">控制可使用开发人员工具的位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7377">Control where developer tools can be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7378">如果将此策略设置为“DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions”（默认值），则用户通常可以访问开发人员工具和 JavaScript 控制台，但不能在企业策略安装的扩展上下文中访问。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7378">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions' (the default), users can access the developer tools and the JavaScript console in general, but not in the context of extensions installed by enterprise policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7379">如果将此策略设置为“DeveloperToolsAllowed”，则用户可以在所有上下文中访问开发人员工具和 JavaScript 控制台，包括企业策略安装的扩展在内。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7379">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsAllowed', users can access the developer tools and the JavaScript console in all contexts, including extensions installed by enterprise policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7380">如果将此策略设置为“DeveloperToolsDisallowed”，用户将无法访问开发人员工具或检查网站元素。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7380">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsDisallowed', users can't access the developer tools or inspect website elements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7381">打开开发人员工具或 JavaScript 控制台的键盘快捷方式和菜单或上下文菜单项将被禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7381">Keyboard shortcuts and menu or context menu entries that open the developer tools or the JavaScript Console are disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7382">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7382">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7383">DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions (0) = 阻止开发人员工具使用企业策略安装的扩展，并在其他情况下允许使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7383">DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions (0) = Block the developer tools on extensions installed by enterprise policy, allow in other contexts</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7384">DeveloperToolsAllowed (1) = 允许使用开发人员工具</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7384">DeveloperToolsAllowed (1) = Allow using the developer tools</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7385">DeveloperToolsDisallowed (2) = 不允许使用开发人员工具</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7385">DeveloperToolsDisallowed (2) = Don't allow using the developer tools</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7386">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7386">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7387">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7387">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7388">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7388">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7389">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7389">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7390">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7390">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7391">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7391">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7392">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7392">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7393">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7393">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7394">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7394">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7395">GP 唯一名称：DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7395">GP unique name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7396">GP 名称：控制可使用开发人员工具的位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7396">GP name: Control where developer tools can be used</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7397">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7397">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7398">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7398">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7399">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7399">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7400">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7400">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7401">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7401">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7402">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7402">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7403">值名称：DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7403">Value Name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7404">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7404">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7405">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7405">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7406">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7406">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7407">首选项项名称：DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7407">Preference Key Name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7408">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7408">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7409">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7409">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="diagnosticdata"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7410">DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7410">DiagnosticData</span></span>

  #### <a name="send-required-and-optional-diagnostic-data-about-browser-usage"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7411">发送有关浏览器使用情况的必需和可选诊断数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7411">Send required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7412">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7412">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7413">在 Windows 7 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7413">On Windows 7 and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7414">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7414">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7415">此策略控制向 Microsoft 发送有关浏览器使用情况的必需和可选诊断数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7415">This policy controls sending required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7416">收集所需的诊断数据可确保 Microsoft Edge 安全、最新且按预期运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7416">Required diagnostic data is collected keep Microsoft Edge secure, up to date and performing as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7417">可选诊断数据包括向 Microsoft 发送的用于改进产品和服务的有关浏览器使用情况、访问的网站以及故障报告的数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7417">Optional diagnostic data includes data about how you use the browser, websites you visit and crash reports to Microsoft for product and service improvement.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7418">Windows 10 设备不支持此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7418">This policy is not supported on Windows 10 devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7419">若要在 Windows 10 上控制此数据收集，IT 管理员必须使用 Windows 诊断数据组策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7419">To control this data collection on Windows 10, IT admins must use the Windows diagnostic data group policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7420">根据 Windows 版本的不同，此策略将是“允许遥测”或“允许诊断数据”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7420">This policy will either be 'Allow Telemetry' or 'Allow Diagnostic Data', depending on the version of Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7421">详细了解 Windows 10 诊断数据收集：[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7421">Learn more about Windows 10 diagnostic data collection: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7422">使用以下设置之一配置此策略：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7422">Use one of the following settings to configure this policy:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7423">'Off' 会关闭必需和可选的诊断数据收集。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7423">'Off' turns off required and optional diagnostic data collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7424">不建议使用此选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7424">This option is not recommended.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7425">'RequiredData' 会发送必需的诊断数据，但关闭可选的诊断数据收集。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7425">'RequiredData' sends required diagnostic data but turns off optional diagnostic data collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7426">Microsoft Edge 会发送必需的诊断数据，以确保 Microsoft Edge 安全、最新且按预期运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7426">Microsoft Edge will send required diagnostic data to keep Microsoft Edge secure, up to date and performing as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7427">'OptionalData' 会发送可选诊断数据，包括向 Microsoft 发送的用于改进产品和服务的有关浏览器使用情况、访问的网站以及故障报告的数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7427">'OptionalData' sends optional diagnostic data includes data about browser usage, websites that are visited, crash reports sent to Microsoft for product and service improvement.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7428">对于 Windows 7/macOS，此策略控制向 Microsoft 发送的必需和可选数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7428">On Windows 7/macOS, this policy controls sending required and optional data to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7429">如果未配置或已禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将默认使用用户首选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7429">If you don't configure this policy or disable it, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7430">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7430">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7431">Off (0) = 关闭（不推荐）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7431">Off (0) = Off (Not recommended)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7432">RequiredData (1) = 必需数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7432">RequiredData (1) = Required data</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7433">OptionalData (2) = 可选数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7433">OptionalData (2) = Optional data</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7434">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7434">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7435">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7435">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7436">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7436">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7437">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7437">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7438">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7438">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7439">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7439">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7440">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7440">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7441">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7441">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7442">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7442">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7443">GP 唯一名称：DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7443">GP unique name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7444">GP 名称：发送有关浏览器使用情况的必需和可选诊断数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7444">GP name: Send required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7445">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7445">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7446">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7446">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7447">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7447">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7448">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7448">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7449">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7449">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7450">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7450">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7451">值名称：DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7451">Value Name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7452">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7452">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7453">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7453">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7454">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7454">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7455">首选密钥名称：DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7455">Preference Key Name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7456">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7456">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7457">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7457">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="directinvokeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7458">DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7458">DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-open-files-using-the-directinvoke-protocol"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7459">允许用户使用 DirectInvoke 协议打开文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7459">Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7460">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7460">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7461">在 Windows 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7461">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7462">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7462">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7463">允许用户使用 DirectInvoke 协议打开文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7463">Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7464">通过 DirectInvoke 协议，网站可请求浏览器使用用户计算机或设备上的特定文件处理程序从特定 URL 打开文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7464">The DirectInvoke protocol allows websites to request that the browser open files from a specific URL using a specific file handler on the user's computer or device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7465">如果启用或未配置此策略，用户可以使用 DirectInvoke 协议打开文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7465">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7466">如果禁用此策略，用户将无法使用 DirectInvoke 协议打开文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7466">If you disable this policy, users can't open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7467">而是将文件保存到文件系统。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7467">Instead, the file will be saved to the file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7468">注意：禁用 DirectInvoke 可能会导致某些 Microsoft SharePoint Online 功能无法按预期工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7468">Note: Disabling DirectInvoke may prevent certain Microsoft SharePoint Online features from working as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7469">有关 DirectInvoke 的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) 和 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7469">For more information about DirectInvoke, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) and [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7470">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7470">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7471">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7471">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7472">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7472">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7473">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7473">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7474">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7474">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7475">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7475">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7476">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7476">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7477">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7477">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7478">GP 唯一名称：DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7478">GP unique name: DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7479">GP 名称：允许用户使用 DirectInvoke 协议打开文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7479">GP name: Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7480">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7480">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7481">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7481">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7482">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7482">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7483">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7483">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7484">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7484">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7485">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7485">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7486">值名称：DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7486">Value Name: DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7487">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7487">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7488">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7488">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7489">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7489">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="disable3dapis"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7490">Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7490">Disable3DAPIs</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-support-for-3d-graphics-apis"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7491">禁用对 3D 图形 API 的支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7491">Disable support for 3D graphics APIs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7492">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7492">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7493">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7493">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7494">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7494">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7495">阻止网页访问图形处理单元 (GPU)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7495">Prevent web pages from accessing the graphics processing unit (GPU).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7496">具体而言，网页无法访问 WebGL API，插件无法使用 Pepper 3D API。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7496">Specifically, web pages can't access the WebGL API and plug-ins can't use the Pepper 3D API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7497">如果未配置或禁用此策略，则可能允许网页使用 WebGL API 并允许插件使用 Pepper 3D API。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7497">If you don't configure or disable this policy, it potentially allows web pages to use the WebGL API and plug-ins to use the Pepper 3D API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7498">默认情况下，Microsoft Edge 可能仍需要传递命令行参数才能使用这些 API。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7498">Microsoft Edge might, by default, still require command line arguments to be passed in order to use these APIs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7499">如果将 [HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled](#hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled) 策略设置为 false，则会忽略“Disable3DAPIs”策略的设置 - 其等效于将“Disable3DAPIs”策略设置为 true。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7499">If [HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled](#hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled) policy is set to false, the setting for 'Disable3DAPIs' policy is ignored - it's the equivalent of setting 'Disable3DAPIs' policy to true.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7500">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7500">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7501">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7501">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7502">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7502">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7503">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7503">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7504">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7504">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7505">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7505">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7506">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7506">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7507">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7507">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7508">GP 唯一名称：Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7508">GP unique name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7509">GP 名称：禁用对 3D 图形 API 的支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7509">GP name: Disable support for 3D graphics APIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7510">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7510">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7511">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7511">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7512">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7512">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7513">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7513">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7514">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7514">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7515">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7515">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7516">值名称：Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7516">Value Name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7517">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7517">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7518">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7518">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7519">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7519">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7520">首选项项名称：Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7520">Preference Key Name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7521">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7521">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7522">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7522">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="disablescreenshots"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7523">DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7523">DisableScreenshots</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-taking-screenshots"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7524">禁止拍摄屏幕截图</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7524">Disable taking screenshots</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7525">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7525">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7526">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7526">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7527">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7527">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7528">控制用户是否可以拍摄浏览器页面的屏幕截图。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7528">Controls if users can take screenshots of the browser page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7529">如果启用，则用户不能使用键盘快捷方式或扩展 API 拍摄屏幕截图。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7529">If enabled, user can't take screenshots by using keyboard shortcuts or extension APIs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7530">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则用户可以拍摄屏幕截图。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7530">If disabled or don't configure this policy, users can take screenshots.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7531">请注意，此策略控制从浏览器本身拍摄的屏幕截图。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7531">Please note this policy controls screenshots taken from within the browser itself.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7532">即使启用此策略，用户可能仍然能够使用浏览器之外的某种方法（如使用操作系统功能或其他应用程序）拍摄屏幕截图。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7532">Even if you enable this policy, users might still be able to take screenshots using some method outside of the browser (like using an operating system feature or another application).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7533">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7533">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7534">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7534">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7535">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7535">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7536">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7536">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7537">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7537">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7538">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7538">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7539">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7539">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7540">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7540">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7541">GP 唯一名称：DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7541">GP unique name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7542">GP 名称：禁止拍摄屏幕截图</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7542">GP name: Disable taking screenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7543">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7543">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7544">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7544">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7545">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7545">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7546">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7546">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7547">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7547">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7548">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7548">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7549">值名称：DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7549">Value Name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7550">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7550">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7551">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7551">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7552">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7552">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7553">首选项项名称：DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7553">Preference Key Name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7554">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7554">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7555">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7555">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="diskcachedir"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7556">DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7556">DiskCacheDir</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-disk-cache-directory"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7557">设置磁盘缓存目录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7557">Set disk cache directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7558">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7558">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7559">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7559">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7560">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7560">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7561">配置用于存储缓存文件的目录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7561">Configures the directory to use to store cached files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7562">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将使用提供的目录，而不管用户是否指定了“--disk-cache-dir”标志。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7562">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory regardless of whether the user has specified the '--disk-cache-dir' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7563">为避免数据丢失或其他意外错误，请不要将此策略配置为卷的根目录或用于其他目的的目录，因为 Microsoft Edge 负责管理其内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7563">To avoid data loss or other unexpected errors, don't configure this policy to a volume's root directory or to a directory used for other purposes, because Microsoft Edge manages its contents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7564">有关指定目录和路径时可使用的变量列表，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7564">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables you can use when specifying directories and paths.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7565">如果未配置此策略，则将使用默认缓存目录，用户可以使用“--disk-cache-dir”命令行标志替代该默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7565">If you don't configure this policy, the default cache directory is used, and users can override that default with the '--disk-cache-dir' command line flag.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7566">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7566">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7567">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7567">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7568">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7568">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7569">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7569">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7570">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7570">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7571">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7571">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7572">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7572">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7573">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7573">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7574">GP 唯一名称：DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7574">GP unique name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7575">GP 名称：设置磁盘缓存目录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7575">GP name: Set disk cache directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7576">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7576">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7577">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7577">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7578">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7578">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7579">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7579">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7580">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7580">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7581">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7581">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7582">值名称：DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7582">Value Name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7583">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7583">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7584">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7584">Example value:</span></span>

```
"${user_home}/Edge_cache"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7585">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7585">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7586">首选项项名称：DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7586">Preference Key Name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7587">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7587">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>${user_home}/Edge_cache</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7588">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7588">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="diskcachesize"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7589">DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7589">DiskCacheSize</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-disk-cache-size-in-bytes"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7590">设置磁盘缓存大小（以字节为单位）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7590">Set disk cache size, in bytes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7591">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7591">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7592">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7592">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7593">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7593">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7594">配置用于在磁盘上存储文件的缓存大小（以字节为单位）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7594">Configures the size of the cache, in bytes, used to store files on the disk.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7595">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将使用提供的缓存大小，而不管用户是否指定了“--disk-cache-size”标志。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7595">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided cache size regardless of whether the user has specified the '--disk-cache-size' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7596">此策略中指定的值不是硬边界，而是对缓存系统的建议；任何小于几兆字节的值都太小，将被舍入到一个合理的最小值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7596">The value specified in this policy isn't a hard boundary but rather a suggestion to the caching system; any value below a few megabytes is too small and will be rounded up to a reasonable minimum.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7597">如果将此策略的值设为 0，则使用默认缓存大小，用户不能更改它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7597">If you set the value of this policy to 0, the default cache size is used, and users can't change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7598">如果未配置此策略，则使用默认大小，但用户可以使用“--disk-cache-size”标志替代它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7598">If you don't configure this policy, the default size is used, but users can override it with the '--disk-cache-size' flag.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7599">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7599">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7600">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7600">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7601">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7601">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7602">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7602">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7603">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7603">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7604">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7604">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7605">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7605">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7606">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7606">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7607">GP 唯一名称：DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7607">GP unique name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7608">GP 名称：设置磁盘缓存大小（以字节为单位）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7608">GP name: Set disk cache size, in bytes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7609">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7609">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7610">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7610">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7611">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7611">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7612">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7612">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7613">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7613">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7614">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7614">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7615">值名称：DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7615">Value Name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7616">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7616">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7617">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7617">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x06400000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7618">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7618">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7619">首选项项名称：DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7619">Preference Key Name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7620">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7620">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>104857600</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7621">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7621">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="dnsoverhttpsmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7622">DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7622">DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-the-mode-of-dns-over-https"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7623">控制 DNS-over-HTTPS 的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7623">Control the mode of DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7624">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7624">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7625">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 83 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7625">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7626">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7626">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7627">控制 DNS-over-HTTPS 解析程序的模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7627">Control the mode of the DNS-over-HTTPS resolver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7628">请注意，此策略仅为每个查询设置默认模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7628">Note that this policy will only set the default mode for each query.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7629">对于特殊类型的查询（例如，解析 DNS-over-HTTPS 服务器主机名的请求），可以替代该模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7629">The mode can be overridden for special types of queries such as requests to resolve a DNS-over-HTTPS server hostname.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7630">“off”模式将禁用 DNS-over-HTTPS。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7630">The "off" mode will disable DNS-over-HTTPS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7631">“automatic”模式将首先发送 DNS-over-HTTPS 查询（如果有 DNS-over-HTTPS 服务器可用），并且在发生错误时可能回退到发送不安全的查询。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7631">The "automatic" mode will send DNS-over-HTTPS queries first if a DNS-over-HTTPS server is available and may fallback to sending insecure queries on error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7632">“secure”模式只会发送 DNS-over-HTTPS 查询，并且在发生错误时无法解析。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7632">The "secure" mode will only send DNS-over-HTTPS queries and will fail to resolve on error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7633">如果未配置此策略，浏览器可能会将 DNS-over-HTTPS 请求发送到与用户配置的系统解析程序关联的解析程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7633">If you don't configure this policy, the browser might send DNS-over-HTTPS requests to a resolver associated with the user's configured system resolver.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7634">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7634">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7635">off (off) = 禁用 DNS-over-HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7635">off (off) = Disable DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7636">automatic (automatic) = 启用不安全回退的 DNS-over-HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7636">automatic (automatic) = Enable DNS-over-HTTPS with insecure fallback</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7637">secure (secure) = 启用不安全回退的 DNS-over-HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7637">secure (secure) = Enable DNS-over-HTTPS without insecure fallback</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7638">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7638">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7639">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7639">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7640">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7640">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7641">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7641">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7642">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7642">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7643">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7643">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7644">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7644">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7645">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7645">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7646">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7646">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7647">GP 唯一名称：DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7647">GP unique name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7648">GP 名称：控制 DNS-over-HTTPS 的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7648">GP name: Control the mode of DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7649">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7649">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7650">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7650">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7651">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7651">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7652">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7652">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7653">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7653">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7654">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7654">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7655">值名称：DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7655">Value Name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7656">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7656">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7657">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7657">Example value:</span></span>

```
"off"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7658">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7658">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7659">首选项项名称：DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7659">Preference Key Name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7660">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7660">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>off</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7661">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7661">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="dnsoverhttpstemplates"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7662">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7662">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-uri-template-of-desired-dns-over-https-resolver"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7663">指定所需 DNS-over-HTTPS 解析程序的 URI 模板</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7663">Specify URI template of desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7664">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7664">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7665">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 83 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7665">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7666">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7666">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7667">所需 DNS-over-HTTPS 解析程序的 URI 模板。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7667">The URI template of the desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7668">要指定多个 DNS-over-HTTPS 解析程序，请用空格分隔相应的 URI 模板。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7668">To specify multiple DNS-over-HTTPS resolvers, separate the corresponding URI templates with spaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7669">如果将 [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) 设置为“secure”，则必须设置此策略，并且该策略不能为空。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7669">If you set [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) to "secure" then this policy must be set and cannot be empty.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7670">如果将 [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) 设置为“automatic”并且设置了此策略，则将使用指定的 URI 模板。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7670">If you set [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) to "automatic" and this policy is set then the URI templates specified will be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7671">如果未设置此策略，则将使用硬编码映射来尝试将用户的当前 DNS 解析程序升级到由同一提供程序操作的 DOH 解析程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7671">If you don't set this policy, then hardcoded mappings will be used to attempt to upgrade the user's current DNS resolver to a DoH resolver operated by the same provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7672">如果 URI 模板包含 DNS 变量，则向解析程序发出的请求将使用 GET；否则，请求将使用 POST。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7672">If the URI template contains a dns variable, requests to the resolver will use GET; otherwise requests will use POST.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7673">格式不正确的模板将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7673">Incorrectly formatted templates will be ignored.</span></span>
