  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7674">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7674">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7675">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7675">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7676">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7676">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7677">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7677">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7678">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7678">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7679">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7679">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7680">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7680">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7681">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7681">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7682">GP 唯一名称：DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7682">GP unique name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7683">GP 名称：指定所需 DNS-over-HTTPS 解析程序的 URI 模板</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7683">GP name: Specify URI template of desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7684">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7684">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7685">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7685">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7686">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7686">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7687">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7687">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7688">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7688">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7689">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7689">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7690">值名称：DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7690">Value Name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7691">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7691">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7692">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7692">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7693">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7693">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7694">首选项项名称：DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7694">Preference Key Name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7695">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7695">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7696">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7696">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="downloaddirectory"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7697">DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7697">DownloadDirectory</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-download-directory"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7698">设置下载目录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7698">Set download directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7699">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7699">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7700">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7700">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7701">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7701">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7702">配置下载文件时要使用的目录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7702">Configures the directory to use when downloading files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7703">如果启用此策略，则无论用户已指定了一个目录，还是选择每次都提示提供下载位置，Microsoft Edge 都将使用提供的目录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7703">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory regardless of whether the user has specified one or chosen to be prompted for download location every time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7704">有关可使用的变量列表，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7704">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables that can be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7705">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则使用默认下载目录，用户可以更改它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7705">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default download directory is used, and the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7706">如果设置了无效路径，Microsoft Edge 将默认为用户的默认下载目录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7706">If you set an invalid path, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's default download directory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7707">如果路径指定的文件夹不存在，则下载操作将触发提示，询问用户要将其下载保存到何处。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7707">If the folder specified by the path doesn't exist, the download will trigger a prompt that asks the user where they want to save their download.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7708">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7708">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7709">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7709">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7710">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7710">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7711">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7711">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7712">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7712">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7713">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7713">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7714">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7714">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7715">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7715">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7716">GP 唯一名称：DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7716">GP unique name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7717">GP 名称：设置下载目录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7717">GP name: Set download directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7718">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7718">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7719">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7719">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7720">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7720">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7721">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7721">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7722">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7722">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7723">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7723">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7724">值名称：DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7724">Value Name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7725">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7725">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7726">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7726">Example value:</span></span>

```
"\n      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads\n      Windows: C:\\Users\\${user_name}\\Downloads"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7727">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7727">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7728">首选项项名称：DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7728">Preference Key Name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7729">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7729">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>
      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads
      Windows: C:\Users\${user_name}\Downloads</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7730">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7730">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="downloadrestrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7731">DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7731">DownloadRestrictions</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-download-restrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7732">允许下载限制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7732">Allow download restrictions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7733">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7733">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7734">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7734">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7735">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7735">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7736">配置 Microsoft Edge 完全阻止的下载类型，而不允许用户替代安全决策。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7736">Configures the type of downloads that Microsoft Edge completely blocks, without letting users override the security decision.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7737">设置 'BlockDangerousDownloads' 可允许所有下载，但带有 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告的下载除外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7737">Set 'BlockDangerousDownloads' to allow all downloads except for those that carry Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7738">设置 'BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads' 可允许所有下载，但带有 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告的潜在危险或不需要的下载除外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7738">Set 'BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads' to allow all downloads except for those that carry Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings of potentially dangerous or unwanted downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7739">设置 "BlockAllDownloads" 以阻止所有下载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7739">Set 'BlockAllDownloads' to block all downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7740">如果未配置此策略或设置 'DefaultDownloadSecurity' 选项，则下载将根据 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 分析结果执行常规安全限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7740">If you don't configure this policy or set the 'DefaultDownloadSecurity' option, the downloads go through the usual security restrictions based on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen analysis results.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7741">请注意，这些限制适用于网页内容中的下载以及“下载链接...”上下文菜单选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7741">Note that these restrictions apply to downloads from web page content, as well as the 'download link...' context menu option.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7742">这些限制不适用于保存或下载当前显示的页面，也不适用于打印选项中的“另存为 PDF”选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7742">These restrictions don't apply to saving or downloading the currently displayed page, nor do they apply to the Save as PDF option from the printing options.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7743">有关 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7743">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934) for more info on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7744">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7744">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7745">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = 无特殊限制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7745">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = No special restrictions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7746">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = 阻止危险下载</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7746">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = Block dangerous downloads</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7747">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = 阻止潜在的危险或有害下载</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7747">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = Block potentially dangerous or unwanted downloads</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7748">BlockAllDownloads (3) = 阻止所有下载</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7748">BlockAllDownloads (3) = Block all downloads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7749">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7749">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7750">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7750">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7751">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7751">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7752">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7752">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7753">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7753">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7754">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7754">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7755">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7755">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7756">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7756">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7757">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7757">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7758">GP 唯一名称：DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7758">GP unique name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7759">GP 名称：允许下载限制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7759">GP name: Allow download restrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7760">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7760">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7761">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7761">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7762">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7762">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7763">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7763">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7764">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7764">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7765">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7765">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7766">值名称：DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7766">Value Name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7767">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7767">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7768">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7768">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7769">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7769">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7770">首选项项名称：DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7770">Preference Key Name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7771">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7771">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7772">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7772">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="edgecollectionsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7773">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7773">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-the-collections-feature"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7774">启用“集锦”功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7774">Enable the Collections feature</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7775">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7775">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7776">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7776">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7777">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7777">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7778">可让用户访问“集锦”功能，他们可在其中使用 Office 集成更高效地收集、组织、共享和导出内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7778">Lets you allow users to access the Collections feature, where they can collect, organize, share, and export content more efficiently and with Office integration.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7779">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以访问和使用 Microsoft Edge 中的“集锦”功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7779">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can access and use the Collections feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7780">如果禁用此策略，用户将无法访问和使用 Microsoft Edge 中的“集锦”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7780">If you disable this policy, users can't access and use Collections in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7781">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7781">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7782">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7782">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7783">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7783">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7784">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7784">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7785">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7785">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7786">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7786">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7787">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7787">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7788">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7788">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7789">GP 唯一名称：EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7789">GP unique name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7790">GP 名称：启用“集锦”功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7790">GP name: Enable the Collections feature</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7791">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7791">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7792">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7792">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7793">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7793">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7794">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7794">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7795">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7795">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7796">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7796">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7797">值名称：EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7797">Value Name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7798">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7798">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7799">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7799">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7800">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7800">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7801">首选项项名称：EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7801">Preference Key Name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7802">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7802">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7803">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7803">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="edgeshoppingassistantenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7804">EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7804">EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="shopping-in-microsoft-edge-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7805">已启用在 Microsoft Edge 中购物的功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7805">Shopping in Microsoft Edge Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7806">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7806">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7807">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自87或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7807">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7808">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7808">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7809">通过此策略，用户可以比较正在查看的产品的价格、从其所在网站获取优惠券或折扣、自动应用优惠券并且使用自动填充数据帮助更快地结账。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7809">This policy lets users compare the prices of a product they are looking at, get coupons or rebates from the website they're on, auto-apply coupons and help checkout faster using autofill data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7810">如果启用或不配置此策略，则价格比较、优惠券、折扣和快速结帐等购物功能将自动应用于零售域。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7810">If you enable or don't configure this policy, shopping features such as price comparison, coupons, rebates and express checkout will be automatically applied for retail domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7811">系统将从服务器提取当前零售商的优惠券和其他零售商提供的价格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7811">Coupons for the current retailer and prices from other retailers will be fetched from a server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7812">如果禁用此策略购物功能，则不会自动针对零售域应用价格比较、优惠券、折扣和快速结帐等购物功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7812">If you disable this policy shopping features such as price comparison, coupons, rebates and express checkout will not be automatically found for retail domains.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7813">从版本 90.0.818.56 开始，也可通过地址栏下方的水平横幅让用户知道购物域上有优惠券、折扣、价格比较或价格历史记录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7813">Starting in version 90.0.818.56, the behavior of the messaging letting users know that there is a coupon, rebate, price comparison or price history available on shopping domains is also done through a horizontal banner below the address bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7814">以前，此消息是在地址栏上显示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7814">Previously this messaging was done on the address bar.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7815">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7815">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7816">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7816">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7817">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7817">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7818">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7818">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7819">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7819">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7820">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7820">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7821">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7821">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7822">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7822">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7823">GP 唯一名称：EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7823">GP unique name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7824">GP 名称：已启用在 Microsoft Edge 中购物的功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7824">GP name: Shopping in Microsoft Edge Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7825">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7825">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7826">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7826">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7827">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7827">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7828">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7828">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7829">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7829">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7830">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7830">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7831">值名称：EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7831">Value Name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7832">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7832">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7833">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7833">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7834">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7834">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7835">首选项项名称：EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7835">Preference Key Name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7836">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7836">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7837">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7837">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="editfavoritesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7838">EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7838">EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allows-users-to-edit-favorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7839">允许用户编辑收藏夹</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7839">Allows users to edit favorites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7840">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7840">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7841">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7841">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7842">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7842">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7843">启用此策略后，用户可添加、删除和修改收藏夹。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7843">Enable this policy to let users add, remove, and modify favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7844">如果未配置该策略，则这是默认行为。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7844">This is the default behavior if you don't configure the policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7845">禁用此策略后，用户将无法添加、删除或修改收藏夹。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7845">Disable this policy to stop users from adding, removing, or modifying favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7846">他们仍然可以使用现有收藏夹。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7846">They can still use existing favorites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7847">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7847">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7848">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7848">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7849">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7849">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7850">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7850">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7851">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7851">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7852">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7852">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7853">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7853">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7854">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7854">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7855">GP 唯一名称：EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7855">GP unique name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7856">GP 名称：允许用户编辑收藏夹</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7856">GP name: Allows users to edit favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7857">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7857">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7858">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7858">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7859">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7859">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7860">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7860">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7861">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7861">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7862">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7862">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7863">值名称：EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7863">Value Name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7864">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7864">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7865">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7865">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7866">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7866">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7867">首选项项名称：EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7867">Preference Key Name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7868">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7868">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7869">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7869">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="enabledeprecatedwebplatformfeatures"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7870">EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7870">EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>

  #### <a name="re-enable-deprecated-web-platform-features-for-a-limited-time-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7871">Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time (obsolete)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7871">Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7872">已过时：此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 86 后不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7872">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 86.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7873">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7873">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7874">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 起至 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7874">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 86</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7875">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7875">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7876">此策略已过时，因为现有的专用 web 平台策略用于管理单个 web 平台功能 deprecations。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7876">This policy is obsolete because dedicated web platform policies are now used to manage individual web platform feature deprecations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7877">指定要临时重新启用的已弃用 Web 平台功能的列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7877">Specify a list of deprecated web platform features to temporarily re-enable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7878">通过此策略，可在有限的时间内重新启用已弃用的 Web 平台功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7878">This policy lets you re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7879">功能由字符串标记标识。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7879">Features are identified by a string tag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7880">如果未配置此策略，列表为空，或者某个功能与支持的字符串标记之一不匹配，则所有已弃用的 Web 平台功能将保持禁用状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7880">If you don't configure this policy, if the list is empty, or if a feature doesn't match one of the supported string tags, all deprecated web platform features remain disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7881">虽然该策略本身在上述平台上受支持，但它启用的功能可能并非在所有这些平台上都可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7881">While the policy itself is supported on the above platforms, the feature it's enabling might not be available on all of those platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7882">并非所有已弃用的 Web 平台功能都可以重新启用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7882">Not all deprecated Web Platform features can be re-enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7883">只有下面明确列出的功能才能重新启用，并且只能在有限的时间内重新启用，具体情况因功能而异。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7883">Only those explicitly listed below can be re-enabled, and only for a limited period of time, which differs per feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7884">可以在 https://bit.ly/blinkintents 查看 Web 平台功能更改背后的意图。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7884">You can review the intent behind the Web Platform feature changes at https://bit.ly/blinkintents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7885">字符串标记的常规格式为 [DeprecatedFeatureName]_EffectiveUntil[yyyymmdd]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7885">The general format of the string tag is [DeprecatedFeatureName]_EffectiveUntil[yyyymmdd].</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7886">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7886">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7887">ExampleDeprecatedFeature (ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902) = 启用 ExampleDeprecatedFeature API 直至 2008/09/02</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7887">ExampleDeprecatedFeature (ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902) = Enable ExampleDeprecatedFeature API through 2008/09/02</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7888">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7888">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7889">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7889">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7890">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7890">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7891">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7891">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7892">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7892">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7893">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7893">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7894">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7894">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7895">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7895">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7896">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7896">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7897">GP 唯一名称：EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7897">GP unique name: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7898">GP name: Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time (obsolete)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7898">GP name: Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7899">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7899">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7900">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7900">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7901">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7901">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7902">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7902">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7903">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7903">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7904">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7904">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7905">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7905">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7906">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7906">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7907">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7907">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures\1 = "ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7908">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7908">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7909">首选项项名称：EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7909">Preference Key Name: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7910">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7910">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7911">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7911">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="enabledomainactionsdownload"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7912">EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7912">EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-domain-actions-download-from-microsoft-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7913">启用 Microsoft 中的域操作下载（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7913">Enable Domain Actions Download from Microsoft (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7914">已过时：该策略已过时，Microsoft Edge 版本 84 后将无法正常工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7914">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7915">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7915">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7916">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 起至 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7916">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 84</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7917">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7917">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7918">由于应避免冲突状态，此策略无效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7918">This policy doesn't work because conflicting states should be avoided.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7919">此策略用于启用/禁用域操作列表下载，但它并不总是能达到所需状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7919">This policy was used to enable/disable download of the domain actions list, but it didn't always achieve the desired state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7920">负责处理下载的试验和配置服务有自己的策略来配置从服务下载的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7920">The Experimentation and Configuration Service, which handles the download, has its own policy to configure what is downloaded from the service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7921">使用 [ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl](#experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7921">Use the [ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl](#experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol) policy instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7922">在 Microsoft Edge 中，域操作代表一系列兼容性功能，可帮助浏览器在 Web 上正常工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7922">In Microsoft Edge, Domain Actions represent a series of compatibility features that help the browser work correctly on the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7923">Microsoft 会保留一个列表，列出出于兼容性原因要对某些域执行的操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7923">Microsoft keeps a list of actions to take on certain domains for compatibility reasons.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7924">例如，如果 Microsoft Edge 上的新用户代理字符串导致某个网站被破坏，则浏览器可能会替代该网站上的用户代理字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7924">For example, the browser may override the User Agent string on a website if that website is broken due to the new User Agent string on Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7925">当 Microsoft 尝试解决网站所有者的问题时，这些操作中的每一个操作都是临时的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7925">Each of these actions is intended to be temporary while Microsoft tries to resolve the issue with the site owner.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7926">当浏览器启动后定期出现时，浏览器将与包含要执行的兼容性操作最新列表的试验和配置服务联系。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7926">When the browser starts up and then periodically afterwards, the browser will contact the Experimentation and Configuration Service that contains the most up to date list of compatibility actions to perform.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7927">此列表在首次检索后将保存到本地，以便后续请求仅在服务器的副本发生更改时更新该列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7927">This list is saved locally after it is first retrieved so that subsequent requests will only update the list if the server's copy has changed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7928">如果启用此策略，将继续从试验和配置服务下载域操作列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7928">If you enable this policy, the list of Domain Actions will continue to be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7929">如果禁用此策略，将不再从试验和配置服务下载域操作列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7929">If you disable this policy, the list of Domain Actions will no longer be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7930">如果未配置此策略，将继续从试验和配置服务下载域操作列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7930">If you don't configure this policy, the list of Domain Actions will continue to be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7931">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7931">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7932">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7932">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7933">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7933">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7934">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7934">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7935">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7935">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7936">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7936">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7937">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7937">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7938">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7938">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7939">GP 唯一名称：EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7939">GP unique name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7940">GP 名称：启用 Microsoft 中的域操作下载（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7940">GP name: Enable Domain Actions Download from Microsoft (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7941">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7941">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7942">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7942">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7943">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7943">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7944">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7944">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7945">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7945">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7946">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7946">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7947">值名称：EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7947">Value Name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7948">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7948">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7949">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7949">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7950">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7950">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7951">首选项项名称：EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7951">Preference Key Name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7952">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7952">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7953">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7953">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="enableonlinerevocationchecks"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7954">EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7954">EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-online-ocspcrl-checks"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7955">启用联机 OCSP/CRL 检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7955">Enable online OCSP/CRL checks</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7956">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7956">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7957">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7957">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7958">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7958">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7959">联机吊销检查不会提供显著的安全优势，默认情况下已禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7959">Online revocation checks don't provide a significant security benefit and are disabled by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7960">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将执行软故障联机 OCSP/CRL 检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7960">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge will perform soft-fail, online OCSP/CRL checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7961">“软故障”意味着如果无法访问吊销服务器，证书将被视为有效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7961">"Soft fail" means that if the revocation server can't be reached, the certificate will be considered valid.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7962">如果禁用或未配置该策略，Microsoft Edge 将不会执行联机吊销检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7962">If you disable the policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge won't perform online revocation checks.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7963">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7963">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7964">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7964">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7965">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7965">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7966">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7966">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7967">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7967">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7968">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7968">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7969">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7969">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7970">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7970">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7971">GP 唯一名称：EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7971">GP unique name: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7972">GP 名称：启用联机 OCSP/CRL 检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7972">GP name: Enable online OCSP/CRL checks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7973">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7973">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7974">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7974">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7975">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7975">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7976">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7976">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7977">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7977">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7978">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7978">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7979">值名称：EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7979">Value Name: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7980">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7980">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7981">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7981">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7982">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7982">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7983">首选项项名称：EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7983">Preference Key Name: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7984">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7984">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7985">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7985">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="enablesha1forlocalanchors"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7986">EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7986">EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-certificates-signed-using-sha-1-when-issued-by-local-trust-anchors-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7987">允许由本地信任密匙颁发的证书使用 SHA-1 签名 (已过时) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7987">Allow certificates signed using SHA-1 when issued by local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7988">已过时：此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 91 之后无效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7988">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 91.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7989">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7989">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7990">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 85 开始，直到 91</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7990">On Windows and macOS since 85, until 91</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7991">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7991">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7992">启用此设置后，只要证书链接到本地​​安装的根证书并且该证书有效，Microsoft Edge 就会允许使用 SHA-1 签名证书保护连接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7992">When this setting is enabled, Microsoft Edge allows connections secured by SHA-1 signed certificates so long as the the certificate chains to a locally-installed root certificate and is otherwise valid.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7993">请注意，此策略依赖于允许启用 SHA-1 签名的操作系统 (OS) 证书验证堆栈。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7993">Note that this policy depends on the operating system (OS) certificate verification stack allowing SHA-1 signatures.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7994">如果 OS 更新更改了 SHA-1 证书的 OS 处理，则此策略可能不再生效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7994">If an OS update changes the OS handling of SHA-1 certificates, this policy might no longer have effect.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7995">此外，此策略旨在作为临时解决方法，使企业有更多时间摆脱 SHA-1。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7995">Further, this policy is intended as a temporary workaround to give enterprises more time to move away from SHA-1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7996">此策略将在 2021 年年中发布的 Microsoft Edge 92 中删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7996">This policy will be removed in Microsoft Edge 92 releasing in mid 2021.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7997">如果未设置此策略或将其设置为 false，或者 SHA-1 证书链接到公共信任的证书根目录，则 Microsoft Edge 将不允许 SHA-1 签名的证书。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7997">If you don't set this policy or set it to false, or the SHA-1 certificate chains to a publicly trusted certificate root, then Microsoft Edge won't allow certificates signed by SHA-1.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7998">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7998">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-7999">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-7999">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8000">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8000">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8001">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8001">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8002">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8002">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8003">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8003">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8004">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8004">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8005">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8005">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8006">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8006">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8007">GP 唯一名称： EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8007">GP unique name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8008">GP 名称：允许由本地信任密匙颁发地证书使用 SHA-1 签名 (已过时) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8008">GP name: Allow certificates signed using SHA-1 when issued by local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8009">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8009">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8010">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8010">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8011">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8011">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8012">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8012">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8013">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8013">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8014">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8014">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8015">值名称： EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8015">Value Name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8016">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8016">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8017">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8017">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8018">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8018">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8019">首选项名称： EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8019">Preference Key Name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8020">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8020">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8021">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8021">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="enterprisehardwareplatformapienabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8022">EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8022">EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-managed-extensions-to-use-the-enterprise-hardware-platform-api"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8023">允许托管扩展使用企业硬件平台 API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8023">Allow managed extensions to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8024">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8024">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8025">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8025">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8026">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8026">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8027">当此策略设置为启用时，允许企业策略安装的扩展使用企业硬件平台 API。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8027">When this policy is set to enabled, extensions installed by enterprise policy are allowed to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8028">当此策略设置为禁用或未设置时，不允许扩展使用企业硬件平台 API。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8028">When this policy is set to disabled or isn't set, no extensions are allowed to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8029">此策略也适用于组件扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8029">This policy also applies to component extensions.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8030">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8030">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8031">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8031">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8032">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8032">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8033">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8033">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8034">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8034">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8035">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8035">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8036">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8036">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8037">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8037">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8038">GP 唯一名称：EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8038">GP unique name: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8039">GP 名称：允许托管扩展使用企业硬件平台 API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8039">GP name: Allow managed extensions to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8040">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8040">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8041">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8041">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8042">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8042">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8043">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8043">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8044">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8044">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8045">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8045">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8046">值名称：EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8046">Value Name: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8047">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8047">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8048">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8048">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8049">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8049">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8050">首选项项名称：EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8050">Preference Key Name: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8051">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8051">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="enterprisemodesitelistmanagerallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8053">EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8053">EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-access-to-the-enterprise-mode-site-list-manager-tool"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8054">允许访问 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager 工具</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8054">Allow access to the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager tool</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8055">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8055">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8056">在 86 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8056">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8057">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8057">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8058">可用于设置是否对用户提供 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8058">Allows you to set whether Enterprise Mode Site List Manager is available to users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8059">如果启用此策略，则用户可以在 edge://compat 页上看到 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager 导航按钮，导航到该工具并使用它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8059">If you enable this policy, users can see the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager nav button on edge://compat page, navigate to the tool and use it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8060">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则用户将看不到 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager 导航按钮，也将无法使用它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8060">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users won't see the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager nav button and won't be able to use it.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8061">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8061">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8062">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8062">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8063">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8063">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8064">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8064">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8065">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8065">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8066">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8066">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8067">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8067">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8068">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8068">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8069">GP 唯一名称：EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8069">GP unique name: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8070">GP 名称：允许访问 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager 工具</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8070">GP name: Allow access to the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager tool</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8071">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8071">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8072">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8072">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8073">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8073">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8074">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8074">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8075">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8075">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8076">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8076">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8077">值名称：EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8077">Value Name: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8078">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8078">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8079">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8079">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8080">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8080">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)
