  ### <a name="exemptdomainfiletypepairsfromfiletypedownloadwarnings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8081">ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8081">ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-download-file-type-extension-based-warnings-for-specified-file-types-on-domains"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8082">为域上指定的文件类型禁用基于下载文件类型扩展的警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8082">Disable download file type extension-based warnings for specified file types on domains</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8083">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8083">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8084">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 85 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8084">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8085">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8085">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8086">你可以启用此策略来创建一个文件类型扩展名字典，其中包含相应的域列表，这些域将免于基于文件类型扩展名的下载警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8086">You can enable this policy to create a dictionary of file type extensions with a corresponding list of domains that will be exempted from file type extension-based download warnings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8087">这使得企业管理员可以阻止针对与列出域相关联的文件的基于文件类型扩展的下载警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8087">This lets enterprise administrators block file type extension-based download warnings for files that are associated with a listed domain.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8088">例如，如果“jnlp”扩展名与“website1.com”相关，用户从“website1.com”下载“jnlp”文件时不会看到警告，但是从“website2.com”下载“jnlp”文件时会看到下载警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8088">For example, if  the "jnlp" extension is associated with "website1.com", users would not see a warning when downloading "jnlp" files from "website1.com", but see a download warning when downloading "jnlp" files from "website2.com".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8089">文件类型扩展名指定为该策略识别的域将仍然受到非文件类型扩展名的安全警告，如混合内容下载警告和 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8089">Files with file type extensions specified for domains identified by this policy will still be subject to non-file type extension-based security warnings such as mixed-content download warnings and Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8090">如果禁用此策略或不对其进行配置，则触发基于扩展的下载警告的文件类型将向用户显示警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8090">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, file types that trigger extension-based download warnings will show warnings to the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8091">如果启用此策略：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8091">If you enable this policy:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8092">URL 模式应按 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)进行格式设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8092">The URL pattern should be formatted according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>
* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8093">输入的文件类型扩展名必须采用低的 ASCII。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8093">The file type extension entered must be in lower-cased ASCII.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8094">在列出文件类型扩展名时，不应该包括前导分隔符，因此应该使用列表“jnlp”而不是“.jnlp”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8094">The leading separator should not be included when listing the file type extension, so list "jnlp" should be used instead of ".jnlp".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8095">示例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8095">Example:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8096">下面的示例值将防止\*.contoso.com域在swf、exe和jnlp扩展名上基于文件类型扩展的下载警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8096">The following example value would prevent file type extension-based download warnings on swf, exe, and jnlp extensions for \*.contoso.com domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8097">它将在任何其他域中为exe和jnlp文件显示基于文件类型的下载警告，但不为 swf 文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8097">It will show the user a file type extension-based download warning on any other domain for exe and jnlp files, but not for swf files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8098">[ { "file_extension": "jnlp", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "exe", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "swf", "domains": ["\*"] } ]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8098">[ { "file_extension": "jnlp", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "exe", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "swf", "domains": ["\*"] } ]</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8099">请注意，虽然前面的示例显示了对所有域的“swf”文件禁用基于文件类型扩展的下载警告，但出于安全考虑，不建议对所有域的任何危险文件类型扩展应用此类警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8099">Note that while the preceding example shows the suppression of file type extension-based download warnings for "swf" files for all domains, applying suppression of such warnings for all domains for any dangerous file type extension is not recommended due to security concerns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8100">在示例中显示它只是为了演示这样做的能力。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8100">It is shown in the example merely to demonstrate the ability to do so.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8101">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8101">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8102">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8102">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8103">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8103">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8104">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8104">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8105">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8105">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8106">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8106">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8107">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8107">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8108">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8108">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8109">GP 唯一名称： ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8109">GP unique name: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8110">GP 名称：禁止下载针对域中指定文件类型的基于文件类型扩展名的警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8110">GP name: Disable download file type extension-based warnings for specified file types on domains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8111">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8111">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8112">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8112">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8113">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8113">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8114">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8114">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8115">路径(必需) : SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8115">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8116">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8116">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8117">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8117">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8118">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8118">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8119">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8119">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings\1 = {"file_extension": "jnlp", "domains": ["https://contoso.com", "contoso2.com"]}
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings\2 = {"file_extension": "swf", "domains": ["*"]}

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8120">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8120">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8121">首选参数名称： ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8121">Preference Key Name: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8122">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8122">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>{'file_extension': 'jnlp', 'domains': ['https://contoso.com', 'contoso2.com']}</string>
  <string>{'file_extension': 'swf', 'domains': ['*']}</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8123">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8123">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8124">ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8124">ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-communication-with-the-experimentation-and-configuration-service"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8125">控制与试验和配置服务的通信</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8125">Control communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8126">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8126">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8127">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8127">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8128">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8128">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8129">在 Microsoft Edge 中，试验和配置服务用于部署试验和配置有效负载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8129">In Microsoft Edge, the Experimentation and Configuration Service is used to deploy Experimentation and Configuration payload.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8130">试验有效负载包括 Microsoft 为测试和反馈启用的早期开发功能列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8130">Experimentation payload consists of a list of early in development features that Microsoft is enabling for testing and feedback.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8131">配置有效负载包含 Microsoft 希望部署到 Microsoft Edge 以优化用户体验的设置列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8131">Configuration payload consists of a list of settings that Microsoft wants to deploy to Microsoft Edge to optimize user experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8132">例如，配置有效负载可指定 Microsoft Edge 向试验和配置服务发送请求以检索最新有效负载的频率。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8132">For example, configuration payload may specify how often Microsoft Edge sends requests to the Experimentation and Configuration Service to retrieve the newest payload.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8133">此外，配置有效负载还可能包含出于兼容性原因对某些域采取的操作列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8133">Additionaly, configuration payload may also contain a list of actions to take on certain domains for compatibility reasons.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8134">例如，如果 Microsoft Edge 上的新用户代理字符串导致某个网站被破坏，则浏览器可能会替代该网站上的用户代理字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8134">For example, the browser may override the User Agent string on a website if that website is broken due to the new User Agent string on Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8135">当 Microsoft 尝试解决网站所有者的问题时，这些操作中的每一个操作都是临时的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8135">Each of these actions is intended to be temporary while Microsoft tries to resolve the issue with the site owner.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8136">如果将此策略设置为 'FullMode' 模式，则会从实验和配置服务下载完整的有效负载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8136">If you set this policy to 'FullMode', the full payload is downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8137">这包括试验和配置有效负载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8137">This includes both the experimentation and configuration payloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8138">如果将此策略设置为 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode' 模式，则仅提供配置有效负载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8138">If you set this policy to 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode', only the configuration payload is delivered.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8139">如果将此策略设置为 "RestrictedMode"，将完全停止与实验和配置服务的通信。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8139">If you set this policy to 'RestrictedMode', the communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service is stopped completely.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8140">如果未配置此策略，则在 Stable 和 Beta 渠道的受管理设备上，行为与 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode' 模式相同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8140">If you don't configure this policy, on a managed device on Stable and Beta channels the behavior is the same as the 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8141">如果未配置此策略，则在未被管理的设备上，该行为与 "FullMode" 相同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8141">If you don't configure this policy, on an unmanaged device the behavior is the same as the 'FullMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8142">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8142">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8143">FullMode (2) = 检索配置和实验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8143">FullMode (2) = Retrieve configurations and experiments</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8144">ConfigurationsOnlyMode (1) = 仅检索配置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8144">ConfigurationsOnlyMode (1) = Retrieve configurations only</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8145">RestrictedMode (0) = 禁用与实验和配置服务的通信</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8145">RestrictedMode (0) = Disable communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8146">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8146">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8147">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8147">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8148">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8148">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8149">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8149">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8150">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8150">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8151">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8151">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8152">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8152">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8153">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8153">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8154">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8154">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8155">GP 唯一名称：ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8155">GP unique name: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8156">GP 名称：控制与试验和配置服务的通信</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8156">GP name: Control communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8157">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8157">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8158">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8158">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8159">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8159">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8160">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8160">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8161">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8161">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8162">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8162">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8163">值名称：ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8163">Value Name: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8164">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8164">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8165">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8165">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8166">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8166">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8167">首选项项名称：ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8167">Preference Key Name: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8168">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8168">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8169">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8169">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="explicitlyallowednetworkports"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8170">ExplicitlyAllowedNetworkPorts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8170">ExplicitlyAllowedNetworkPorts</span></span>

  #### <a name="explicitly-allowed-network-ports"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8171">显式允许的网络端口</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8171">Explicitly allowed network ports</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8172">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8172">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8173">自 91 或更高版本起，在 Windows 和 macOS 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8173">On Windows and macOS since 91 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8174">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8174">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8175">此策略允许绕过 Microsoft Edge 内置的受限端口列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8175">This policy allows bypassing the restricted port list built into Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8176">端口集定义为允许传出连接的逗号分隔列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8176">The set of ports is defined as a comma-separated list that outgoing connections should be permitted on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8177">限制端口以防止 Microsoft Edge 被用作攻击各种网络漏洞的途径。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8177">Ports are restricted to prevent Microsoft Edge from being used as a vector to exploit various network vulnerabilities.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8178">设置此策略可能会使网络受到攻击。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8178">Setting this policy may expose your network to attacks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8179">此策略旨在暂时解决错误代码"ERR_UNSAFE_PORT"，同时将被阻止端口上运行的服务迁移到标准端口 (例如端口 80 或 443)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8179">This policy is intended as a temporary workaround for error code "ERR_UNSAFE_PORT" while migrating a service running on a blocked port to a standard port (for example port 80 or 443).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8180">恶意网站可以轻松检测此策略是否设置，以及针对哪些端口，然后使用该信息来设定攻击目标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8180">Malicious websites can easily detect that this policy is set, and for which ports, then use that information to target attacks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8181">将该值留空或未设置意味着将阻止所有受限制的端口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8181">Leaving the value empty or unset means that all restricted ports will be blocked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8182">通过此策略设置的无效端口值将被忽略，同时仍将应用有效的端口值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8182">Invalid port values set through this policy will be ignored while valid ones will still be applied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8183">此策略会覆盖"--explicitly-allowed-ports"命令行选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8183">This policy overrides the "--explicitly-allowed-ports" command-line option.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8184">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8184">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8185">554 (554) = 端口 554 (2021/10/15 到期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8185">554 (554) = port 554 (expires 2021/10/15)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8186">10080 (10080) = 端口 10080 (2022/04/01 到期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8186">10080 (10080) = port 10080 (expires 2022/04/01)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8187">6566 (6566) = 端口 6566 (2021/10/15 到期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8187">6566 (6566) = port 6566 (expires 2021/10/15)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8188">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8188">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8189">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8189">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8190">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8190">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8191">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8191">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8192">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8192">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8193">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8193">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8194">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8194">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8195">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8195">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8196">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8196">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8197">GP 唯一名称：ExplicitlyAllowedNetworkPorts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8197">GP unique name: ExplicitlyAllowedNetworkPorts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8198">GP 名称：显式允许的网络端口</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8198">GP name: Explicitly allowed network ports</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8199">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8199">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8200">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8200">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8201">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8201">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8202">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8202">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8203">路径 (强制) ：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExplicitlyAllowedNetworkPorts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8203">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExplicitlyAllowedNetworkPorts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8204">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8204">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8205">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8205">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8206">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8206">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8207">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8207">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExplicitlyAllowedNetworkPorts\1 = "10080"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8208">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8208">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8209">首选项项名称：ExplicitlyAllowedNetworkPorts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8209">Preference Key Name: ExplicitlyAllowedNetworkPorts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8210">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8210">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>10080</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8211">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8211">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8212">ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8212">ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-an-always-open-checkbox-in-external-protocol-dialog"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8213">在外部协议对话框中显示“始终打开”复选框</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8213">Show an "Always open" checkbox in external protocol dialog</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8214">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8214">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8215">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 79 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8215">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8216">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8216">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8217">此策略控制外部协议启动确认提示上是否显示“始终允许此网站打开此类型的链接”复选框。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8217">This policy controls whether the "Always allow this site to open links of this type" checkbox is shown on external protocol launch confirmation prompts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8218">此策略仅适用于 https:// links。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8218">This policy only applies to https:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8219">如果启用此策略，则当显示外部协议确认提示时，用户可以选择“始终允许”以跳过此网站上协议的所有未来确认提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8219">If you enable this policy, when an external protocol confirmation prompt is shown, the user can select "Always allow" to skip all future confirmation prompts for the protocol on this site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8220">如果禁用此策略，则不会显示“始终允许”复选框。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8220">If you disable this policy, the "Always allow" checkbox isn't displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8221">每次调用外部协议时，系统都会提示用户进行确认。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8221">The user will be prompted for confirmation every time an external protocol is invoked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8222">在 Microsoft Edge 83 前，如果未配置此策略，则不会显示“始终允许”复选框。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8222">Prior to Microsoft Edge 83, if you don't configure this policy, the "Always allow" checkbox isn't displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8223">每次调用外部协议时，系统都会提示用户进行确认。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8223">The user will be prompted for confirmation every time an external protocol is invoked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8224">对于 Microsoft Edge 83，如果未配置此策略，复选框可见性由 edge://flags 中的“允许记住协议启动提示首选项”标志控制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8224">On Microsoft Edge 83, if you don't configure this policy, the checkbox visibility is controlled by the "Enable remembering protocol launch prompting preferences" flag in edge://flags</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8225">自 Microsoft Edge 84 起，如果未配置此策略，则当显示外部协议确认提示时，用户可以选择“始终允许”跳过针对此网站上协议的所有未来确认提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8225">As of Microsoft Edge 84, if you don't configure this policy, when an external protocol confirmation prompt is shown, the user can select "Always allow" to skip all future confirmation prompts for the protocol on this site.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8226">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8226">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8227">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8227">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8228">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8228">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8229">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8229">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8230">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8230">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8231">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8231">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8232">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8232">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8233">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8233">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8234">GP 唯一名称：ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8234">GP unique name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8235">GP 名称：在外部协议对话框中显示“始终打开”复选框</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8235">GP name: Show an "Always open" checkbox in external protocol dialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8236">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8236">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8237">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8237">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8238">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8238">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8239">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8239">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8240">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8240">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8241">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8241">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8242">值名称：ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8242">Value Name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8243">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8243">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8244">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8244">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8245">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8245">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8246">首选项项名称：ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8246">Preference Key Name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8247">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8247">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8248">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8248">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="familysafetysettingsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8249">FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8249">FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-configure-family-safety-and-kids-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8250">允许用户配置家庭安全和儿童模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8250">Allow users to configure Family safety and Kids Mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8251">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8251">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8252">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 83 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8252">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8253">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8253">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8254">此策略将会禁用浏览器中的两项与家庭安全相关的功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8254">This policy disables two family safety related features in the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8255">它将隐藏“设置”内的“家庭”页面，并且至 edge://settings/family 的导航将被阻止。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8255">This will hide the Family page inside Settings and navigation to edge://settings/family will be blocked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8256">家庭设置页面介绍了 Microsoft Family Safety 中的家庭组可用的功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8256">The family settings page describes what features are available with family groups with Microsoft Family Safety.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8257">在此处详细了解 Family Safety：([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432))。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8257">Learn more about Family Safety here: ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432)).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8258">从 Microsoft Edge 90 开始，此策略还会禁用儿童模式，该模式是一种适合于儿童的浏览模式，具有自定义主题和需要设备密码才能退出的允许列表浏览。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8258">Starting in Microsoft Edge 90, this policy also disables Kids Mode, a kid friendly browsing mode with custom themes and allow list browsing that requires the device password to exit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8259">在此处详细了解儿童模式：([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2146910](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2146910))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8259">Learn more about Kids Mode here: ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2146910](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2146910))</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8260">如果启用此策略或者未进行配置，则会显示“设置”中的家庭页面并且儿童模式可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8260">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the family page in Settings will be shown and Kids Mode will be available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8261">如果禁用此策略，则不会显示家庭页面，并且儿童模式将会隐藏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8261">If you disable this policy, the family page will not be shown, and Kids Mode will be hidden.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8262">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8262">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8263">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8263">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8264">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8264">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8265">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8265">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8266">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8266">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8267">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8267">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8268">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8268">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8269">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8269">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8270">GP 唯一名称：FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8270">GP unique name: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8271">GP 名称：允许用户配置家庭安全和儿童模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8271">GP name: Allow users to configure Family safety and Kids Mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8272">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8272">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8273">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8273">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8274">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8274">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8275">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8275">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8276">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8276">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8277">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8277">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8278">值名称：FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8278">Value Name: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8279">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8279">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8280">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8280">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8281">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8281">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8282">首选项项名称：FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8282">Preference Key Name: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8283">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8283">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8284">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8284">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="favoritesbarenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8285">FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8285">FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-favorites-bar"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8286">启用收藏夹栏</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8286">Enable favorites bar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8287">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8287">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8288">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8288">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8289">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8289">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8290">启用或禁用收藏夹栏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8290">Enables or disables the favorites bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8291">如果启用此策略，用户将看到收藏夹栏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8291">If you enable this policy, users will see the favorites bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8292">如果禁用此策略，用户将看不到收藏夹栏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8292">If you disable this policy, users won't see the favorites bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8293">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以决定是否使用收藏夹栏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8293">If this policy is not configured, then the user can decide to use the favorites bar or not.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8294">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8294">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8295">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8295">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8296">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8296">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8297">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8297">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8298">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8298">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8299">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8299">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8300">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8300">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8301">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8301">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8302">GP 唯一名称：FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8302">GP unique name: FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8303">GP 名称：启用收藏夹栏</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8303">GP name: Enable favorites bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8304">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8304">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8305">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8305">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8306">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8306">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8307">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8307">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8308">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8308">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8309">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8309">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8310">值名称：FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8310">Value Name: FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8311">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8311">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8312">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8312">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8313">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8313">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8314">首选项项名称：FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8314">Preference Key Name: FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8315">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8315">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8316">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8316">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="fetchkeepalivedurationsecondsonshutdown"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8317">FetchKeepaliveDurationSecondsOnShutdown</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8317">FetchKeepaliveDurationSecondsOnShutdown</span></span>

  #### <a name="fetch-keepalive-duration-on-shutdown"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8318">获取关机时的保留持续时间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8318">Fetch keepalive duration on shutdown</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8319">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8319">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8320">自 90 或更高版本起，在 Windows 和 macOS 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8320">On Windows and macOS since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8321">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8321">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8322">控制允许保留持续时间（秒）的请求，以防止浏览器完成其关闭。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8322">Controls the duration (in seconds) that keepalive requests are allowed to prevent the browser from completing its shutdown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8323">如果配置此策略，浏览器将阻止完成关闭，同时处理任何未保留请求（请参阅 https://fetch.spec.whatwg.org/#request-keepalive-flag) 此策略指定的最长时间）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8323">If you configure this policy, the browser will block completing shutdown while it processes any outstanding keepalive requests (see https://fetch.spec.whatwg.org/#request-keepalive-flag) up to the maximum period of time specified by this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8324">如果禁用或不配置此策略，则使用默认值 0 秒，浏览器关闭期间将立即取消未保留请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8324">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default value of 0 seconds is used and outstanding keepalive requests will be immediately cancelled during browser shutdown.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8325">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8325">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8326">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8326">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8327">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8327">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8328">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8328">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8329">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8329">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8330">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8330">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8331">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8331">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8332">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8332">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8333">GP 唯一名称：FetchKeepaliveDurationSecondsOnShutdown</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8333">GP unique name: FetchKeepaliveDurationSecondsOnShutdown</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8334">GP 名称：获取关机时的保留持续时间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8334">GP name: Fetch keepalive duration on shutdown</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8335">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8335">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8336">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8336">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8337">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8337">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8338">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8338">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8339">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8339">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8340">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8340">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8341">值名称：FetchKeepaliveDurationSecondsOnShutdown</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8341">Value Name: FetchKeepaliveDurationSecondsOnShutdown</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8342">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8342">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8343">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8343">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8344">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8344">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8345">首选项项名称：FetchKeepaliveDurationSecondsOnShutdown</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8345">Preference Key Name: FetchKeepaliveDurationSecondsOnShutdown</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8346">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8346">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8347">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8347">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="forcebingsafesearch"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8348">ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8348">ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>

  #### <a name="enforce-bing-safesearch"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8349">强制实施必应安全搜索</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8349">Enforce Bing SafeSearch</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8350">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8350">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8351">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8351">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8352">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8352">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8353">确保将安全搜索设为指定的值并完成必应 Web 搜索中的查询。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8353">Ensure that queries in Bing web search are done with SafeSearch set to the value specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8354">用户无法更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8354">Users can't change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8355">如果将此策略配置为 "BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode"，必应搜索中的搜索安全将回退到 bing.com 值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8355">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode', SafeSearch in Bing search falls back to the bing.com value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8356">如果将此策略配置为 'BingSafeSearchModerateMode'，则使用安全搜索中的中等设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8356">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchModerateMode', the moderate setting is used in SafeSearch.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8357">“中等”设置可筛选成人视频和图像，但不能筛选搜索结果中的文本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8357">The moderate setting filters adult videos and images but not text from search results.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8358">如果将此策略配置为 'BingSafeSearchStrictMode'，则使用安全搜索中的严格设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8358">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchStrictMode', the strict setting in SafeSearch is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8359">严格设置可筛选成人文本、图像和视频。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8359">The strict setting filters adult text, images, and videos.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8360">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则不会强制实施必应搜索中的安全搜索，用户可以在 bing.com 上设置所需的值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8360">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, SafeSearch in Bing search isn't enforced, and users can set the value they want on bing.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8361">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8361">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8362">BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode (0) = 不要在必应中配置搜索限制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8362">BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode (0) = Don't configure search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8363">BingSafeSearchModerateMode (1) = 在必应中配置中等搜索限制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8363">BingSafeSearchModerateMode (1) = Configure moderate search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8364">BingSafeSearchStrictMode (2) = 在必应中配置严格搜索限制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8364">BingSafeSearchStrictMode (2) = Configure strict search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8365">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8365">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8366">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8366">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8367">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8367">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8368">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8368">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8369">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8369">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8370">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8370">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8371">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8371">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8372">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8372">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8373">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8373">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8374">GP 唯一名称：ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8374">GP unique name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8375">GP 名称：强制实施必应安全搜索</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8375">GP name: Enforce Bing SafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8376">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8376">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8377">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8377">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8378">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8378">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8379">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8379">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8380">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8380">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8381">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8381">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8382">值名称：ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8382">Value Name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8383">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8383">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8384">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8384">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8385">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8385">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8386">首选项项名称：ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8386">Preference Key Name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8387">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8387">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8388">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8388">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="forcecertificatepromptsonmultiplematches"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8389">ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8389">ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-whether-microsoft-edge-should-automatically-select-a-certificate-when-there-are-multiple-certificate-matches-for-a-site-configured-with-autoselectcertificateforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8390">配置当配置了“AutoSelectCertificateForUrls”的网站有多个证书匹配项时，Microsoft Edge 是否应自动选择证书</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8390">Configure whether Microsoft Edge should automatically select a certificate when there are multiple certificate matches for a site configured with "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8391">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8391">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8392">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 81 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8392">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8393">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8393">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8394">切换是否在有多个证书可用且网站配置了 [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) 时提示用户选择证书。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8394">Toggles whether users are prompted to select a certificate if there are multiple certificates available and a site is configured with [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8395">如果未为网站配置 [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls)，则系统将始终提示用户选择证书。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8395">If you don't configure [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) for a site, the user will always be prompted to select a certificate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8396">如果将此策略设置为 True，则只有当有多个证书时，Microsoft Edge 才会提示用户为 [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) 中定义的列表上的网站选择证书。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8396">If you set this policy to True, Microsoft Edge will prompt a user to select a certificate for sites on the list defined in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) if and only if there is more than one certificate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8397">如果将此策略设置为 False 或未配置，Microsoft Edge 将自动选择一个证书，即使证书有多个匹配项也是如此。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8397">If you set this policy to False or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will automatically select a certificate even if there are multiple matches for a certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8398">系统不会提示用户为 [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) 中定义的列表上的网站选择证书。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8398">The user will not be prompted to select a certificate for sites on the list defined in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8399">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8399">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8400">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8400">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8401">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8401">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8402">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8402">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8403">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8403">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8404">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8404">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8405">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8405">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8406">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8406">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8407">GP 唯一名称：ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8407">GP unique name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8408">GP 名称：配置当配置了“AutoSelectCertificateForUrls”的网站有多个证书匹配项时，Microsoft Edge 是否应自动选择证书</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8408">GP name: Configure whether Microsoft Edge should automatically select a certificate when there are multiple certificate matches for a site configured with "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8409">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8409">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8410">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8410">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8411">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8411">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8412">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8412">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8413">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8413">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8414">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8414">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8415">值名称：ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8415">Value Name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8416">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8416">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8417">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8417">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8418">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8418">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8419">首选项项名称：ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8419">Preference Key Name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8420">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8420">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8421">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8421">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="forceephemeralprofiles"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8422">ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8422">ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-use-of-ephemeral-profiles"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8423">启用临时配置文件的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8423">Enable use of ephemeral profiles</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8424">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8424">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8425">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8425">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8426">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8426">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8427">控制用户配置文件是否切换到临时模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8427">Controls whether user profiles are switched to ephemeral mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8428">会话开始时将创建一个临时配置文件，会话结束时将删除该配置文件，并且该配置文件与用户的原始配置文件相关联。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8428">An ephemeral profile is created when a session begins, is deleted when the session ends, and is associated with the user's original profile.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8429">如果启用此策略，则配置文件将以临时模式运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8429">If you enable this policy, profiles run in ephemeral mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8430">这样，用户可从自己的设备工作，无需将浏览数据保存到这些设备。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8430">This lets users work from their own devices without saving browsing data to those devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8431">如果将此策略启用为操作系统策略（例如，通过在 Windows 上使用 GPO），则它将应用于系统上的每个配置文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8431">If you enable this policy as an OS policy (by using GPO on Windows, for example), it applies to every profile on the system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8432">如果禁用此策略或未配置它，用户在登录浏览器时将获得其常规配置文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8432">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, users get their regular profiles when they sign in to the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8433">在临时模式下，配置文件数据仅在用户会话期间保存在磁盘上。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8433">In ephemeral mode, profile data is saved on disk only for the length of the user session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8434">浏览器历史记录、扩展及其数据、Cookie 等 Web 数据以及 Web 数据库等功能在浏览器关闭后不会保存。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8434">Features like browser history, extensions and their data, web data like cookies, and web databases aren't saved after the browser is closed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8435">这不会阻止用户将任何数据手动下载到磁盘，或者保存页面或打印它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8435">This doesn't prevent a user from manually downloading any data to disk, or from saving pages or printing them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8436">如果用户已启用同步，则所有数据都将保留在其同步帐户中，就像使用常规配置文件一样。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8436">If the user has enabled sync, all data is preserved in their sync accounts just like with regular profiles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8437">用户还可以在临时模式下使用 InPrivate 浏览，除非你明确禁用此功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8437">Users can also use InPrivate browsing in ephemeral mode unless you explicitly disable this.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8438">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8438">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8439">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8439">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8440">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8440">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8441">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8441">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8442">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8442">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8443">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8443">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8444">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8444">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8445">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8445">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8446">GP 唯一名称：ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8446">GP unique name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8447">GP 名称：启用临时配置文件的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8447">GP name: Enable use of ephemeral profiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8448">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8448">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8449">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8449">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8450">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8450">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8451">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8451">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8452">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8452">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8453">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8453">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8454">值名称：ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8454">Value Name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8455">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8455">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8456">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8456">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8457">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8457">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8458">首选项项名称：ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8458">Preference Key Name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8459">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8459">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8460">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8460">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="forcegooglesafesearch"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8461">ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8461">ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>

  #### <a name="enforce-google-safesearch"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8462">强制实施 Google 安全搜索</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8462">Enforce Google SafeSearch</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8463">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8463">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8464">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8464">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8465">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8465">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8466">将安全搜索设置为活动状态并强制执行 Google Web 搜索中的查询，并防止用户更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8466">Forces queries in Google Web Search to be performed with SafeSearch set to active, and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8467">如果启用此策略，则 Google 搜索中的安全搜索始终处于活动状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8467">If you enable this policy, SafeSearch in Google Search is always active.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8468">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则不会强制实施 Google 搜索中的安全搜索。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8468">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, SafeSearch in Google Search isn't enforced.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8469">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8469">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8470">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8470">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8471">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8471">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
