  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8472">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8472">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8473">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8473">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8474">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8474">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8475">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8475">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8476">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8476">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8477">GP 唯一名称：ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8477">GP unique name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8478">GP 名称：强制实施 Google 安全搜索</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8478">GP name: Enforce Google SafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8479">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8479">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8480">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8480">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8481">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8481">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8482">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8482">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8483">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8483">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8484">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8484">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8485">值名称：ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8485">Value Name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8486">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8486">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8487">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8487">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8488">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8488">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8489">首选项项名称：ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8489">Preference Key Name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8490">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8490">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8491">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8491">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="forcelegacydefaultreferrerpolicy"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8492">ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8492">ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>

  #### <a name="use-a-default-referrer-policy-of-no-referrer-when-downgrade-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8493">使用 no-referrer-when-downgrade 的默认引用者策略（过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8493">Use a default referrer policy of no-referrer-when-downgrade (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8494">已过时：此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 88 之后不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8494">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8495">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8495">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8496">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 81 开始，直到 88</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8496">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 88</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8497">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8497">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8498">此策略不起作用，因为它只是一种短期机制，如果发现企业的 web 内容与新的默认推荐者策略不兼容，它将为企业提供更多时间来更新其 we b内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8498">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if it was found to be incompatible with the new default referrer policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8499">Microsoft Edge 的默认引用者策略已从其当前的 no-referrer-when-downgrade 值增强为更安全的 strict-origin-when-cross-origin。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8499">Microsoft Edge's default referrer policy was strengthened from the value of no-referrer-when-downgrade to the more secure strict-origin-when-cross-origin.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8500">启用此企业策略后，Microsoft Edge 的默认引用者策略将设置为其旧值 no-referrer-when-downgrade。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8500">When this enterprise policy is enabled, Microsoft Edge's default referrer policy will be set to its old value of no-referrer-when-downgrade.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8501">默认情况下，此企业策略处于禁用状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8501">This enterprise policy is disabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8502">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8502">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8503">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8503">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8504">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8504">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8505">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8505">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8506">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8506">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8507">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8507">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8508">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8508">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8509">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8509">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8510">GP 唯一名称：ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8510">GP unique name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8511">GP 名称：使用 no-referrer-when-downgrade 的默认引者策略（过时） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8511">GP name: Use a default referrer policy of no-referrer-when-downgrade (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8512">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8512">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8513">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8513">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8514">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8514">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8515">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8515">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8516">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8516">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8517">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8517">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8518">值名称：ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8518">Value Name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8519">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8519">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8520">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8520">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8521">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8521">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8522">首选项项名称：ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8522">Preference Key Name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8523">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8523">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8524">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8524">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="forcenetworkinprocess"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8525">ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8525">ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-networking-code-to-run-in-the-browser-process-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8526">强制网络代码在浏览器进程中运行（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8526">Force networking code to run in the browser process (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8527">已过时：该策略已过时，Microsoft Edge 版本83 后将无法正常工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8527">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 83.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8528">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8528">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8529">在 78 版至83版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8529">On Windows since 78, until 83</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8530">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8530">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8531">此策略不起作用，因为它仅作为一种短期机制提供，目的是让企业有更多时间迁移到不依赖于连接网络 API 的第三方软件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8531">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to migrate to 3rd party software that doesn't depend on hooking networking APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8532">建议使用代理服务器，而不是 LSP 和 Win32 API 修补。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8532">Proxy servers are recommended over LSPs and Win32 API patching.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8533">此策略强制网络代码在浏览器进程中运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8533">This policy forces networking code to run in the browser process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8534">默认情况下，此策略处于禁用状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8534">This policy is disabled by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8535">如果启用，则在网络进程被沙盒屏蔽时，用户会遇到安全问题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8535">If enabled, users are open to security issues when the networking process is sandboxed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8536">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8536">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8537">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8537">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8538">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8538">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8539">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8539">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8540">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8540">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8541">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8541">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8542">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8542">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8543">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8543">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8544">GP 唯一名称：ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8544">GP unique name: ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8545">GP 名称：强制网络代码在浏览器进程中运行（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8545">GP name: Force networking code to run in the browser process (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8546">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8546">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8547">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8547">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8548">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8548">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8549">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8549">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8550">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8550">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8551">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8551">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8552">值名称：ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8552">Value Name: ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8553">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8553">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8554">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8554">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8555">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8555">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="forcesync"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8556">ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8556">ForceSync</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-synchronization-of-browser-data-and-do-not-show-the-sync-consent-prompt"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8557">强制同步浏览器数据，但不显示同步许可提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8557">Force synchronization of browser data and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8558">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8558">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8559">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8559">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8560">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8560">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8561">强制 Microsoft Edge 中的数据同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8561">Forces data synchronization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8562">此策略还会阻止用户关闭同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8562">This policy also prevents the user from turning sync off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8563">如果未配置此策略，用户将可以启用或禁用同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8563">If you don't configure this policy, users will be able to turn sync on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8564">如果启用此策略，用户将不能关闭同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8564">If you enable this policy, users will not be able to turn sync off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8565">若要使此策略按预期工作，[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) 策略必须配置，或者必须设置为"启用"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8565">For this policy to work as intended, [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy must not be configured, or must be set to enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8566">如果 [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) 设置为"已禁用"，则 [ForceSync](#forcesync) 将不会生效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8566">If [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) is set to disabled, then [ForceSync](#forcesync) will not take affect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8567">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 不可配置，或者必须设置为 False。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8567">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) must not be configured or must be set to False.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8568">如果设置为 True，则 [ForceSync](#forcesync) 不会生效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8568">If this is set to True, [ForceSync](#forcesync) will not take affect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8569">0 = 不会自动启动同步并显示同步许可（默认） 1 = 为 Azure AD/Azure AD 降级用户配置文件启用强制同步，并且不显示同步许可提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8569">0 = Do not automatically start sync and show the sync consent (default) 1 = Force sync to be turned on for Azure AD/Azure AD-Degraded user profile and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8570">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8570">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8571">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8571">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8572">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8572">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8573">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8573">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8574">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8574">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8575">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8575">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8576">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8576">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8577">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8577">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8578">GP 唯一名称：ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8578">GP unique name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8579">GP 名称：强制同步浏览器数据，但不显示同步许可提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8579">GP name: Force synchronization of browser data and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8580">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8580">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8581">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8581">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8582">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8582">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8583">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8583">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8584">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8584">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8585">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8585">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8586">值名称：ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8586">Value Name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8587">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8587">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8588">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8588">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8589">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8589">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8590">首选项项名称：ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8590">Preference Key Name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8591">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8591">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8592">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8592">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="forceyoutuberestrict"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8593">ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8593">ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-minimum-youtube-restricted-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8594">强制最低 YouTube 受限模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8594">Force minimum YouTube Restricted Mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8595">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8595">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8596">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8596">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8597">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8597">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8598">对 YouTube 强制实施最低受限模式，并阻止用户选择限制较少的模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8598">Enforces a minimum Restricted Mode on YouTube and prevents users from picking a less restricted mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8599">如果设置为 'Strict'，则将对 YouTube 强制实施严格受限模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8599">Set to 'Strict' to enforce Strict Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8600">如果设置为 'Moderate'，则将强制用户对 YouTube 仅使用中等受限模式和严格受限模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8600">Set to 'Moderate' to enforce the user to only use Moderate Restricted Mode and Strict Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8601">他们不能禁用受限模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8601">They can't disable Restricted Mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8602">如果设置为 'Off' 或未配置此策略，则不对 YouTube 强制实施受限模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8602">Set to 'Off' or don't configure this policy to not enforce Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8603">外部策略（如 YouTube 策略）可能仍会强制实施受限模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8603">External policies such as YouTube policies might still enforce Restricted Mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8604">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8604">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8605">Off (0) = 不对 YouTube 强制实施受限模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8605">Off (0) = Do not enforce Restricted Mode on YouTube</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8606">Moderate (1) = 至少对 YouTube 强制实施中等受限模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8606">Moderate (1) = Enforce at least Moderate Restricted Mode on YouTube</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8607">Strict (2) = 对 YouTube 强制实施严格受限模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8607">Strict (2) = Enforce Strict Restricted Mode for YouTube</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8608">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8608">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8609">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8609">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8610">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8610">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8611">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8611">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8612">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8612">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8613">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8613">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8614">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8614">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8615">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8615">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8616">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8616">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8617">GP 唯一名称：ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8617">GP unique name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8618">GP 名称：强制最低 YouTube 受限模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8618">GP name: Force minimum YouTube Restricted Mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8619">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8619">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8620">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8620">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8621">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8621">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8622">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8622">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8623">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8623">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8624">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8624">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8625">值名称：ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8625">Value Name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8626">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8626">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8627">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8627">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8628">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8628">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8629">首选项项名称：ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8629">Preference Key Name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8630">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8630">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8631">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8631">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="fullscreenallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8632">FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8632">FullscreenAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-full-screen-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8633">允许全屏模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8633">Allow full screen mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8634">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8634">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8635">在 Windows 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8635">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8636">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8636">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8637">设置全屏模式的可用性 - 所有 Microsoft Edge UI 都将隐藏，并且仅 Web 内容可见。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8637">Set the availability of full screen mode - all Microsoft Edge UI is hidden and only web content is visible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8638">如果启用或未配置此策略，则有相应权限的用户、应用和扩展可以进入全屏模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8638">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the user, apps, and extensions with appropriate permissions can enter full screen mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8639">如果禁用此策略，则用户、应用和扩展无法进入全屏模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8639">If you disable this policy, users, apps, and extensions can't enter full screen mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8640">禁用全屏模式时，无法使用命令行在展台模式下打开 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8640">Opening Microsoft Edge in kiosk mode using the command line is unavailable when full screen mode is disabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8641">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8641">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8642">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8642">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8643">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8643">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8644">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8644">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8645">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8645">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8646">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8646">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8647">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8647">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8648">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8648">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8649">GP 唯一名称：FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8649">GP unique name: FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8650">GP 名称：允许全屏模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8650">GP name: Allow full screen mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8651">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8651">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8652">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8652">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8653">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8653">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8654">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8654">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8655">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8655">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8656">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8656">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8657">值名称：FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8657">Value Name: FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8658">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8658">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8659">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8659">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8660">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8660">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="globallyscopehttpauthcacheenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8661">GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8661">GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-globally-scoped-http-auth-cache"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8662">启用全局范围的 HTTP 身份验证缓存</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8662">Enable globally scoped HTTP auth cache</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8663">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8663">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8664">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 81 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8664">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8665">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8665">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8666">此策略使用 HTTP 服务器身份验证凭据配置单个全局每配置文件缓存。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8666">This policy configures a single global per profile cache with HTTP server authentication credentials.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8667">如果禁用或未设置此策略，浏览器将使用跨网站身份验证的默认行为，从版本 80 开始，将按热门网站划分 HTTP 服务器身份验证凭据的范围。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8667">If you disable or don't set this policy, the browser will use the default behavior of cross-site auth, which as of version 80, will be to scope HTTP server authentication credentials by top-level site.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8668">因此，如果两个网站使用来自同一身份验证域的资源，则需要在两个网站的上下文中独立提供凭据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8668">So, if two sites use resources from the same authenticating domain, credentials will need to be provided independently in the context of both sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8669">缓存的代理凭据将跨网站重复使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8669">Cached proxy credentials will be reused across sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8670">如果启用此策略，则在一个网站的上下文中输入的 HTTP 身份验证凭据将自动用于另一个网站的上下文。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8670">If you enable this policy HTTP auth credentials entered in the context of one site will automatically be used in the context of another site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8671">启用此策略时，网站会对某些类型的跨网站攻击敞开大门，这些攻击能使用 URL 中嵌入的凭据将条目添加到 HTTP 身份验证缓存中，从而没有 Cookie 就能跨网站跟踪用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8671">Enabling this policy leaves sites open to some types of cross-site attacks, and allows users to be tracked across sites even without cookies by adding entries to the HTTP auth cache using credentials embedded in URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8672">此策略旨在让依赖于旧行为的企业有机会更新其登录过程，将来会被删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8672">This policy is intended to give enterprises depending on the legacy behavior a chance to update their login procedures and will be removed in the future.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8673">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8673">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8674">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8674">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8675">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8675">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8676">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8676">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8677">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8677">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8678">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8678">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8679">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8679">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8680">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8680">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8681">GP 唯一名称：GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8681">GP unique name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8682">GP 名称：启用全局范围的 HTTP 身份验证缓存</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8682">GP name: Enable globally scoped HTTP auth cache</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8683">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8683">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8684">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8684">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8685">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8685">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8686">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8686">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8687">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8687">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8688">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8688">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8689">值名称：GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8689">Value Name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8690">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8690">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8691">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8691">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8692">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8692">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8693">首选项项名称：GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8693">Preference Key Name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8694">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8694">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8695">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8695">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="gotointranetsiteforsinglewordentryinaddressbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8696">GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8696">GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-direct-intranet-site-navigation-instead-of-searching-on-single-word-entries-in-the-address-bar"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8697">强制直接 Intranet 站点导航，而不是在地址栏中搜索单个词条</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8697">Force direct intranet site navigation instead of searching on single word entries in the Address Bar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8698">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8698">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8699">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8699">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8700">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8700">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8701">启用此策略时，如果在地址栏中输入的文本是一个没有标点符号的单词，则地址栏建议列表中最上方的自动建议结果将导航到 Intranet 站点。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8701">If you enable this policy, the top auto-suggest result in the address bar suggestion list will navigate to intranet sites if the text entered in the address bar is a single word without punctuation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8702">键入不带标点符号的单个单词时，默认导航将定向到与输入的文本匹配的 Intranet 站点。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8702">Default navigation when typing a single word without punctuation will conduct a navigation to an intranet site matching the entered text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8703">启用此策略时，如果输入的文本是一个没有标点符号的单词，则地址栏建议列表中的第二个自动建议结果将按照确切输入内容执行 Web 搜索。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8703">If you enable this policy, the second auto-suggest result in the address bar suggestion list will conduct a web search exactly as it was entered, provided that this text is a single word without punctuation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8704">除非还启用了阻止 Web 搜索的策略，否则将使用默认搜索提供程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8704">The default search provider will be used unless a policy to prevent web search is also enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8705">启用此策略有以下两个影响：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8705">Two effects of enabling this policy are:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8706">不再导航到网站来响应通常解析为历史记录项的单个单词查询。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8706">Navigation to sites in response to single word queries that would typically resolve to a history item will no longer happen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8707">相反，浏览器将尝试导航到组织 Intranet 中可能不存在的 Intranet 站点。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8707">Instead, the browser will attempt navigate to internal sites that may not exist in an organization's intranet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8708">这将导致 404 错误。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8708">This will result in a 404 error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8709">对于常用的单字搜索词，需要手动选择搜索建议才能正确执行搜索。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8709">Popular, single-word search terms will require manual selection of search suggestions to properly conduct a search.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8710">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8710">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8711">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8711">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8712">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8712">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8713">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8713">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8714">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8714">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8715">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8715">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8716">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8716">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8717">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8717">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8718">GP 唯一名称：GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8718">GP unique name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8719">GP 名称：强制直接 Intranet 站点导航，而不是在地址栏中搜索单个词条</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8719">GP name: Force direct intranet site navigation instead of searching on single word entries in the Address Bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8720">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8720">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8721">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8721">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8722">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8722">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8723">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8723">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8724">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8724">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8725">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8725">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8726">值名称：GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8726">Value Name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8727">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8727">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8728">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8728">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8729">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8729">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8730">首选项项名称：GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8730">Preference Key Name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8731">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8731">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8732">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8732">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="hstspolicybypasslist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8733">HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8733">HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-names-that-will-bypass-the-hsts-policy-check"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8734">配置将跳过 HSTS 策略检查的名称列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8734">Configure the list of names that will bypass the HSTS policy check</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8735">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8735">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8736">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 79 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8736">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8737">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8737">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8738">设置策略会指定绕过从 http 升级到 https 的已预加载 HSTS 的主机名列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8738">Setting the policy specifies a list of hostnames that bypass preloaded HSTS upgrades from http to https.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8739">此策略仅允许单标签主机名，并且此策略仅适用于静态 HSTS 预加载的条目（例如，"应用"、"新建"、"搜索"、"播放"）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8739">Only single-label hostnames are allowed in this policy, and this policy only applies to static HSTS-preloaded entries (for example, "app", "new", "search", "play").</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8740">对于使用Strict-Transport-Security响应头动态请求HSTS升级的服务器，该策略不会阻止HSTS升级。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8740">This policy does not prevent HSTS upgrades for servers that have dynamically requested HSTS upgrades using a Strict-Transport-Security response header.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8741">提供的主机名必须规范：任何 IDN 必须转换为其 A 标签格式，所有 ASCII 字母必须小写。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8741">Supplied hostnames must be canonicalized: Any IDNs must be converted to their A-label format, and all ASCII letters must be lowercase.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8742">此策略仅适用于指定的特定单标签主机名，不适用于这些名称的子域。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8742">This policy only applies to the specific single-label hostnames specified, not to subdomains of those names.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8743">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8743">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8744">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8744">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8745">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8745">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8746">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8746">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8747">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8747">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8748">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8748">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8749">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8749">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8750">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8750">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8751">GP 唯一名称：HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8751">GP unique name: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8752">GP 名称：配置将跳过 HSTS 策略检查的名称列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8752">GP name: Configure the list of names that will bypass the HSTS policy check</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8753">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8753">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8754">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8754">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8755">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8755">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8756">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8756">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8757">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8757">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8758">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8758">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8759">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8759">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8760">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8760">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8761">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8761">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList\1 = "meet"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8762">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8762">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8763">首选项项名称：HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8763">Preference Key Name: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8764">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8764">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>meet</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8765">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8765">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8766">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8766">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="use-hardware-acceleration-when-available"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8767">使用硬件加速（如果可用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8767">Use hardware acceleration when available</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8768">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8768">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8769">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8769">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8770">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8770">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8771">指定如果可用时是否使用硬件加速。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8771">Specifies whether to use hardware acceleration if it's available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8772">如果启用此策略或未配置此策略，则会启用硬件加速，除非 GPU 功能被明确阻止。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8772">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, hardware acceleration is enabled unless a GPU feature is explicitly blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8773">如果禁用此策略，则会禁用硬件加速。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8773">If you disable this policy, hardware acceleration is disabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8774">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8774">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8775">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8775">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8776">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8776">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8777">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8777">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8778">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8778">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8779">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8779">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8780">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8780">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8781">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8781">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8782">GP 唯一名称：HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8782">GP unique name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8783">GP 名称：使用硬件加速（如果可用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8783">GP name: Use hardware acceleration when available</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8784">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8784">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8785">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8785">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8786">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8786">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8787">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8787">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8788">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8788">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8789">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8789">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8790">值名称：HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8790">Value Name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8791">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8791">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8792">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8792">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8793">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8793">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8794">首选项项名称：HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8794">Preference Key Name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8795">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8795">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8796">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8796">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="headlessmodeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8797">HeadlessModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8797">HeadlessModeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-headless-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8798">控制无外设模式的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8798">Control use of the Headless Mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8799">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8799">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8800">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 92 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8800">On Windows and macOS since 92 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8801">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8801">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8802">此策略设置允许你决定用户是否可以以无外设模式启动 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8802">This policy setting lets you decide whether users can launch Microsoft Edge in headless mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8803">如果启用或不配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将允许使用无外设模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8803">If you enable or don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge allows use of the headless mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8804">如果禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将拒绝使用无外设模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8804">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge denies use of the headless mode.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8805">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8805">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8806">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8806">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8807">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8807">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8808">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8808">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8809">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8809">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8810">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8810">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8811">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8811">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8812">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8812">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8813">GP 唯一名称：HeadlessModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8813">GP unique name: HeadlessModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8814">GP 名称：控制无外设模式的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8814">GP name: Control use of the Headless Mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8815">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8815">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8816">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8816">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8817">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8817">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8818">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8818">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8819">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8819">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8820">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8820">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8821">值名称：HeadlessModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8821">Value Name: HeadlessModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8822">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8822">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8823">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8823">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8824">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8824">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8825">首选项项名称：HeadlessModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8825">Preference Key Name: HeadlessModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8826">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8826">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8827">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8827">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="hidefirstrunexperience"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8828">HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8828">HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>

  #### <a name="hide-the-first-run-experience-and-splash-screen"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8829">隐藏首次运行体验和初始屏幕</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8829">Hide the First-run experience and splash screen</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8830">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8830">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8831">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 80 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8831">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8832">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8832">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8833">如果启用此策略，则首次运行 Microsoft Edge 时，用户将不会看到首次运行体验和初始屏幕。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8833">If you enable this policy, the First-run experience and the splash screen will not be shown to users when they run Microsoft Edge for the first time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8834">对于首次运行体验中显示的配置选项，浏览器将默认为以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8834">For the configuration options shown in the First Run Experience, the browser will default to the following:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8835">- 在新选项卡页上，源类型将设置为“MSN 新闻”，布局将设置为“鼓舞人心”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8835">-On the New Tab Page, the feed type will be set to MSN News and the layout to Inspirational.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8836">- 如果 Windows 帐户为 Azure AD 或 MSA 类型，用户仍将自动登录到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8836">-The user will still be automatically signed into Microsoft Edge if the Windows account is of Azure AD or MSA type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8837">-默认情况下不会启用同步，并且系统会提示用户选择是否要在浏览器启动时同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8837">-Sync will not be enabled by default and users will be prompted to choose whether they'd like to sync on browser startup.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8838">可使用 [ForceSync](#forcesync) 或 [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 策略来配置同步和同步许可提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8838">You can use the [ForceSync](#forcesync) or the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy to configure sync and the sync consent prompt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8839">如果禁用或未配置此策略，将显示首次运行体验和初始屏幕。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8839">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the First-run experience and the Splash screen will be shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8840">注意：也可以使用其他特定策略管理首次运行体验中向用户显示的特定配置选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8840">Note: The specific configuration options shown to the user in the First Run Experience, can also be managed by using other specific policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8841">你可以将 HideFirstRunExperience 策略与这些策略搭配使用，以便在受管理设备上配置特定浏览器体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8841">You can use the HideFirstRunExperience policy in combination with these policies to configure a specific browser experience on your managed devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8842">其他一些策略包括：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8842">Some of these other policies are:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8843">-[AutoImportAtFirstRun](#autoimportatfirstrun)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8843">-[AutoImportAtFirstRun](#autoimportatfirstrun)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8844">-[NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8844">-[NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8845">-[NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8845">-[NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8846">-[ForceSync](#forcesync)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8846">-[ForceSync](#forcesync)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8847">-[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8847">-[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8848">-[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8848">-[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8849">-[NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8849">-[NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8850">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8850">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8851">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8851">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8852">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8852">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8853">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8853">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8854">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8854">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8855">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8855">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8856">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8856">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8857">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8857">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8858">GP 唯一名称：HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8858">GP unique name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8859">GP 名称：隐藏首次运行体验和初始屏幕</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8859">GP name: Hide the First-run experience and splash screen</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8860">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8860">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8861">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8861">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8862">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8862">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8863">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8863">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8864">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8864">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8865">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8865">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8866">值名称：HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8866">Value Name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8867">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8867">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8868">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8868">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8869">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8869">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8870">首选项项名称：HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8870">Preference Key Name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8871">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8871">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8872">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8872">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="hideinternetexplorerredirectuxforincompatiblesitesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8873">HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8873">HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="hide-the-one-time-redirection-dialog-and-the-banner-on-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8874">隐藏一次性重定向对话框和 Microsoft Edge 上的横幅</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8874">Hide the one-time redirection dialog and the banner on Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8875">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8875">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8876">在 87 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8876">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8877">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8877">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8878">此策略将提供一个可禁用一次性重定向对话框和横幅的选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8878">This policy gives an option to disable one-time redirection dialog and the banner.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8879">如果启用此策略，用户将不会看到一次性对话框和标题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8879">When this policy is enabled, users will not see both the one-time dialog and the banner.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8880">当在 Internet Explorer 中遇到不兼容的网站时，用户将继续重定向到 Microsoft Edge，但系统不会导入其浏览数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8880">Users will continue to be redirected to Microsoft Edge when they encounter an incompatible website on Internet Explorer, but their browsing data will not be imported.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8881">如果启用此策略，则一定不会向用户显示一次性重定向对话框和横幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8881">If you enable this policy the one-time redirection dialog and banner will never be shown to users.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8882">发生重定向时，不会导入用户的浏览数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8882">Users' browsing data will not be imported when a redirection happens.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8883">如果禁用或未设置此策略，系统会在首次重定向时显示重定向对话框，且对于以重定向开始的会话，系统将持续向用户显示重定向横幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8883">If you disable or don't set this policy, the redirection dialog will be shown on the first redirection and the persistent redirection banner will be shown to users on sessions that begin with a redirection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8884">每次用户遇到此类重定向时，都将导入用户的浏览数据（仅当用户在一次性对话框上同意重定向时）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8884">Users' browsing data will be imported every time user encounters such redirection (ONLY IF user consents to it on the one-time dialog).</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8885">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8885">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8886">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8886">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
