  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8887">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8887">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8888">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8888">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8889">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8889">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8890">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8890">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8891">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8891">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8892">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8892">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8893">GP 唯一名称：HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8893">GP unique name: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8894">GP 名称：隐藏一次性重定向对话框和 Microsoft Edge 上的横幅</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8894">GP name: Hide the one-time redirection dialog and the banner on Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8895">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8895">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8896">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8896">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8897">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8897">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8898">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8898">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8899">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8899">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8900">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8900">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8901">值名称：HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8901">Value Name: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8902">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8902">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8903">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8903">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8904">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8904">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="importautofillformdata"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8905">ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8905">ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-autofill-form-data"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8906">允许导入自动填充表单数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8906">Allow importing of autofill form data</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8907">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8907">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8908">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8908">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8909">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8909">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8910">允许用户将自动填充表单数据从另一个浏览器导入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8910">Allows users to import autofill form data from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8911">如果启用此策略，则会自动选中手动导入自动填充数据的选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8911">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import autofill data is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8912">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入自动填充表单数据，并且用户不能手动导入这些数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8912">If you disable this policy, autofill form data isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8913">如果未配置此策略，则首次运行时将导入自动填充数据，在以后的浏览会话期间，用户可以选择是否手动导入此数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8913">If you don't configure this policy, autofill data is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8914">可将此策略设置为建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8914">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8915">这意味着 Microsoft Edge 将在首次运行时导入自动填充数据，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**自动填充数据**选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8915">This means that Microsoft Edge will import autofill data on first run, but users can select or clear **autofill data** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8916">**注意**：此策略当前管理从 Google Chrome（Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上）和 Mozilla Firefox（Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上）浏览器导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8916">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) and Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8917">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8917">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8918">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8918">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8919">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8919">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8920">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8920">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8921">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8921">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8922">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8922">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8923">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8923">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8924">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8924">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8925">GP 唯一名称：ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8925">GP unique name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8926">GP 名称：允许导入自动填充表单数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8926">GP name: Allow importing of autofill form data</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8927">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8927">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8928">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8928">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8929">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8929">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8930">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8930">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8931">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8931">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8932">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8932">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8933">值名称：ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8933">Value Name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8934">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8934">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8935">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8935">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8936">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8936">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8937">首选项项名称：ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8937">Preference Key Name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8938">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8938">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8939">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8939">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="importbrowsersettings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8940">ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8940">ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-browser-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8941">允许导入浏览器设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8941">Allow importing of browser settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8942">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8942">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8943">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8943">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8944">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8944">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8945">允许用户将浏览器设置从另一个浏览器导入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8945">Allows users to import browser settings from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8946">如果启用此策略，将在“**导入浏览器数据**”对话框中自动选中“**浏览器设置**”复选框。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8946">If you enable this policy, the **Browser settings** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8947">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入浏览器设置，而且用户不能手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8947">If you disable this policy, browser settings aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8948">如果未配置此策略，则首次运行时将导入浏览器设置，在以后的浏览会话期间，用户可以选择是否手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8948">If you don't configure this policy, browser settings are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8949">还可将此策略设置为建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8949">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8950">这意味着 Microsoft Edge 在首次运行时将导入设置，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**浏览器设置**选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8950">This means that Microsoft Edge imports the settings on first run, but users can select or clear the **browser settings** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8951">**注意**：此策略当前管理导入 Google Chrome（在 Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8951">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8952">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8952">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8953">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8953">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8954">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8954">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8955">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8955">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8956">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8956">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8957">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8957">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8958">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8958">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8959">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8959">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8960">GP 唯一名称：ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8960">GP unique name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8961">GP 名称：允许导入浏览器设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8961">GP name: Allow importing of browser settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8962">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8962">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8963">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8963">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8964">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8964">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8965">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8965">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8966">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8966">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8967">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8967">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8968">值名称：ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8968">Value Name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8969">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8969">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8970">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8970">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8971">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8971">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8972">首选项项名称：ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8972">Preference Key Name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8973">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8973">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8974">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8974">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="importcookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8975">ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8975">ImportCookies</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-cookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8976">允许导入 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8976">Allow importing of Cookies</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8977">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8977">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8978">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 81 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8978">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8979">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8979">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8980">允许用户将 Cookie 从另一个浏览器导入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8980">Allows users to import Cookies from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8981">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8981">If you disable this policy, Cookies aren't imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8982">如果未配置此策略，则首次运行时将导入 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8982">If you don't configure this policy, Cookies are imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8983">还可将此策略设置为建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8983">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8984">这意味着 Microsoft Edge 在首次运行时将导入 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8984">This means that Microsoft Edge imports Cookies on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8985">**注意**：此策略当前管理导入 Google Chrome（在 Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8985">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8986">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8986">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8987">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8987">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8988">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8988">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8989">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8989">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8990">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8990">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8991">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8991">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8992">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8992">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8993">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8993">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8994">GP 唯一名称：ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8994">GP unique name: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8995">GP 名称：允许导入 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8995">GP name: Allow importing of Cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8996">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8996">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8997">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8997">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8998">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8998">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-8999">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-8999">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9000">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9000">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9001">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9001">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9002">值名称：ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9002">Value Name: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9003">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9003">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9004">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9004">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9005">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9005">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9006">首选项项名称：ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9006">Preference Key Name: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9007">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9007">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9008">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9008">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="importextensions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9009">ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9009">ImportExtensions</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-extensions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9010">允许导入扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9010">Allow importing of extensions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9011">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9011">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9012">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 81 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9012">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9013">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9013">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9014">允许用户将扩展从另一个浏览器导入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9014">Allows users to import extensions from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9015">如果启用此策略，将在“**导入浏览器数据**”对话框中自动选中“**扩展**”复选框。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9015">If you enable this policy, the **Extensions** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9016">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入扩展，而且用户不能手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9016">If you disable this policy, extensions aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9017">如果未配置此策略，则首次运行时将导入扩展，在以后的浏览会话期间，用户可以选择是否手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9017">If you don't configure this policy, extensions are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9018">还可将此策略设置为建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9018">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9019">这意味着 Microsoft Edge 在首次运行时将导入扩展，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**收藏夹**选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9019">This means that Microsoft Edge imports extensions on first run, but users can select or clear the **favorites** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9020">**注意**：此策略目前仅支持从 Google Chrome（在 Windows 7、8、10和 macOS 上）导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9020">**Note**: This policy currently only supports importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9021">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9021">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9022">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9022">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9023">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9023">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9024">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9024">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9025">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9025">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9026">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9026">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9027">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9027">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9028">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9028">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9029">GP 唯一名称：ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9029">GP unique name: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9030">GP 名称：允许导入扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9030">GP name: Allow importing of extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9031">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9031">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9032">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9032">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9033">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9033">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9034">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9034">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9035">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9035">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9036">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9036">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9037">值名称：ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9037">Value Name: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9038">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9038">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9039">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9039">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9040">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9040">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9041">首选项项名称：ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9041">Preference Key Name: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9042">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9042">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9043">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9043">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="importfavorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9044">ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9044">ImportFavorites</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-favorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9045">允许导入收藏夹</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9045">Allow importing of favorites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9046">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9046">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9047">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9047">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9048">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9048">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9049">允许用户将收藏夹从另一个浏览器导入 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9049">Allows users to import favorites from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9050">如果启用此策略，将在“**导入浏览器数据**”对话框中自动选中“**收藏夹**”复选框。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9050">If you enable this policy, the **Favorites** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9051">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入收藏夹，而且用户不能手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9051">If you disable this policy, favorites aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9052">如果未配置此策略，则首次运行时将导入收藏夹，在以后的浏览会话期间，用户可以选择是否手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9052">If you don't configure this policy, favorites are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9053">还可将此策略设置为建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9053">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9054">这意味着 Microsoft Edge 在首次运行时将导入收藏夹，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**收藏夹**选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9054">This means that Microsoft Edge imports favorites on first run, but users can select or clear the **favorites** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9055">**注意**：此策略当前管理从 Internet Explorer（Windows 7、8 和 10 上）、Google Chrome（在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上以及 macOS 上）、Mozilla Firefox（Windows 7、8 和 10 上以及 macOS 上）和 Apple Safari（macOS 上）浏览器导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9055">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Apple Safari (on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9056">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9056">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9057">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9057">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9058">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9058">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9059">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9059">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9060">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9060">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9061">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9061">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9062">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9062">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9063">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9063">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9064">GP 唯一名称：ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9064">GP unique name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9065">GP 名称：允许导入收藏夹</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9065">GP name: Allow importing of favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9066">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9066">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9067">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9067">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9068">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9068">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9069">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9069">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9070">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9070">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9071">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9071">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9072">值名称：ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9072">Value Name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9073">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9073">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9074">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9074">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9075">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9075">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9076">首选项项名称：ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9076">Preference Key Name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9077">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9077">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9078">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9078">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="importhistory"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9079">ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9079">ImportHistory</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-browsing-history"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9080">允许导入浏览历史记录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9080">Allow importing of browsing history</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9081">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9081">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9082">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9082">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9083">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9083">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9084">允许用户将浏览历史记录从另一个浏览器导入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9084">Allows users to import their browsing history from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9085">如果启用此策略，将在“**导入浏览器数据**”对话框中自动选中“**浏览历史记录**”复选框。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9085">If you enable this policy, the **Browsing history** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9086">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入浏览历史记录数据，并且用户不能手动导入此数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9086">If you disable this policy, browsing history data isn't imported at first run, and users can't import this data manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9087">如果未配置此策略，则首次运行时将导入浏览历史记录数据，在以后的浏览会话期间，用户可以选择是否手动导入此数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9087">If you don't configure this policy, browsing history data is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import it manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9088">还可将此策略设置为建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9088">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9089">这意味着 Microsoft Edge 在首次运行时将导入浏览历史记录，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**历史记录**选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9089">This means that Microsoft Edge imports browsing history on first run, but users can select or clear the **history** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9090">**注意**：此策略当前管理从 Internet Explorer（Windows 7、8 和 10 上）、Google Chrome（在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上以及 macOS 上）、Mozilla Firefox（Windows 7、8 和 10 上以及 macOS 上）和 Apple Safari (macOS) 浏览器导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9090">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Apple Safari (macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9091">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9091">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9092">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9092">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9093">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9093">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9094">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9094">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9095">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9095">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9096">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9096">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9097">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9097">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9098">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9098">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9099">GP 唯一名称：ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9099">GP unique name: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9100">GP 名称：允许导入浏览历史记录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9100">GP name: Allow importing of browsing history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9101">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9101">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9102">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9102">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9103">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9103">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9104">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9104">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9105">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9105">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9106">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9106">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9107">值名称：ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9107">Value Name: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9108">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9108">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9109">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9109">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9110">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9110">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9111">首选项项名称：ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9111">Preference Key Name: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9112">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9112">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9113">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9113">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="importhomepage"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9114">ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9114">ImportHomepage</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-home-page-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9115">允许导入主页设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9115">Allow importing of home page settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9116">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9116">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9117">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9117">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9118">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9118">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9119">允许用户将主页设置从另一个浏览器导入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9119">Allows users to import their home page setting from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9120">如果启用此策略，则会自动选中手动导入主页设置的选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9120">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import the home page setting is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9121">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入主页设置，并且用户不能手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9121">If you disable this policy, the home page setting isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9122">如果未配置此策略，则首次运行时将导入主页设置，在以后的浏览会话期间，用户可以选择是否手动导入此数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9122">If you don't configure this policy, the home page setting is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9123">可将此策略设置为建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9123">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9124">这意味着 Microsoft Edge 在首次运行时将导入主页设置，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**主页**选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9124">This means that Microsoft Edge imports the home page setting on first run, but users can select or clear the **home page** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9125">**注意**：此策略当前管理从 Internet Explorer（在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上）导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9125">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9126">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9126">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9127">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9127">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9128">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9128">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9129">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9129">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9130">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9130">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9131">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9131">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9132">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9132">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9133">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9133">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9134">GP 唯一名称：ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9134">GP unique name: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9135">GP 名称：允许导入主页设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9135">GP name: Allow importing of home page settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9136">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9136">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9137">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9137">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9138">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9138">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9139">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9139">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9140">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9140">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9141">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9141">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9142">值名称：ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9142">Value Name: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9143">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9143">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9144">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9144">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9145">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9145">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9146">首选项项名称：ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9146">Preference Key Name: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9147">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9147">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9148">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9148">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="importopentabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9149">ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9149">ImportOpenTabs</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-open-tabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9150">允许导入打开的选项卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9150">Allow importing of open tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9151">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9151">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9152">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 79 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9152">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9153">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9153">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9154">允许用户将打开和固定的选项卡从另一个浏览器导入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9154">Allows users to import open and pinned tabs from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9155">如果启用此策略，将在“**导入浏览器数据**”对话框中自动选中“**打开的选项卡**”复选框。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9155">If you enable this policy, the **Open tabs** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9156">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入打开的选项卡，而且用户不能手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9156">If you disable this policy, open tabs aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9157">如果未配置此策略，则首次运行时将导入打开的选项卡，在以后的浏览会话期间，用户可以选择是否手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9157">If you don't configure this policy, open tabs are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9158">还可将此策略设置为建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9158">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9159">这意味着 Microsoft Edge 在首次运行时将导入打开的选项卡，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除“**打开的选项卡**”选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9159">This means that Microsoft Edge imports open tabs on first run, but users can select or clear the **Open tabs** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9160">**注意**：此策略目前仅支持从 Google Chrome（在 Windows 7、8、10和 macOS 上）导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9160">**Note**: This policy currently only supports importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9161">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9161">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9162">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9162">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9163">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9163">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9164">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9164">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9165">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9165">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9166">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9166">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9167">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9167">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9168">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9168">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9169">GP 唯一名称：ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9169">GP unique name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9170">GP 名称：允许导入打开的选项卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9170">GP name: Allow importing of open tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9171">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9171">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9172">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9172">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9173">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9173">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9174">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9174">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9175">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9175">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9176">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9176">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9177">值名称：ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9177">Value Name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9178">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9178">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9179">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9179">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9180">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9180">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9181">首选项项名称：ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9181">Preference Key Name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9182">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9182">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9183">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9183">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="importpaymentinfo"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9184">ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9184">ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-payment-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9185">允许导入付款信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9185">Allow importing of payment info</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9186">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9186">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9187">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9187">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9188">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9188">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9189">允许用户将付款信息从另一个浏览器导入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9189">Allows users to import payment info from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9190">如果启用此策略，将在“**导入浏览器数据**”对话框中自动选中“**付款信息**”复选框。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9190">If you enable this policy, the **payment info** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9191">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入付款信息，并且用户不能手动导入该信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9191">If you disable this policy, payment info isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9192">如果未配置此策略，则首次运行时将导入付款信息，在以后的浏览会话期间，用户可以选择是否手动导入该信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9192">If you don't configure this policy, payment info is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import it manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9193">还可将此策略设置为建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9193">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9194">这意味着 Microsoft Edge 在首次运行时将导入付款信息，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除“**付款信息**”选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9194">This means that Microsoft Edge imports payment info on first run, but users can select or clear the **payment info** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9195">**注意：** 此策略目前管理从 Google Chrome（Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上）导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9195">**Note:** This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9196">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9196">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9197">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9197">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9198">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9198">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9199">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9199">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9200">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9200">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9201">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9201">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9202">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9202">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9203">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9203">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9204">GP 唯一名称：ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9204">GP unique name: ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9205">GP 名称：允许导入付款信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9205">GP name: Allow importing of payment info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9206">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9206">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9207">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9207">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9208">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9208">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9209">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9209">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9210">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9210">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9211">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9211">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9212">值名称：ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9212">Value Name: ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9213">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9213">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9214">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9214">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9215">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9215">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9216">首选项项名称：ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9216">Preference Key Name: ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9217">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9217">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9218">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9218">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="importsavedpasswords"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9219">ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9219">ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-saved-passwords"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9220">允许导入保存的密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9220">Allow importing of saved passwords</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9221">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9221">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9222">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9222">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9223">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9223">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9224">允许用户将保存的密码从另一个浏览器导入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9224">Allows users to import saved passwords from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9225">如果启用此策略，则会自动选中手动导入保存的密码的选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9225">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import saved passwords is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9226">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入保存的密码，而且用户不能手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9226">If you disable this policy, saved passwords aren't imported on first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9227">如果未配置此策略，则首次运行时将导入密码，在以后的浏览会话期间，用户可以选择是否手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9227">If you don't configure this policy, passwords are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9228">可将此策略设置为建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9228">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9229">这意味着 Microsoft Edge 在首次运行时将导入密码，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除“**密码**”选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9229">This means that Microsoft Edge imports passwords on first run, but users can select or clear the **passwords** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9230">**注意**：此策略当前管理从 Internet Explorer（Windows 7、8 和 10 上）、Google Chrome（在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上以及 macOS 上）和 Mozilla Firefox（Windows 7、8 和 10 上以及 macOS 上）浏览器导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9230">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9231">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9231">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9232">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9232">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9233">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9233">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9234">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9234">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9235">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9235">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9236">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9236">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9237">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9237">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9238">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9238">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9239">GP 唯一名称：ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9239">GP unique name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9240">GP 名称：允许导入保存的密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9240">GP name: Allow importing of saved passwords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9241">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9241">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9242">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9242">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9243">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9243">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9244">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9244">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9245">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9245">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9246">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9246">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9247">值名称：ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9247">Value Name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9248">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9248">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9249">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9249">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9250">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9250">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9251">首选项项名称：ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9251">Preference Key Name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9252">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9252">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9253">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9253">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="importsearchengine"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9254">ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9254">ImportSearchEngine</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-search-engine-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9255">允许导入搜索引擎设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9255">Allow importing of search engine settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9256">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9256">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9257">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9257">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9258">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9258">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9259">允许用户将搜索引擎设置从另一个浏览器导入到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9259">Allows users to import search engine settings from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9260">如果启用此策略，则会自动选中导入搜索引擎设置的选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9260">If you enable, this policy, the option to import search engine settings is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9261">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入搜索引擎设置，而且用户不能手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9261">If you disable this policy, search engine settings aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9262">如果未配置此策略，则首次运行时将导入搜索引擎设置，在以后的浏览会话期间，用户可以选择是否手动导入此数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9262">If you don't configure this policy, search engine settings are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9263">可将此策略设置为建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9263">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9264">这意味着 Microsoft Edge 在首次运行时将导入搜索引擎设置，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除“**搜索引擎**”选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9264">This means that Microsoft Edge imports search engine settings on first run, but users can select or clear the **search engine** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9265">**注意**：此策略当前管理从 Internet Explorer（在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上）导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9265">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9266">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9266">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9267">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9267">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9268">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9268">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9269">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9269">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9270">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9270">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9271">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9271">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9272">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9272">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9273">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9273">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9274">GP 唯一名称：ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9274">GP unique name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9275">GP 名称：允许导入搜索引擎设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9275">GP name: Allow importing of search engine settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9276">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9276">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9277">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9277">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9278">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9278">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9279">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9279">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9280">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9280">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9281">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9281">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9282">值名称：ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9282">Value Name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9283">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9283">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9284">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9284">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9285">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9285">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9286">首选项项名称：ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9286">Preference Key Name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9287">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9287">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9288">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9288">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="importshortcuts"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9289">ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9289">ImportShortcuts</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-shortcuts"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9290">允许导入快捷方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9290">Allow importing of shortcuts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9291">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9291">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9292">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 81 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9292">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9293">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9293">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9294">允许用户将快捷方式从另一个浏览器导入 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9294">Allows users to import Shortcuts from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9295">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入快捷方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9295">If you disable this policy, Shortcuts aren't imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9296">如果未配置此策略，则首次运行时将导入快捷方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9296">If you don't configure this policy, Shortcuts are imported on first run.</span></span>
