<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9297">还可将此策略设置为建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9297">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9298">这意味着 Microsoft Edge 在首次运行时将导入快捷方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9298">This means that Microsoft Edge imports Shortcuts on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9299">**注意**：此策略目前管理从 Google Chrome（Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上）导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9299">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9300">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9300">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9301">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9301">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9302">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9302">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9303">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9303">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9304">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9304">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9305">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9305">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9306">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9306">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9307">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9307">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9308">GP 唯一名称：ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9308">GP unique name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9309">GP 名称：允许导入快捷方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9309">GP name: Allow importing of shortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9310">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9310">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9311">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9311">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9312">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9312">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9313">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9313">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9314">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9314">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9315">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9315">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9316">值名称：ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9316">Value Name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9317">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9317">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9318">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9318">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9319">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9319">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9320">首选项项名称：ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9320">Preference Key Name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9321">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9321">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9322">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9322">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="importstartuppagesettings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9323">ImportStartupPageSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9323">ImportStartupPageSettings</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-startup-page-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9324">允许导入启动页面设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9324">Allow importing of startup page settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9325">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9325">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9326">在 91 或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9326">On Windows since 91 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9327">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9327">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9328">允许用户将启动设置从另一个浏览器导入 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9328">Allows users to import Startup settings from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9329">如果启用此策略，则将始终导入启动设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9329">If you enable this policy, the Startup settings are always imported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9330">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时或手动导入时不会导入启动设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9330">If you disable this policy, startup settings are not imported at first run or at manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9331">如果未配置此策略，则首次运行时将导入启动设置，在以后的浏览会话期间，用户可以通过浏览器设置选择是否手动导入此数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9331">If you don't configure this policy, startup settings are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually by selecting browser settings option during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9332">可将此策略设置为建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9332">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9333">这意味着，Microsoft Edge 首次运行时将导入启动设置，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**浏览器设置**选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9333">This means that Microsoft Edge will import startup settings on first run, but users can select or clear **browser settings** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9334">**注意**：此策略当前管理从 Microsoft Edge 旧版 和 Google Chrome 浏览器 (在 Windows 7、8 和 10 上) 导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9334">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Microsoft Edge Legacy and Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9335">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9335">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9336">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9336">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9337">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9337">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9338">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9338">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9339">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9339">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9340">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9340">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9341">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9341">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9342">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9342">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9343">GP 唯一名称：ImportStartupPageSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9343">GP unique name: ImportStartupPageSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9344">GP 名称：允许导入启动页面设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9344">GP name: Allow importing of startup page settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9345">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9345">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9346">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9346">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9347">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9347">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9348">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9348">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9349">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9349">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9350">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9350">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9351">值名称：ImportStartupPageSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9351">Value Name: ImportStartupPageSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9352">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9352">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9353">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9353">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9354">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9354">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="inprivatemodeavailability"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9355">InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9355">InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-inprivate-mode-availability"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9356">配置 InPrivate 模式可用性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9356">Configure InPrivate mode availability</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9357">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9357">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9358">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9358">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9359">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9359">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9360">指定用户是否可以在 Microsoft Edge 中以 InPrivate 模式打开页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9360">Specifies whether the user can open pages in InPrivate mode in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9361">如果未配置此策略或将其设置为 'Enabled'，则用户可以以 InPrivate 模式打开页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9361">If you don't configure this policy or set it to 'Enabled', users can open pages in InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9362">将此策略设置为 'Disabled' 可阻止用户使用 InPrivate 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9362">Set this policy to 'Disabled' to stop users from using InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9363">将此策略设置为 'Forced' 可始终使用 InPrivate 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9363">Set this policy to 'Forced' to always use InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9364">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9364">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9365">Enabled (0) = InPrivate 模式可用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9365">Enabled (0) = InPrivate mode available</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9366">Disabled (1) = 禁用 InPrivate 模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9366">Disabled (1) = InPrivate mode disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9367">Forced (2) = 强制 InPrivate 模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9367">Forced (2) = InPrivate mode forced</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9368">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9368">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9369">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9369">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9370">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9370">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9371">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9371">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9372">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9372">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9373">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9373">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9374">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9374">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9375">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9375">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9376">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9376">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9377">GP 唯一名称：InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9377">GP unique name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9378">GP 名称：配置 InPrivate 模式可用性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9378">GP name: Configure InPrivate mode availability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9379">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9379">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9380">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9380">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9381">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9381">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9382">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9382">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9383">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9383">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9384">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9384">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9385">值名称：InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9385">Value Name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9386">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9386">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9387">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9387">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9388">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9388">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9389">首选项项名称：InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9389">Preference Key Name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9390">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9390">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9391">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9391">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="insecureformswarningsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9392">InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9392">InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-warnings-for-insecure-forms"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9393">启用不安全窗体的警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9393">Enable warnings for insecure forms</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9394">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9394">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9395">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9395">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9396">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9396">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9397">此策略控制嵌入浏览器中安全（HTTPS）网站的非安全窗体（通过 HTTP 提交的窗体）的处理。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9397">This policy controls the handling of insecure forms (forms submitted over HTTP) embedded in secure (HTTPS) sites in the browser.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9398">如果启用此策略或不对其进行设置，则在提交不安全窗体时将显示完整的页面警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9398">If you enable this policy or don't set it, a full page warning will be shown when an insecure form is submitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9399">此外，如果窗体域获得焦点，将在窗体域旁显示警告气泡，并且将对这些窗体禁用自动填充。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9399">Additionally, a warning bubble will be shown next to the form fields when they are focused, and autofill will be disabled for those forms.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9400">如果禁用此策略，则不会显示不安全窗体的警告，并且自动填充将正常工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9400">If you disable this policy, warnings will not be shown for insecure forms, and autofill will work normally.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9401">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9401">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9402">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9402">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9403">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9403">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9404">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9404">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9405">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9405">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9406">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9406">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9407">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9407">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9408">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9408">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9409">GP 唯一名称：InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9409">GP unique name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9410">GP 名称：启用不安全窗体的警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9410">GP name: Enable warnings for insecure forms</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9411">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9411">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9412">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9412">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9413">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9413">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9414">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9414">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9415">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9415">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9416">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9416">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9417">值名称：InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9417">Value Name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9418">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9418">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9419">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9419">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9420">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9420">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9421">首选项项名称：InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9421">Preference Key Name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9422">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9422">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9423">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9423">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="intensivewakeupthrottlingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9424">IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9424">IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-the-intensivewakeupthrottling-feature"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9425">控制 IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 的功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9425">Control the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9426">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9426">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9427">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 85 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9427">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9428">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9428">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9429">启用了 IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 特性时，背景标签中的Javascript 计时器会被强制地调节和合并，在页面背景关闭 5 分钟或更长时间后，每分钟运行不超过一次。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9429">When enabled the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature causes Javascript timers in background tabs to be aggressively throttled and coalesced, running no more than once per minute after a page has been backgrounded for 5 minutes or more.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9430">这是一个与 web 标准兼容的功能，但它可能会导致某些网站的某些操作延迟一分钟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9430">This is a web standards compliant feature, but it may break functionality on some websites by causing certain actions to be delayed by up to a minute.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9431">但是，启用它可以显著地节省CPU和电池。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9431">However, it results in significant CPU and battery savings when enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9432">有关更多详细信息，请参阅https://bit.ly/30b1XR4。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9432">See https://bit.ly/30b1XR4 for more details.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9433">如果启用此策略，将强制启用该功能，用户将无法覆盖此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9433">If you enable this policy, the feature will be force enabled, and users will not be able to override this setting.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9434">如果禁用此策略，将强制禁用该功能，用户将无法覆盖此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9434">If you disable this policy, the feature will be force disabled, and users will not be able to override this setting.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9435">如果未配置此策略，该功能将由其自己的内部逻辑控制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9435">If you don't configure this policy, the feature will be controlled by its own internal logic.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9436">用户可以手动配置此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9436">Users can manually configure this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9437">请注意，每个体现程序将应用此策略，策略设置的最新值在呈现程序启动时生效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9437">Note that the policy is applied per renderer process, with the most recent value of the policy setting in force when a renderer process starts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9438">若要确保所有加载的选项卡均会收到一致的策略设置，则需要完全重启。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9438">A full restart is required to ensure that all the loaded tabs receive a consistent policy setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9439">使用此策略的不同值运行的进程是无害的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9439">It is harmless for processes to be running with different values of this policy.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9440">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9440">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9441">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9441">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9442">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9442">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9443">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9443">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9444">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9444">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9445">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9445">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9446">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9446">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9447">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9447">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9448">GP 唯一名称： IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9448">GP unique name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9449">GP 名称：控制 IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9449">GP name: Control the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9450">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9450">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9451">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9451">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9452">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9452">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9453">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9453">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9454">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9454">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9455">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9455">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9456">值名称： IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9456">Value Name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9457">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9457">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9458">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9458">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9459">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9459">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9460">首选参数名称： IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9460">Preference Key Name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9461">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9461">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9462">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9462">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationenhancedhangdetection"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9463">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9463">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-enhanced-hang-detection-for-internet-explorer-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9464">为 Internet Explorer 模式配置增强的挂起检测</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9464">Configure enhanced hang detection for Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9465">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9465">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9466">在 84 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9466">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9467">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9467">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9468">与独立的 Internet Explorer 相比，增强的挂起检测是一种更精细的方法来检测 Internet Explorer 模式下挂起的网页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9468">Enhanced hang detection is a more granular approach to detecting hung webpages in Internet Explorer mode than what standalone Internet Explorer uses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9469">检测到挂起的网页时，浏览器将应用缓解措施，防止其余浏览器挂起。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9469">When a hung webpage is detected, the browser will apply a mitigation to prevent the rest of the browser from hanging.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9470">通过此设置，可配置增强型挂起检测的使用情况，以防遇到与任何网站不兼容的问题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9470">This setting allows you to configure the use of enhanced hang detection in case you run into incompatible issues with any of your websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9471">当你在 Internet Explorer 模式看到通知，如“(网站)没有响应”，但不是在独立的 Internet Explorer，我们建议你禁用此政策。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9471">We recommend disabling this policy only if you see notifications such as "(website) is not responding" in Internet Explorer mode but not in standalone Internet Explorer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9472">此设置与以下策略配合使用：[InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) （设置为 'IEMode'） 和 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 策略 （列表至少有一个条目）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9472">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9473">如果你将此策略设置为 'Enabled' 或未进行配置，则在 Internet Explorer 模式下运行的网站将使用增强挂起检测。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9473">If you set this policy to 'Enabled' or don't configure it, websites running in Internet Explorer mode will use enhanced hang detection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9474">如果将此策略设置为 'Disabled'，则禁用增强挂起检测，用户将获得基本的 Internet Explorer 挂起检测状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9474">If you set this policy to 'Disabled', enhanced hang detection is disabled, and users will get the basic Internet Explorer hang detection behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9475">要了解有关 Internet Explorer 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9475">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9476">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9476">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9477">Disabled (0) = 禁用 "增强挂起检测"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9477">Disabled (0) = Enhanced hang detection disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9478">Enabled (1) = 启用 "增强挂起检测"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9478">Enabled (1) = Enhanced hang detection enabled</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9479">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9479">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9480">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9480">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9481">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9481">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9482">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9482">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9483">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9483">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9484">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9484">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9485">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9485">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9486">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9486">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9487">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9487">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9488">GP 唯一名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9488">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9489">GP 名称：针对 Internet Explorer 模式配置增强型挂起检测</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9489">GP name: Configure enhanced hang detection for Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9490">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9490">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9491">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9491">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9492">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9492">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9493">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9493">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9494">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9494">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9495">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9495">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9496">值名称： InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9496">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9497">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9497">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9498">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9498">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9499">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9499">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationlevel"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9500">InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9500">InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-internet-explorer-integration"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9501">配置 Internet Explorer 集成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9501">Configure Internet Explorer integration</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9502">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9502">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9503">在 Windows 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9503">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9504">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9504">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9505">有关配置 Internet Explorer 模式的最佳体验的指南，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9505">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9506">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9506">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9507">None (0) = None</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9507">None (0) = None</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9508">IEMode (1) = Internet Explorer 模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9508">IEMode (1) = Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9509">NeedIE (2) = Internet Explorer 11</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9509">NeedIE (2) = Internet Explorer 11</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9510">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9510">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9511">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9511">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9512">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9512">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9513">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9513">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9514">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9514">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9515">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9515">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9516">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9516">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9517">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9517">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9518">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9518">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9519">GP 唯一名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9519">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9520">GP 名称：配置 Internet Explorer 集成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9520">GP name: Configure Internet Explorer integration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9521">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9521">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9522">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9522">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9523">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9523">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9524">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9524">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9525">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9525">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9526">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9526">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9527">值名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9527">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9528">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9528">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9529">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9529">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9530">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9530">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationlocalfileallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9531">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9531">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-launching-of-local-files-in-internet-explorer-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9532">允许在 Internet Explorer 模式下启动本地文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9532">Allow launching of local files in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9533">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9533">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9534">在 88 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9534">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9535">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9535">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9536">此策略控制 --ie-mode-file-url 命令行参数的可用性，该参数用于使用在命令行行指定的本地文件启动 Microsoft Edge 进入 Internet Explorer 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9536">This policy controls the availability of the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument which is used to launch Microsoft Edge with a local file specified on the command line into Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9537">此设置与以下设置配合使用: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 设置为“IEMode”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9537">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9538">如果将此策略设置为 true 或未配置该策略，则允许用户使用 --ie-mode-file-url 命令行参数在 Internet Explorer 模式下启动本地文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9538">If you set this policy to true, or don't configure it, the user is allowed to use the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument for launching local files in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9539">如果将此策略设置为 false，则不允许用户使用 --ie-mode-file-url 命令行参数在 Internet Explorer 模式下启动本地文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9539">If you set this policy to false, the user isn't allowed to use the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument for launching local files in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9540">若要了解有关 Internet Explorer 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9540">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9541">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9541">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9542">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9542">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9543">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9543">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9544">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9544">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9545">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9545">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9546">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9546">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9547">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9547">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9548">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9548">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9549">GP 唯一名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9549">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9550">GP 名称：允许在 Internet Explorer 模式下启动本地文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9550">GP name: Allow launching of local files in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9551">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9551">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9552">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9552">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9553">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9553">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9554">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9554">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9555">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9555">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9556">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9556">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9557">值名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9557">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9558">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9558">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9559">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9559">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9560">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9560">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationlocalfileextensionallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9561">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9561">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>

  #### <a name="open-local-files-in-internet-explorer-mode-file-extension-allow-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9562">在 Internet Explorer 模式文件扩展名允许列表中打开本地文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9562">Open local files in Internet Explorer mode file extension allow list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9563">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9563">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9564">在 88 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9564">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9565">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9565">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9566">此策略基于文件扩展名限制允许将哪些 file:// URL 启动到 Internet Explorer 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9566">This policy limits which file:// URLs are allowed to be launched into Internet Explorer mode based on file extension.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9567">此设置与以下设置配合使用: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 设置为“IEMode”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9567">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9568">当请求在 Internet Explorer 模式下启动 file:// URL 时，此列表中必须存在 URL 的文件扩展名，以便允许 URL 在 Internet Explorer 模式下启动。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9568">When a file:// URL is requested to launch in Internet Explorer mode, the file extension of the URL must be present in this list in order for the URL to be allowed to launch in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9569">阻止在 Internet Explorer 模式下打开的 URL 将改为在 Edge 模式下打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9569">A URL which is blocked from opening in Internet Explorer mode will instead open in Edge mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9570">如果将此策略设置为特殊值“\*”或未配置该策略，则允许所有文件扩展名。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9570">If you set this policy to the special value "\*" or don't configure it, all file extensions are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9571">若要了解有关 Internet Explorer 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9571">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9572">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9572">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9573">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9573">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9574">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9574">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9575">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9575">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9576">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9576">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9577">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9577">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9578">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9578">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9579">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9579">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9580">GP 唯一名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9580">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9581">GP 名称：在 Internet Explorer 模式文件扩展名允许列表中打开本地文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9581">GP name: Open local files in Internet Explorer mode file extension allow list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9582">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9582">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9583">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9583">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9584">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9584">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9585">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9585">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9586">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9586">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9587">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9587">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9588">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9588">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9589">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9589">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9590">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9590">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\1 = ".mht"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\2 = ".pdf"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\3 = ".vsdx"

```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9591">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9591">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationlocalfileshowcontextmenu"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9592">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9592">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-context-menu-to-open-a-file-link-in-internet-explorer-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9593">显示上下文菜单以在 Internet Explorer 模式下打开 file:// 链接</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9593">Show context menu to open a file:// link in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9594">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9594">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9595">在 88 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9595">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9596">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9596">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9597">此策略控制 file:// 链接上下文菜单上“在新的 Internet Explorer 模式选项卡中打开链接”选项的可见性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9597">This policy controls the visibility of the 'Open link in new Internet Explorer mode tab' option on the context menu for file:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9598">此设置与以下设置配合使用: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 设置为“IEMode”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9598">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9599">如果将此策略设置为 true，则“在新的 Internet Explorer 模式选项卡中打开链接”上下文菜单项将可用于 file:// 链接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9599">If you set this policy to true, the 'Open link in new Internet Explorer mode tab' context menu item will be available for file:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9600">如果将此策略设置为 false 或未配置该策略，则不会添加上下文菜单项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9600">If you set this policy to false or don't configure it, the context menu item will not be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9601">如果[InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed](#internetexplorerintegrationreloadiniemodeallowed)策略允许用户在 Internet Explorer 模式下重新加载网站，则"在新建 Internet Explorer 模式选项卡中的打开链接"上下文菜单项将可用于所有链接，站点列表明确配置为使用 Microsoft Edge 模式的网站的链接除外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9601">If the [InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed](#internetexplorerintegrationreloadiniemodeallowed) policy allows users to reload sites in Internet Explorer mode, then the 'Open link in new Internet Explorer mode tab' context menu item will be available for all links, except links to sites explicitly configured by the site list to use Microsoft Edge mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9602">在这种情况下，如果此策略设置为 true，则上下文菜单项将可用于 file:// 链接，即使对于配置为使用 Microsoft Edge 模式的网站也是如此。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9602">In this case, if you set this policy to true, the context menu item will be available for file:// links even for sites configured to use Microsoft Edge mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9603">如果此策略设置为 false 或未对其进行配置，则此策略无效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9603">If you set this policy to false or don't configure it, this policy has no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9604">要了解有关 Internet Explorer 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9604">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9605">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9605">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9606">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9606">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9607">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9607">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9608">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9608">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9609">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9609">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9610">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9610">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9611">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9611">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9612">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9612">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9613">GP 唯一名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9613">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9614">GP 名称：显示上下文菜单以 Internet Explorer 模式打开 file:// 链接</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9614">GP name: Show context menu to open a file:// link in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9615">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9615">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9616">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9616">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9617">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9617">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9618">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9618">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9619">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9619">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9620">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9620">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9621">值名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9621">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9622">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9622">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9623">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9623">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9624">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9624">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationlocalsitelistexpirationdays"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9625">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalSiteListExpirationDays</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9625">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalSiteListExpirationDays</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-the-number-of-days-that-a-site-remains-on-the-local-ie-mode-site-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9626">指定站点在本地 IE 模式站点列表中保留的天数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9626">Specify the number of days that a site remains on the local IE mode site list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9627">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9627">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9628">在 Windows 上自 92 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9628">On Windows since 92 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9629">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9629">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9630">如果[InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed](#internetexplorerintegrationreloadiniemodeallowed)策略已启用或未配置，则用户将能够告诉 Microsoft Edge 在 Internet Explorer 模式下加载特定页面的天数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9630">If the [InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed](#internetexplorerintegrationreloadiniemodeallowed) policy is enabled or not configured, users will be able to tell Microsoft Edge to load specific pages in Internet Explorer mode for a limited number of days.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9631">可以使用此设置确定在浏览器中记住配置的天数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9631">You can use this setting to determine how many days that configuration is remembered in the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9632">此时间段过后，单独的页面将不再在 IE 模式下自动加载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9632">After this period has elapsed, the individual page will no longer automatically load in IE mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9633">如果禁用 [InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed](#internetexplorerintegrationreloadiniemodeallowed) 策略，则此策略无效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9633">If you disable the [InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed](#internetexplorerintegrationreloadiniemodeallowed) policy, this policy has no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9634">如果禁用或不配置此策略，则使用默认值 30 天。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9634">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default value of 30 days is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9635">如果启用此策略，则必须输入网站在 Microsoft Edge 的用户本地站点列表上保留的天数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9635">If you enable this policy, you must enter the number of days for which the sites are retained on the user's local site list in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9636">该值可以是 0 到 90 天。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9636">The value can be from 0 to 90 days.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9637">要了解有关 Internet Explorer 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9637">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9638">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9638">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9639">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9639">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9640">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9640">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9641">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9641">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9642">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9642">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9643">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9643">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9644">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9644">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9645">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9645">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9646">GP 唯一名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalSiteListExpirationDays</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9646">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalSiteListExpirationDays</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9647">GP 名称：指定站点在本地 IE 模式站点列表中保留的天数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9647">GP name: Specify the number of days that a site remains on the local IE mode site list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9648">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9648">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9649">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9649">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9650">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9650">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9651">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9651">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9652">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9652">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9653">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9653">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9654">值名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalSiteListExpirationDays</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9654">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalSiteListExpirationDays</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9655">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9655">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9656">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9656">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x0000001e
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9657">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9657">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationreloadiniemodeallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9658">InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9658">InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-unconfigured-sites-to-be-reloaded-in-internet-explorer-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9659">允许以 Internet Explorer 模式重新加载未配置的站点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9659">Allow unconfigured sites to be reloaded in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9660">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9660">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9661">在 Windows 上自 92 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9661">On Windows since 92 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9662">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9662">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9663">此策略允许用户在 Microsoft Edge 中浏览并且网站需要 Internet Explorer 以实现兼容性时以 Internet Explorer 模式重新加载未配置的网站（未在企业模式站点列表中配置）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9663">This policy allows users to reload unconfigured sites (that are not configured in the Enterprise Mode Site List) in Internet Explorer mode when browsing in Microsoft Edge and a site requires Internet Explorer for compatibility.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9664">在 Internet Explorer 模式下重新加载网站后，"页内"导航将保持 Internet Explorer 模式 (例如，页面上的链接、脚本或表单，或者另一个"页内"导航页上的服务器端重定向)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9664">After a site has been reloaded in Internet Explorer mode, "in-page" navigations will stay in Internet Explorer mode (for example, a link, script, or form on the page, or a server-side redirect from another "in-page" navigation).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9665">用户可以选择退出 Internet Explorer 模式，或者当非"页面内"导航发生时，Microsoft Edge 将自动退出 Internet Explorer 模式 (例如，使用地址栏、后退按钮或收藏的链接)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9665">Users can choose to exit from Internet Explorer mode, or Microsoft Edge will automatically exit from Internet Explorer mode when a navigation that isn't "in-page" occurs (for example, using the address bar, the back button, or a favorite link).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9666">用户还可以选择 Microsoft Edge 以后也为该网站使用 Internet Explorer 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9666">Users can also optionally tell Microsoft Edge to use Internet Explorer mode for the site in the future.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9667">此选择将通过 [InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalSiteListExpirationDays](#internetexplorerintegrationlocalsitelistexpirationdays) 策略管理被记住的时间长度。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9667">This choice will be remembered for a length of time managed by the [InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalSiteListExpirationDays](#internetexplorerintegrationlocalsitelistexpirationdays) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9668">如果[InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel)策略设置为"IEMode"，则[InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist)策略的网站列表显式配置为使用 Microsoft Edge 的网站在 Internet Explorer 模式下无法重新加载，并且站点列表或[SendIntranetToInternetExplorer](#sendintranettointernetexplorer)策略配置为使用 Internet Explorer 模式的网站无法退出 Internet Explorer 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9668">If the [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) policy is set to 'IEMode', then sites explicitly configured by the [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy's site list to use Microsoft Edge can't be reloaded in Internet Explorer mode, and sites configured by the site list or by the [SendIntranetToInternetExplorer](#sendintranettointernetexplorer) policy to use Internet Explorer mode can't exit from Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9669">如果启用此策略，则允许用户以 Internet Explorer 模式重新加载未配置网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9669">If you enable this policy, users are allowed to reload unconfigured sites in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9670">如果禁用此策略，则不允许用户以 Internet Explorer 模式重新加载未配置网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9670">If you disable this policy, users aren't allowed to reload unconfigured sites in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9671">请注意，如果启用此策略，它优先于 [InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed](#internetexplorerintegrationtestingallowed) 策略的配置，并且该策略将被禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9671">Note that if you enable this policy, it takes precedence over how you configured the [InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed](#internetexplorerintegrationtestingallowed) policy, and that policy will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9672">要了解有关 Internet Explorer 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9672">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9673">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9673">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9674">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9674">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9675">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9675">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9676">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9676">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9677">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9677">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9678">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9678">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9679">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9679">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9680">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9680">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
