  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9681">GP 唯一名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9681">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9682">GP 名称：允许以 Internet Explorer 模式重新加载未配置网站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9682">GP name: Allow unconfigured sites to be reloaded in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9683">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9683">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9684">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9684">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9685">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9685">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9686">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9686">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9687">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9687">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9688">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9688">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9689">值名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9689">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9690">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9690">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9691">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9691">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9692">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9692">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationsitelist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9693">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9693">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-enterprise-mode-site-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9694">配置企业模式站点列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9694">Configure the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9695">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9695">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9696">在 Windows 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9696">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9697">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9697">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9698">有关配置 Internet Explorer 模式的最佳体验的指南，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9698">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9699">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9699">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9700">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9700">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9701">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9701">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9702">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9702">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9703">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9703">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9704">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9704">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9705">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9705">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9706">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9706">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9707">GP 唯一名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9707">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9708">GP 名称：配置企业模式站点列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9708">GP name: Configure the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9709">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9709">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9710">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9710">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9711">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9711">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9712">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9712">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9713">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9713">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9714">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9714">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9715">值名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9715">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9716">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9716">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9717">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9717">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://internal.contoso.com/sitelist.xml"
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9718">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9718">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationsiteredirect"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9719">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9719">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-how-in-page-navigations-to-unconfigured-sites-behave-when-started-from-internet-explorer-mode-pages"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9720">指定从 Internet Explorer 模式页面启动时未配置网站的“页内”导航行为</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9720">Specify how "in-page" navigations to unconfigured sites behave when started from Internet Explorer mode pages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9721">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9721">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9722">在 Windows 上自 81 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9722">On Windows since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9723">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9723">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9724">“页内”导航将从当前页上的链接、脚本或窗体启动。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9724">An "in-page" navigation is started from a link, a script, or a form on the current page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9725">它也可以是上次“页内”导航尝试的服务器端重定向。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9725">It can also be a server-side redirect of a previous "in-page" navigation attempt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9726">相反，用户可以使用浏览器控件通过多种方式进行与当前页面无关的非“页内”导航。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9726">Conversely, a user can start a navigation that isn't "in-page" that's independent of the current page in several ways by using the browser controls.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9727">例如，使用地址栏、返回按钮或收藏夹链接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9727">For example, using the address bar, the back button, or a favorite link.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9728">通过此设置，可指定从以 Internet Explorer 模式加载的页面到未配置的网站（未在企业模式站点列表中配置）的导航是切换回 Microsoft Edge，还是保留在 Internet Explorer 模式下。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9728">This setting lets you specify whether navigations from pages loaded in Internet Explorer mode to unconfigured sites (that are not configured in the Enterprise Mode Site List) switch back to Microsoft Edge or remain in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9729">此设置与以下策略配合使用：[InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) （设置为 'IEMode'） 和 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 策略 （列表至少有一个条目）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9729">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9730">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则只有配置为在 Internet Explorer 模式下打开的网站才会在该模式下打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9730">If you disable or don't configure this policy, only sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will open in that mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9731">任何未配置为在 Internet Explorer 模式下打开的网站都将重定向回 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9731">Any site not configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will be redirected back to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9732">如果将此策略设置为“默认”，则只有配置为在 Internet Explorer 模式下打开的网站才会在该模式下打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9732">If you set this policy to 'Default', only sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will open in that mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9733">任何未配置为在 Internet Explorer 模式下打开的网站都将重定向回 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9733">Any site not configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will be redirected back to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9734">如果将此策略设置为 AutomaticNavigationsOnly，则你将获得默认体验，但所有未配置站点的自动导航（如 302 重定向）将保持 Internet Explorer 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9734">If you set this policy to 'AutomaticNavigationsOnly', you get the default experience except that all automatic navigations (such as 302 redirects) to unconfigured sites will be kept in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9735">如果将此策略设置为 AllInPageNavigations，则从以 IE 模式加载的页面到未配置的网站的所有导航都将保持 Internet Explorer 模式（最不推荐）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9735">If you set this policy to 'AllInPageNavigations', all navigations from pages loaded in IE mode to unconfigured sites are kept in Internet Explorer mode (Least Recommended).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9736">如果 [InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed](#internetexplorerintegrationreloadiniemodeallowed) 策略允许用户在 Internet Explorer 模式下重新加载网站，则用户选择在 Internet Explorer 模式下重新加载的未配置网站的所有页内导航都将保留在 Internet Explorer 模式下，无论此策略的配置方式如何。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9736">If the [InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed](#internetexplorerintegrationreloadiniemodeallowed) policy allows users to reload sites in Internet Explorer mode, then all in-page navigations from unconfigured sites that users have chosen to reload in Internet Explorer mode will be kept in Internet Explorer mode, regardless of how this policy is configured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9737">要了解有关 Internet Explorer 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9737">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9738">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9738">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9739">Default (0) = 默认值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9739">Default (0) = Default</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9740">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1) = 仅保留 Internet Explorer 模式下的自动导航</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9740">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1) = Keep only automatic navigations in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9741">AllInPageNavigations (2) = 使所有页内导航保持 Internet Explorer 模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9741">AllInPageNavigations (2) = Keep all in-page navigations in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9742">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9742">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9743">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9743">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9744">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9744">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9745">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9745">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9746">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9746">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9747">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9747">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9748">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9748">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9749">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9749">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9750">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9750">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9751">GP 唯一名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9751">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9752">GP 名称：指定从 Internet Explorer 模式页面启动时未配置网站的“页内”导航行为</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9752">GP name: Specify how "in-page" navigations to unconfigured sites behave when started from Internet Explorer mode pages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9753">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9753">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9754">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9754">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9755">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9755">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9756">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9756">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9757">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9757">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9758">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9758">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9759">值名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9759">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9760">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9760">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9761">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9761">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9762">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9762">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationtestingallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9763">InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9763">InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-internet-explorer-mode-testing-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9764">允许 Internet Explorer 模式测试 (已弃用) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9764">Allow Internet Explorer mode testing (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9765">已弃用：此策略已弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9765">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9766">当前受支持，但将在未来的版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9766">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9767">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9767">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9768">在 86 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9768">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9769">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9769">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9770">此策略已弃用，请改为使用 [InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed](#internetexplorerintegrationreloadiniemodeallowed) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9770">This policy is deprecated, use the [InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed](#internetexplorerintegrationreloadiniemodeallowed) policy instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9771">它在 Microsoft Edge 版本 95 中不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9771">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 95.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9772">通过使用此策略，用户可以在 Microsoft Edge 中打开 Internet Explorer 模式选项卡，在 Internet Explorer 模式下测试应用程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9772">This policy allows users to test applications in Internet Explorer mode by opening an Internet Explorer mode tab in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9773">用户可以通过选择 "在 Internet Explorer 模式下打开网站"，在 "更多工具" 菜单内执行此操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9773">Users can do so from within the "More tools" menu by selecting 'Open sites in Internet Explorer mode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9774">此外，用户可以在新式浏览器中使用“在Edge模式下打开网站”选项来测试其应用程序，而无需删除网站列表中的应用程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9774">Additionally, users can test their applications in a modern browser without removing applications from the site list using the option 'Open sites in Edge mode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9775">此设置与以下设置配合使用: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 设置为“IEMode”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9775">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9776">如果启用此策略，则 "更多工具" 下将显示 "在 Internet Explorer 模式中打开网站" 选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9776">If you enable this policy, the option to 'Open sites in Internet Explorer mode' will be visible under "More tools".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9777">用户可在此选项卡上的 Internet Explorer 模式下查看其网站。"更多工具" 下的 "以Microsoft Edge 模式打开网站" 的另一个选项也会显示出来，以便在现代浏览器中测试网站，而无需将其从网站列表中删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9777">Users can view their sites in Internet Explorer mode on this tab. Another option to 'Open sites in Edge mode' will also be visible under "More tools" to help testing sites in a modern browser without removing them from the site list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9778">请注意，如果 [InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed](#internetexplorerintegrationreloadiniemodeallowed) 策略已启用，则将优先执行此策略，这些选项在"更多工具"下将不可见。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9778">Note that if the [InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed](#internetexplorerintegrationreloadiniemodeallowed) policy is enabled, it takes precedence and these options will not be visible under "More tools".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9779">如果禁用或未配置此策略，用户将看不到 "在 Internet Explorer 模式中打开" 和 "在Microsoft Edge 模式下打开" 选项，然后单击 "更多工具" 菜单。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9779">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can't see the options 'Open in Internet Explorer mode' and 'Open in Edge mode' under "More tools" menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9780">但是，用户可以使用--ie-mode-test标志配置这些选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9780">However, users can configure these options with the --ie-mode-test flag.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9781">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9781">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9782">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9782">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9783">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9783">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9784">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9784">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9785">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9785">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9786">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9786">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9787">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9787">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9788">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9788">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9789">GP 唯一名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9789">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9790">GP 名称：允许 Internet Explorer 模式测试 (已弃用) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9790">GP name: Allow Internet Explorer mode testing (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9791">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9791">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9792">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9792">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9793">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9793">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9794">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9794">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9795">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9795">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9796">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9796">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9797">值名称：InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9797">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9798">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9798">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9799">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9799">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9800">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9800">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="intranetredirectbehavior"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9801">IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9801">IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>

  #### <a name="intranet-redirection-behavior"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9802">Intranet 重定向行为</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9802">Intranet Redirection Behavior</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9803">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9803">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9804">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自88或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9804">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9805">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9805">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9806">此策略配置通过 DNS 拦截检查进行 Intranet 重定向的行为。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9806">This policy configures behavior for intranet redirection via DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9807">这些检查将尝试发现浏览器是否位于重定向未知主机名的代理后面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9807">The checks attempt to discover whether the browser is behind a proxy that redirects unknown host names.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9808">如果未配置此策略，则浏览器将使用 DNS 拦截检查和 Intranet 重定向建议的默认行为。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9808">If this policy isn't configured, the browser will use the default behavior of DNS interception checks and intranet redirect suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9809">在 M88 中，默认情况下启用它们，但在将来的版本中将默认禁用它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9809">In M88, they are enabled by default but will be disabled by default in the future release.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9810">[DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) 是一个相关策略，它也可能会禁用 DNS 拦截检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9810">[DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) is a related policy that might also disable DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9811">但是，此策略是更灵活的版本，它可能会单独控制 Intranet 重定向信息栏，并且可能会在将来进行扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9811">However, this policy is a more flexible version which might separately control intranet redirection infobars and might be expanded in the future.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9812">如果 [DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) 或此策略请求禁用拦截检查，则检查将被禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9812">If either [DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) or this policy make a request to disable interception checks, the checks will be disabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9813">如果此策略禁用了 DNS 拦截检查，但启用了 [GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar](#gotointranetsiteforsinglewordentryinaddressbar)，则单字查询仍将导致 Intranet 导航。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9813">If DNS interception checks are disabled by this policy but [GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar](#gotointranetsiteforsinglewordentryinaddressbar) is enabled, single word queries will still result in intranet navigations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9814">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9814">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9815">Default (0) = 使用默认浏览器行为。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9815">Default (0) = Use default browser behavior.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9816">DisableInterceptionChecksDisableInfobar (1) = 禁用 DNS 拦截检查和“是否就是”“http://intranetsite/”信息栏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9816">DisableInterceptionChecksDisableInfobar (1) = Disable DNS interception checks and did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9817">DisableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (2) = 禁用 DNS 拦截检查；允许“是否就是”“http://intranetsite/”信息栏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9817">DisableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (2) = Disable DNS interception checks; allow did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9818">EnableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (3) = 允许 DNS 拦截检查和“是否就是”“http://intranetsite/”信息栏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9818">EnableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (3) = Allow DNS interception checks and did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9819">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9819">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9820">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9820">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9821">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9821">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9822">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9822">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9823">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9823">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9824">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9824">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9825">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9825">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9826">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9826">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9827">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9827">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9828">GP 唯一名称：IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9828">GP unique name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9829">GP 名称：Intranet 重定向行为</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9829">GP name: Intranet Redirection Behavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9830">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9830">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9831">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9831">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9832">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9832">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9833">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9833">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9834">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9834">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9835">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9835">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9836">值名称：IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9836">Value Name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9837">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9837">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9838">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9838">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9839">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9839">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9840">首选项键名称：IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9840">Preference Key Name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9841">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9841">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9842">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9842">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="isolateorigins"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9843">IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9843">IsolateOrigins</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-site-isolation-for-specific-origins"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9844">针对特定源启用网站隔离</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9844">Enable site isolation for specific origins</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9845">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9845">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9846">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9846">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9847">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9847">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9848">指定在隔离进程中运行的源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9848">Specify origins to run in an isolated process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9849">默认情况下，Microsoft Edge 将页面从每个网站隔离到其自己的进程中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9849">By default, Microsoft Edge isolates pages from each Site into its own process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9850">此策略基于"源"而不是"站点"，可以进行更精细的隔离。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9850">This policy enables more granular isolation based on Origin rather than Site.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9851">例如，指定 https://subdomain.contoso.com/ 将导致 https://subdomain.contoso.com/ 中的页面在不同于 https://contoso.com/ 网站中其他来源的页面的进程中隔离。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9851">For example, specifying https://subdomain.contoso.com/ will cause pages from https://subdomain.contoso.com/ to be isolated in a different process than pages from other Origins within the https://contoso.com/ Site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9852">如果启用此策略，逗号分隔列表中的每个命名源都将在其自己的进程中运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9852">If you enable this policy, each of the named origins in a comma-separated list will run in its own process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9853">如果禁用或不配置此策略，将基于网站隔离页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9853">If you disable or don't configure this policy, pages will be isolated on a per-Site basis.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9854">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9854">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9855">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9855">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9856">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9856">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9857">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9857">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9858">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9858">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9859">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9859">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9860">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9860">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9861">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9861">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9862">GP 唯一名称：IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9862">GP unique name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9863">GP 名称：针对特定源启用网站隔离</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9863">GP name: Enable site isolation for specific origins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9864">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9864">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9865">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9865">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9866">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9866">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9867">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9867">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9868">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9868">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9869">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9869">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9870">值名称：IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9870">Value Name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9871">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9871">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9872">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9872">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://contoso.com/,https://fabrikam.com/"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9873">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9873">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9874">首选项项名称：IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9874">Preference Key Name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9875">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9875">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://contoso.com/,https://fabrikam.com/</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9876">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9876">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="localbrowserdatashareenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9877">LocalBrowserDataShareEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9877">LocalBrowserDataShareEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-windows-to-search-local-microsoft-edge-browsing-data"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9878">启用 Windows 搜索本地 Microsoft Edge 浏览数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9878">Enable Windows to search local Microsoft Edge browsing data</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9879">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9879">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9880">在 Windows 上自 93 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9880">On Windows since 93 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9881">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9881">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9882">使 Windows 能够为本地存储在用户设备上的 Microsoft Edge 浏览数据编制索引，并允许用户直接从 Windows 功能（例如 Windows 任务栏上的搜索框）查找和启动以前存储的浏览数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9882">Enables Windows to index Microsoft Edge browsing data stored locally on the user's device and allows users to find and launch previously stored browsing data directly from Windows features such as the search box on the taskbar in Windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9883">如果启用或不配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 会将本地浏览数据发布到Windows 索引器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9883">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will publish local browsing data to the Windows Indexer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9884">如果禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 则不会与 Windows 索引器共享数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9884">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will not share data to the Windows Indexer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9885">请注意，如果禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将删除在设备上与 Windows 共享的数据，并停止共享任何新的浏览数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9885">Note that if you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will remove the data shared with Windows on the device and stop sharing any new browsing data.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9886">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9886">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9887">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9887">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9888">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9888">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9889">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9889">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9890">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9890">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9891">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9891">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9892">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9892">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9893">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9893">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9894">GP 唯一名称：LocalBrowserDataShareEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9894">GP unique name: LocalBrowserDataShareEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9895">GP 名称：启用 Windows 搜索本地 Microsoft Edge 浏览数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9895">GP name: Enable Windows to search local Microsoft Edge browsing data</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9896">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9896">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9897">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9897">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9898">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9898">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9899">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9899">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9900">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9900">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9901">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9901">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9902">值名称：LocalBrowserDataShareEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9902">Value Name: LocalBrowserDataShareEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9903">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9903">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9904">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9904">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9905">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9905">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="localprovidersenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9906">LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9906">LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-suggestions-from-local-providers"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9907">允许来自本地提供程序的建议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9907">Allow suggestions from local providers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9908">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9908">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9909">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 83 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9909">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9910">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9910">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9911">在 Microsoft Edge 的地址栏和自动建议列表中允许来自设备上的建议提供程序（本地提供程序，例如收藏夹和浏览历史记录）的建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9911">Allow suggestions from suggestion providers on the device (local providers), for example, Favorites and Browsing History, in Microsoft Edge's Address Bar and Auto-Suggest List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9912">如果启用此策略，则将使用本地提供程序的建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9912">If you enable this policy, suggestions from local providers are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9913">如果禁用此策略，则不会使用本地提供程序的建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9913">If you disable this policy, suggestions from local providers are never used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9914">不会显示本地历史记录和本地收藏夹建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9914">Local history and local favorites suggestions will not appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9915">如果未配置此策略，则允许来自本地提供程序的建议，但用户可以使用设置开关进行更改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9915">If you do not configure this policy, suggestions from local providers are allowed but the user can change that using the settings toggle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9916">请注意，如果应用了禁用此功能的策略，则某些功能可能不可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9916">Note that some features may not be available if a policy to disable this feature has been applied.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9917">例如，如果启用 [SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled](#savingbrowserhistorydisabled) 策略，则浏览历史记录建议将不可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9917">For example, Browsing History suggestions will not be available if you enable the [SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled](#savingbrowserhistorydisabled) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9918">此策略需要重新启动浏览器才能完成应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9918">This policy requires a browser restart to finish applying.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9919">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9919">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9920">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9920">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9921">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9921">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9922">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9922">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9923">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9923">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9924">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9924">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9925">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9925">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9926">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9926">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9927">GP 唯一名称：LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9927">GP unique name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9928">GP 名称：允许来自本地提供程序的建议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9928">GP name: Allow suggestions from local providers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9929">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9929">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9930">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9930">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9931">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9931">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9932">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9932">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9933">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9933">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9934">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9934">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9935">值名称：LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9935">Value Name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9936">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9936">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9937">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9937">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9938">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9938">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9939">首选项项名称：LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9939">Preference Key Name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9940">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9940">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9941">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9941">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="managedconfigurationperorigin"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9942">ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9942">ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>

  #### <a name="sets-managed-configuration-values-for-websites-to-specific-origins"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9943">将网站的托管配置值设置到特定来源</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9943">Sets managed configuration values for websites to specific origins</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9944">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9944">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9945">自 90 或更高版本起，在 Windows 和 macOS 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9945">On Windows and macOS since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9946">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9946">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9947">设置此策略定义给定源的托管配置 API 的返回值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9947">Setting this policy defines the return value of Managed Configuration API for given origin.</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9948">托管配置 API 是一个密钥值配置，可以通过 navigator.device.getManagedConfiguration() javascript 调用来访问。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9948">Managed Configuration API is a key-value configuration that can be accessed via navigator.device.getManagedConfiguration() javascript call.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9949">此 API 仅可用于通过 [WebAppInstallForceList](#webappinstallforcelist) 与强制安装的 web 应用程序相对应的源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9949">This API is only available to origins which correspond to force-installed web applications via [WebAppInstallForceList](#webappinstallforcelist).</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9950">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9950">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9951">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9951">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9952">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9952">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9953">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9953">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9954">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9954">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9955">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9955">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9956">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9956">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9957">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9957">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9958">GP 唯一名称：ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9958">GP unique name: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9959">GP 名称：将网站的托管配置值设置到特定来源</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9959">GP name: Sets managed configuration values for websites to specific origins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9960">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9960">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9961">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9961">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9962">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9962">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9963">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9963">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9964">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9964">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9965">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9965">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9966">值名称：ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9966">Value Name: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9967">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9967">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9968">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9968">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin = [
  {
    "managed_configuration_hash": "asd891jedasd12ue9h",
    "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration.json",
    "origin": "https://www.contoso.com"
  },
  {
    "managed_configuration_hash": "djio12easd89u12aws",
    "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration2.json",
    "origin": "https://www.example.com"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9969">精简示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9969">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin = [{"managed_configuration_hash": "asd891jedasd12ue9h", "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration.json", "origin": "https://www.contoso.com"}, {"managed_configuration_hash": "djio12easd89u12aws", "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration2.json", "origin": "https://www.example.com"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9970">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9970">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9971">首选项密钥名称：ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9971">Preference Key Name: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9972">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9972">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>managed_configuration_hash</key>
    <string>asd891jedasd12ue9h</string>
    <key>managed_configuration_url</key>
    <string>https://static.contoso.com/configuration.json</string>
    <key>origin</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>managed_configuration_hash</key>
    <string>djio12easd89u12aws</string>
    <key>managed_configuration_url</key>
    <string>https://static.contoso.com/configuration2.json</string>
    <key>origin</key>
    <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9973">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9973">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="managedfavorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9974">ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9974">ManagedFavorites</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-favorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9975">配置收藏夹</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9975">Configure favorites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9976">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9976">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9977">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9977">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9978">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9978">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9979">配置受管收藏夹列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9979">Configures a list of managed favorites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9980">该策略将创建收藏夹列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9980">The policy creates a list of favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9981">每个收藏夹都包含“name”和“url”项，它们用于保存收藏夹的名称及其目标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9981">Each favorite contains the keys "name" and "url," which hold the favorite's name and its target.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9982">可通过定义一个不带“url”项、但带有附加“children”项的收藏夹来配置一个子文件夹，其包含上面定义的收藏夹列表（其中一些收藏夹可能会再次成为文件夹）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9982">You can configure a subfolder by defining a favorites without an "url" key but with an additional "children" key that contains a list of favorites as defined above (some of which may be folders again).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9983">Microsoft Edge 将修正不完整的 URL，就像它们是通过地址栏提交的一样，例如，“microsoft.com”变为“https://microsoft.com/”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9983">Microsoft Edge amends incomplete URLs as if they were submitted via the Address Bar, for example "microsoft.com" becomes "https://microsoft.com/".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9984">这些收藏夹放置在用户无法修改的文件夹中（但用户可以选择从收藏夹栏中隐藏它）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9984">These favorites are placed in a folder that can't be modified by the user (but the user can choose to hide it from the favorites bar).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9985">默认情况下，文件夹名称是“受管收藏夹”，但你可以通过向收藏夹列表添加一个字典来更改它，该字典包含“topleval_name”项并且以所需文件夹名称作为值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9985">By default the folder name is "Managed favorites" but you can change it by adding to the list of favorites a dictionary containing the key "toplevel_name" with the desired folder name as the value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9986">受管收藏夹不会同步到用户帐户，并且无法通过扩展进行修改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9986">Managed favorites are not synced to the user account and can't be modified by extensions.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9987">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9987">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9988">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9988">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9989">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9989">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9990">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9990">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9991">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9991">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9992">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9992">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9993">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9993">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9994">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9994">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9995">GP 唯一名称：ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9995">GP unique name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9996">GP 名称：配置收藏夹</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9996">GP name: Configure favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9997">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9997">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9998">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9998">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-9999">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-9999">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10000">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10000">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10001">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10001">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10002">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10002">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10003">值名称：ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10003">Value Name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10004">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10004">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10005">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10005">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedFavorites = [
  {
    "toplevel_name": "My managed favorites folder"
  },
  {
    "name": "Microsoft",
    "url": "microsoft.com"
  },
  {
    "name": "Bing",
    "url": "bing.com"
  },
  {
    "children": [
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge Insiders",
        "url": "www.microsoftedgeinsider.com"
      },
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge",
        "url": "www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge"
      }
    ],
    "name": "Microsoft Edge links"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10006">精简示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10006">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedFavorites = [{"toplevel_name": "My managed favorites folder"}, {"name": "Microsoft", "url": "microsoft.com"}, {"name": "Bing", "url": "bing.com"}, {"children": [{"name": "Microsoft Edge Insiders", "url": "www.microsoftedgeinsider.com"}, {"name": "Microsoft Edge", "url": "www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge"}], "name": "Microsoft Edge links"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10007">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10007">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10008">首选项项名称：ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10008">Preference Key Name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10009">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10009">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ManagedFavorites</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>toplevel_name</key>
    <string>My managed favorites folder</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Microsoft</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>microsoft.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Bing</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>bing.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>children</key>
    <array>
      <dict>
        <key>name</key>
        <string>Microsoft Edge Insiders</string>
        <key>url</key>
        <string>www.microsoftedgeinsider.com</string>
      </dict>
      <dict>
        <key>name</key>
        <string>Microsoft Edge</string>
        <key>url</key>
        <string>www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge</string>
      </dict>
    </array>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Microsoft Edge links</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10010">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10010">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="managedsearchengines"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10011">ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10011">ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>

  #### <a name="manage-search-engines"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10012">管理搜索引擎</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10012">Manage Search Engines</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10013">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10013">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10014">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10014">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10015">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10015">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10016">可配置最多包含 10 个搜索引擎的列表，其中一个必须标记为默认搜索引擎。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10016">Lets you configure a list of up to 10 search engines, one of which must be marked as the default search engine.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10017">不需要指定编码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10017">You do not need to specify the encoding.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10018">从 Microsoft Edge 80 开始，suggest_url 和 image_search_url 参数是可选的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10018">Starting in Microsoft Edge 80, the suggest_url and image_search_url parameters are optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10019">从 Microsoft Edge 80 开始，可使用可选参数 image_search_post_params（由逗号分隔的名称/值对组成）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10019">The optional parameter, image_search_post_params (consists of comma-separated name/value pairs), is available starting in Microsoft Edge 80.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10020">从 Microsoft Edge 83 开始，可使用 allow_search_enger_discovery 可选参数启用搜索引擎发现。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10020">Starting in Microsoft Edge 83, you can enable search engine discovery with the allow_search_engine_discovery optional parameter.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10021">此参数必须是列表中的第一项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10021">This parameter must be the first item in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10022">如果未指定 allow_search_enger_discovery，则默认情况下将禁用搜索引擎发现。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10022">If allow_search_engine_discovery is not specified, search engine discovery will be disabled by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10023">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，你可以将此策略设置为允许搜索提供程序发现的建议策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10023">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy to allow search provider discovery.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10024">无需添加 allow_search_engine_discovery 可选参数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10024">You do not need to add the allow_search_engine_discovery optional parameter.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10025">如果启用此策略，用户将无法在列表中添加、删除或更改任何搜索引擎。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10025">If you enable this policy, users can't add, remove, or change any search engine in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10026">用户可以将其默认搜索引擎设置为列表中的任何搜索引擎。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10026">Users can set their default search engine to any search engine in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10027">如果禁用或未配置此策略，用户可以根据需要修改搜索引擎列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10027">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can modify the search engines list as desired.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10028">如果设置了 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略，则此策略 (ManagedSearchEngines) 将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10028">If the [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policy is set, this policy (ManagedSearchEngines) is ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10029">用户必须重新启动浏览器才能完成应用此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10029">The user must restart their browser to finish applying this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10030">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10030">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10031">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10031">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10032">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10032">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10033">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10033">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10034">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10034">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10035">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10035">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10036">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10036">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10037">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10037">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10038">GP 唯一名称：ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10038">GP unique name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10039">GP 名称：管理搜索引擎</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10039">GP name: Manage Search Engines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10040">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10040">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10041">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10041">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10042">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10042">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10043">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10043">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10044">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10044">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10045">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10045">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10046">值名称：ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10046">Value Name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10047">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10047">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10048">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10048">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedSearchEngines = [
  {
    "allow_search_engine_discovery": true
  },
  {
    "is_default": true,
    "keyword": "example1.com",
    "name": "Example1",
    "search_url": "https://www.example1.com/search?q={searchTerms}",
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example1.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  },
  {
    "image_search_post_params": "content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}",
    "image_search_url": "https://www.example2.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload",
    "keyword": "example2.com",
    "name": "Example2",
    "search_url": "https://www.example2.com/search?q={searchTerms}",
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example2.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  },
  {
    "encoding": "UTF-8",
    "image_search_url": "https://www.example3.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload",
    "keyword": "example3.com",
    "name": "Example3",
    "search_url": "https://www.example3.com/search?q={searchTerms}",
```
