```
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example3.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  },
  {
    "keyword": "example4.com",
    "name": "Example4",
    "search_url": "https://www.example4.com/search?q={searchTerms}"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10049">精简示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10049">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedSearchEngines = [{"allow_search_engine_discovery": true}, {"is_default": true, "keyword": "example1.com", "name": "Example1", "search_url": "https://www.example1.com/search?q={searchTerms}", "suggest_url": "https://www.example1.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"}, {"image_search_post_params": "content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}", "image_search_url": "https://www.example2.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", "keyword": "example2.com", "name": "Example2", "search_url": "https://www.example2.com/search?q={searchTerms}", "suggest_url": "https://www.example2.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"}, {"encoding": "UTF-8", "image_search_url": "https://www.example3.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", "keyword": "example3.com", "name": "Example3", "search_url": "https://www.example3.com/search?q={searchTerms}", "suggest_url": "https://www.example3.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"}, {"keyword": "example4.com", "name": "Example4", "search_url": "https://www.example4.com/search?q={searchTerms}"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10050">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10050">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10051">首选项项名称：ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10051">Preference Key Name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10052">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10052">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ManagedSearchEngines</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>allow_search_engine_discovery</key>
    <true/>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>is_default</key>
    <true/>
    <key>keyword</key>
    <string>example1.com</string>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Example1</string>
    <key>search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example1.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>
    <key>suggest_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example1.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>image_search_post_params</key>
    <string>content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}</string>
    <key>image_search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example2.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload</string>
    <key>keyword</key>
    <string>example2.com</string>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Example2</string>
    <key>search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example2.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>
    <key>suggest_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example2.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>encoding</key>
    <string>UTF-8</string>
    <key>image_search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example3.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload</string>
    <key>keyword</key>
    <string>example3.com</string>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Example3</string>
    <key>search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example3.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>
    <key>suggest_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example3.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>keyword</key>
    <string>example4.com</string>

    <key>search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example4.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10053">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10053">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="mathsolverenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10054">MathSolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10054">MathSolverEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="let-users-snip-a-math-problem-and-get-the-solution-with-a-step-by-step-explanation-in-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10055">让用户截取数学问题，并在 Microsoft Edge 中通过分步说明获取解决方案</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10055">Let users snip a Math problem and get the solution with a step-by-step explanation in Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10056">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10056">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10057">自 91 或更高版本起，在 Windows 和 macOS 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10057">On Windows and macOS since 91 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10058">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10058">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10059">此策略可以让你管理用户是否可以在 Microsoft Edge 中使用 Math Solver 工具。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10059">This policy lets you manage whether users can use the Math Solver tool in Microsoft Edge or not.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10060">如果启用或未配置策略，则用户可以截取数学问题并获取解决方案，包括 Microsoft Edge 侧窗格中解决方案的分步说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10060">If you enable or don't configure the policy, then a user can take a snip of the Math problem and get the solution including a step-by-step explanation of the solution in a Microsoft Edge side pane.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10061">如果禁用该策略，则 Math Solver 工具将被禁用，用户将不能使用它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10061">If you disable the policy, then the Math Solver tool will be disabled and users will not be able to use it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10062">注意：将 [ComponentUpdatesEnabled](#componentupdatesenabled) 策略设置为 disabled 也将禁用 Math Solver 组件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10062">Note: Setting the [ComponentUpdatesEnabled](#componentupdatesenabled) policy to disabled will also disable the Math Solver component.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10063">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10063">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10064">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10064">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10065">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10065">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10066">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10066">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10067">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10067">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10068">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10068">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10069">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10069">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10070">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10070">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10071">GP 唯一名称：MathSolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10071">GP unique name: MathSolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10072">让用户截取数学问题，并在 Microsoft Edge 中获取分步说明的解决方案</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10072">GP name: Let users snip a Math problem and get the solution with a step-by-step explanation in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10073">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10073">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10074">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10074">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10075">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10075">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10076">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10076">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10077">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10077">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10078">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10078">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10079">值名称：MathSolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10079">Value Name: MathSolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10080">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10080">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10081">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10081">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10082">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10082">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10083">首选项项名称：MathSolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10083">Preference Key Name: MathSolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10084">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10084">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10085">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10085">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="maxconnectionsperproxy"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10086">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10086">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>

  #### <a name="maximum-number-of-concurrent-connections-to-the-proxy-server"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10087">代理服务器的最大并发连接数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10087">Maximum number of concurrent connections to the proxy server</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10088">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10088">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10089">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10089">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10090">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10090">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10091">指定同时连接到代理服务器的最大连接数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10091">Specifies the maximum number of simultaneous connections to the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10092">某些代理服务器无法处理每个客户端大量并发连接 - 可通过将此策略设置为较低的值来解决此问题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10092">Some proxy servers can't handle a high number of concurrent connections per client - you can solve this by setting this policy to a lower value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10093">此策略的值应低于 100、高于 6。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10093">The value of this policy should be lower than 100 and higher than 6.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10094">默认值为 32。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10094">The default value is 32.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10095">众所周知，某些 Web 应用会通过挂起的 GET 占用多个连接 - 如果这些类型的 Web 应用中有太多处于打开状态，则将最大连接数降低到 32 以下可能会导致浏览器网络挂起。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10095">Some web apps are known to consume many connections with hanging GETs - lowering the maximum connections below 32 may lead to browser networking hangs if too many of these kind of web apps are open.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10096">如果未配置此策略，则使用默认值 (32)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10096">If you don't configure this policy, the default value (32) is used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10097">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10097">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10098">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10098">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10099">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10099">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10100">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10100">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10101">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10101">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10102">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10102">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10103">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10103">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10104">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10104">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10105">GP 唯一名称：MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10105">GP unique name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10106">GP 名称：代理服务器的最大并发连接数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10106">GP name: Maximum number of concurrent connections to the proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10107">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10107">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10108">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10108">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10109">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10109">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10110">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10110">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10111">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10111">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10112">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10112">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10113">值名称：MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10113">Value Name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10114">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10114">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10115">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10115">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000020
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10116">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10116">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10117">首选项项名称：MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10117">Preference Key Name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10118">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10118">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>32</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10119">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10119">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="mediaroutercastallowallips"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10120">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10120">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-google-cast-to-connect-to-cast-devices-on-all-ip-addresses"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10121">允许 Google Cast 连接到所有 IP 地址上的 Cast 设备</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10121">Allow Google Cast to connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10122">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10122">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10123">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10123">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10124">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10124">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10125">启用此策略时，可让 Google Cast 连接到所有 IP 地址上的 Cast 设备，而不仅仅是 RFC1918/RFC4193 专用地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10125">Enable this policy to let Google Cast connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses, not just RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10126">禁用此策略时，可将 Google Cast 限制为 RFC1918/RFC4193 专用地址上的 Cast 设备。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10126">Disable this policy to restrict Google Cast to Cast devices on RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10127">如果未配置此策略，除非启用了 CastAllowAllIPs 功能，否则 Google Cast 仅连接到 RFC1918/RFC4193 专用地址上的 Cast 设备。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10127">If you don't configure this policy, Google Cast connects to Cast devices on RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses only, unless you enable the CastAllowAllIPs feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10128">如果 [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) 策略已禁用，则此策略将不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10128">If the [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) policy is disabled, then this policy has no effect.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10129">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10129">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10130">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10130">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10131">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10131">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10132">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10132">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10133">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10133">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10134">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10134">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10135">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10135">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10136">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10136">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10137">GP 唯一名称：MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10137">GP unique name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10138">GP 名称：允许 Google Cast 连接到所有 IP 地址上的 Cast 设备</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10138">GP name: Allow Google Cast to connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10139">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10139">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10140">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10140">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10141">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10141">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10142">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10142">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10143">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10143">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10144">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10144">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10145">值名称：MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10145">Value Name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10146">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10146">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10147">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10147">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10148">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10148">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10149">首选项项名称：MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10149">Preference Key Name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10150">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10150">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10151">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10151">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="metricsreportingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10152">MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10152">MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-usage-and-crash-related-data-reporting-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10153">启用使用情况和故障相关数据报告（过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10153">Enable usage and crash-related data reporting (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10154">已过时：此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 88 之后不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10154">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10155">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10155">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10156">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 开始，直到 88</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10156">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 88</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10157">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10157">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10158">不再支持此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10158">This policy is no longer supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10159">它被 [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata)（用于 Windows 7、Windows 8 和 macOS）取代，并允许在 Win 10（[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)）上进行遥测。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10159">It is replaced by [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (for Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS) and Allow Telemetry on Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10160">此策略允许向 Microsoft 发送关于 Microsoft Edge 的使用情况和故障相关数据的报告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10160">This policy enables reporting of usage and crash-related data about Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10161">启用此策略可向 Microsoft 发送使用情况和故障相关数据的报告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10161">Enable this policy to send reporting of usage and crash-related data to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10162">禁用此策略可以不将数据发送给 Microsoft。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10162">Disable this policy to not send the data to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10163">在这两种情况下，用户不能更改或覆盖设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10163">In both cases, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10164">在 Windows 10 上，如果未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将默认使用 Windows 诊断数据设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10164">On Windows 10, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the Windows diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10165">如果启用此策略，只有当 Windows 诊断数据设置设为“增强”或“完全”时，Microsoft Edge 才会发送使用情况数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10165">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge will only send usage data if the Windows Diagnostic data setting is set to Enhanced or Full.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10166">如果禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将不会发送使用情况数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10166">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will not send usage data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10167">基于 Windows 诊断数据设置发送故障相关数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10167">Crash-related data is sent based on the Windows Diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10168">有关 Windows 诊断数据设置的详细信息，请访问 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10168">Learn more about Windows Diagnostic data settings at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10169">在 Windows 7、Windows 8 和 macOS 上，此策略控制使用情况和故障相关数据的发送。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10169">On Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS, this policy controls sending usage and crash-related data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10170">如果未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将默认使用用户首选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10170">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10171">若要启用此策略，必需将 [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) 设置为“启用”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10171">To enable this policy,[SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) must be set to Enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10172">如果 [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) 或 [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) 未配置或已禁用，则不会将此数据发送到 Microsoft。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10172">If [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) or [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) is Not Configured or Disabled, this data will not be sent to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10173">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者通过 MDM 托管或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10173">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10174">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10174">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10175">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10175">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10176">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10176">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10177">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10177">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10178">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10178">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10179">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10179">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10180">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10180">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10181">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10181">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10182">GP 唯一名称：MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10182">GP unique name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10183">GP 名称：启用使用情况和故障相关数据报告（过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10183">GP name: Enable usage and crash-related data reporting (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10184">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10184">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10185">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10185">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10186">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10186">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10187">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10187">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10188">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10188">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10189">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10189">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10190">值名称：MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10190">Value Name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10191">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10191">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10192">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10192">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10193">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10193">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10194">首选项项名称：MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10194">Preference Key Name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10195">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10195">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10196">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10196">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="nativewindowocclusionenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10197">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10197">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-native-window-occlusion-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10198">启用本机窗口封闭（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10198">Enable Native Window Occlusion (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10199">已弃用：此策略已弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10199">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10200">当前受支持，但将在未来的版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10200">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10201">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10201">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10202">在 84 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10202">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10203">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10203">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10204">已弃用此策略，请改为使用 “["WindowOcclusionEnabled](#windowocclusionenabled)” 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10204">This policy is deprecated, use the '[WindowOcclusionEnabled](#windowocclusionenabled)' policy instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10205">它在 Microsoft Edge 版本 92 中不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10205">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 92.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10206">在 Microsoft Edge 中启用本机窗口封闭。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10206">Enables native window occlusion in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10207">如果启用此设置，为了降低 CPU 使用率和功耗，Microsoft Edge 将检测窗口何时被其他窗口覆盖，并将暂停工作绘制像素。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10207">If you enable this setting, to reduce CPU and power consumption Microsoft Edge will detect when a window is covered by other windows, and will suspend work painting pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10208">如果禁用此设置，Microsoft Edge 将不会检测窗口何时被其他窗口覆盖。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10208">If you disable this setting Microsoft Edge will not detect when a window is covered by other windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10209">如果未设置此策略，将启用封闭检测。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10209">If this policy is left not set, occlusion detection will be enabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10210">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10210">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10211">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10211">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10212">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10212">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10213">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10213">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10214">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10214">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10215">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10215">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10216">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10216">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10217">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10217">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10218">GP 唯一名称：NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10218">GP unique name: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10219">GP 名称：启用本机窗口封闭（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10219">GP name: Enable Native Window Occlusion (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10220">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10220">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10221">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10221">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10222">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10222">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10223">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10223">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10224">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10224">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10225">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10225">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10226">值名称：NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10226">Value Name: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10227">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10227">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10228">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10228">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10229">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10229">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10230">NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10230">NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-a-timeout-for-delay-of-tab-navigation-for-the-enterprise-mode-site-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10231">为企业模式站点列表设置延迟选项卡导航延迟的超时</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10231">Set a timeout for delay of tab navigation for the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10232">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10232">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10233">在 84 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10233">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10234">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10234">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10235">允许你设置一个超时（以秒为单位），以使  Microsoft Edge 选项卡一直等到浏览器下载了初始企业模式站点列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10235">Allows you to set a timeout, in seconds, for Microsoft Edge tabs waiting to navigate until the browser has downloaded the initial Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10236">此设置与以下策略配合使用：[InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel)（设置为 'IEMode'）、[InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 策略（列表至少有一个条目）和 [DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload](#delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload)（设置为 "All eligible navigations" (1)）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10236">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry and [DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload](#delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload) is set to "All eligible navigations" (1).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10237">选项卡等待企业模式站点列表下载的时间不会等多过此超时。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10237">Tabs will not wait longer than this timeout for the Enterprise Mode Site List to download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10238">如果浏览器在超时时未完成下载企业模式网站列表， Microsoft Edge 选项卡将继续导航。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10238">If the browser has not finished downloading the Enterprise Mode Site List when the timeout expires, Microsoft Edge tabs will continue navigating anyway.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10239">超时的值应该不大于20秒，也不小于1秒。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10239">The value of the timeout should be no greater than 20 seconds and no fewer than 1 second.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10240">如果将此策略中的超时设置为大于默认值2秒的值，则会在2秒后向用户显示一个信息栏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10240">If you set the timeout in this policy to a value greater than the default of 2 seconds, an information bar is shown to the user after 2 seconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10241">信息栏包含一个按钮，允许用户停止等待企业模式站点列表下载完成。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10241">The information bar contains a button that allows the user to quit waiting for the Enterprise Mode Site List download to complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10242">如果未配置此策略，将使用默认的2秒超时。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10242">If you don't configure this policy, the default timeout of 2 seconds is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10243">此默认设置可能会在将来更改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10243">This default is subject to change in the future.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10244">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10244">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10245">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10245">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10246">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10246">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10247">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10247">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10248">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10248">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10249">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10249">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10250">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10250">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10251">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10251">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10252">GP 唯一名称： NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10252">GP unique name: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10253">GP 名称：为企业模式站点列表的选项卡导航设置延迟超时</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10253">GP name: Set a timeout for delay of tab navigation for the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10254">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10254">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10255">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10255">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10256">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10256">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10257">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10257">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10258">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10258">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10259">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10259">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10260">值名称： NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10260">Value Name: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10261">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10261">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10262">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10262">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x0000000a
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10263">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10263">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="networkpredictionoptions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10264">NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10264">NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-network-prediction"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10265">启用网络预测</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10265">Enable network prediction</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10266">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10266">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10267">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10267">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10268">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10268">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10269">启用网络预测并阻止用户更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10269">Enables network prediction and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10270">这样可控制 DNS 预取、TCP 和 SSL 预连接以及网页预呈现。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10270">This controls DNS prefetching, TCP and SSL preconnection, and prerendering of web pages.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10271">如果未配置此策略，则会启用网络预测，但用户可以更改它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10271">If you don't configure this policy, network prediction is enabled but the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10272">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10272">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10273">NetworkPredictionAlways (0) = 预测任何网络连接上的网络操作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10273">NetworkPredictionAlways (0) = Predict network actions on any network connection</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10274">NetworkPredictionWifiOnly (1) = 不受支持，如果使用该值，将被视为 "预报网络连接上的网络操作" （0）设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10274">NetworkPredictionWifiOnly (1) = Not supported, if this value is used it will be treated as if 'Predict network actions on any network connection' (0) was set</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10275">NetworkPredictionNever (2) = 不预测任何网络连接上的网络操作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10275">NetworkPredictionNever (2) = Don't predict network actions on any network connection</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10276">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10276">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10277">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10277">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10278">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10278">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10279">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10279">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10280">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10280">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10281">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10281">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10282">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10282">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10283">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10283">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10284">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10284">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10285">GP 唯一名称：NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10285">GP unique name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10286">GP 名称：启用网络预测</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10286">GP name: Enable network prediction</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10287">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10287">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10288">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10288">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10289">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10289">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10290">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10290">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10291">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10291">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10292">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10292">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10293">值名称：NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10293">Value Name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10294">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10294">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10295">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10295">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10296">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10296">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10297">首选项项名称：NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10297">Preference Key Name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10298">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10298">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10299">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10299">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="nonremovableprofileenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10300">NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10300">NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-whether-a-user-always-has-a-default-profile-automatically-signed-in-with-their-work-or-school-account"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10301">配置用户是否始终具有使用其工作或学校帐户自动登录的默认配置文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10301">Configure whether a user always has a default profile automatically signed in with their work or school account</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10302">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10302">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10303">在 Windows 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10303">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10304">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10304">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10305">此策略确定用户是否能够删除使用其工作或学校帐户自动登录的 Microsoft Edge 配置文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10305">This policy determines if a user can remove the Microsoft Edge profile automatically signed in with a user's work or school account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10306">如果启用此策略，则将使用 Windows 上用户的工作或学校帐户创建一个不可删除的配置文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10306">If you enable this policy, a non-removable profile will be created with the user's work or school account on Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10307">此配置文件无法注销或删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10307">This profile can't be signed out or removed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10308">只有使用与 OS 登录帐户匹配的本地帐户或 Azure AD 帐户登录配置文件时，配置文件才是不可删除的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10308">The profile will be non-removable only if profile is signed-in with either on-premises account or Azure AD account that matches OS sign-in account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10309">如果禁用或未配置此策略，用户可以注销或删除使用 Windows 上其工作或学校帐户自动登录的配置文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10309">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the profile automatically signed in with a user's work or school account on Windows can be signed out or removed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10310">如果要配置浏览器登录，请使用 [BrowserSigning](#browsersignin) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10310">If you want to configure browser sign in, use the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10311">此策略仅在加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例或者已注册设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10311">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10312">从 Microsoft Edge 89 开始，如果存在禁用同步且计算机已混合加入的现有本地配置文件，它将本地配置文件自动升级到 Azure AD 配置文件，使其不可删除，而不是创建新的不可删除的 Azure AD 配置文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10312">From Microsoft Edge 89 onwards, if there is an existing on-premises profile with sync disabled and machine is hybrid joined, it will auto-upgrade the on-premises profile to Azure AD profile and make it non-removable instead of creating a new non-removable Azure AD profile.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10313">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10313">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10314">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10314">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10315">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10315">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10316">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10316">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10317">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10317">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10318">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10318">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10319">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10319">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10320">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10320">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10321">GP 唯一名称：NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10321">GP unique name: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10322">GP 名称：配置用户是否始终具有使用其工作或学校帐户自动登录的默认配置文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10322">GP name: Configure whether a user always has a default profile automatically signed in with their work or school account</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10323">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10323">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10324">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10324">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10325">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10325">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10326">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10326">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10327">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10327">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10328">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10328">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10329">值名称：NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10329">Value Name: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10330">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10330">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10331">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10331">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10332">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10332">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="overridesecurityrestrictionsoninsecureorigin"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10333">OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10333">OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-where-security-restrictions-on-insecure-origins-apply"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10334">控制对不安全源应用安全限制的位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10334">Control where security restrictions on insecure origins apply</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10335">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10335">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10336">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10336">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10337">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10337">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10338">指定不安全源的安全限制不适用的源 (URL) 或主机名模式（如“\*.contoso.com”）列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10338">Specifies a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns (like "\*.contoso.com") for which security restrictions on insecure origins don't apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10339">通过此策略，可为无法部署 TLS 的旧应用程序指定允许的源，或者为内部 Web 开发设置临时服务器，以便开发人员不必在临时服务器上部署 TLS，就可以测试需要安全上下文的功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10339">This policy lets you specify allowed origins for legacy applications that can't deploy TLS or set up a staging server for internal web development so that developers can test out features requiring secure contexts without having to deploy TLS on the staging server.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10340">此策略还可防止源服务器在多功能地址栏中被标记为“不安全”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10340">This policy also prevents the origin from being labeled "Not Secure" in the omnibox.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10341">在此策略中设置 URL 列表与将命令行标志“--unsafely-treat-insecure-origin-as-secure”设置为逗号分隔的相同 URL 列表的效果相同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10341">Setting a list of URLs in this policy has the same effect as setting the command-line flag '--unsafely-treat-insecure-origin-as-secure' to a comma-separated list of the same URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10342">如果启用此策略，它将替代命令行标志。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10342">If you enable this policy, it overrides the command-line flag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10343">有关安全上下文的详细信息，请参阅 https://www.w3.org/TR/secure-contexts/。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10343">For more information on secure contexts, see https://www.w3.org/TR/secure-contexts/.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10344">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10344">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10345">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10345">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10346">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10346">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10347">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10347">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10348">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10348">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10349">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10349">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10350">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10350">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10351">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10351">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10352">GP 唯一名称：OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10352">GP unique name: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10353">GP 名称：控制对不安全源应用安全限制的位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10353">GP name: Control where security restrictions on insecure origins apply</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10354">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10354">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10355">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10355">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10356">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10356">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10357">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10357">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10358">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10358">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10359">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10359">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10360">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10360">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10361">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10361">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10362">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10362">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin\1 = "http://testserver.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin\2 = "*.contoso.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10363">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10363">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10364">首选项项名称：OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10364">Preference Key Name: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10365">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10365">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>http://testserver.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>*.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10366">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10366">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="paymentmethodqueryenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10367">PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10367">PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-websites-to-query-for-available-payment-methods"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10368">允许网站查询可用的付款方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10368">Allow websites to query for available payment methods</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10369">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10369">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10370">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 80 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10370">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10371">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10371">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10372">允许你设置网站是否可以检查用户是否保存了付款方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10372">Allows you to set whether websites can check if the user has payment methods saved.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10373">如果禁用此策略，则使用 PaymentRequest.canMakePayment 或 PaymentRequest.hasEnrolledInstrument API 的网站将被通知没有可用的付款方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10373">If you disable this policy, websites that use PaymentRequest.canMakePayment or PaymentRequest.hasEnrolledInstrument API will be informed that no payment methods are available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10374">如果启用此策略或未设置此策略，网站可以检查用户是否保存了付款方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10374">If you enable this policy or don't set this policy, websites can check if the user has payment methods saved.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10375">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10375">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10376">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10376">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10377">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10377">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10378">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10378">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10379">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10379">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10380">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10380">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10381">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10381">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10382">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10382">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10383">GP 唯一名称：PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10383">GP unique name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10384">GP 名称：允许网站查询可用的付款方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10384">GP name: Allow websites to query for available payment methods</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10385">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10385">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10386">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10386">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10387">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10387">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10388">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10388">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10389">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10389">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10390">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10390">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10391">值名称：PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10391">Value Name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10392">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10392">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10393">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10393">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10394">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10394">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10395">首选项项名称：PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10395">Preference Key Name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10396">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10396">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10397">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10397">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="personalizationreportingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10398">PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10398">PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-personalization-of-ads-microsoft-edge-search-news-and-other-microsoft-services-by-sending-browsing-history-favorites-and-collections-usage-and-other-browsing-data-to-microsoft"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10399">允许将浏览历史记录、收藏夹和集锦、使用情况和其他浏览数据发送给 Microsoft，以允许对广告、Microsoft Edge、搜索、新闻和其他 Microsoft 服务进行个性化设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10399">Allow personalization of ads, Microsoft Edge, search, news and other Microsoft services by sending browsing history, favorites and collections, usage and other browsing data to Microsoft</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10400">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10400">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10401">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 80 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10401">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10402">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10402">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10403">此策略阻止 Microsoft 收集用户的 Microsoft Edge 浏览历史记录、收藏夹和集锦、使用情况和其他浏览数据，以用于个性化广告、搜索、新闻、Microsoft Edge 和其他 Microsoft 服务。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10403">This policy prevents Microsoft from collecting a user's Microsoft Edge browsing history, favorites and collections, usage, and other browsing data to be used for personalizing advertising, search, news, Microsoft Edge and other Microsoft services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10404">此设置不适用于儿童帐户或企业帐户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10404">This setting is not available for child accounts or enterprise accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10405">如果禁用此策略，用户将无法更改或替代该设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10405">If you disable this policy, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10406">如果启用或未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将默认为用户的首选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10406">If this policy is enabled or not configured, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10407">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10407">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10408">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10408">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10409">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10409">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10410">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10410">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10411">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10411">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10412">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10412">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10413">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10413">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10414">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10414">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10415">GP 唯一名称：PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10415">GP unique name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10416">GP 名称：允许将浏览历史记录、收藏夹和集锦、使用情况和其他浏览数据发送给 Microsoft，以允许对广告、Microsoft Edge、搜索、新闻和其他 Microsoft 服务进行个性化设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10416">GP name: Allow personalization of ads, Microsoft Edge, search, news and other Microsoft services by sending browsing history, favorites and collections, usage and other browsing data to Microsoft</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10417">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10417">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10418">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10418">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10419">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10419">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10420">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10420">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10421">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10421">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10422">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10422">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10423">值名称：PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10423">Value Name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10424">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10424">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10425">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10425">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```
