  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10426">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10426">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10427">首选项项名称：PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10427">Preference Key Name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10428">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10428">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10429">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10429">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="pinningwizardallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10430">PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10430">PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-pin-to-taskbar-wizard"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10431">允许固定到任务栏向导</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10431">Allow Pin to taskbar wizard</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10432">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10432">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10433">在 Windows 上自 80 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10433">On Windows since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10434">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10434">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10435">Microsoft Edge 使用固定到任务栏向导帮助用户将建议的网站固定到任务栏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10435">Microsoft Edge uses the Pin to taskbar wizard to help users pin suggested sites to the taskbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10436">固定到任务栏向导功能默认情况下处于启用状态，用户可通过“设置及更多”菜单访问该功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10436">The Pin to taskbar wizard feature is enabled by default and accessible to the user through the Settings and more menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10437">如果启用或未配置此策略，用户可以从“设置及更多”菜单调用固定到任务栏向导。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10437">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can call the Pin to taskbar wizard from the Settings and More menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10438">也可以通过协议发布来调用该向导。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10438">The wizard can also be called via a protocol launch.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10439">如果禁用此策略，则将在菜单中禁用固定到任务栏向导，并且无法通过协议发布进行调用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10439">If you disable this policy, the Pin to taskbar wizard is disabled in the menu and cannot be called via a protocol launch.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10440">启用或禁用固定到任务栏向导的用户设置不可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10440">User settings to enable or disable the Pin to taskbar wizard aren't available.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10441">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10441">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10442">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10442">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10443">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10443">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10444">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10444">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10445">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10445">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10446">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10446">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10447">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10447">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10448">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10448">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10449">GP 唯一名称：PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10449">GP unique name: PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10450">GP 名称：允许固定到任务栏向导</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10450">GP name: Allow Pin to taskbar wizard</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10451">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10451">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10452">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10452">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10453">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10453">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10454">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10454">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10455">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10455">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10456">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10456">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10457">值名称：PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10457">Value Name: PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10458">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10458">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10459">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10459">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10460">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10460">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="proactiveauthenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10461">ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10461">ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-proactive-authentication-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10462">启用主动身份验证（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10462">Enable Proactive Authentication (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10463">已过时：此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 90 之后无效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10463">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 90.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10464">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10464">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10465">在 Windows 和 macOS 上，从 77 直到 90</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10465">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 90</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10466">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10466">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10467">此策略已过时，因为它不能独立于浏览器登录运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10467">This policy is obsolete because it does not work independently of browser sign in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10468">它在 Microsoft Edge 90 之后的版本中无效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10468">It does not work in Microsoft Edge after version 90.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10469">如果要配置浏览器登录，请使用 [BrowserSigning](#browsersignin) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10469">If you want to configure browser sign in, use the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10470">允许你配置是否在 Microsoft Edge 中开启主动身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10470">Lets you configure whether to turn on Proactive Authentication in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10471">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 会尝试使用登录到浏览器的帐户对网站和服务进行无缝身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10471">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge tries to seamlessly authenticate to websites and services using the account which is signed-in to the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10472">如果禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 不会尝试使用单一登录 (SSO) 对网站或服务进行身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10472">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge does not try to authenticate with websites or services using single sign-on (SSO).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10473">与企业新选项卡页类似的身份验证体验无法使用 (例如，最近和推荐的 Office 文档将无法使用)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10473">Authenticated experiences like the Enterprise New Tab Page will not work (e.g. recent and recommended Office documents will not be available).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10474">如果未配置此策略，则将启用主动身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10474">If you don't configure this policy, Proactive Authentication is turned on.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10475">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10475">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10476">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10476">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10477">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10477">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10478">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10478">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10479">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10479">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10480">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10480">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10481">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10481">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10482">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10482">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10483">GP 唯一名称：ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10483">GP unique name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10484">GP 名称：启用主动身份验证 (已过时) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10484">GP name: Enable Proactive Authentication (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10485">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10485">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10486">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10486">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10487">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10487">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10488">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10488">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10489">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10489">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10490">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10490">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10491">值名称：ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10491">Value Name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10492">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10492">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10493">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10493">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10494">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10494">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10495">首选项项名称：ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10495">Preference Key Name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10496">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10496">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10497">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10497">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="promotionaltabsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10498">PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10498">PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-full-tab-promotional-content"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10499">启用完整选项卡促销内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10499">Enable full-tab promotional content</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10500">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10500">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10501">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10501">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10502">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10502">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10503">控制完整选项卡促销或教育内容的展示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10503">Control the presentation of full-tab promotional or educational content.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10504">此设置控制欢迎页面的展示，可帮助用户登录 Microsoft Edge、选择其默认浏览器或了解产品功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10504">This setting controls the presentation of welcome pages that help users sign into Microsoft Edge, choose their default browser, or learn about product features.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10505">如果启用此策略（将其设置为 true）或未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 可以向用户显示完整选项卡内容以提供产品信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10505">If you enable this policy (set it true) or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge can show full-tab content to users to provide product information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10506">如果禁用（设置为 false）此策略，Microsoft Edge 将无法向用户显示完整选项卡内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10506">If you disable (set to false) this policy, Microsoft Edge can't show full-tab content to users.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10507">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10507">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10508">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10508">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10509">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10509">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10510">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10510">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10511">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10511">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10512">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10512">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10513">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10513">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10514">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10514">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10515">GP 唯一名称：PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10515">GP unique name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10516">GP 名称：启用完整选项卡促销内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10516">GP name: Enable full-tab promotional content</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10517">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10517">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10518">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10518">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10519">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10519">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10520">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10520">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10521">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10521">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10522">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10522">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10523">值名称：PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10523">Value Name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10524">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10524">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10525">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10525">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10526">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10526">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10527">首选项项名称：PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10527">Preference Key Name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10528">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10528">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="promptfordownloadlocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10530">PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10530">PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>

  #### <a name="ask-where-to-save-downloaded-files"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10531">询问在何处保存下载的文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10531">Ask where to save downloaded files</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10532">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10532">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10533">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10533">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10534">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10534">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10535">设置是否在下载文件之前询问保存位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10535">Set whether to ask where to save a file before downloading it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10536">如果启用此策略，则会在下载前询问用户将每个文件保存在何处；如果未配置此策略，则文件将自动保存到默认位置，而不询问用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10536">If you enable this policy, the user is asked where to save each file before downloading; if you don't configure it, files are saved automatically to the default location, without asking the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10537">如果未配置此策略，用户将能够更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10537">If you don't configure this policy, the user will be able to change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10538">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10538">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10539">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10539">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10540">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10540">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10541">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10541">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10542">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10542">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10543">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10543">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10544">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10544">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10545">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10545">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10546">GP 唯一名称：PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10546">GP unique name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10547">GP 名称：询问在何处保存下载的文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10547">GP name: Ask where to save downloaded files</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10548">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10548">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10549">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10549">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10550">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10550">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10551">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10551">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10552">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10552">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10553">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10553">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10554">值名称：PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10554">Value Name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10555">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10555">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10556">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10556">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10557">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10557">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10558">首选项项名称：PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10558">Preference Key Name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10559">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10559">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10560">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10560">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="quicallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10561">QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10561">QuicAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-quic-protocol"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10562">允许 QUIC 协议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10562">Allow QUIC protocol</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10563">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10563">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10564">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10564">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10565">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10565">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10566">允许在 Microsoft Edge 中使用 QUIC 协议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10566">Allows use of the QUIC protocol in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10567">如果启用或未配置此策略，则允许使用 QUIC 协议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10567">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the QUIC protocol is allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10568">如果禁用此策略，则 QUIC 协议将被阻止。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10568">If you disable this policy, the QUIC protocol is blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10569">QUIC 是一种传输层网络协议，可提高当前使用 TCP 的 Web 应用程序的性能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10569">QUIC is a transport layer network protocol that can improve performance of web applications that currently use TCP.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10570">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10570">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10571">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10571">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10572">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10572">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10573">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10573">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10574">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10574">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10575">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10575">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10576">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10576">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10577">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10577">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10578">GP 唯一名称：QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10578">GP unique name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10579">GP 名称：允许 QUIC 协议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10579">GP name: Allow QUIC protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10580">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10580">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10581">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10581">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10582">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10582">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10583">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10583">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10584">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10584">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10585">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10585">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10586">值名称：QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10586">Value Name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10587">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10587">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10588">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10588">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10589">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10589">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10590">首选项项名称：QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10590">Preference Key Name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10591">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10591">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10592">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10592">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="quickviewofficefilesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10593">QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10593">QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="manage-quickview-office-files-capability-in-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10594">在 Microsoft Edge 中管理 QuickView Office 文件功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10594">Manage QuickView Office files capability in Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10595">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10595">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10596">自 90 或更高版本起，在 Windows 和 macOS 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10596">On Windows and macOS since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10597">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10597">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10598">允许设置用户是否可以查看 web 上不在 OneDrive 或 SharePoint 上的 Office 文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10598">Allows you to set whether users can view Office files on the web that aren't on OneDrive or SharePoint.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10599">（例如：Word 文档、PowerPoint 演示文稿和 Excel 电子表格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10599">(For example: Word documents, PowerPoint presentations, and Excel spreadsheets)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10600">如果启用或未配置此策略，则可以使用 Office Viewer 在 Microsoft Edge 中查看这些文件，而不是下载这些文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10600">If you enable or don't configure this policy, these files can be viewed in Microsoft Edge using Office Viewer instead of downloading the files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10601">如果禁用此策略，将下载这些文件以供查看。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10601">If you disable this policy, these files will be downloaded to be viewed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10602">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10602">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10603">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10603">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10604">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10604">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10605">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10605">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10606">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10606">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10607">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10607">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10608">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10608">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10609">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10609">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10610">GP 唯一名称：QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10610">GP unique name: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10611">GP 名称：在 Microsoft Edge 中管理 QuickView Office 文件功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10611">GP name: Manage QuickView Office files capability in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10612">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10612">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10613">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10613">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10614">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10614">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10615">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10615">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10616">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10616">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10617">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10617">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10618">值名称：QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10618">Value Name: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10619">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10619">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10620">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10620">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10621">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10621">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10622">首选项项名称：QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10622">Preference Key Name: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10623">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10623">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10624">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10624">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerpreventbhoinstall"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10625">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10625">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span></span>

  #### <a name="prevent-install-of-the-bho-to-redirect-incompatible-sites-from-internet-explorer-to-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10626">阻止安装可将不兼容的网站从 Internet Explorer 重定向到 Microsoft Edge 的 BHO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10626">Prevent install of the BHO to redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10627">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10627">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10628">在 87 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10628">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10629">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10629">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10630">通过此设置，你可以指定是否阻止安装浏览器帮助程序对象(BHO)，BHO 可将不兼容的网站从 Internet Explorer 重定向到 Microsoft Edge，以支持需要使用新式浏览器的网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10630">This setting lets you specify whether to block the install of the Browser Helper Object (BHO) that enables redirecting incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge for sites that require a modern browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10631">如果启用此策略，将不安装 BHO。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10631">If you enable this policy, the BHO will not be installed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10632">如果已安装，将在下一次 Microsoft Edge 更新时将其卸载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10632">If it is already installed it will be uninstalled on the next Microsoft Edge update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10633">如果未配置或禁用了此策略，将安装 BHO。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10633">If this policy is not configured or is disabled, the BHO will be installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10634">只有在安装 BHO 后，才会发生不兼容网站重定向，但重定向是否发生还受 [RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode](#redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerredirectmode) 的控制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10634">The BHO is required for incompatible site redirection to occur, however whether redirection occurs or not is also controlled by [RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode](#redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerredirectmode).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10635">有关此策略的详细信息，请参阅[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10635">For more information about this policy see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10636">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10636">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10637">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10637">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10638">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10638">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10639">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10639">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10640">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10640">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10641">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10641">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10642">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10642">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10643">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10643">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10644">GP 唯一名称：RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10644">GP unique name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10645">GP 名称：阻止安装可将不兼容的网站从 Internet Explorer 重定向到 Microsoft Edge 的 BHO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10645">GP name: Prevent install of the BHO to redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10646">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10646">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10647">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10647">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10648">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10648">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10649">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10649">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10650">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10650">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10651">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10651">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10652">值名称：RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10652">Value Name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10653">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10653">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10654">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10654">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10655">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10655">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerredirectmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10656">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10656">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="redirect-incompatible-sites-from-internet-explorer-to-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10657">将不兼容的网站从 Internet Explorer 重新定向到 Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10657">Redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10658">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10658">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10659">在 87 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10659">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10660">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10660">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10661">通过此设置，你可以指定 Internet Explorer 是否在导航到需要新式浏览器的网站时重定向到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10661">This setting lets you specify whether Internet Explorer will redirect navigations to sites that require a modern browser to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10662">如果未配置此策略或将其设置为“站点列表”，则从 M87 开始，Internet Explorer 会将需要新式浏览器的网站重定向到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10662">If you don't configure this policy or set it to 'Sitelist', beginning in M87, Internet Explorer will redirect sites that require a modern browser to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10663">从 Internet Explorer 将网站重定向到 Microsoft Edge 时，如果之前没有其他内容，则会关闭开始加载该网站的 Internet Explorer 标签页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10663">When a site is redirected from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge, the Internet Explorer tab that began loading that site is closed if it had no prior content.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10664">否则，将导航到 Microsoft 帮助页面，其中介绍了将相应网站重定向到 Microsoft Edge 的原因。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10664">Otherwise, it is navigated to a Microsoft help page explaining why the site was redirected to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10665">启动 Microsoft Edge 以从 IE 加载网站时，用户会看到一个信息栏，其中说明了该网站在新式浏览器中效果最佳。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10665">When Microsoft Edge is launched to load a site from IE, an information bar is shown to the user explaining that the site works best in a modern browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10666">如果将此策略设置为“禁用”，则 Internet Explorer 不会将任何流量重定向到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10666">If you set this policy to 'Disable', Internet Explorer will not redirect any traffic to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10667">有关此策略的详细信息，请参阅[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10667">For more information about this policy see  [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10668">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10668">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10669">Disable (0) = 禁用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10669">Disable (0) = Disable</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10670">Sitelist (1) = 基于不兼容网站列表重定向网站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10670">Sitelist (1) = Redirect sites based on the incompatible sites sitelist</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10671">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10671">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10672">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10672">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10673">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10673">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10674">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10674">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10675">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10675">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10676">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10676">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10677">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10677">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10678">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10678">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10679">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10679">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10680">GP 唯一名称：RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10680">GP unique name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10681">GP 名称：Redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10681">GP name: Redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10682">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10682">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10683">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10683">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10684">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10684">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10685">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10685">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10686">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10686">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10687">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10687">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10688">值名称：RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10688">Value Name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10689">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10689">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10690">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10690">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10691">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10691">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="relaunchnotification"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10692">RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10692">RelaunchNotification</span></span>

  #### <a name="notify-a-user-that-a-browser-restart-is-recommended-or-required-for-pending-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10693">通知用户对于挂起的更新，推荐或需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10693">Notify a user that a browser restart is recommended or required for pending updates</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10694">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10694">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10695">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10695">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10696">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10696">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10697">通知用户他们需要重新启动 Microsoft Edge 以应用挂起的更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10697">Notify users that they need to restart Microsoft Edge to apply a pending update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10698">如果未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将在顶部菜单栏最右侧添加一个回收图标，提示用户重新启动浏览器以应用更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10698">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge adds a recycle icon at the far right of the top menu bar to prompt users to restart the browser to apply the update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10699">如果启用此策略并将其设置为 'Recommended'，则会反复出现一条警告，提示用户建议重新启动。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10699">If you enable this policy and set it to 'Recommended', a recurring warning prompts users that a restart is recommended.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10700">用户可以解除此警告并推迟重新启动。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10700">Users can dismiss this warning and defer the restart.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10701">如果将该策略设置为 'Required'，则会反复出现一条警告，提示用户在通知期过后，浏览器将自动重新启动。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10701">If you set the policy to 'Required', a recurring warning prompts users that the browser will be restarted automatically as soon as a notification period passes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10702">默认期限为七天。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10702">The default period is seven days.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10703">可使用 [RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod) 策略配置此期限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10703">You can configure this period with the [RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10704">浏览器重新启动后，将还原用户的会话。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10704">The user's session is restored when the browser restarts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10705">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10705">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10706">Recommended (1) = 推荐 - 向用户显示重复提示，指示建议重新启动</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10706">Recommended (1) = Recommended - Show a recurring prompt to the user indicating that a restart is recommended</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10707">Required (2) = 必需 - 向用户显示重复提示，指示需要重新启动</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10707">Required (2) = Required - Show a recurring prompt to the user indicating that a restart is required</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10708">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10708">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10709">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10709">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10710">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10710">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10711">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10711">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10712">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10712">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10713">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10713">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10714">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10714">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10715">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10715">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10716">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10716">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10717">GP 唯一名称：RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10717">GP unique name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10718">GP 名称：通知用户对于挂起的更新，推荐或需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10718">GP name: Notify a user that a browser restart is recommended or required for pending updates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10719">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10719">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10720">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10720">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10721">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10721">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10722">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10722">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10723">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10723">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10724">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10724">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10725">值名称：RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10725">Value Name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10726">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10726">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10727">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10727">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10728">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10728">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10729">首选项项名称：RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10729">Preference Key Name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10730">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10730">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10731">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10731">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="relaunchnotificationperiod"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10732">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10732">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-time-period-for-update-notifications"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10733">设置更新通知的时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10733">Set the time period for update notifications</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10734">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10734">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10735">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10735">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10736">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10736">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10737">可用于设置时间段（以毫秒为单位），在此时间段内，用户将收到通知：必须重新启动 Microsoft Edge 才能应用挂起的更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10737">Allows you to set the time period, in milliseconds, over which users are notified that Microsoft Edge must be relaunched to apply a pending update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10738">在此时间段内，将反复通知用户需要更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10738">Over this time period, the user will be repeatedly informed of the need for an update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10739">在 Microsoft Edge 中，通知期的三分之一过去后，应用菜单将更改以指示需要重新启动。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10739">In Microsoft Edge the app menu changes to indicate that a relaunch is needed once one third of the notification period passes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10740">此通知会在通知期的三分之二过去后改变颜色，并在整个通知期结束后再次改变颜色。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10740">This notification changes color once two thirds of the notification period passes, and again once the full notification period has passed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10741">由 [RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) 策略启用的附加通知遵循相同的计划。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10741">The additional notifications enabled by the [RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) policy follow this same schedule.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10742">如果未设置，则使用默认周期 604800000 毫秒（一周）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10742">If not set, the default period of 604800000 milliseconds (one week) is used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10743">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10743">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10744">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10744">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10745">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10745">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10746">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10746">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10747">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10747">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10748">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10748">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10749">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10749">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10750">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10750">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10751">GP 唯一名称：RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10751">GP unique name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10752">GP 名称：设置更新通知的时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10752">GP name: Set the time period for update notifications</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10753">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10753">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10754">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10754">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10755">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10755">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10756">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10756">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10757">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10757">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10758">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10758">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10759">值名称：RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10759">Value Name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10760">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10760">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10761">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10761">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x240c8400
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10762">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10762">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10763">首选项项名称：RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10763">Preference Key Name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10764">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10764">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>604800000</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10765">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10765">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="renderercodeintegrityenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10766">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10766">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-renderer-code-integrity"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10767">启用呈现器代码完整性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10767">Enable renderer code integrity</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10768">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10768">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10769">在 Windows 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10769">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10770">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10770">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10771">将策略设置为启用或保持未设置状态，可开启呈现器代码完整性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10771">Setting the policy to Enabled or leaving it unset turns Renderer Code Integrity on.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10772">将策略设置为禁用会对 Microsoft Edge 的安全性和稳定性产生不利影响，因为未知和潜在的恶意代码可能在 Microsoft Edge 的呈现器进程中加载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10772">Setting the policy to Disabled has a detrimental effect on Microsoft Edge's security and stability as unknown and potentially hostile code can load inside Microsoft Edge's renderer processes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10773">仅在与必须在 Microsoft Edge 的呈现器进程内运行的第三方软件存在兼容性问题时，才关闭该策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10773">Only turn off the policy if there are compatibility issues with third-party software that must run inside Microsoft Edge's renderer processes.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10774">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10774">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10775">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10775">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10776">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10776">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10777">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10777">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10778">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10778">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10779">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10779">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10780">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10780">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10781">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10781">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10782">GP 唯一名称：RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10782">GP unique name: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10783">GP 名称：启用呈现器代码完整性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10783">GP name: Enable renderer code integrity</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10784">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10784">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10785">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10785">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10786">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10786">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10787">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10787">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10788">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10788">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10789">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10789">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10790">值名称：RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10790">Value Name: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10791">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10791">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10792">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10792">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10793">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10793">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="requireonlinerevocationchecksforlocalanchors"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10794">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10794">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-if-online-ocspcrl-checks-are-required-for-local-trust-anchors"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10795">指定本地信任密钥是否需要联机 OCSP/CRL 检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10795">Specify if online OCSP/CRL checks are required for local trust anchors</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10796">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10796">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10797">在 Windows 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10797">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10798">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10798">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10799">控制是否需要联机吊销检查（OCSP/CRL 检查）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10799">Control whether online revocation checks (OCSP/CRL checks) are required.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10800">如果 Microsoft Edge 无法获取吊销状态信息，这些证书将被视为已吊销（“硬故障”）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10800">If Microsoft Edge can't get revocation status information, these certificates are treated as revoked ("hard-fail").</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10801">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将始终对成功验证并由本地安装的 CA 证书签名的服务器证书执行吊销检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10801">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge always performs revocation checking for server certificates that successfully validate and are signed by locally-installed CA certificates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10802">如果未配置或禁用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将使用现有的联机吊销检查设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10802">If you don't configure or disable this policy, then Microsoft Edge uses the existing online revocation checking settings.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10803">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10803">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10804">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10804">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10805">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10805">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10806">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10806">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10807">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10807">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10808">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10808">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10809">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10809">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10810">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10810">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10811">GP 唯一名称：RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10811">GP unique name: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10812">GP 名称：指定本地信任密钥是否需要联机 OCSP/CRL 检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10812">GP name: Specify if online OCSP/CRL checks are required for local trust anchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10813">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10813">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10814">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10814">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10815">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10815">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10816">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10816">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10817">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10817">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10818">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10818">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10819">值名称：RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10819">Value Name: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10820">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10820">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10821">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10821">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10822">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10822">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="resolvenavigationerrorsusewebservice"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10823">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10823">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-resolution-of-navigation-errors-using-a-web-service"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10824">启用使用 Web 服务解决导航错误</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10824">Enable resolution of navigation errors using a web service</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10825">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10825">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10826">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10826">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10827">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10827">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10828">允许 Microsoft Edge 发布与 Web 服务的无数据连接，以便在酒店和机场 Wi-Fi 等情况下探测网络连接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10828">Allow Microsoft Edge to issue a dataless connection to a web service to probe networks for connectivity in cases like hotel and airport Wi-Fi.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10829">如果启用此策略，则将使用 Web 服务执行网络连接测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10829">If you enable this policy, a web service is used for network connectivity tests.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10830">如果禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将使用本机 API 尝试解决网络连接和导航问题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10830">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses native APIs to try to resolve network connectivity and navigation issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10831">**注意**：除了 Windows 8 和更高版本的 Windows 之外，Microsoft Edge *始终*使用本机 API 来解决连接问题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10831">**Note**: Except on Windows 8 and later versions of Windows, Microsoft Edge *always* uses native APIs to resolve connectivity issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10832">如果未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将遵循 edge://settings/privacy 处“服务”下设置的用户首选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10832">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge respects the user preference that's set under Services at edge://settings/privacy.</span></span>
