<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10833">具体而言，有一个“**使用 Web 服务帮助解决导航错误**”开关，用户可以打开或关闭该开关。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10833">Specifically, there's a **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** toggle, which the user can switch on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10834">请注意，如果已启用此策略 (ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService)，则“**使用 Web 服务帮助解决导航错误**”设置将打开，但用户无法使用开关更改该设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10834">Be aware that if you have enabled this policy (ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService), the **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** setting is turned on, but the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10835">如果禁用此策略，“**使用 Web 服务帮助解决导航错误**”设置将关闭，用户无法使用开关更改该设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10835">If you have disabled this policy, the **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** setting is turned off, and the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10836">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10836">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10837">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10837">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10838">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10838">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10839">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10839">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10840">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10840">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10841">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10841">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10842">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10842">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10843">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10843">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10844">GP 唯一名称：ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10844">GP unique name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10845">GP 名称：启用使用 Web 服务解决导航错误</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10845">GP name: Enable resolution of navigation errors using a web service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10846">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10846">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10847">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10847">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10848">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10848">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10849">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10849">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10850">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10850">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10851">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10851">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10852">值名称：ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10852">Value Name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10853">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10853">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10854">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10854">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10855">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10855">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10856">首选项项名称：ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10856">Preference Key Name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10857">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10857">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10858">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10858">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="restrictsignintopattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10859">RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10859">RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>

  #### <a name="restrict-which-accounts-can-be-used-as-microsoft-edge-primary-accounts"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10860">限制哪些帐户可用作 Microsoft Edge 主要帐户</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10860">Restrict which accounts can be used as Microsoft Edge primary accounts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10861">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10861">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10862">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10862">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10863">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10863">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10864">确定哪些帐户可以设置为 Microsoft Edge 中的浏览器主帐户（在同步选择加入流程中选择的帐户）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10864">Determines which accounts can be set as browser primary accounts in Microsoft Edge (the account that is chosen during the Sync opt-in flow).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10865">如果用户试图使用与此模式不匹配的用户名配置浏览器主帐户，则他们会被阻止，并且会看到相应的错误消息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10865">If a user tries to configure a browser primary account with a username that doesn't match this pattern, they are blocked and will get the appropriate error message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10866">可以使用该模式的 Perl 样式正则表达式将此策略配置为匹配多个帐户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10866">You can configure this policy to match multiple accounts using a Perl style regular expression for the pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10867">请注意，模式匹配是区分大小写的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10867">Note that pattern matches are case sensitive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10868">有关所用正则表达式规则的详细信息，请参阅 https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10868">For more information about the regular expression rules that are used, refer to https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10869">如果未配置此策略或将其保留为空，用户可以在 Microsoft Edge 中将任何帐户设置为浏览器主帐户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10869">If you don't configure this policy or leave it blank, users can set any account as a browser primary account in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10870">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10870">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10871">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10871">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10872">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10872">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10873">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10873">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10874">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10874">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10875">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10875">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10876">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10876">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10877">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10877">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10878">GP 唯一名称：RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10878">GP unique name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10879">GP 名称：限制哪些帐户可用作 Microsoft Edge 主要帐户</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10879">GP name: Restrict which accounts can be used as Microsoft Edge primary accounts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10880">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10880">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10881">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10881">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10882">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10882">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10883">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10883">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10884">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10884">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10885">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10885">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10886">值名称：RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10886">Value Name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10887">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10887">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10888">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10888">Example value:</span></span>

```
".*@contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10889">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10889">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10890">首选项项名称：RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10890">Preference Key Name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10891">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10891">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>.*@contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10892">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10892">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="roamingprofilelocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10893">RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10893">RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-roaming-profile-directory"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10894">设置漫游配置文件目录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10894">Set the roaming profile directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10895">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10895">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10896">在 85 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10896">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10897">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10897">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10898">配置用于存储配置文件的漫游副本的目录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10898">Configures the directory to use to store the roaming copy of profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10899">如果启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将使用提供的目录存储配置文件的漫游副本，前提是你已启用了 [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10899">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory to store a roaming copy of the profiles, as long as you've also enabled the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10900">如果禁用 [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) 策略或不对其进行配置，则不会使用存储在此策略中的值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10900">If you disable the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy or don't configure it, the value stored in this policy isn't used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10901">有关你可使用的变量列表，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10901">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables you can use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10902">如果未配置此策略，则将使用默认的漫游配置文件路径。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10902">If you don't configure this policy, the default roaming profile path is used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10903">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10903">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10904">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10904">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10905">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10905">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10906">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10906">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10907">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10907">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10908">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10908">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10909">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10909">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10910">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10910">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10911">GP 唯一名称： RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10911">GP unique name: RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10912">GP 名称：设置漫游配置文件目录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10912">GP name: Set the roaming profile directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10913">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10913">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10914">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10914">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10915">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10915">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10916">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10916">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10917">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10917">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10918">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10918">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10919">值名称： RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10919">Value Name: RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10920">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10920">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10921">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10921">Example value:</span></span>

```
"${roaming_app_data}\\edge-profile"
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10922">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10922">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="roamingprofilesupportenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10923">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10923">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-using-roaming-copies-for-microsoft-edge-profile-data"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10924">启用 Microsoft Edge 配置文件数据的漫游副本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10924">Enable using roaming copies for Microsoft Edge profile data</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10925">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10925">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10926">在 85 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10926">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10927">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10927">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10928">启用此策略，在 Windows 上使用漫游配置文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10928">Enable this policy to use roaming profiles on Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10929">存储在 Microsoft Edge 配置文件中的设置（收藏夹和首选项）也保存到存储在漫游用户配置文件文件夹中的文件（或管理员通过[RoamingProfileLocation](#roamingprofilelocation)策略指定的位置）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10929">The settings stored in Microsoft Edge profiles (favorites and preferences) are also saved to a file stored in the Roaming user profile folder (or the location specified by the administrator through the [RoamingProfileLocation](#roamingprofilelocation) policy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10930">如果禁用该策略或不对其进行配置，则仅使用常规本地配置文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10930">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, only the regular local profiles are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10931">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 仅禁用云同步，并且对此策略没有影响。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10931">The [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) only disables cloud synchronization and has no impact on this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10932">有关使用漫游用户配置文件的详细信息，请参阅[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10932">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058) for more information on using roaming user profiles.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10933">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10933">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10934">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10934">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10935">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10935">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10936">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10936">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10937">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10937">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10938">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10938">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10939">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10939">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10940">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10940">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10941">GP 唯一名称： RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10941">GP unique name: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10942">GP 名称：支持使用 Microsoft Edge 配置文件数据的漫游副本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10942">GP name: Enable using roaming copies for Microsoft Edge profile data</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10943">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10943">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10944">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10944">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10945">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10945">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10946">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10946">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10947">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10947">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10948">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10948">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10949">值名称：RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10949">Value Name: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10950">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10950">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10951">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10951">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10952">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10952">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="runallflashinallowmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10953">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10953">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="extend-adobe-flash-content-setting-to-all-content-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10954">将 Adobe Flash 内容设置扩展到所有内容（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10954">Extend Adobe Flash content setting to all content (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10955">已过时：此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 88 之后无效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10955">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10956">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10956">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10957">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 开始，直到 88</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10957">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 88</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10958">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10958">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10959">此策略不起作用，因为 Microsoft Edge 不再支持 Flash。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10959">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10960">如果启用此策略，则内容设置中设为允许 Adobe Flash（由用户或通过企业策略）的网站中嵌入的所有 Adobe Flash 内容都将运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10960">If you enable this policy, all Adobe Flash content embedded in websites that are set to allow Adobe Flash in the content settings -- either by the user or by enterprise policy -- will run.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10961">这包括来自其他源的内容和/或小型内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10961">This includes content from other origins and/or small content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10962">要控制允许哪些网站运行 Adobe Flash，请参阅 [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting)、[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) 和 [PluginsBlockedForUrl](#pluginsblockedforurls) 策略中的规范。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10962">To control which websites are allowed to run Adobe Flash, see the specifications in the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting), [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls), and [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10963">如果禁用或未配置此策略，来自其他源的 Adobe Flash 内容（来自上面提到的三个策略中未指定的网站）或小型内容可能会被阻止。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10963">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, Adobe Flash content from other origins (from sites that aren't specified in the three policies mentioned immediately above) or small content might be blocked.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10964">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10964">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10965">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10965">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10966">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10966">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10967">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10967">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10968">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10968">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10969">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10969">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10970">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10970">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10971">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10971">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10972">GP 唯一名称：RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10972">GP unique name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10973">GP 名称：将 Adobe Flash 内容设置扩展到所有内容（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10973">GP name: Extend Adobe Flash content setting to all content (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10974">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10974">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10975">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10975">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10976">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10976">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10977">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10977">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10978">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10978">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10979">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10979">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10980">值名称：RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10980">Value Name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10981">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10981">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10982">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10982">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10983">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10983">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10984">首选项项名称：RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10984">Preference Key Name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10985">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10985">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10986">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10986">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sslerroroverrideallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10987">SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10987">SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-proceed-from-the-https-warning-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10988">允许用户从 HTTPS 警告页面继续操作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10988">Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10989">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10989">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10990">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10990">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10991">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10991">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10992">当用户访问存在 SSL 错误的网站时，Microsoft Edge 会显示警告页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10992">Microsoft Edge shows a warning page when users visit sites that have SSL errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10993">如果启用或未配置（默认）此策略，则用户可以单击浏览这些警告页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10993">If you enable or don't configure (default) this policy, users can click through these warning pages.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10994">如果禁用此策略，则将阻止用户单击浏览任何警告页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10994">If you disable this policy, users are blocked from clicking through any warning page.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10995">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10995">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10996">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10996">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10997">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10997">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10998">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10998">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-10999">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-10999">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11000">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11000">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11001">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11001">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11002">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11002">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11003">GP 唯一名称：SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11003">GP unique name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11004">GP 名称：允许用户从 HTTPS 警告页面继续操作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11004">GP name: Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11005">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11005">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11006">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11006">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11007">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11007">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11008">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11008">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11009">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11009">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11010">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11010">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11011">值名称：SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11011">Value Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11012">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11012">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11013">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11013">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11014">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11014">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11015">首选项项名称：SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11015">Preference Key Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11016">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11016">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11017">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11017">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sslerroroverrideallowedfororigins"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11018">SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOwedgins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11018">SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-proceed-from-the-https-warning-page-for-specific-origins"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11019">允许用户从特定来源的 HTTPS 警告页继续操作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11019">Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page for specific origins</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11020">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11020">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11021">自 90 或更高版本起，在 Windows 和 macOS 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11021">On Windows and macOS since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11022">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11022">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11023">当用户访问存在 SSL 错误的网站时，Microsoft Edge 会显示警告页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11023">Microsoft Edge shows a warning page when users visit sites that have SSL errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11024">如果启用或不配置 [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) 策略，则此策略不会执行任何操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11024">If you enable or don't configure the [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) policy, this policy does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11025">如果禁用 [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) 策略，则通过配置此策略可以为用户能够继续单击 SSL 错误页面的网站配置源模式列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11025">If you disable the [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) policy, configuring this policy lets you configure a list of origin patterns for sites where users can continue to click through SSL error pages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11026">用户无法单击不在此列表中的源上的 SSL 错误页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11026">Users can't click through SSL error pages on origins that are not on this list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11027">如果未配置此策略，则 [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) 策略适用于所有网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11027">If you don't configure this policy, the [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) policy applies for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11028">有关有效源模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11028">For detailed information about valid origin patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11029">\* 不是此策略的接受值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11029">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11030">此策略仅基于源匹配，因此会忽略 URL 模式的任何路径或查询。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11030">This policy only matches based on origin, so any path or query in the URL pattern is ignored.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11031">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11031">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11032">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11032">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11033">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11033">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11034">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11034">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11035">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11035">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11036">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11036">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11037">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11037">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11038">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11038">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11039">GP 唯一名称：SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11039">GP unique name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11040">GP 名称：允许用户从特定源的 HTTPS 警告页面继续操作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11040">GP name: Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page for specific origins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11041">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11041">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11042">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11042">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11043">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11043">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11044">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11044">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11045">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11045">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11046">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11046">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11047">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11047">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11048">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11048">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11049">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11049">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11050">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11050">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11051">首选键名称：SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11051">Preference Key Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11052">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11052">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11053">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11053">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sslversionmin"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11054">SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11054">SSLVersionMin</span></span>

  #### <a name="minimum-tls-version-enabled-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11055">启用最低 TLS 版本 (已弃用) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11055">Minimum TLS version enabled (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11056">已弃用：此策略已弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11056">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11057">当前受支持，但将在未来的版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11057">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11058">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11058">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11059">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11059">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11060">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11060">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11061">从版本 91（2021 年 5 月左右）开始，将删除对禁止显示 TLS 1.0/1.1 警告的支持，然后此策略将停止工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11061">Support for suppressing the TLS 1.0/1.1 warning will be removed from Microsoft Edge starting in version 91 (around May 2021) and this policy will stop working then.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11062">设置 TLS 的最低支持版本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11062">Sets the minimum supported version of TLS.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11063">如果未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将显示适用于 TLS 1.0 和 TLS 1.1 的错误，但用户将可以忽略它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11063">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will show an error for TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1, but the user will be able to bypass it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11064">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将不会使用低于指定版本的任何 SSL/TLS 版本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11064">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge won't use any version of SSL/TLS lower than the specified version.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11065">任何无法识别的值都将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11065">Any unrecognized value is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11066">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11066">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11067">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11067">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11068">TLSv1.1 (tls1.1) = TLS 1.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11068">TLSv1.1 (tls1.1) = TLS 1.1</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11069">TLSv1.2 (tls1.2) = TLS 1.2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11069">TLSv1.2 (tls1.2) = TLS 1.2</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11070">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11070">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11071">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11071">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11072">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11072">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11073">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11073">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11074">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11074">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11075">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11075">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11076">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11076">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11077">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11077">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11078">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11078">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11079">GP 唯一名称：SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11079">GP unique name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11080">GP 名称：启用最低 TLS 版本 (已弃用) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11080">GP name: Minimum TLS version enabled (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11081">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11081">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11082">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11082">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11083">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11083">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11084">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11084">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11085">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11085">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11086">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11086">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11087">值名称：SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11087">Value Name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11088">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11088">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11089">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11089">Example value:</span></span>

```
"tls1"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11090">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11090">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11091">首选项项名称：SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11091">Preference Key Name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11092">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11092">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>tls1</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11093">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11093">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="savecookiesonexit"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11094">SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11094">SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>

  #### <a name="save-cookies-when-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11095">Microsoft Edge 关闭时保存 cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11095">Save cookies when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11096">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11096">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11097">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11097">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11098">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11098">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11099">如果启用此策略，指定 cookie 集将在浏览器关闭时免于删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11099">When this policy is enabled, the specified set of cookies is exempt from deletion when the browser closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11100">此策略仅适用于以下情况：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11100">This policy is only effective when:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11101">在“设置”/“隐私和服务”/“关闭时清除浏览数据”中配置了“Cookie 和其他站点数据”开关；或者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11101">The 'Cookies and other site data' toggle is configured in Settings/Privacy and services/Clear browsing data on close or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11102">已启用策略 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit)；或者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11102">The policy [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) is enabled or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11103">策略 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 设置为“在会话期间保留 Cookie”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11103">The policy [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) is set to 'Keep cookies for the duration of the session'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11104">可以根据 URL 模式定义一个站点列表，这些站点将跨会话保存它们的 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11104">You can define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that will have their cookies preserved across sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11105">注意：用户仍可编辑 Cookie 网站列表来添加或删除 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11105">Note: Users can still edit the cookie site list to add or remove URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11106">但是，他们不能删除管理员添加的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11106">However, they can't remove URLs that have been added by an Admin.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11107">如果启用此策略，浏览器关闭时将不会清除 Cookie 列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11107">If you enable this policy, the list of cookies won't be cleared when the browser closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11108">如果禁用或不配置此策略，则使用用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11108">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the user's personal configuration is used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11109">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11109">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11110">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11110">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11111">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11111">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11112">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11112">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11113">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11113">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11114">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11114">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11115">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11115">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11116">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11116">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11117">GP 唯一名称：SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11117">GP unique name: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11118">GP 名称：Microsoft Edge 关闭时保存 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11118">GP name: Save cookies when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11119">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11119">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11120">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11120">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11121">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11121">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11122">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11122">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11123">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11123">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11124">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11124">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11125">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11125">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11126">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11126">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11127">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11127">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11128">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11128">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11129">首选密钥名称：SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11129">Preference Key Name: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11130">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11130">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11131">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11131">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="savingbrowserhistorydisabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11132">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11132">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-saving-browser-history"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11133">禁止保存浏览器历史记录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11133">Disable saving browser history</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11134">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11134">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11135">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11135">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11136">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11136">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11137">禁止保存浏览器历史记录并阻止用户更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11137">Disables saving browser history and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11138">如果启用此策略，则不会保存浏览历史记录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11138">If you enable this policy, browsing history isn't saved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11139">这也会禁用选项卡同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11139">This also disables tab syncing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11140">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则会保存浏览历史记录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11140">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, browsing history is saved.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11141">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11141">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11142">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11142">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11143">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11143">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11144">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11144">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11145">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11145">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11146">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11146">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11147">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11147">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11148">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11148">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11149">GP 唯一名称：SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11149">GP unique name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11150">GP 名称：禁止保存浏览器历史记录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11150">GP name: Disable saving browser history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11151">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11151">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11152">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11152">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11153">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11153">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11154">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11154">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11155">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11155">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11156">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11156">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11157">值名称：SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11157">Value Name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11158">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11158">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11159">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11159">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11160">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11160">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11161">首选项项名称：SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11161">Preference Key Name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11162">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11162">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11163">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11163">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="screencaptureallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11164">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11164">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-or-deny-screen-capture"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11165">允许或拒绝屏幕捕获</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11165">Allow or deny screen capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11166">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11166">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11167">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 83 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11167">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11168">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11168">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11169">如果启用此策略或未配置此策略，则网页可以使用屏幕共享 API（例如 getDisplayMedia() 或桌面捕获扩展 API）进行屏幕捕获。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11169">If you enable this policy, or don't configure this policy, a web page can use screen-share APIs (for example, getDisplayMedia() or the Desktop Capture extension API) for a screen capture.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11170">如果禁用此策略，对屏幕共享 API 的调用将失败。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11170">If you disable this policy, calls to screen-share APIs will fail.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11171">例如，如果你使用的是基于 Web 的联机会议，则视频或屏幕共享将不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11171">For example, if you're using a web-based online meeting, video or screen sharing will not work.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11172">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11172">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11173">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11173">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11174">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11174">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11175">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11175">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11176">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11176">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11177">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11177">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11178">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11178">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11179">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11179">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11180">GP 唯一名称：ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11180">GP unique name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11181">GP 名称：允许或拒绝屏幕捕获</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11181">GP name: Allow or deny screen capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11182">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11182">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11183">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11183">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11184">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11184">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11185">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11185">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11186">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11186">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11187">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11187">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11188">值名称：ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11188">Value Name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11189">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11189">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11190">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11190">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11191">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11191">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11192">首选项项名称：ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11192">Preference Key Name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11193">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11193">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11194">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11194">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="scrolltotextfragmentenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11195">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11195">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-scrolling-to-text-specified-in-url-fragments"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11196">允许滚动到 URL 片段中指定的文本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11196">Enable scrolling to text specified in URL fragments</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11197">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11197">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11198">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 83 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11198">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11199">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11199">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11200">此功能允许超链接和地址栏 URL 导航以网页上的特定文本为目标，在网页加载完成后将滚动到该文本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11200">This feature lets hyperlink and address bar URL navigations target specific text on a web page, which will be scrolled to after the web page finishes loading.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11201">如果启用或未配置此策略，则允许网页通过 URL 滚动到特定文本片段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11201">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web page scrolling to specific text fragments via a URL will be enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11202">如果禁用此策略，则禁止网页通过 URL 滚动到特定文本片段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11202">If you disable this policy, web page scrolling to specific text fragments via a URL will be disabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11203">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11203">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11204">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11204">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11205">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11205">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11206">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11206">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11207">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11207">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11208">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11208">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11209">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11209">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11210">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11210">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11211">GP 唯一名称：ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11211">GP unique name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11212">GP 名称：允许滚动到 URL 片段中指定的文本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11212">GP name: Enable scrolling to text specified in URL fragments</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11213">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11213">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11214">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11214">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11215">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11215">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11216">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11216">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11217">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11217">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11218">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11218">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11219">值名称：ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11219">Value Name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11220">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11220">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11221">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11221">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11222">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11222">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11223">首选项项名称：ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11223">Preference Key Name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11224">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11224">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11225">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11225">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="searchsuggestenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11226">SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11226">SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-search-suggestions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11227">启用搜索建议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11227">Enable search suggestions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11228">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11228">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11229">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11229">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11230">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11230">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11231">在 Microsoft Edge 的地址栏和自动建议列表中启用 Web 搜索建议，并阻止用户更改此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11231">Enables web search suggestions in Microsoft Edge's Address Bar and Auto-Suggest List and prevents users from changing this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11232">如果启用此策略，将使用 Web 搜索建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11232">If you enable this policy, web search suggestions are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11233">如果禁用此策略，则永远不会使用 Web 搜索建议，但仍会显示本地历史记录和本地收藏夹建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11233">If you disable this policy, web search suggestions are never used, however local history and local favorites suggestions still appear.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11234">如果禁用此策略，键入的字符和访问的 URL 都不会包含在 Microsoft 的遥测中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11234">If you disable this policy, neither the typed characters, nor the URLs visited will be included in telemetry to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11235">如果未设置此策略，则会启用搜索建议，但用户可对此进行更改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11235">If this policy is left not set, search suggestions are enabled but the user can change that.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11236">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11236">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11237">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11237">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11238">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11238">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11239">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11239">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11240">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11240">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11241">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11241">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11242">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11242">Windows information and settings</span></span>
