  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11243">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11243">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11244">GP 唯一名称：SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11244">GP unique name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11245">GP 名称：启用搜索建议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11245">GP name: Enable search suggestions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11246">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11246">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11247">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11247">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11248">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11248">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11249">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11249">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11250">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11250">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11251">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11251">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11252">值名称：SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11252">Value Name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11253">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11253">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11254">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11254">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11255">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11255">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11256">首选项项名称：SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11256">Preference Key Name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11257">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11257">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11258">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11258">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="securitykeypermitattestation"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11259">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11259">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>

  #### <a name="websites-or-domains-that-dont-need-permission-to-use-direct-security-key-attestation"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11260">无需相应权限即可使用直接安全密钥证明的网站或域</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11260">Websites or domains that don't need permission to use direct Security Key attestation</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11261">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11261">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11262">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11262">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11263">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11263">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11264">指定在请求来自安全密钥的证明证书时不需要显式用户权限的网站和域。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11264">Specifies websites and domains that don't need explicit user permission when attestation certificates from security keys are requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11265">此外，还会向安全密钥发送一个信号，指示它可以使用单个证明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11265">Additionally, a signal is sent to the security key indicating that it can use individual attestation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11266">如果不这样做，每次网站请求安全密钥证明时都会提示用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11266">Without this, users are prompted each time a site requests attestation of security keys.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11267">网站（如 https://contoso.com/some/path)）仅与 U2F AppID 匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11267">Sites (like https://contoso.com/some/path) only match as U2F appIDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11268">域（如 contoso.com）仅与 webauthn RP ID 匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11268">Domains (like contoso.com) only match as webauthn RP IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11269">要涵盖给定网站的 U2F 和 webauthn API，需要同时列出 appID URL 和域。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11269">To cover both U2F and webauthn APIs for a given site, you need to list both the appID URL and domain.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11270">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11270">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11271">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11271">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11272">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11272">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11273">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11273">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11274">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11274">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11275">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11275">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11276">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11276">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11277">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11277">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11278">GP 唯一名称：SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11278">GP unique name: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11279">GP 名称：无需相应权限即可使用直接安全密钥证明的网站或域</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11279">GP name: Websites or domains that don't need permission to use direct Security Key attestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11280">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11280">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11281">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11281">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11282">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11282">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11283">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11283">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11284">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11284">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11285">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11285">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11286">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11286">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11287">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11287">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11288">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11288">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation\1 = "https://contoso.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11289">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11289">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11290">首选项项名称：SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11290">Preference Key Name: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11291">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11291">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="sendintranettointernetexplorer"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11293">SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11293">SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>

  #### <a name="send-all-intranet-sites-to-internet-explorer"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11294">将所有 Intranet 站点都发送到 Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11294">Send all intranet sites to Internet Explorer</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11295">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11295">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11296">在 Windows 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11296">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11297">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11297">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11298">有关配置 Internet Explorer 模式的最佳体验的指南，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11298">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11299">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11299">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11300">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11300">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11301">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11301">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11302">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11302">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11303">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11303">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11304">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11304">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11305">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11305">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11306">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11306">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11307">GP 唯一名称：SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11307">GP unique name: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11308">GP 名称：将所有 Intranet 站点都发送到 Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11308">GP name: Send all intranet sites to Internet Explorer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11309">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11309">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11310">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11310">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11311">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11311">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11312">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11312">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11313">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11313">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11314">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11314">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11315">值名称：SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11315">Value Name: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11316">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11316">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11317">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11317">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11318">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11318">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sendsiteinfotoimproveservices"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11319">SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11319">SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>

  #### <a name="send-site-information-to-improve-microsoft-services-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11320">发送站点信息以改进 Microsoft 服务（过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11320">Send site information to improve Microsoft services (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11321">已过时：此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 88 之后不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11321">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11322">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11322">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11323">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 开始，直到 88</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11323">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 88</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11324">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11324">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11325">不再支持此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11325">This policy is no longer supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11326">它被 [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata)（用于 Windows 7、Windows 8 和 macOS）取代，并允许在 Win 10（[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)）上进行遥测。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11326">It is replaced by [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (for Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS) and Allow Telemetry on Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11327">此策略允许向 Microsoft 发送有关在 Microsoft Edge 中访问过的网站的信息，以改进搜索等服务。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11327">This policy enables sending info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft to improve services like search.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11328">启用此策略后，可将有关在 Microsoft Edge 中访问过的网站的信息发送给 Microsoft。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11328">Enable this policy to send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11329">禁用此策略后，不会向 Microsoft 发送有关在 Microsoft Edge 中访问过的网站的信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11329">Disable this policy to not send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11330">在这两种情况下，用户不能更改或覆盖设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11330">In both cases, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11331">在 Windows 10 上，如果未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将默认使用 Windows 诊断数据设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11331">On Windows 10, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the Windows diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11332">启用此策略后，如果 Windows 诊断数据设置设为“完整”，Microsoft Edge 将仅发送有关在 Microsoft Edge 中访问过的网站的信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11332">If this policy is enabled Microsoft Edge will only send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge if the Windows Diagnostic data setting is set to Full.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11333">如果禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将不会发送有关所访问网站的信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11333">If this policy is disabled Microsoft Edge will not send info about websites visited.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11334">详细了解 Windows 诊断数据设置：[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11334">Learn more about Windows Diagnostic data settings: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11335">在 Windows 7、Windows 8 和 macOS 上，此策略控制发送有关已访问网站的信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11335">On Windows 7, windows 8, and macOS this policy controls sending info about websites visited.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11336">如果未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将默认使用用户首选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11336">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11337">若要启用此策略，必需将 [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) 设置为“已启用”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11337">To enable this policy, [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) must be set to Enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11338">如果 [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) 或 [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) 未配置或已禁用，则不会将此数据发送到 Microsoft。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11338">If [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) or [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) is Not Configured or Disabled, this data will not be sent to Microsoft.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11339">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11339">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11340">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11340">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11341">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11341">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11342">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11342">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11343">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11343">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11344">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11344">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11345">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11345">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11346">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11346">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11347">GP 唯一名称：SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11347">GP unique name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11348">GP 名称：发送站点信息以改进 Microsoft 服务（过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11348">GP name: Send site information to improve Microsoft services (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11349">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11349">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11350">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11350">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11351">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11351">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11352">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11352">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11353">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11353">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11354">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11354">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11355">值名称：SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11355">Value Name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11356">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11356">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11357">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11357">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11358">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11358">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11359">首选项项名称：SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11359">Preference Key Name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11360">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11360">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11361">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11361">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sensorsallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11362">SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11362">SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-access-to-sensors-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11363">允许访问特定网站上的传感器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11363">Allow access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11364">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11364">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11365">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11365">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11366">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11366">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11367">基于 URL 模式，定义一个可访问并使用诸如运动和光传感器等传感器的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11367">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can access and use sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11368">如果未配置此策略，则所有网站都将使用 [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) 策略中的全局默认值（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11368">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11369">对于与此策略不匹配的 URL 模式，将使用以下优先级顺序：[SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) 策略（如果有匹配）、[DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) 策略（如果已设置）或用户的个人设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11369">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11370">此策略中定义的 URL 模式与 [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) 策略中配置的不冲突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11370">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11371">不能同时允许和阻止一个 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11371">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11372">有关有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11372">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11373">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11373">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11374">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11374">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11375">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11375">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11376">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11376">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11377">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11377">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11378">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11378">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11379">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11379">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11380">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11380">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11381">GP 唯一名称：SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11381">GP unique name: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11382">GP 名称：允许访问特定网站上的传感器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11382">GP name: Allow access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11383">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11383">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11384">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11384">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11385">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11385">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11386">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11386">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11387">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11387">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11388">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11388">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11389">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11389">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11390">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11390">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11391">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11391">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11392">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11392">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11393">首选项项名称：SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11393">Preference Key Name: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11394">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11394">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="sensorsblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11396">SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11396">SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-access-to-sensors-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11397">阻止访问特定网站上的传感器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11397">Block access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11398">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11398">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11399">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11399">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11400">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11400">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11401">基于 URL 模式，定义一个不能访问运动和光传感器等传感器的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11401">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't access sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11402">如果未配置此策略，则所有网站都将使用 [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) 策略中的全局默认值（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11402">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11403">对于与此策略不匹配的 URL 模式，将使用以下优先级顺序： [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) 策略（如果有匹配）、[DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) 策略（如果已设置）或用户的个人设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11403">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11404">此策略中定义的 URL 模式与 [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) 策略中配置的不冲突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11404">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11405">不能同时允许和阻止一个 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11405">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11406">有关有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11406">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11407">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11407">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11408">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11408">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11409">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11409">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11410">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11410">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11411">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11411">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11412">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11412">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11413">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11413">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11414">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11414">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11415">GP 唯一名称：SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11415">GP unique name: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11416">GP 名称：阻止访问特定网站上的传感器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11416">GP name: Block access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11417">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11417">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11418">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11418">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11419">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11419">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11420">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11420">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11421">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11421">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11422">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11422">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11423">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11423">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11424">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11424">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11425">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11425">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11426">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11426">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11427">首选项项名称：SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11427">Preference Key Name: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11428">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11428">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="serialaskforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11430">SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11430">SerialAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-the-serial-api-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11431">在特定网站上允许串行 API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11431">Allow the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11432">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11432">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11433">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11433">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11434">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11434">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11435">根据 URL 模式定义可要求用户授予串行端口访问权限的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11435">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can ask the user for access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11436">如果未配置此策略，则所有网站都将使用 [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) 策略中的全局默认值（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11436">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11437">对于与此策略不匹配的 URL 模式，将使用以下优先级顺序：[SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) 策略（如果有匹配）、[DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) 策略（如果已设置）或用户的个人设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11437">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11438">此策略中定义的 URL 模式与 [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) 策略中配置的不冲突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11438">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11439">不能同时允许和阻止一个 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11439">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11440">有关有效 url 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11440">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11441">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11441">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11442">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11442">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11443">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11443">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11444">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11444">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11445">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11445">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11446">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11446">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11447">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11447">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11448">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11448">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11449">GP 唯一名称：SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11449">GP unique name: SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11450">GP 名称：在特定网站上允许串行 API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11450">GP name: Allow the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11451">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11451">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11452">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11452">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11453">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11453">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11454">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11454">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11455">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11455">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11456">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11456">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11457">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11457">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11458">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11458">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11459">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11459">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11460">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11460">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11461">首选项项名称：SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11461">Preference Key Name: SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11462">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11462">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11463">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11463">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="serialblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11464">SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11464">SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-the-serial-api-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11465">在特定网站上阻止串行 API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11465">Block the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11466">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11466">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11467">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11467">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11468">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11468">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11469">根据 URL 模式定义不能要求用户授予串行端口访问权限的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11469">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't ask the user to grant them access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11470">如果未配置此策略，则所有网站都将使用 [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) 策略中的全局默认值（如果已设置）或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11470">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11471">对于与此策略不匹配的 URL 模式，将使用以下优先级顺序：[SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) 策略（如果有匹配）、[DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) 策略（如果已设置）或用户的个人设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11471">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11472">此策略中的 URL 模式不能与 [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) 策略中配置的 URL 模式冲突。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11472">The URL patterns in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11473">不能同时允许和阻止一个 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11473">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11474">有关有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11474">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11475">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11475">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11476">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11476">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11477">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11477">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11478">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11478">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11479">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11479">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11480">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11480">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11481">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11481">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11482">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11482">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11483">GP 唯一名称：SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11483">GP unique name: SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11484">GP 名称：在特定网站上阻止串行 API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11484">GP name: Block the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11485">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11485">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11486">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11486">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11487">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11487">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11488">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11488">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11489">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11489">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11490">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11490">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11491">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11491">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11492">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11492">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11493">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11493">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11494">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11494">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11495">首选项项名称：SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11495">Preference Key Name: SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11496">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11496">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11497">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11497">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sharedarraybufferunrestrictedaccessallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11498">SharedArrayBufferUnrestrictedAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11498">SharedArrayBufferUnrestrictedAccessAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="specifies-whether-sharedarraybuffers-can-be-used-in-a-non-cross-origin-isolated-context"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11499">指定是否可以在非跨源隔离环境中使用 SharedArrayBuffers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11499">Specifies whether SharedArrayBuffers can be used in a non cross-origin-isolated context</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11500">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11500">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11501">自 91 或更高版本起，在 Windows 和 macOS 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11501">On Windows and macOS since 91 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11502">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11502">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11503">指定是否可以在非跨源隔离环境中使用 SharedArrayBuffers。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11503">Specifies whether SharedArrayBuffers can be used in a non cross-origin-isolated context.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11504">SharedArrayBuffer 是一个二进制数据缓冲区，可用于在共享内存上创建视图。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11504">A SharedArrayBuffer is a binary data buffer that can be used to create views on shared memory.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11505">SharedArrayBuffers 在几个常用 CPU 中具有内存访问漏洞。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11505">SharedArrayBuffers have a memory access vulnerability in several popular CPUs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11506">如果启用此策略，则允许网站使用 SharedArrayBuffers。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11506">If you enable this policy, sites are allowed to use SharedArrayBuffers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11507">如果禁用或不配置此策略，网站将被阻止使用 SharedArrayBuffers。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11507">If you disable or don't configure this policy, sites are prevented from using SharedArrayBuffers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11508">Microsoft Edge 91 及以上版本使用 SharedArrayBuffers 时，出于 Web 兼容性原因，Microsoft Edge 需要跨源隔离。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11508">Microsoft Edge will require cross-origin isolation when using SharedArrayBuffers from Microsoft Edge 91 onward for Web Compatibility reasons.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11509">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11509">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11510">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11510">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11511">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11511">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11512">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11512">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11513">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11513">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11514">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11514">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11515">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11515">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11516">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11516">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11517">GP 唯一名称：SharedArrayBufferUnrestrictedAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11517">GP unique name: SharedArrayBufferUnrestrictedAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11518">GP 名称：指定是否可以在非跨源隔离环境中使用 SharedArrayBuffers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11518">GP name: Specifies whether SharedArrayBuffers can be used in a non cross-origin-isolated context</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11519">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11519">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11520">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11520">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11521">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11521">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11522">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11522">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11523">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11523">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11524">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11524">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11525">值名称：SharedArrayBufferUnrestrictedAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11525">Value Name: SharedArrayBufferUnrestrictedAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11526">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11526">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11527">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11527">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11528">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11528">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11529">首选项项名称：SharedArrayBufferUnrestrictedAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11529">Preference Key Name: SharedArrayBufferUnrestrictedAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11530">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11530">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11531">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11531">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="showmicrosoftrewards"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11532">ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11532">ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-microsoft-rewards-experiences"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11533">展示 Microsoft Rewards体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11533">Show Microsoft Rewards experiences</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11534">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11534">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11535">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自88或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11535">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11536">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11536">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11537">显示Microsoft Rewards体验和通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11537">Show Microsoft Rewards experience and notifications.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11538">如果启用此策略：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11538">If you enable this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11539">搜索和赢得市场中的Windows账户用户（不包括Azure AD账户）将在其Microsoft Edge用户资料中看到Microsoft Rewards体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11539">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11540">在 Microsoft Edge 设置中启用 Microsoft Rewards 的设置将被启用，并处于开启状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11540">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be enabled and toggled on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11541">如果禁用此策略：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11541">If you disable this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11542">搜索和赢得市场中的Windows账户用户（不包括Azure AD账户）将在其Microsoft Edge用户资料中不会看到Microsoft Rewards体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11542">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will not see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11543">在Microsoft Edge设置中启用Microsoft Rewards 的设置将被禁用，并处于关闭状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11543">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be disabled and toggled off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11544">如果未配置此策略：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11544">If you don't configure this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11545">搜索和赢得市场中的Windows账户用户（不包括Azure AD账户）将在其Microsoft Edge用户资料中看到 Microsoft Rewards 体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11545">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11546">在 Microsoft Edge 设置中启用 Microsoft Rewards 的设置将被启用，并处于开启状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11546">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be enabled and toggled on.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11547">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11547">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11548">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11548">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11549">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11549">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11550">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11550">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11551">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11551">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11552">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11552">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11553">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11553">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11554">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11554">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11555">GP 唯一名称： ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11555">GP unique name: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11556">GP 名称：展示 Microsoft Rewards 体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11556">GP name: Show Microsoft Rewards experiences</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11557">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11557">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11558">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11558">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11559">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11559">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11560">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11560">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11561">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11561">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11562">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11562">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11563">值名称： ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11563">Value Name: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11564">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11564">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11565">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11565">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11566">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11566">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11567">首选键名称： ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11567">Preference Key Name: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11568">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11568">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="showofficeshortcutinfavoritesbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11570">ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11570">ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-microsoft-office-shortcut-in-favorites-bar-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11571">在收藏夹栏中显示 Microsoft Office 快捷方式（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11571">Show Microsoft Office shortcut in favorites bar (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11572">已弃用：此策略已弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11572">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11573">当前受支持，但将在未来的版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11573">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11574">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11574">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11575">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11575">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11576">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11576">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11577">由于操作要求的更改，此策略未按预期工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11577">This policy didn't work as expected due to changes in operational requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11578">因此，它已弃用，不应使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11578">Therefore it's deprecated and should not be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11579">指定是否在收藏夹栏中包含 Office.com 的快捷方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11579">Specifies whether to include a shortcut to Office.com in the favorites bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11580">对于已登录到 Microsoft Edge 的用户，快捷方式会将用户带到其 Microsoft Office 应用和文档。如果启用或未配置此策略，用户可以通过在收藏夹栏上下文菜单中更改切换来选择是否要查看快捷方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11580">For users signed into Microsoft Edge the shortcut takes users to their Microsoft Office apps and docs. If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can choose whether to see the shortcut by changing the toggle in the favorites bar context menu.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11581">如果禁用此策略，则不会显示快捷方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11581">If you disable this policy, the shortcut isn't shown.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11582">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11582">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11583">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11583">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11584">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11584">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11585">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11585">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11586">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11586">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11587">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11587">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11588">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11588">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11589">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11589">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11590">GP 唯一名称：ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11590">GP unique name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11591">GP 名称：在收藏夹栏中显示 Microsoft Office 快捷方式（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11591">GP name: Show Microsoft Office shortcut in favorites bar (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11592">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11592">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11593">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11593">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11594">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11594">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11595">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11595">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11596">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11596">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11597">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11597">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11598">值名称：ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11598">Value Name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11599">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11599">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11600">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11600">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11601">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11601">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11602">首选项项名称：ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11602">Preference Key Name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11603">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11603">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11604">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11604">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="showrecommendationsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11605">ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11605">ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-recommendations-and-promotional-notifications-from-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11606">允许来自 Microsoft Edge 的建议和促销通知</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11606">Allow recommendations and promotional notifications from Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11607">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11607">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11608">自 89 或更高版本起，在 Windows 和 macOS 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11608">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11609">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11609">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11610">通过此策略设置，你可以决定员工是否应该从 Microsoft Edge 接收建议和产品内帮助通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11610">This policy setting lets you decide whether employees should receive recommendations and in-product assistance notifications from Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11611">如果启用或不配置此设置，则员工将收到来自 Microsoft Edge 的建议/通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11611">If you enable or don't configure this setting, employees receive recommendations / notifications from Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11612">如果禁用此设置，则员工不会从 Microsoft Edge 收到任何建议/通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11612">If you disable this setting, employees will not receive any recommendations / notifications from Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11613">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11613">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11614">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11614">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11615">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11615">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11616">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11616">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11617">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11617">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11618">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11618">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11619">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11619">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11620">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11620">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11621">GP 唯一名称：ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11621">GP unique name: ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11622">GP 名称：允许来自 Microsoft Edge 的建议和促销通知</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11622">GP name: Allow recommendations and promotional notifications from Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11623">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11623">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11624">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11624">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11625">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11625">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11626">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11626">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11627">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11627">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11628">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11628">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11629">值名称：ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11629">Value Name: ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11630">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11630">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11631">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11631">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11632">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11632">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11633">首选项项名称：ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11633">Preference Key Name: ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11634">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11634">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11635">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11635">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="signedhttpexchangeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11636">SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11636">SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
