  #### <a name="enable-signed-http-exchange-sxg-support"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11637">启用签名的 HTTP Exchange (SXG) 支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11637">Enable Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) support</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11638">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11638">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11639">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11639">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11640">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11640">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11641">启用对签名的 HTTP Exchange (SXG) 的支持。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11641">Enable support for Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11642">如果未设置或启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将接受作为签名的 HTTP Exchange 提供 Web 内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11642">If this policy isn't set or enabled, Microsoft Edge will accept web contents served as Signed HTTP Exchanges.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11643">如果此策略设置为禁用，则无法加载签名的 HTTP Exchange。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11643">If this policy is set to disabled, Signed HTTP Exchanges can't be loaded.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11644">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11644">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11645">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11645">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11646">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11646">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11647">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11647">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11648">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11648">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11649">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11649">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11650">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11650">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11651">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11651">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11652">GP 唯一名称：SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11652">GP unique name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11653">GP 名称：启用签名的 HTTP Exchange (SXG) 支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11653">GP name: Enable Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) support</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11654">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11654">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11655">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11655">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11656">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11656">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11657">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11657">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11658">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11658">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11659">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11659">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11660">值名称：SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11660">Value Name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11661">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11661">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11662">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11662">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11663">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11663">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11664">首选项项名称：SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11664">Preference Key Name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11665">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11665">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11666">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11666">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="siteperprocess"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11667">SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11667">SitePerProcess</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-site-isolation-for-every-site"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11668">对每个网站启用网站隔离</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11668">Enable site isolation for every site</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11669">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11669">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11670">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11670">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11671">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11671">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11672">“SitePerProcess”策略可用于防止用户选择退出默认行为，即隔离所有网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11672">The 'SitePerProcess' policy can be used to prevent users from opting out of the default behavior of isolating all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11673">请注意，也可以使用 [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) 策略来隔离其他更精细的来源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11673">Note that you can also use the [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) policy to isolate additional, finer-grained origins.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11674">如果启用此策略，则用户不能选择退出默认行为，即每个网站在其自己的进程中运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11674">If you enable this policy, users can't opt out of the default behavior where each site runs in its own process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11675">如果禁用或未配置此策略，用户可以选择退出网站隔离。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11675">If you disable or don't configure this policy, a user can opt out of site isolation.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11676">（例如，通过使用 edge://flags 中的“禁用网站隔离”条目。）禁用或未配置该策略不会关闭网站隔离。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11676">(For example, by using "Disable site isolation" entry in edge://flags.)  Disabling the policy or not configuring the policy doesn't turn off Site Isolation.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11677">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11677">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11678">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11678">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11679">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11679">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11680">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11680">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11681">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11681">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11682">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11682">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11683">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11683">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11684">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11684">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11685">GP 唯一名称：SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11685">GP unique name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11686">GP 名称：对每个网站启用网站隔离</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11686">GP name: Enable site isolation for every site</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11687">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11687">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11688">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11688">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11689">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11689">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11690">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11690">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11691">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11691">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11692">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11692">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11693">值名称：SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11693">Value Name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11694">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11694">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11695">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11695">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11696">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11696">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11697">首选项项名称：SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11697">Preference Key Name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11698">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11698">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11699">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11699">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="smartactionsblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11700">SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11700">SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-smart-actions-for-a-list-of-services"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11701">阻止对服务列表执行智能操作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11701">Block smart actions for a list of services</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11702">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11702">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11703">自 89 或更高版本起，在 Windows 和 macOS 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11703">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11704">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11704">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11705">列出不显示智能操作的特定服务，如 PDF。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11705">List specific services, such as PDFs, that don't show smart actions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11706">(智能操作时诸如“定义”之类的操作，它们在 Microsoft Edge 中的完整和迷你上下文菜单中可用。)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11706">(Smart actions are actions like "define" which are available in full and mini context menus in Microsoft Edge.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11707">如果启用策略：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11707">If you enable the policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11708">对于与给定列表匹配的服务的所有配置文件，将禁用迷你和完整上下文菜单中的智能操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11708">The smart action in the mini and full context menu will be disabled for all profiles for services that match the given list.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11709">对于与给定列表匹配的服务，用户将在文本选择时在迷你和完整上下文菜单中看到智能操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11709">Users will not see the smart action in the mini and full context menu on text selection for services that match the given list.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11710">在 Microsoft Edge 设置中，对于与给定列表匹配的服务，将迷你和完整上下文菜单中的智能操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11710">In Microsoft Edge settings, the smart action in the mini and full context menu will be disabled for services that match the given list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11711">如果禁用或未配置此策略：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11711">If you disable or don't configure this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11712">对于所有配置文件，将启用迷你和完整上下文菜单中的智能操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11712">The smart action in the mini and full context menu will be enabled for all profiles.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11713">用户将在文本选择时在迷你和完整上下文菜单中看到智能操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11713">Users will see the smart action in the mini and full context menu on text selection.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11714">在 Microsoft Edge 设置中，将启用迷你和完整上下文菜单中的智能操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11714">In Microsoft Edge settings, the smart action in the mini and full context menu will be enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11715">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11715">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11716">smart_actions_pdf (smart_actions_pdf) = PDF 中的智能操作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11716">smart_actions_pdf (smart_actions_pdf) = Smart actions in PDF</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11717">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11717">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11718">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11718">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11719">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11719">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11720">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11720">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11721">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11721">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11722">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11722">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11723">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11723">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11724">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11724">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11725">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11725">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11726">GP 唯一名称：SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11726">GP unique name: SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11727">GP 名称：阻止对服务列表执行智能操作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11727">GP name: Block smart actions for a list of services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11728">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11728">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11729">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11729">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11730">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11730">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11731">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11731">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11732">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11732">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11733">路径（建议）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11733">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11734">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11734">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11735">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11735">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11736">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11736">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartActionsBlockList\1 = "smart_actions_pdf"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11737">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11737">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11738">首选项键名称：SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11738">Preference Key Name: SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11739">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11739">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>smart_actions_pdf</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11740">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11740">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="speechrecognitionenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11741">SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11741">SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-speech-recognition"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11742">Configure Speech Recognition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11742">Configure Speech Recognition</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11743">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11743">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11744">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自87或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11744">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11745">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11745">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11746">设置网站是否可以使用 W3C Web Speech API 识别来自用户的语音。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11746">Set whether websites can use the W3C Web Speech API to recognize speech from the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11747">Microsoft Edge 的 Web 语音 API 实现使用 Azure 认知服务，因此语音数据将离开该计算机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11747">The Microsoft Edge implementation of the Web Speech API uses Azure Cognitive Services, so voice data will leave the machine.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11748">如果启用或未配置此策略，则使用 Web 语音 API 的基于 web 的应用程序可以使用语音识别。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11748">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web-based applications that use the Web Speech API can use Speech Recognition.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11749">如果禁用此策略，则无法通过 Web Speech API 获取语音识别。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11749">If you disable this policy, Speech Recognition is not available through the Web Speech API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11750">在此处阅读有关此功能的更多信息：SpeechRecognition API：[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388) 认知服务：[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11750">Read more about this feature here: SpeechRecognition API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11751">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11751">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11752">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11752">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11753">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11753">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11754">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11754">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11755">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11755">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11756">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11756">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11757">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11757">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11758">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11758">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11759">GP unique name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11759">GP unique name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11760">GP name: Configure Speech Recognition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11760">GP name: Configure Speech Recognition</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11761">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11761">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11762">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11762">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11763">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11763">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11764">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11764">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11765">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11765">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11766">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11766">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11767">Value Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11767">Value Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11768">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11768">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11769">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11769">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11770">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11770">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11771">Preference Key Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11771">Preference Key Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11772">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11772">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11773">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11773">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="spellcheckenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11774">SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11774">SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-spellcheck"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11775">启用拼写检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11775">Enable spellcheck</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11776">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11776">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11777">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11777">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11778">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11778">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11779">如果启用或未配置此策略，用户可以使用拼写检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11779">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the user can use spellcheck.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11780">如果禁用此策略，用户将无法使用拼写检查，并且 [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) 和 [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) 策略也将被禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11780">If you disable this policy, the user can't use spellcheck and the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) and [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) policies are also disabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11781">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11781">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11782">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11782">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11783">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11783">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11784">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11784">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11785">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11785">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11786">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11786">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11787">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11787">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11788">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11788">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11789">GP 唯一名称：SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11789">GP unique name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11790">GP 名称：启用拼写检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11790">GP name: Enable spellcheck</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11791">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11791">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11792">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11792">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11793">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11793">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11794">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11794">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11795">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11795">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11796">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11796">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11797">值名称：SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11797">Value Name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11798">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11798">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11799">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11799">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11800">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11800">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11801">首选项项名称：SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11801">Preference Key Name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11802">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11802">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11803">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11803">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="spellchecklanguage"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11804">SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11804">SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-specific-spellcheck-languages"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11805">启用特定拼写检查语言</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11805">Enable specific spellcheck languages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11806">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11806">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11807">在 Windows 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11807">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11808">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11808">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11809">启用不同的拼写检查语言。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11809">Enables different languages for spellcheck.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11810">你指定的任何无法识别的语言都将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11810">Any language that you specify that isn't recognized is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11811">如果启用此策略，则会为指定的语言以及用户启用的任何语言启用拼写检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11811">If you enable this policy, spellcheck is enabled for the languages specified, as well as any languages the user has enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11812">如果未配置或禁用此策略，则用户的拼写检查首选项不会发生任何更改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11812">If you don't configure or disable this policy, there's no change to the user's spellcheck preferences.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11813">如果禁用了 [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) 策略，则此策略将不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11813">If the [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) policy is disabled, this policy will have no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11814">如果“SpellcheckLanguage”和 [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) 策略中同时包含某种语言，则将启用该拼写检查语言。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11814">If a language is included in both the 'SpellcheckLanguage' and the [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) policy, the spellcheck language is enabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11815">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11815">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11816">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11816">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11817">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11817">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11818">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11818">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11819">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11819">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11820">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11820">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11821">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11821">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11822">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11822">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11823">GP 唯一名称：SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11823">GP unique name: SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11824">GP 名称：启用特定拼写检查语言</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11824">GP name: Enable specific spellcheck languages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11825">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11825">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11826">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11826">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11827">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11827">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11828">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11828">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11829">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11829">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11830">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11830">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11831">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11831">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11832">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11832">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11833">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11833">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\1 = "fr"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\2 = "es"

```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11834">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11834">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="spellchecklanguageblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11835">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11835">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-disable-spellcheck-languages"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11836">强制禁用拼写检查语言</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11836">Force disable spellcheck languages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11837">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11837">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11838">在 Windows 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11838">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11839">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11839">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11840">强制禁用拼写检查语言。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11840">Force-disables spellcheck languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11841">该列表中无法识别的语言将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11841">Unrecognized languages in that list will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11842">如果启用此策略，将对指定的语言禁用拼写检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11842">If you enable this policy, spellcheck will be disabled for the languages specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11843">用户仍可以对列表中未包含的语言启用或禁用拼写检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11843">The user can still enable or disable spellcheck for languages not in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11844">如果未设置或禁用此策略，用户的拼写检查首选项将不会发生任何更改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11844">If you do not set this policy, or disable it, there will be no change to the user's spellcheck preferences.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11845">如果 [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) 策略设置为禁用，则此策略将不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11845">If the [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) policy is set to disabled, this policy will have no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11846">如果 [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) 和“SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist”策略中同时包含某种语言，则将启用该拼写检查语言。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11846">If a language is included in both the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) and the 'SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist' policy, the spellcheck language is enabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11847">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11847">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11848">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11848">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11849">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11849">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11850">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11850">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11851">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11851">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11852">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11852">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11853">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11853">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11854">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11854">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11855">GP 唯一名称：SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11855">GP unique name: SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11856">GP 名称：强制禁用拼写检查语言</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11856">GP name: Force disable spellcheck languages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11857">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11857">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11858">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11858">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11859">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11859">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11860">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11860">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11861">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11861">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11862">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11862">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11863">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11863">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11864">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11864">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11865">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11865">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\1 = "fr"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\2 = "es"

```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11866">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11866">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="strictermixedcontenttreatmentenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11867">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11867">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-stricter-treatment-for-mixed-content-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11868">对混合内容启用更严格的处理（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11868">Enable stricter treatment for mixed content (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11869">已过时：此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 84 后将无法正常工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11869">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11870">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11870">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11871">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 81 开始，直到 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11871">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 84</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11872">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11872">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11873">此策略不起作用，因为它只是一种短期机制，如果发现企业的 web 内容与更严格的混合内容处理不兼容，它将为企业提供更多时间来更新其 we b内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11873">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if it was found to be incompatible with stricter mixed content treatment.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11874">此策略控制浏览器中混合内容（HTTPS 网站中的 HTTP 内容）的处理。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11874">This policy controls the treatment for mixed content (HTTP content in HTTPS sites) in the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11875">如果将此策略设置为 true 或未设置此策略，则音频和视频混合内容将自动升级到 HTTPS（即，URL 将重写为 HTTPS，如果资源不能通过 HTTPS 提供，则不会回退），并且 URL 栏中将对图像混合内容显示“不安全”警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11875">If you set this policy to true or not set, audio and video mixed content will be automatically upgraded to HTTPS (that is, the URL will be rewritten as HTTPS, without a fallback if the resource isn't available over HTTPS) and a 'Not Secure' warning will be shown in the URL bar for image mixed content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11876">如果将该策略设置为 false，则音频和视频的自动升级将被禁用，并且不会显示图像的警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11876">If you set the policy to false, auto upgrades will be disabled for audio and video, and no warning will be shown for images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11877">此策略不会影响音频、视频和图像以外其他类型的混合内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11877">This policy does not affect other types of mixed content other than audio, video, and images.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11878">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11878">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11879">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11879">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11880">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11880">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11881">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11881">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11882">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11882">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11883">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11883">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11884">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11884">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11885">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11885">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11886">GP 唯一名称：StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11886">GP unique name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11887">GP 名称：对混合内容启用更严格的处理（过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11887">GP name: Enable stricter treatment for mixed content (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11888">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11888">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11889">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11889">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11890">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11890">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11891">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11891">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11892">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11892">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11893">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11893">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11894">值名称：StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11894">Value Name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11895">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11895">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11896">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11896">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11897">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11897">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11898">首选项项名称：StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11898">Preference Key Name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11899">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11899">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11900">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11900">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="suppressunsupportedoswarning"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11901">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11901">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>

  #### <a name="suppress-the-unsupported-os-warning"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11902">禁止对不支持的操作系统显示警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11902">Suppress the unsupported OS warning</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11903">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11903">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11904">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11904">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11905">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11905">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11906">禁止当 Microsoft Edge 在不再受支持的计算机或操作系统上运行时出现的警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11906">Suppresses the warning that appears when Microsoft Edge is running on a computer or operating system that is no longer supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11907">如果此策略为 false 或未设置，则警告将出现在这些不受支持的计算机或操作系统上。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11907">If this policy is false or unset, the warnings will appear on such unsupported computers or operating systems.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11908">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11908">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11909">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11909">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11910">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11910">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11911">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11911">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11912">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11912">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11913">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11913">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11914">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11914">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11915">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11915">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11916">GP 唯一名称：SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11916">GP unique name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11917">GP 名称：禁止对不支持的操作系统显示警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11917">GP name: Suppress the unsupported OS warning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11918">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11918">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11919">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11919">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11920">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11920">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11921">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11921">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11922">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11922">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11923">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11923">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11924">值名称：SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11924">Value Name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11925">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11925">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11926">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11926">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11927">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11927">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11928">首选项项名称：SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11928">Preference Key Name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11929">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11929">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11930">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11930">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="syncdisabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11931">SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11931">SyncDisabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-synchronization-of-data-using-microsoft-sync-services"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11932">禁止使用 Microsoft 同步服务进行数据同步</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11932">Disable synchronization of data using Microsoft sync services</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11933">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11933">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11934">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11934">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11935">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11935">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11936">禁用 Microsoft Edge 中的数据同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11936">Disables data synchronization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11937">此策略还可防止出现同步许可提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11937">This policy also prevents the sync consent prompt from appearing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11938">此策略仅禁用云同步，并且对 [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) 策略没有影响。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11938">This policy disables cloud synchronization only and has no impact on the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11939">如果未设置此策略或未按建议应用此策略，用户将能够打开或关闭同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11939">If you don't set this policy or apply it as recommended, users will be able to turn sync on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11940">如果将此策略应用为强制，用户将无法打开同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11940">If you apply this policy as mandatory, users will not be able to turn sync on.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11941">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11941">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11942">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11942">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11943">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11943">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11944">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11944">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11945">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11945">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11946">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11946">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11947">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11947">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11948">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11948">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11949">GP 唯一名称：SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11949">GP unique name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11950">GP 名称：禁止使用 Microsoft 同步服务进行数据同步</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11950">GP name: Disable synchronization of data using Microsoft sync services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11951">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11951">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11952">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11952">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11953">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11953">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11954">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11954">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11955">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11955">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11956">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11956">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11957">值名称：SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11957">Value Name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11958">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11958">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11959">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11959">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11960">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11960">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11961">首选项项名称：SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11961">Preference Key Name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11962">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11962">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11963">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11963">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="synctypeslistdisabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11964">SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11964">SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-types-that-are-excluded-from-synchronization"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11965">配置从同步中排除的类型列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11965">Configure the list of types that are excluded from synchronization</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11966">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11966">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11967">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 83 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11967">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11968">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11968">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11969">如果启用此策略，则所有指定的数据类型都将从同步中排除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11969">If you enable this policy all the specified data types will be excluded from synchronization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11970">此策略可用于限制上传到 Microsoft Edge 同步服务的数据类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11970">This policy can be used to limit the type of data uploaded to the Microsoft Edge synchronization service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11971">可为此策略提供以下数据类型之一：“favorites”、“settings”、“passwords”、“addressesAndMore”、“extensions”、“history”、“openTabs”和“collections”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11971">You can provide one of the following data types for this policy: "favorites", "settings", "passwords", "addressesAndMore", "extensions", "history", "openTabs", and "collections".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11972">请注意，这些数据类型名称区分大小写。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11972">Note that these data type names are case sensitive.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11973">用户将无法替代已禁用的数据类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11973">Users will not be able to override the disabled data types.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11974">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11974">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11975">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11975">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11976">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11976">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11977">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11977">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11978">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11978">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11979">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11979">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11980">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11980">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11981">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11981">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11982">GP 唯一名称：SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11982">GP unique name: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11983">GP 名称：配置从同步中排除的类型列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11983">GP name: Configure the list of types that are excluded from synchronization</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11984">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11984">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11985">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11985">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11986">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11986">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11987">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11987">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11988">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11988">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11989">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11989">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11990">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11990">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11991">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11991">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11992">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11992">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled\1 = "favorites"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11993">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11993">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11994">首选项项名称：SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11994">Preference Key Name: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11995">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11995">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>favorites</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11996">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11996">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="tls13hardeningforlocalanchorsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11997">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11997">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-a-tls-13-security-feature-for-local-trust-anchors-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11998">为本地信任密钥启用 TLS 1.3 安全功能（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11998">Enable a TLS 1.3 security feature for local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-11999">已过时：该策略已过时，Microsoft Edge 版本 85 后将无法正常工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-11999">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 85.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12000">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12000">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12001">在 Windows 和 macOS 上，自 81 起至 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12001">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 85</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12002">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12002">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12003">此策略不起作用，因为它仅作为一种短期机制提供，目的是让企业有更多时间升级受影响的代理。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12003">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to upgrade affected proxies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12004">此策略控制 TLS 1.3 中保护连接免受降级攻击的安全功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12004">This policy controls a security feature in TLS 1.3 that protects connections against downgrade attacks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12005">它向后兼容，不会影响与符合 TLS 1.2 的服务器或代理的连接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12005">It is backwards-compatible and will not affect connections to compliant TLS 1.2 servers or proxies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12006">但是，某些 TLS 拦截代理的旧版本存在实现缺陷，导致它们不兼容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12006">However, older versions of some TLS-intercepting proxies have an implementation flaw which causes them to be incompatible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12007">如果启用或未设置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将为所有连接启用这些安全保护。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12007">If you enable this policy or don't set it, Microsoft Edge will enable these security protections for all connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12008">如果禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将对使用本地安装的 CA 证书进行身份验证的连接禁用这些安全保护。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12008">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will disable these security protections for connections authenticated with locally-installed CA certificates.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12009">对于通过公共信任的 CA 证书进行身份验证的连接，始终启用这些保护。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12009">These protections are always enabled for connections authenticated with publicly-trusted CA certificates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12010">此策略可用于测试任何受影响的代理并对其进行升级。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12010">This policy can be used to test for any affected proxies and upgrade them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12011">受影响的代理预期会连接失败，并且出现错误代码 ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12011">Affected proxies are expected to fail connections with an error code of ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12012">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12012">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12013">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12013">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12014">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12014">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12015">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12015">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12016">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12016">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12017">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12017">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12018">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12018">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12019">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12019">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12020">GP 唯一名称：TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12020">GP unique name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12021">GP 名称：为本地信任密钥启用 TLS 1.3 安全功能（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12021">GP name: Enable a TLS 1.3 security feature for local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12022">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12022">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12023">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12023">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12024">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12024">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12025">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12025">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12026">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12026">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12027">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12027">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12028">值名称：TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12028">Value Name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12029">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12029">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12030">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12030">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12031">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12031">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12032">首选项项名称：TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12032">Preference Key Name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12033">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12033">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12034">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12034">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="tlsciphersuitedenylist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12035">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12035">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-the-tls-cipher-suites-to-disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12036">指定要禁用的 TLS 密码套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12036">Specify the TLS cipher suites to disable</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12037">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12037">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12038">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 85 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12038">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12039">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12039">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12040">配置针对 TLS 连接禁用的密码套件的列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12040">Configure the list of cipher suites that are disabled for TLS connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12041">如果配置了此策略，建立 TLS 连接时将不会使用配置的密码套件列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12041">If you configure this policy, the list of configured cipher suites will not be used when establishing TLS connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12042">如果未配置此策略，浏览器将选择要使用的 TLS 密码套件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12042">If you don't configure this policy, the browser will choose which TLS cipher suites to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12043">密码套件值将被指定为十六进制值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12043">Cipher suite values to be disabled are specified as 16-bit hexadecimal values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12044">这些值由 Internet 分配的号码核证机关（IANA）注册表分配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12044">The values are assigned by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) registry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12045">Tls 1.3 所需的 TLS 1.3 密码套件 TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 （0x1301），此策略无法禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12045">The TLS 1.3 cipher suite TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 (0x1301) is required for TLS 1.3 and can't be disabled by this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12046">此策略不会影响基于 QUIC 的连接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12046">This policy does not affect QUIC-based connections.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12047">可通过[QuicAllowed](#quicallowed)策略关闭 QUIC。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12047">QUIC can be turned off via the [QuicAllowed](#quicallowed) policy.</span></span>
