  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12048">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12048">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12049">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12049">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12050">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12050">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12051">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12051">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12052">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12052">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12053">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12053">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12054">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12054">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12055">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12055">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12056">GP 唯一名称： TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12056">GP unique name: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12057">GP 名称：指定要禁用的 TLS 密码套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12057">GP name: Specify the TLS cipher suites to disable</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12058">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12058">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12059">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12059">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12060">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12060">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12061">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12061">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12062">路径(强制) :SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12062">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12063">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12063">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12064">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12064">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12065">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12065">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12066">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12066">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\1 = "0x1303"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\2 = "0xcca8"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\3 = "0xcca9"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12067">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12067">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12068">首选参数名称： TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12068">Preference Key Name: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12069">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12069">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>0x1303</string>
  <string>0xcca8</string>
  <string>0xcca9</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12070">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12070">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="tabfreezingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12071">TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12071">TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-freezing-of-background-tabs-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12072">允许冻结后台选项卡（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12072">Allow freezing of background tabs (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12073">已过时：此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 86 后将无法工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12073">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 86.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12074">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12074">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12075">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 79 开始，直到 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12075">On Windows and macOS since 79, until 86</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12076">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12076">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12077">此策略无法工作，使用 [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) 代替。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12077">This policy doesn't work, use [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12078">控制 Microsoft Edge 是否可以将后台的选项卡冻结至少 5 分钟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12078">Controls whether Microsoft Edge can freeze tabs that are in the background for at least 5 minutes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12079">选项卡冻结可减少 CPU、电池和内存使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12079">Tab freezing reduces CPU, battery, and memory usage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12080">Microsoft Edge 使用启发式技术来避免冻结在后台执行有用工作的选项卡，例如显示通知、播放声音和流式传输视频。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12080">Microsoft Edge uses heuristics to avoid freezing tabs that do useful work in the background, such as display notifications, play sound, and stream video.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12081">如果启用或未配置此策略，则已在后台至少 5 分钟的选项卡可能会被冻结。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12081">If you enable or don't configure this policy, tabs that have been in the background for at least 5 minutes might be frozen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12082">如果禁用此策略，则不会冻结任何选项卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12082">If you disable this policy, no tabs will be frozen.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12083">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12083">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12084">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12084">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12085">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12085">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12086">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12086">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12087">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12087">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12088">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12088">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12089">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12089">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12090">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12090">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12091">GP 唯一名称：TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12091">GP unique name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12092">GP 名称：允许冻结后台选项卡 (已过时)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12092">GP name: Allow freezing of background tabs (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12093">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板 /Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12093">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12094">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12094">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12095">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12095">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12096">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12096">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12097">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12097">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12098">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12098">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12099">值名称：TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12099">Value Name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12100">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12100">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12101">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12101">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12102">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12102">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12103">首选项项名称：TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12103">Preference Key Name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12104">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12104">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12105">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12105">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="targetblankimpliesnoopener"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12106">TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12106">TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>

  #### <a name="do-not-set-windowopener-for-links-targeting-_blank"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12107">不要为面向 _blank 的链接设置 window.opener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12107">Do not set window.opener for links targeting _blank</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12108">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12108">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12109">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自88或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12109">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12110">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12110">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12111">如果启用或不设置此策略，则 window.opener 属性设置为 null，除非锚点指定 rel=“opener”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12111">If you enable this policy or leave it unset, the window.opener property is set to null unless the anchor specifies rel="opener".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12112">如果禁用此策略，则目标 _blank 的弹出窗口可以通过 JavaScript (访问) 打开该弹出窗口的页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12112">If you disable this policy, popups that target _blank are permitted to access (via JavaScript) the page that requested to open the popup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12113">此策略将在 Microsoft Edge 版本 95 中过时。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12113">This policy will be obsoleted in Microsoft Edge version 95.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12114">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12114">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12115">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12115">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12116">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12116">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12117">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12117">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12118">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12118">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12119">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12119">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12120">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12120">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12121">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12121">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12122">GP 唯一名称：TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12122">GP unique name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12123">GP 名称：不要为面向 _blank 的链接设置 window.opener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12123">GP name: Do not set window.opener for links targeting _blank</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12124">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12124">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12125">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12125">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12126">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12126">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12127">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12127">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12128">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12128">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12129">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12129">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12130">值名称：TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12130">Value Name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12131">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12131">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12132">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12132">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12133">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12133">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12134">首选项项名称：TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12134">Preference Key Name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12135">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12135">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12136">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12136">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="taskmanagerendprocessenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12137">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12137">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-ending-processes-in-the-browser-task-manager"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12138">允许在浏览器任务管理器中结束进程</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12138">Enable ending processes in the Browser task manager</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12139">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12139">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12140">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12140">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12141">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12141">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12142">如果启用或未配置此策略，用户可以在浏览器任务管理器中结束进程。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12142">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can end processes in the Browser task manager.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12143">如果禁用该策略，用户将无法结束进程，并且浏览器任务管理器中的“结束进程”按钮将被禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12143">If you disable it, users can't end processes, and the End process button is disabled in the Browser task manager.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12144">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12144">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12145">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12145">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12146">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12146">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12147">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12147">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12148">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12148">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12149">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12149">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12150">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12150">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12151">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12151">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12152">GP 唯一名称：TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12152">GP unique name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12153">GP 名称：允许在浏览器任务管理器中结束进程</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12153">GP name: Enable ending processes in the Browser task manager</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12154">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12154">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12155">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12155">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12156">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12156">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12157">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12157">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12158">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12158">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12159">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12159">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12160">值名称：TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12160">Value Name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12161">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12161">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12162">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12162">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12163">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12163">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12164">首选项项名称：TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12164">Preference Key Name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12165">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12165">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12166">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12166">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="totalmemorylimitmb"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12167">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12167">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-limit-on-megabytes-of-memory-a-single-microsoft-edge-instance-can-use"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12168">设置单个 Microsoft Edge 实例可以使用的内存兆字节限制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12168">Set limit on megabytes of memory a single Microsoft Edge instance can use</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12169">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12169">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12170">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 80 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12170">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12171">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12171">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12172">配置在选项卡开始被丢弃以节省内存之前单个 Microsoft Edge 实例可以使用的内存量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12172">Configures the amount of memory that a single Microsoft Edge instance can use before tabs start getting discarded to save memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12173">该选项卡所使用的内存将被释放，并且在切换到该选项卡时必须重新加载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12173">The memory used by the tab will be freed and the tab will have to be reloaded when switched to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12174">如果启用此策略，一旦超出限制，浏览器将开始丢弃选项卡以节省内存。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12174">If you enable this policy, the browser will start to discard tabs to save memory once the limitation is exceeded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12175">但是，不能保证浏览器始终在限制范围内运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12175">However, there is no guarantee that the browser is always running under the limit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12176">1024 以下的任何值将四舍五入为 1024。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12176">Any value under 1024 will be rounded up to 1024.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12177">如果未设置此策略，则浏览器只会在检测到计算机上的物理内存量不足时尝试节省内存。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12177">If you don't set this policy, the browser will only attempt to save memory when it has detected that the amount of physical memory on its machine is low.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12178">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12178">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12179">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12179">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12180">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12180">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12181">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12181">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12182">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12182">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12183">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12183">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12184">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12184">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12185">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12185">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12186">GP 唯一名称：TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12186">GP unique name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12187">GP 名称：设置单个 Microsoft Edge 实例可以使用的内存兆字节限制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12187">GP name: Set limit on megabytes of memory a single Microsoft Edge instance can use</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12188">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12188">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12189">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12189">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12190">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12190">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12191">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12191">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12192">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12192">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12193">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12193">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12194">值名称：TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12194">Value Name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12195">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12195">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12196">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12196">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000800
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12197">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12197">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12198">首选项项名称：TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12198">Preference Key Name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12199">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12199">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2048</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12200">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12200">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="trackingprevention"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12201">TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12201">TrackingPrevention</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-tracking-of-users-web-browsing-activity"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12202">阻止跟踪用户的 Web 浏览活动</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12202">Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12203">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12203">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12204">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 78 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12204">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12205">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12205">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12206">让你决定是否阻止网站跟踪用户的 Web 浏览活动。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12206">Lets you decide whether to block websites from tracking users' web-browsing activity.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12207">如果禁用或未配置此策略，用户可以设置自己的跟踪防护级别。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12207">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, users can set their own level of tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12208">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12208">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12209">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = 关闭（无跟踪防护）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12209">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = Off (no tracking prevention)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12210">TrackingPreventionBasic (1) = 基本（阻止有害跟踪器，内容和广告将个性化处理）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12210">TrackingPreventionBasic (1) = Basic (blocks harmful trackers, content and ads will be personalized)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12211">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2) = 平衡（阻止有害跟踪器和来自用户未访问过的网站的跟踪器；内容和广告的个性化程度较低）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12211">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2) = Balanced (blocks harmful trackers and trackers from sites user has not visited; content and ads will be less personalized)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12212">TrackingPreventionStrict (3) = 严格（阻止所有站点中的有害跟踪器和大多数跟踪器；内容和广告的个性化程度最低。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12212">TrackingPreventionStrict (3) = Strict (blocks harmful trackers and majority of trackers from all sites; content and ads will have minimal personalization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12213">网站的某些部分可能无法正常工作）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12213">Some parts of sites might not work)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12214">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12214">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12215">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12215">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12216">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12216">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12217">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12217">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12218">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12218">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12219">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12219">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12220">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12220">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12221">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12221">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12222">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12222">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12223">GP 唯一名称：TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12223">GP unique name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12224">GP 名称：阻止跟踪用户的 Web 浏览活动</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12224">GP name: Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12225">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12225">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12226">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12226">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12227">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12227">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12228">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12228">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12229">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12229">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12230">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12230">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12231">值名称：TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12231">Value Name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12232">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12232">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12233">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12233">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12234">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12234">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12235">首选项项名称：TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12235">Preference Key Name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12236">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12236">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12237">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12237">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="translateenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12238">TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12238">TranslateEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-translate"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12239">启用翻译</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12239">Enable Translate</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12240">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12240">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12241">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12241">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12242">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12242">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12243">在 Microsoft Edge 上启用集成的 Microsoft 翻译服务。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12243">Enables the integrated Microsoft translation service on Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12244">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将为用户提供翻译功能，方法是在适当时显示集成的翻译浮出控件，并在右键单击上下文菜单中显示翻译选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12244">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge offers translation functionality to the user by showing an integrated translate flyout when appropriate, and a translate option on the right-click context menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12245">禁用此策略可禁用所有内置翻译功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12245">Disable this policy to disable all built-in translate features.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12246">如果未配置该策略，用户可以选择是否使用翻译功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12246">If you don't configure the policy, users can choose whether to use the translation functionality or not.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12247">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12247">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12248">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12248">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12249">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12249">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12250">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12250">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12251">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12251">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12252">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12252">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12253">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12253">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12254">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12254">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12255">GP 唯一名称：TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12255">GP unique name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12256">GP 名称：启用翻译</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12256">GP name: Enable Translate</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12257">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12257">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12258">GP 路径（推荐）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认（用户可替代）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12258">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12259">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12259">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12260">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12260">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12261">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12261">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12262">路径（推荐）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12262">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12263">值名称：TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12263">Value Name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12264">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12264">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12265">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12265">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12266">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12266">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12267">首选项项名称：TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12267">Preference Key Name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12268">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12268">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12269">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12269">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="tripledesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12270">TripleDESEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12270">TripleDESEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-3des-cipher-suites-in-tls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12271">在 TLS 中启用 3DES 密码套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12271">Enable 3DES cipher suites in TLS</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12272">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12272">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12273">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 93 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12273">On Windows and macOS since 93 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12274">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12274">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12275">"警告： 3DES 将从 Microsoft Edge 95 （大约 2021 年 10 月）中完全删除，然后此策略将停止工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12275">'Warning: 3DES will be completely removed from Microsoft Edge in version 95 (around October 2021) and this policy will stop working then.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12276">如果该策略设置为 true，则启用 TLS 中的 3DES 密码套件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12276">If the policy is set to true, then 3DES cipher suites in TLS will be enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12277">如果设置为 false，则禁用它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12277">If it is set to false, they will be disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12278">如果未设置该策略，则默认情况下将禁用 3DES 密码套件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12278">If the policy is unset, 3DES cipher suites are disabled by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12279">此策略可用于暂时保留与过时服务器的兼容性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12279">This policy may be used to temporarily retain compatibility with an outdated server.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12280">这是一个临时方案，应该重新配置服务器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12280">This is a stopgap measure and the server should be reconfigured.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12281">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12281">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12282">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12282">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12283">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12283">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12284">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12284">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12285">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12285">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12286">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12286">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12287">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12287">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12288">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12288">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12289">GP 唯一名称：TripleDESEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12289">GP unique name: TripleDESEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12290">GP 名称：在 TLS 中启用 3DES 密码套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12290">GP name: Enable 3DES cipher suites in TLS</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12291">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12291">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12292">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12292">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12293">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12293">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12294">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12294">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12295">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12295">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12296">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12296">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12297">值名称：TripleDESEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12297">Value Name: TripleDESEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12298">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12298">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12299">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12299">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12300">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12300">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12301">首选项项名称：TripleDESEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12301">Preference Key Name: TripleDESEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12302">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12302">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12303">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12303">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="urlallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12304">URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12304">URLAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="define-a-list-of-allowed-urls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12305">定义允许的 URL 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12305">Define a list of allowed URLs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12306">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12306">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12307">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12307">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12308">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12308">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12309">通过设置该策略，可提供对所列 URL 的访问权限，将其作为 [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) 的例外情况。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12309">Setting the policy provides access to the listed URLs, as exceptions to [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12310">根据 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) 设置 URL 模式的格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12310">Format the URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12311">可使用此策略打开限制性阻止列表的例外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12311">You can use this policy to open exceptions to restrictive block lists.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12312">例如，可以在阻止列表中包含 '\*' 以阻止所有请求，然后使用此策略允许访问有限的 URL 列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12312">For example, you can include '\*' in the block list to block all requests, and then use this policy to allow access to a limited list of URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12313">可以使用此策略打开某些方案、其他域的子域、端口或特定路径的例外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12313">You can use this policy to open exceptions to certain schemes, subdomains of other domains, ports, or specific paths.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12314">最具体的筛选器可确定是阻止还是允许 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12314">The most specific filter determines if a URL is blocked or allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12315">允许的列表优先于阻止列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12315">The allowed list takes precedence over the block list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12316">此策略限制为 1000 个条目；后续条目将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12316">This policy is limited to 1000 entries; subsequent entries are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12317">通过此策略，浏览器还可以自动调用注册为“电话：”或“ssh：”等协议的协议处理程序的外部应用程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12317">This policy also allows the browser to automatically invoke external applications registered as protocol handlers for protocols like "tel:" or "ssh:".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12318">如果未配置此策略，则 [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) 策略中的阻止列表不存在例外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12318">If you don't configure this policy, there are no exceptions to the block list in the [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12319">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12319">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12320">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12320">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12321">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12321">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12322">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12322">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12323">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12323">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12324">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12324">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12325">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12325">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12326">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12326">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12327">GP 唯一名称：URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12327">GP unique name: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12328">GP 名称：定义允许的 URL 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12328">GP name: Define a list of allowed URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12329">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12329">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12330">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12330">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12331">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12331">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12332">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12332">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12333">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12333">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12334">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12334">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12335">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12335">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12336">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12336">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12337">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12337">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\3 = "hosting.com/good_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12338">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12338">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12339">首选项项名称：URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12339">Preference Key Name: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12340">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12340">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/good_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12341">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12341">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="urlblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12342">URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12342">URLBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-access-to-a-list-of-urls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12343">阻止对 URL 列表的访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12343">Block access to a list of URLs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12344">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12344">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12345">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12345">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12346">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12346">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12347">根据 URL 模式定义被阻止的网站列表（用户无法加载它们）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12347">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked (your users can't load them).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12348">根据 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) 设置 URL 模式的格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12348">Format the URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12349">可在 [URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist) 策略中定义例外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12349">You can define exceptions in the [URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12350">这些策略限制为 1000 个条目；后续条目将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12350">These policies are limited to 1000 entries; subsequent entries are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12351">请注意，不建议阻止内部“edge://”URL - 这可能会导致意外错误。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12351">Note that blocking internal 'edge://\*' URLs isn't recommended - this may lead to unexpected errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12352">此策略不会阻止页面通过 JavaScript 动态更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12352">This policy doesn't prevent the page from updating dynamically through JavaScript.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12353">例如，如果阻止“contoso.com/abc”，只要页面不刷新，用户仍可以访问“contoso.com”并单击链接访问“contoso.com/abc”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12353">For example, if you block 'contoso.com/abc', users might still be able to visit 'contoso.com' and click on a link to visit 'contoso.com/abc', as long as the page doesn't refresh.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12354">如果未配置此策略，则不会阻止任何 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12354">If you don't configure this policy, no URLs are blocked.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12355">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12355">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12356">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12356">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12357">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12357">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12358">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12358">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12359">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12359">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12360">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12360">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12361">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12361">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12362">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12362">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12363">GP 唯一名称：URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12363">GP unique name: URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12364">GP 名称：阻止对 URL 列表的访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12364">GP name: Block access to a list of URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12365">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12365">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12366">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12366">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12367">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12367">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12368">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12368">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12369">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12369">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12370">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12370">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12371">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12371">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12372">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12372">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12373">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12373">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\3 = "hosting.com/bad_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\6 = "file://*"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\7 = "custom_scheme:*"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\8 = "*"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12374">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12374">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12375">首选项项名称：URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12375">Preference Key Name: URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12376">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12376">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/bad_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
  <string>file://*</string>
  <string>custom_scheme:*</string>
  <string>*</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12377">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12377">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="updatepolicyoverride"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12378">UpdatePolicyOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12378">UpdatePolicyOverride</span></span>

  #### <a name="specifies-how-microsoft-edge-update-handles-available-updates-from-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12379">指定 Microsoft Edge 更新如何处理 Microsoft Edge 中的可用更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12379">Specifies how Microsoft Edge Update handles available updates from Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12380">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12380">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12381">在 macOS 上自 89 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12381">On macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12382">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12382">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12383">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 更新将根据你配置以下选项的方式处理 Microsoft Edge 更新：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12383">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Update handles Microsoft Edge updates according to how you configure the following options:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12384">仅限自动无提示更新：仅在定期更新检查找到更新后才应用更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12384">Automatic silent updates only: Updates are applied only when they're found by the periodic update check.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12385">仅限手动更新：仅当用户运行手动更新检查时才应用更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12385">Manual updates only: Updates are applied only when the user runs a manual update check.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12386">（并非所有应用都为此选项提供接口。）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12386">(Not all apps provide an interface for this option.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12387">如果选择手动更新，请确保使用 Microsoft AutoUpdate 定期检查更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12387">If you select manual updates, make sure you periodically check for updates by using Microsoft Autoupdate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12388">如果未启用和配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 更新将自动检查更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12388">If you don't enable and configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Update automatically checks for updates.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12389">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12389">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12390">automatic-silent-only (automatic-silent-only) = 仅当定期更新检查发现更新时才应用更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12390">automatic-silent-only (automatic-silent-only) = Updates are applied only when they're found by the periodic update check.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12391">manual-only (manual-only) = 仅当用户运行手动更新检查时才应用更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12391">manual-only (manual-only) = Updates are applied only when the user runs a manual update check.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12392">（并非所有应用都为此选项提供接口。）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12392">(Not all apps provide an interface for this option.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12393">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12393">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12394">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12394">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12395">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12395">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12396">可以推荐：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12396">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12397">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12397">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12398">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12398">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12399">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12399">String</span></span>

  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12400">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12400">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12401">首选项键名称：UpdatePolicyOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12401">Preference Key Name: UpdatePolicyOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12402">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12402">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>automatic-silent-only</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12403">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12403">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="useragentclienthintsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12404">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12404">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-the-user-agent-client-hints-feature-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12405">启用“User-Agent 客户端提示”功能（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12405">Enable the User-Agent Client Hints feature (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12406">已弃用：此策略已弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12406">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12407">当前受支持，但将在未来的版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12407">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12408">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12408">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12409">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 86 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12409">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12410">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12410">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12411">此策略已弃用，因为它仅作为一种短期机制提供，目的是让企业能够在发现与“User-Agent 客户端提示”功能不兼容时有更多的时间来更新其 Web 内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12411">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the User-Agent Client Hints feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12412">它在 Microsoft Edge 版本 94 中不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12412">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 94.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12413">启用后，“User-Agent 客户端提示”功能将发送细化的请求标头，提供有关用户浏览器（例如，浏览器版本）和环境（例如，系统体系结构）的信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12413">When enabled the User-Agent Client Hints feature sends granular request headers that provide information about the user browser (for example, the browser version) and environment (for example, the system architecture).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12414">这是一项附加功能，但是新标头可能会破坏某些限制请求中可能包含的字符的网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12414">This is an additive feature, but the new headers may break some websites that restrict the characters that requests may contain.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12415">如果启用或未配置此策略，将启用 “User-Agent 客户端提示”功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12415">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the User-Agent Client Hints feature is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12416">如果禁用此策略，则此功能不可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12416">If you disable this policy, this feature is unavailable.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12417">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12417">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12418">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12418">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12419">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12419">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12420">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12420">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12421">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12421">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12422">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12422">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12423">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12423">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12424">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12424">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12425">GP 唯一名称： UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12425">GP unique name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12426">GP 名称：启用“User-Agent 客户端提示”功能（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12426">GP name: Enable the User-Agent Client Hints feature (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12427">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12427">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12428">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12428">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12429">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12429">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12430">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12430">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12431">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12431">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12432">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12432">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12433">值名称：UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12433">Value Name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12434">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12434">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12435">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12435">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12436">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12436">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12437">首选项名称： UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12437">Preference Key Name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12438">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12438">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12439">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12439">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="userdatadir"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12440">UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12440">UserDataDir</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-user-data-directory"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12441">设置用户数据目录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12441">Set the user data directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12442">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12442">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12443">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12443">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12444">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12444">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12445">设置用于存储用户数据的目录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12445">Set the directory to use for storing user data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12446">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将使用指定的目录，而不管用户是否设置了“--user-data-dir”命令行标志。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12446">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the specified directory regardless of whether the user has set the '--user-data-dir' command-line flag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12447">如果未启用此策略，则使用默认配置文件路径，但用户可以使用“--user-data-dir”标志替代它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12447">If you don't enable this policy, the default profile path is used, but the user can override it by using the '--user-data-dir' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12448">用户可以在 edge://version/ 的配置文件路径下找到配置文件的目录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12448">Users can find the directory for the profile at edge://version/ under profile path.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12449">为避免数据丢失或其他错误，请不要将此策略配置为卷的根目录或用于其他目的的目录，因为 Microsoft Edge 管理其内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12449">To avoid data loss or other errors, don't configure this policy to a volume's root directory or to a directory that's used for other purposes, because Microsoft Edge manages its contents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12450">有关可使用的变量列表，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12450">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables that can be used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12451">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12451">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12452">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12452">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12453">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12453">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12454">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12454">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12455">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12455">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12456">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12456">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12457">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12457">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12458">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12458">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
