  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12459">GP 唯一名称：UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12459">GP unique name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12460">GP 名称：设置用户数据目录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12460">GP name: Set the user data directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12461">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12461">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12462">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12462">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12463">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12463">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12464">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12464">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12465">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12465">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12466">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12466">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12467">值名称：UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12467">Value Name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12468">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12468">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12469">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12469">Example value:</span></span>

```
"${users}/${user_name}/Edge"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12470">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12470">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12471">首选项项名称：UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12471">Preference Key Name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12472">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12472">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>${users}/${user_name}/Edge</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12473">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12473">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="userdatasnapshotretentionlimit"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12474">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12474">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>

  #### <a name="limits-the-number-of-user-data-snapshots-retained-for-use-in-case-of-emergency-rollback"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12475">限制保留用于紧急回退的用户数据快照数量</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12475">Limits the number of user data snapshots retained for use in case of emergency rollback</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12476">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12476">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12477">在 86 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12477">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12478">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12478">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12479">按照每个主要版本的更新，Microsoft Edge 将创建用户浏览数据部分的快照，以便在将来的紧急情况下需要临时版本回退时使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12479">Following each major version update, Microsoft Edge will create a snapshot of parts of the user's browsing data to use in case of a later emergency that requires a temporary version rollback.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12480">如果对用户拥有相应快照的版本执行了临时回退，则快照中的数据会被还原。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12480">If a temporary rollback is performed to a version for which a user has a corresponding snapshot, the data in the snapshot is restored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12481">这可让用户保留书签和自动填充数据等设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12481">This lets users keep settings such as bookmarks and autofill data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12482">如果未设置此策略，将使用“3 张快照”的默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12482">If you don't set this policy, the default value of 3 snapshots is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12483">如果你设置了此策略，旧的快照将根据需要被删除，以便遵守你设置的限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12483">If you set this policy, old snapshots are deleted as needed to respect the limit you set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12484">如果将此策略设置为 “0”，则不会执行任何快照。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12484">If you set this policy to 0, no snapshots are taken.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12485">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12485">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12486">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12486">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12487">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12487">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12488">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12488">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12489">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12489">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12490">整型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12490">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12491">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12491">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12492">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12492">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12493">GP 唯一名称：UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12493">GP unique name: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12494">GP 名称：限制保留用于紧急回退情况的用户数据快照数量</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12494">GP name: Limits the number of user data snapshots retained for use in case of emergency rollback</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12495">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12495">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12496">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12496">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12497">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12497">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12498">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12498">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12499">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12499">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12500">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12500">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12501">值名称：UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12501">Value Name: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12502">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12502">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12503">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12503">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000003
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12504">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12504">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="userfeedbackallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12505">UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12505">UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-user-feedback"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12506">允许用户反馈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12506">Allow user feedback</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12507">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12507">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12508">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12508">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12509">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12509">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12510">Microsoft Edge 使用“Edge 反馈”功能（默认情况下启用），允许用户发送反馈、建议或客户调查以及报告浏览器的任何问题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12510">Microsoft Edge uses the Edge Feedback feature (enabled by default) to allow users to send feedback, suggestions or customer surveys and to report any issues with the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12511">此外，默认情况下，用户无法禁用（关闭）“Edge 反馈”功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12511">Also, by default, users can't disable (turn off) the Edge Feedback feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12512">如果启用或未配置此策略，用户可以调用“Edge 反馈”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12512">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can invoke Edge Feedback.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12513">如果禁用此策略，则用户不能调用“Edge 反馈”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12513">If you disable this policy, users can't invoke Edge Feedback.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12514">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12514">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12515">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12515">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12516">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12516">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12517">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12517">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12518">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12518">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12519">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12519">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12520">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12520">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12521">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12521">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12522">GP 唯一名称：UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12522">GP unique name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12523">GP 名称：允许用户反馈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12523">GP name: Allow user feedback</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12524">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12524">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12525">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12525">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12526">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12526">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12527">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12527">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12528">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12528">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12529">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12529">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12530">值名称：UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12530">Value Name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12531">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12531">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12532">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12532">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12533">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12533">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12534">首选项项名称：UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12534">Preference Key Name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12535">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12535">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12536">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12536">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="verticaltabsallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12537">VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12537">VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="configures-availability-of-a-vertical-layout-for-tabs-on-the-side-of-the-browser"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12538">为浏览器侧面的选项卡配置垂直布局的可用性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12538">Configures availability of a vertical layout for tabs on the side of the browser</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12539">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12539">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12540">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自88或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12540">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12541">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12541">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12542">配置用户是否可以访问选项卡在浏览器侧面垂直对齐而不是在顶部对齐的替代布局。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12542">Configures whether a user can access an alternative layout where tabs are vertically aligned on the side of the browser instead of at the top.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12543">当打开多个选项卡时，此布局可提供更好的选项卡查看和管理。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12543">When there are several tabs open, this layout provides better tab viewing and management.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12544">网站标题的可见性更佳，扫描对齐的图标更容易，还有更多空间可用于管理和关闭选项卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12544">There's better visibility of the site titles, it's easier to scan aligned icons, and there's more space to manage and close tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12545">如果禁用此策略，则垂直选项卡布局将不可用作选项提供给用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12545">If you disable this policy, then the vertical tab layout will not be available as an option for users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12546">如果启用或未配置此策略，则选项卡布局仍将位于顶部，但用户可以选择打开侧面的垂直选项卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12546">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the tab layout will still be at the top, but a user has the option to turn on vertical tabs on the side.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12547">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12547">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12548">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12548">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12549">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12549">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12550">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12550">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12551">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12551">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12552">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12552">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12553">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12553">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12554">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12554">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12555">GP 唯一名称：VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12555">GP unique name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12556">GP 名称：为浏览器侧面的选项卡配置垂直布局的可用性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12556">GP name: Configures availability of a vertical layout for tabs on the side of the browser</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12557">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12557">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12558">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12558">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12559">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12559">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12560">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12560">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12561">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12561">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12562">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12562">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12563">值名称：VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12563">Value Name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12564">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12564">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12565">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12565">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12566">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12566">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12567">首选项键名称：VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12567">Preference Key Name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12568">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12568">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12569">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12569">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="videocaptureallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12570">VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12570">VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-or-block-video-capture"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12571">允许或阻止视频捕获</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12571">Allow or block video capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12572">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12572">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12573">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12573">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12574">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12574">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12575">控制网站是否可以捕获视频。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12575">Control whether sites can capture video.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12576">如果已启用或未配置（默认），系统将要求用户对所有网站授予视频捕获访问权限，但在 [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) 策略列表中配置了 URL 的网站除外，这些网站将在没有提示的情况下被授予访问权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12576">If enabled or not configured (default), the user will be asked about video capture access for all sites except those with URLs configured in the [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) policy list, which will be granted access without prompting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12577">如果禁用此策略，则系统不会提示用户，并且视频捕获仅对在 [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) 策略中配置的 URL 可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12577">If you disable this policy, the user isn't prompted, and video capture is only available to URLs configured in [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12578">此策略会影响所有类型的视频输入，而不仅仅是内置摄像头。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12578">This policy affects all types of video inputs, not only the built-in camera.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12579">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12579">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12580">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12580">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12581">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12581">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12582">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12582">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12583">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12583">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12584">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12584">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12585">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12585">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12586">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12586">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12587">GP 唯一名称：VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12587">GP unique name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12588">GP 名称：允许或阻止视频捕获</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12588">GP name: Allow or block video capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12589">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12589">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12590">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12590">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12591">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12591">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12592">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12592">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12593">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12593">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12594">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12594">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12595">值名称：VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12595">Value Name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12596">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12596">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12597">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12597">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12598">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12598">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12599">首选项项名称：VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12599">Preference Key Name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12600">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12600">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12601">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12601">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="videocaptureallowedurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12602">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12602">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="sites-that-can-access-video-capture-devices-without-requesting-permission"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12603">无需请求许可即可访问视频捕获设备的网站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12603">Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12604">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12604">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12605">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12605">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12606">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12606">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12607">根据 URL 模式指定无需请求用户许可即可使用视频捕获设备的网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12607">Specify websites, based on URL patterns, that can use video capture devices without asking the user for permission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12608">此列表中的模式将与请求 URL 的安全源进行匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12608">Patterns in this list are matched against the security origin of the requesting URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12609">如果二者相符，则将自动向网站授予对视频捕获设备的访问权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12609">If they match, the site is automatically granted access to video capture devices.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12610">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12610">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12611">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12611">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12612">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12612">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12613">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12613">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12614">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12614">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12615">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12615">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12616">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12616">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12617">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12617">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12618">GP 唯一名称：VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12618">GP unique name: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12619">GP 名称：无需请求许可即可访问视频捕获设备的网站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12619">GP name: Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12620">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12620">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12621">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12621">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12622">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12622">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12623">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12623">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12624">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12624">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12625">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12625">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12626">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12626">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12627">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12627">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12628">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12628">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\2 = "https://[*.]contoso.edu/"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12629">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12629">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12630">首选项项名称：VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12630">Preference Key Name: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12631">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12631">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>https://[*.]contoso.edu/</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12632">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12632">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="wpadquickcheckenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12633">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12633">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-wpad-optimization"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12634">设置 WPAD 优化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12634">Set WPAD optimization</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12635">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12635">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12636">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12636">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12637">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12637">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12638">允许你在 Microsoft Edge 中关闭 WPAD（Web 代理自动发现）优化。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12638">Allows you to turn off WPAD (Web Proxy Auto-Discovery) optimization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12639">如果禁用此策略，则将禁用 WPAD 优化，这会使浏览器对基于 DNS 的 WPAD 服务器等待更长时间。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12639">If you disable this policy, WPAD optimization is disabled, which makes the browser wait longer for DNS-based WPAD servers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12640">如果启用或未配置该策略，则将启用 WPAD 优化。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12640">If you enable or don't configure the policy, WPAD optimization is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12641">无论是否启用或如何启用此策略，用户都无法更改 WPAD 优化设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12641">Independent of whether or how this policy is enabled, the WPAD optimization setting cannot be changed by users.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12642">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12642">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12643">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12643">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12644">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12644">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12645">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12645">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12646">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12646">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12647">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12647">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12648">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12648">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12649">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12649">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12650">GP 唯一名称：WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12650">GP unique name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12651">GP 名称：设置 WPAD 优化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12651">GP name: Set WPAD optimization</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12652">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12652">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12653">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12653">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12654">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12654">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12655">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12655">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12656">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12656">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12657">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12657">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12658">值名称：WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12658">Value Name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12659">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12659">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12660">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12660">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12661">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12661">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12662">首选项项名称：WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12662">Preference Key Name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12663">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12663">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12664">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12664">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="webappinstallforcelist"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12665">WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12665">WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-list-of-force-installed-web-apps"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12666">配置强制安装的 Web 应用列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12666">Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12667">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12667">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12668">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 80 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12668">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12669">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12669">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12670">配置此策略以指定一个无需用户交互即可自行安装的网页应用列表，并且用户无法卸载或关闭这些应用程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12670">Configure this policy to specify a list of web apps that install silently, without user interaction, and which users can't uninstall or turn off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12671">策略的每个列表项都是具有强制成员的对象：url (要安装的 web 应用的 URL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12671">Each list item of the policy is an object with a mandatory member: url (the URL of the web app to install)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12672">和 3 个可选成员：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12672">and 3 optional members:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12673">default_launch_container（指定 web 应用打开时使用的窗口模式 - 默认为新选项卡。）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12673">default_launch_container (specifies the window mode that the web app opens with-a new tab is the default.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12674">create_desktop_shortcut（如果要创建 Linux 和 Microsoft Windows 桌面快捷方式，则为 true。）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12674">create_desktop_shortcut (True if you want to create Linux and Microsoft Windows desktop shortcuts.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12675">fallback_app_name（从 Microsoft Edge 90 开始，如果应用名称不是渐进式 Web App (PWA) ，则允许覆盖应用名称，或者，如果应用名称是 PWA，则允许覆盖临时安装的应用名称，但在安装完成之前需要进行身份验证。）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12675">fallback_app_name (Starting with Microsoft Edge 90, allows you to override the app name if it is not a Progressive Web App (PWA), or the app name that is temporarily installed if it is a PWA but authentication is required before the installation can be completed.)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12676">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12676">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12677">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12677">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12678">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12678">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12679">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12679">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12680">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12680">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12681">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12681">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12682">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12682">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12683">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12683">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12684">GP 唯一名称：WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12684">GP unique name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12685">GP 名称：配置强制安装的 Web 应用列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12685">GP name: Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12686">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12686">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12687">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12687">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12688">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12688">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12689">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12689">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12690">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12690">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12691">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12691">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12692">值名称：WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12692">Value Name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12693">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12693">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12694">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12694">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebAppInstallForceList = [
  {
    "create_desktop_shortcut": true,
    "default_launch_container": "window",
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/maps"
  },
  {
    "default_launch_container": "tab",
    "url": "https://app.contoso.edu"
  },
  {
    "default_launch_container": "window",
    "fallback_app_name": "Editor",
    "url": "https://app.contoso.com/editor"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12695">精简示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12695">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebAppInstallForceList = [{"create_desktop_shortcut": true, "default_launch_container": "window", "url": "https://www.contoso.com/maps"}, {"default_launch_container": "tab", "url": "https://app.contoso.edu"}, {"default_launch_container": "window", "fallback_app_name": "Editor", "url": "https://app.contoso.com/editor"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12696">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12696">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12697">首选项项名称：WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12697">Preference Key Name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12698">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12698">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebAppInstallForceList</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>create_desktop_shortcut</key>
    <true/>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>window</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com/maps</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>tab</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://app.contoso.edu</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>window</string>
    <key>fallback_app_name</key>
    <string>Editor</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://app.contoso.com/editor</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12699">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12699">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="webcaptureenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12700">WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12700">WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-web-capture-feature-in-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12701">在 Microsoft Edge 中启用网络捕获功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12701">Enable web capture feature in Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12702">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12702">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12703">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自87或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12703">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12704">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12704">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12705">在 Microsoft Edge 中启用网页捕获功能，允许用户捕获 Web 内容并使用墨迹书写工具对捕获内容进行批注。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12705">Enables the web capture feature in Microsoft Edge that allows users to capture web content and annotate the capture using inking tools.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12706">如果启用此策略或不对其进行配置，则会在上下文菜单、“设置”菜单和“更多”菜单中以及使用键盘快捷方式 CTRL+SHIFT+S 时显示网页捕获选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12706">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the Web capture option shows up in the context menu, Settings and more menu, and by using the keyboard shortcut, CTRL+SHIFT+S.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12707">如果禁用此策略，用户将无法在 Microsoft Edge 中访问网页捕获功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12707">If you disable this policy, users can't access the web capture feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12708">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12708">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12709">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12709">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12710">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12710">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12711">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12711">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12712">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12712">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12713">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12713">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12714">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12714">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12715">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12715">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12716">GP 唯一名称：WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12716">GP unique name: WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12717">GP 名称：Enable web capture feature in Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12717">GP name: Enable web capture feature in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12718">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12718">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12719">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12719">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12720">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12720">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12721">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12721">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12722">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12722">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12723">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12723">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12724">值名称：WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12724">Value Name: WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12725">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12725">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12726">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12726">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12727">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12727">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12728">首选项项名称：WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12728">Preference Key Name: WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12729">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12729">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12730">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12730">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="webcomponentsv0enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12731">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12731">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="re-enable-web-components-v0-api-until-m84-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12732">重新启用 Web Components v0 API 直至 M84（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12732">Re-enable Web Components v0 API until M84 (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12733">已过时：该策略已过时，Microsoft Edge 版本 84 后将无法正常工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12733">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12734">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12734">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12735">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 80 起至 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12735">On Windows and macOS since 80, until 84</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12736">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12736">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12737">此策略不起作用，因为此策略允许在 Microsoft Edge 版本85前有选择地重新启用这些功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12737">This policy doesn't work because this policy allowed these features to be selectively re-enabled until Microsoft Edge version 85.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12738">Web Components v0 API（Shadow DOM v0、Custom Elements v0 和 HTML Imports）在 2018 中已弃用，并且从 Microsoft Edge 版本 80 开始已默认禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12738">The Web Components v0 APIs (Shadow DOM v0, Custom Elements v0, and HTML Imports) were deprecated in 2018, and have been disabled by default starting in Microsoft Edge version 80.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12739">如果将此策略设置为 True，则将为所有网站启用 Web Components v0 API 功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12739">If you set this policy is set to True, the Web Components v0 features will be enabled for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12740">如果将此策略设置为 False 或未设置此策略，则从 Microsoft Edge 版本 80 开始，Web Components v0 功能将默认禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12740">If you set this policy to False or don't set this policy, the Web Components v0 features will be disabled by default, starting in Microsoft Edge version 80.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12741">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12741">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12742">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12742">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12743">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12743">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12744">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12744">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12745">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12745">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12746">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12746">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12747">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12747">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12748">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12748">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12749">GP 唯一名称：WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12749">GP unique name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12750">GP 名称：重新启用 Web Components v0 API 直至 M84（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12750">GP name: Re-enable Web Components v0 API until M84 (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12751">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12751">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12752">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12752">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12753">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12753">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12754">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12754">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12755">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12755">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12756">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12756">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12757">值名称：WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12757">Value Name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12758">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12758">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12759">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12759">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12760">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12760">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12761">首选项项名称：WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12761">Preference Key Name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12762">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12762">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12763">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12763">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="webdriveroverridesincompatiblepolicies"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12764">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12764">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-webdriver-to-override-incompatible-policies-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12765">允许 WebDriver 替代不兼容的策略（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12765">Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (obsolete)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12766">已弃用：此策略已弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12766">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12767">当前受支持，但在未来的版本中将过时。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12767">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12768">已过时：该策略已过时，Microsoft Edge 版本 84 后将无法正常工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12768">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12769">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12769">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12770">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 起至 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12770">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 84</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12771">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12771">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12772">此策略不起作用，因为 WebDriver 现在与所有现有策略兼容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12772">This policy doesn't work because WebDriver is now compatible with all existing policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12773">此策略允许 WebDriver 功能的用户替代可能干扰其操作的策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12773">This policy allows users of the WebDriver feature to override policies which can interfere with its operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12774">当前，此策略禁用 [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) 和 [IsolateOriggins](#isolateorigins) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12774">Currently this policy disables [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) and [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12775">如果启用该策略，WebDriver 将能够替代不兼容的策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12775">If the policy is enabled, WebDriver will be able to override incomaptible policies.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12776">如果禁用或未配置该策略，则不允许 WebDriver 替代不兼容的策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12776">If the policy is disabled or not configured, WebDriver will not be allowed to override incompatible policies.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12777">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12777">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12778">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12778">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12779">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12779">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12780">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12780">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12781">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12781">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12782">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12782">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12783">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12783">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12784">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12784">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12785">GP 唯一名称：WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12785">GP unique name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12786">GP 名称：允许 WebDriver 替代不兼容的策略（已过时）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12786">GP name: Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12787">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12787">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12788">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12788">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12789">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12789">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12790">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12790">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12791">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12791">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12792">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12792">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12793">值名称：WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12793">Value Name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12794">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12794">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12795">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12795">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12796">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12796">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12797">首选项项名称：WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12797">Preference Key Name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12798">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12798">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12799">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12799">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="webrtcallowlegacytlsprotocols"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12800">WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12800">WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-legacy-tlsdtls-downgrade-in-webrtc-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12801">在 WebRTC 中允许旧版 TLS/DTLS 降级（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12801">Allow legacy TLS/DTLS downgrade in WebRTC (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12802">已弃用：此策略已弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12802">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12803">当前受支持，但将在未来的版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12803">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12804">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12804">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12805">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自88或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12805">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12806">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12806">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12807">如果启用此策略，WebRTC 对等连接可以降级到 TLS/DTLS（DTLS 1.0、TLS 1.0 和 TLS 1.1）协议的过时版本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12807">If you enable this policy, WebRTC peer connections can downgrade to obsolete versions of the TLS/DTLS (DTLS 1.0, TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1) protocols.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12808">如果禁用或未设置此策略，则这些 TLS/DTLS 版本将被禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12808">If you disable or don't set this policy, these TLS/DTLS versions are disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12809">此策略是临时的，在 Microsoft Edge 的将来版本中将被删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12809">This policy is temporary and will be removed in a future version of Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12810">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12810">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12811">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12811">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12812">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12812">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12813">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12813">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12814">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12814">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12815">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12815">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12816">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12816">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12817">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12817">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12818">GP 唯一名称：WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12818">GP unique name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12819">GP 名称：在 WebRTC 中允许旧版 TLS/DTLS 降级（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12819">GP name: Allow legacy TLS/DTLS downgrade in WebRTC (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12820">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12820">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12821">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12821">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12822">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12822">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12823">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12823">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12824">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12824">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12825">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12825">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12826">值名称：WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12826">Value Name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12827">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12827">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12828">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12828">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12829">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12829">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12830">首选项键名称：WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12830">Preference Key Name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12831">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12831">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12832">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12832">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="webrtclocalipsallowedurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12833">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12833">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="manage-exposure-of-local-ip-addressess-by-webrtc"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12834">管理通过 WebRTC 暴露本地 IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12834">Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12835">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12835">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12836">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 80 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12836">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12837">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12837">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12838">指定 WebRTC 应暴露其本地 IP 地址的源 (URL) 或主机名模式（如“*contoso.com*”）列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12838">Specifies a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns (like "*contoso.com*") for which local IP address should be exposed by WebRTC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12839">如果启用此策略并设置源 (URL) 或主机名模式列表，则当启用 edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns 时，WebRTC 将显示与列表中模式匹配的案例的本地 IP 地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12839">If you enable this policy and set a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns, when edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Enabled, WebRTC will expose the local IP address for cases that match patterns in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12840">如果禁用或未配置此策略，并且启用了 edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns，则 WebRTC 将不会暴露本地 IP 地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12840">If you disable or don't configure this policy, and edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Enabled, WebRTC will not expose local IP addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12841">本地 IP 地址将屏蔽为 mDNS 主机名。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12841">The local IP address is concealed with an mDNS hostname.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12842">如果启用、禁用或未配置此策略，并且禁用了 edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns，则 WebRTC 将暴露本地 IP 地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12842">If you enable, disable, or don't configure this policy, and edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Disabled, WebRTC will expose local IP addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12843">请注意，此策略会削弱管理员可能需要的本地 IP 地址保护。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12843">Please note that this policy weakens the protection of local IP addresses that might be needed by administrators.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12844">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12844">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12845">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12845">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12846">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12846">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12847">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12847">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12848">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12848">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12849">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12849">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12850">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12850">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12851">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12851">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12852">GP 唯一名称：WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12852">GP unique name: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12853">GP 名称：管理通过 WebRTC 暴露本地 IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12853">GP name: Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12854">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12854">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12855">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12855">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12856">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12856">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12857">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12857">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12858">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12858">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12859">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12859">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12860">值名称：1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12860">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12861">值类型：REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12861">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12862">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12862">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\2 = "*contoso.com*"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12863">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12863">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12864">首选项项名称：WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12864">Preference Key Name: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12865">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12865">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>*contoso.com*</string>
</array>
```
