  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12866">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12866">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="webrtclocalhostiphandling"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12867">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12867">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>

  #### <a name="restrict-exposure-of-local-ip-address-by-webrtc"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12868">限制通过 WebRTC 暴露本地 IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12868">Restrict exposure of local IP address by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12869">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12869">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12870">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12870">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12871">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12871">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12872">允许你设置 WebRTC 是否暴露用户的本地 IP 地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12872">Allows you to set whether or not WebRTC exposes the user's local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12873">如果将此策略设置为 "AllowAllInterfaces" 或 "AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces"，WebRTC 将公开本地 IP 地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12873">If you set this policy to "AllowAllInterfaces" or "AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces", WebRTC exposes the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12874">如果将此策略设置为 "AllowPublicInterfaceOnly" 或 "DisableNonProxiedUdp"，则 WebRTC 不会公开本地 IP 地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12874">If you set this policy to "AllowPublicInterfaceOnly" or "DisableNonProxiedUdp", WebRTC doesn't expose the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12875">如果未设置此策略或者将其禁用，WebRTC 会暴露本地 IP 地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12875">If you don't set this policy, or if you disable it, WebRTC exposes the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12876">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12876">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12877">AllowAllInterfaces (default) = 允许所有界面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12877">AllowAllInterfaces (default) = Allow all interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12878">这将暴露本地 IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12878">This exposes the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12879">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces) = 允许公共和专用接口使用 http 默认路由。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12879">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces) = Allow public and private interfaces over http default route.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12880">这将暴露本地 IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12880">This exposes the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12881">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (default_public_interface_only) = 允许公共接口使用 http 默认路由。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12881">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (default_public_interface_only) = Allow public interface over http default route.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12882">这不会暴露本地 IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12882">This doesn't expose the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12883">DisableNonProxiedUdp (disable_non_proxied_udp) = 使用 TCP，除非代理服务器支持 UDP。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12883">DisableNonProxiedUdp (disable_non_proxied_udp) = Use TCP unless proxy server supports UDP.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12884">这不会暴露本地 IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12884">This doesn't expose the local IP address</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12885">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12885">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12886">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12886">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12887">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12887">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12888">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12888">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12889">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12889">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12890">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12890">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12891">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12891">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12892">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12892">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12893">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12893">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12894">GP 唯一名称：WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12894">GP unique name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12895">GP 名称：限制通过 WebRTC 暴露本地 IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12895">GP name: Restrict exposure of local IP address by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12896">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12896">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12897">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12897">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12898">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12898">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12899">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12899">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12900">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12900">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12901">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12901">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12902">值名称：WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12902">Value Name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12903">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12903">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12904">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12904">Example value:</span></span>

```
"default"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12905">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12905">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12906">首选项项名称：WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12906">Preference Key Name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12907">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12907">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>default</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12908">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12908">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="webrtcudpportrange"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12909">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12909">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>

  #### <a name="restrict-the-range-of-local-udp-ports-used-by-webrtc"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12910">限制 WebRTC 使用的本地 UDP 端口的范围</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12910">Restrict the range of local UDP ports used by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12911">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12911">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12912">在 Windows 和 macOS 上自 77 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12912">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12913">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12913">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12914">将 WebRTC 使用的 UDP 端口范围限制为指定的端口间隔（包括终结点）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12914">Restricts the UDP port range used by WebRTC to a specified port interval (endpoints included).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12915">通过配置此策略，可指定 WebRTC 可以使用的本地 UDP 端口的范围。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12915">By configuring this policy, you specify the range of local UDP ports that WebRTC can use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12916">如果未配置此策略，或者将其设置为空字符串或无效端口范围，则 WebRTC 可以使用任何可用的本地 UDP 端口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12916">If you don't configure this policy, or if you set it to an empty string or invalid port range, WebRTC can use any available local UDP port.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12917">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12917">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12918">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12918">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12919">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12919">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12920">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12920">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12921">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12921">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12922">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12922">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12923">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12923">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12924">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12924">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12925">GP 唯一名称：WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12925">GP unique name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12926">GP 名称：限制 WebRTC 使用的本地 UDP 端口的范围</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12926">GP name: Restrict the range of local UDP ports used by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12927">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12927">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12928">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12928">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12929">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12929">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12930">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12930">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12931">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12931">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12932">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12932">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12933">值名称：WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12933">Value Name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12934">值类型：REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12934">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12935">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12935">Example value:</span></span>

```
"10000-11999"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12936">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12936">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12937">首选项项名称：WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12937">Preference Key Name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12938">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12938">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>10000-11999</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12939">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12939">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="webwidgetallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12940">WebWidgetAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12940">WebWidgetAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-the-web-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12941">启用 Web 构件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12941">Enable the Web widget</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12942">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12942">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12943">在 88 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12943">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12944">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12944">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12945">启用 Web 构件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12945">Enables the Web widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12946">启用此功能后，用户可以使用构件从桌面或应用程序中搜索网页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12946">When enabled, users can use the widget to search the web from their desktop or from an application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12947">构件提供一个搜索框，显示 web 建议并打开 Microsoft Edge 中的所有 web 搜索。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12947">The widget provides a search box that shows web suggestions and opens all web searches in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12948">"搜索" 框提供搜索（由必应提供支持）和 URL 建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12948">The search box provides search (powered by Bing) and URL suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12949">该构件还包含源磁贴，用户可单击该磁贴以查看有关新 Microsoft Edge 浏览器选项卡或窗口中 msn.com 的详细信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12949">The widget also includes feed tiles that users can click to see more information on msn.com in a new Microsoft Edge browser tab or window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12950">源磁贴可能包含广告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12950">The feed tiles may include ads.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12951">可从 Microsoft Edge 设置或 Microsoft Edge 中的 "更多工具" 菜单启动构件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12951">The widget can be launched from the Microsoft Edge settings or from the "More tools" menu in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12952">如果启用或未配置此策略：将自动为所有配置文件启用网页构件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12952">If you enable or don't configure this policy: The Web widget will be automatically enabled for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12953">在 "Microsoft Edge 设置" 中，用户将看到用于启动构件的选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12953">In the Microsoft Edge settings, users will see option to launch the widget.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12954">在 "Microsoft Edge 设置" 中，用户将看到菜单项用于在 Windows 启动时运行构件（自动启动）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12954">In the Microsoft Edge settings, users will see the menu item to run the widget at Windows startup (auto-start).</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12955">如果启用了 [WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) 策略，则启动时启用该构件的选项将切换。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12955">The option to enable the widget at startup will be toggled on if the [WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) policy is enabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12956">如果已禁用或未配置 [WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) ，则启动时启用该构件的选项将关闭。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12956">If the [WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) is disabled or not configured, the option to enable the widget at startup will be toggled off.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12957">用户将看到从 "Microsoft Edge" 的 "更多工具" 菜单启动构件的菜单项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12957">Users will see the menu item to launch the widget from the Microsoft Edge "More tools" menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12958">用户可从 "更多工具" 启动构件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12958">Users can launch the widget from "More tools".</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12959">可通过系统托盘中的 "退出" 选项或通过从任务栏关闭构件来关闭构件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12959">The widget can be turned off by the "Quit" option in the System tray or by closing the widget from the taskbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12960">如果启用了自动启动，将在系统重新启动时重新启动该构件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12960">The widget will be restarted on system reboot if auto-start is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12961">如果禁用此策略：将禁用所有配置文件的 Web 构件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12961">If you disable this policy: The Web widget will be disabled for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12962">从 Microsoft Edge 设置启动构件的选项将被禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12962">The option to launch the widget from Microsoft Edge Settings will be disabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12963">在 Windows 启动时启动 "开始" 的选项（自动启动）将被禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12963">The option to launch start the widget at Windows startup (auto-start) will be disabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12964">从 Microsoft Edge "更多工具" 菜单启动构件的选项将被禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12964">The option to launch the widget from Microsoft Edge "More tools" menu will be disabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12965">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12965">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12966">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12966">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12967">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12967">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12968">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12968">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12969">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12969">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12970">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12970">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12971">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12971">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12972">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12972">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12973">GP 唯一名称： WebWidgetAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12973">GP unique name: WebWidgetAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12974">GP名称：启用 Web 构件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12974">GP name: Enable the Web widget</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12975">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12975">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12976">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12976">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12977">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12977">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12978">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12978">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12979">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12979">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12980">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12980">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12981">值名称： WebWidgetAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12981">Value Name: WebWidgetAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12982">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12982">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12983">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12983">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12984">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12984">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="webwidgetisenabledonstartup"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12985">WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12985">WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-the-web-widget-at-windows-startup"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12986">在 Windows 启动时允许Web构件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12986">Allow the Web widget at Windows startup</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12987">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12987">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12988">在 88 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12988">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12989">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12989">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12990">允许 Web 构件在 Windows 启动时开始运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12990">Allows the Web widget to start running at Windows startup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12991">如果启用：默认情况下，Web 构件将在 Windows 启动时开始运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12991">If you enable: The Web widget will start running at Windows startup by default.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12992">如果通过 [WebWidgetAllowed "](#webwidgetallowed) " 策略禁用了构件，则在 Windows 启动时，此策略将不会启动该构件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12992">If the widget is disabled via [WebWidgetAllowed](#webwidgetallowed) policy, this policy will not start the widget on Windows startup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12993">如果禁用此策略： 所有配置文件的Web构件不会在 Windows 启动时启动。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12993">If you disable this policy: The Web widget will not start at Windows startup for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12994">在 Windows 启动时启动构件的选项将在 "Microsoft Edge 设置" 中被禁用，并处于关闭状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12994">The option to start the widget at Windows startup will be disabled and toggled off in Microsoft Edge settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12995">如果未配置策略：所有配置文件的 Web 构件不会在 Windows 启动时启动。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12995">If you don't configure the policy: The Web widget will not start at Windows startup for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12996">在 Windows 启动时，启动构件的选项将在 "Microsoft Edge 设置" 中处于关闭状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12996">The option to start the widget at Windows startup will be toggled off in Microsoft Edge settings.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12997">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12997">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12998">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12998">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-12999">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-12999">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13000">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13000">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13001">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13001">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13002">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13002">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13003">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13003">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13004">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13004">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13005">GP 唯一名称： WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13005">GP unique name: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13006">GP名称：在 Windows 启动时允许Web构件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13006">GP name: Allow the Web widget at Windows startup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13007">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13007">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13008">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13008">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13009">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13009">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13010">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13010">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13011">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13011">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13012">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13012">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13013">值名称：WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13013">Value Name: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13014">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13014">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13015">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13015">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13016">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13016">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="winhttpproxyresolverenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13017">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13017">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="use-windows-proxy-resolver-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13018">使用 Windows 代理解析程序（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13018">Use Windows proxy resolver (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13019">已弃用：此策略已弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13019">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13020">当前受支持，但将在未来的版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13020">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13021">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13021">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13022">在 84 版或更高版本的 Windows 上</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13022">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13023">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13023">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13024">此策略已弃用，因为未来版本中的类似功能将取代该策略，请参阅https://crbug.com/1032820。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13024">This policy is deprecated because it will be superseded by a similar feature in a future release, see https://crbug.com/1032820.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13025">使用 Windows 来解析所有浏览器网络的代理，而不是内置在 Microsoft Edge 中的代理解析器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13025">Use Windows to resolve proxies for all browser networking instead of the proxy resolver built into Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13026">Windows 代理解析器支持 Windows 代理功能，如DirectAccess/NRPT。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13026">The Windows proxy resolver enables Windows proxy features such as DirectAccess/NRPT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13027">此策略附带由https://crbug.com/644030描述的问题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13027">This policy comes with the problems described by https://crbug.com/644030.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13028">它会导致 Windows 代码提取并执行 PAC 文件，包括通过[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)策略设置的 PAC 文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13028">It causes PAC files to be fetched and executed by Windows code, including PAC files set via the [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13029">由于网络获取 PAC 文件是通过 Windows 而不是 Microsoft Edge 代码进行的，网络策略如[DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode)将不会应用于网络获取 PAC 文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13029">Since Network Fetches for the PAC file happen via Windows instead of Microsoft Edge code, network policies such as [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) will not apply to network fetches for a PAC file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13030">如果启用此策略，将使用 Windows 代理解决程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13030">If you enable this policy, the Windows proxy resolver will be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13031">如果禁用或未配置此策略，将使用 Microsoft Edge 代理解决程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13031">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the Microsoft Edge proxy resolver will be used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13032">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13032">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13033">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13033">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13034">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13034">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13035">动态策略刷新：否 - 需要重新启动浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13035">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13036">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13036">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13037">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13037">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13038">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13038">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13039">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13039">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13040">GP 唯一名称： WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13040">GP unique name: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13041">GP 名称：使用 Windows 代理解析程序（已弃用）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13041">GP name: Use Windows proxy resolver (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13042">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13042">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13043">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13043">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13044">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13044">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13045">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13045">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13046">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13046">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13047">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13047">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13048">值名称： WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13048">Value Name: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13049">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13049">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13050">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13050">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13051">返回页首</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13051">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="windowocclusionenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13052">WindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13052">WindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-window-occlusion"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13053">启用窗口封闭</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13053">Enable Window Occlusion</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13054">支持的版本：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13054">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13055">在 Windows 上自 89 或更高版本起</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13055">On Windows since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13056">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13056">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13057">在 Microsoft Edge 中启用窗口封闭。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13057">Enables window occlusion in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13058">如果启用此设置，为了降低 CPU 使用率和功耗，Microsoft Edge 将检测窗口何时被其他窗口覆盖，并将暂停工作绘制像素。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13058">If you enable this setting, to reduce CPU and power consumption Microsoft Edge will detect when a window is covered by other windows, and will suspend work painting pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13059">如果禁用此设置，Microsoft Edge 将不会检测窗口何时被其他窗口覆盖。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13059">If you disable this setting Microsoft Edge will not detect when a window is covered by other windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13060">如果未设置此策略，则将启用窗口隐藏检测。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13060">If this policy is left not set, window hiding detection will be enabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13061">支持的功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13061">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13062">可以强制：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13062">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13063">可以推荐：否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13063">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13064">动态策略刷新：是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13064">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13065">数据类型：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13065">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13066">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13066">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13067">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13067">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13068">组策略 (ADMX) 信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13068">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13069">GP 唯一名称：WindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13069">GP unique name: WindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13070">GP 名称：启用窗口封闭</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13070">GP name: Enable Window Occlusion</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13071">GP 路径（强制）：管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13071">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13072">GP 路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13072">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13073">GP ADMX 文件名：MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13073">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13074">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13074">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13075">路径（强制）：SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13075">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13076">路径（推荐）：不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13076">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13077">值名称：WindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13077">Value Name: WindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13078">值类型：REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13078">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e70d-13079">示例值：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e70d-13079">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```
